ingredients: ['2 cups horseradish root, peeled and cut into 1/2 inch pieces (roughly 12 ounces before peeling)', '3/4 cup distilled white vinegar', '1/2 cup finely chopped peeled raw beet', '1/3 cup sugar', '1/2 teaspoon coarse salt']
directions: ['Using processor fitted with shredder attachment, shred horseradish.', 'Transfer horseradish to medium bowl.', 'Fit processor with metal blade.', 'Return horseradish to work bowl and add ingredients. Process until almost smooth, scraping down sides of bowl occasionally, about 5 minutes. Mix in salt.', 'Place horseradish in glass jar. Cover tightly; chill at least 1 day and up to 10 days.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1/2 cup sour cream', '1 cup Grana Padano cheese, grated', '1 can artichoke hearts, drained and roughly chopped', '1/2 cup minced red onion', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt & black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400ºF. In a medium-sized mixing bowl mix together mayonnaise, sour cream, Grana Padano cheese and onion. Add artichoke hearts, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Transfer mixture to shallow baking dish. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until light brown on top.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, peeled , trimmed and thinly sliced', '1 medium leek, white part only, thinly sliced, washed and dried', '2 large apples, peeled, cored and cut into 1/2-inch cubes (we like McIntosh or Braeburn)', '10 ounces celeriac, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '3 bay leaves', '2 sprigs thyme', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg', 'salt and freshly ground white pepper', '3/4 pound peeled fresh chestnuts (from about 1 1/4 pounds chestnuts in the shell)', '2 quarts chicken stock or store-bought chicken broth', '1/2 cup heavy cream', '2 cups canola oil', '2 cups thinly sliced shallots (about 4 large shallots']
directions: ['Begin by making your crispy shallot topping. In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil until it registers 275°F on a deep-frying thermometer. Add shallots and cook, stirring, until light golden brown, about 8 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer shallots to a paper-towel-lined plate to drain. Increase heat to high and place a fine-mesh sieve over a heatproof bowl. When oil reaches 350°F on the thermometer, add the fried shallots and cook just until they are crisp and well-browned, a few seconds, watching carefully so they do not burn. Immediately pour oil and shallots through sieve to stop cooking, then transfer shallots to paper-towel-lined plate to drain. Shallots will keep in an airtight container at room temperature for 1 day.', 'Heat the oil in a stockpot or large casserole over medium heat. Add the onion, leek, apples, celery root, bay leaves, thyme, nutmeg and salt and pepper to taste and cook, stirring occasionally, for about 10 minutes, or until the onions and leeks are soft but not browned. Add the chestnuts and chicken stock and bring to the boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and cook, skimming the surface regularly, for 35-40 minutes, or until the chestnuts can be mashed easily with a fork. Add the heavy cream and simmer for 5-10 minutes more, then remove from the heat and discard the bay leaves and thyme.', 'Puree the soup until smooth using an immersion blender, then pass it through a fine-mesh strainer. You should have about 2 quarts soup at the point. If you have more, or if you think the soup is too thin -- it should have the consistency of a light cream soup - simmer it over medium heat until slightly thickened. Taste and, adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve soup warm, top with shallots just before serving.', 'adapted from recipes by Daniel Boulud and the New York Times']

ingredients: ['1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon Kosher salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 large sweet-tart apple, cored and thinly sliced', '1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion', '1 pound spinach leaves', '1/2 cup chopped toasted pecans']
directions: ['In a large serving bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt and black pepper until thick and emulsified. Add apple and onion and toss to coat. Add spinach and pecans and toss again. Serve.']

ingredients: ['1 15 oz can pumpkin puree', '1 13.5 oz can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '3 tablespoons tahini', '1 clove garlic', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon cumin powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne, optional', 'salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['In a food processor fitted with a blade, process pumpkin, chickpeas and garlic until fairly smooth.', 'Add olive oil, lemon juice, cumin, cayenne and a pinch of salt and pepper; process until smooth.', 'Add additional salt and pepper to taste. Serve with tortilla chips.']

recipe_name: Roasted Red Pepper and Spinach Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ['15 medium-size cremini mushrooms, stems removed (save stems for filling)', '1/2 tablespoon ½ Tbsp olive oil', '1/4 cup ¼ cup sweet onion, finely chopped', '1/2 cup ½ cup mushroom stems, finely chopped', '1/3 cup 1/3 cup roasted red peppers, finely chopped', '5 ounces 5 ounces frozen spinach, thawed and excess liquid squeezed out', '1-1 1/2 tablespoon 1-1½ Tbsp nutritional yeast', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 drizzle Balsamic reduction']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.', 'In a skillet, over medium heat, sauté onions and mushrooms stems with olive oil for 8-10 minutes or until onions are translucent.', 'Add roasted red peppers and spinach and heat another 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Add sea salt and pepper to taste.', 'Dividing evenly, fill mushroom caps with filling. Bake for 25-30 minutes.', 'Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving if desired.']

recipe_name: Celery Root Remoulade with Smoked Trout and Peas
ingredients: ['1 Tbls olive oil', '4 scallions, sliced (1/2 Cup)', '1lb frozen peas', '2 Tbls Dijon mustard', '1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1 Tbls capers, minced', '1 Tbls preserved lemon, minced', '1 cup Fresh Basil Leaves, chopped', '1/4 Tbls Hot Sauce (optional)', '1lb Celery Root, peeled and cut into julienne strips (4 cups)', '4 stalks of celery, with tender leaves, small diced (1 Cup)', '2 cups fresh parsley leaves', '8 oz. can of smoked trout or salmon, flaked', '1 lemon, zested into strips', '1 head butterhead lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces', '3/4 cup lemon vinaigrette (divided)', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['In a large skillet, heat olive oil, add scallions and cook for about 2 minutes. Add peas, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat to cool while you prep other ingredients.', 'In a mixing bowl, make the dressing. Whisk together the mustard, mayonnaise, 1/2 cup of the lemon vinaigrette, capers, basil, preserved lemon and, if using, hot sauce. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Trim and cut the celery root into julienned matchsticks. A fast way of doing this: slice the root into large, thin slices using a mandolin slicer, then stack the slices and cut them into strips (or you can use the Mandoline Julienne attachment). Or just use a hand knife and cut it by hand. Your call.', 'Mix the julienned celery root with the celery, parsley leaves, lemon zest and smoked trout. Add the cooled peas and mix in the dressing. Season the lettuce with salt and pepper, and toss with the remaining 1/4 cup of lemon dressing. Serve the remoulade over the butterhead salad.']

ingredients: ['1 lb cherries, de-stemmed and pitted', '1 orange', '1 lemon', '5 garlic cloves, peeled and crushed', '2 fresh rosemary sprigs', '5 fresh thyme sprigs', '2 bay leaves', '3/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 c cup Spanish aged sherry vinegar', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt']
directions: ['Place de-stemmed and pitted cherries in medium bowl. Using a vegetable peeler, remove half the zest of the lemon and orange. Add to the bowl along with the garlic, rosemary, thyme and bay. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar and salt. Pour over cherry mix. Stir thoroughly. Let sit at room temperature for four hours, stirring a few times. Cover and refrigerate to marinate overnight. Allow to reach room temperature before serving.']

ingredients: ['1 sweet onion, diced', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '2 limes, juiced', '6 apricots, cubed', '1 large jalapeno, chopped fine', '1 cup cherries, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, taste and adjust for seasoning. Fruit salsas are a great accompaniment to grilled meat or fish. You can mix and match the fruit and herbs to create a multitude of combinations.']

recipe_name: Grilled Peaches with Blue Cheese and Honey
ingredients: ['6 ripe peaches, cut in half and pits removed', '1 cup extra virgin olive oil', '6 oz blue cheese', 'your favorite honey']
directions: ['Brush each peach half with olive oil. Brush grill grates with oil or spray oil. Lay peaches cavity side down on grill and grill 3 minutes. Flip to other side and grill an additional 3 minutes. Remove from grill and place 1 tablespoon blue cheese into each peach cavity. Drizzle each with your favorite honey.']

ingredients: ['1 lb pitted Castelvetrano olives', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', 'zest of 2 lemons', 'juice of 1 lemon']
directions: ['Toss olives with olive oil, zest and juice. Let sit at least 1 hour before serving.', 'These olives are great with cheese platters, salads and as garnishes.', 'Use leftover olive oil for a light salad dressing']

ingredients: ['6 eggs, hardboiled, peeled and cooled', '3 ounces wild salmon, cooked', '1/2 large ripe avocado', '1-3 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1-2 tablespoons fresh dill, minced', '2 tablespoons scallions, finely sliced', 'paprika for sprinkling (optional)', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Slice peeled eggs in half lengthwise. Gently scoop the yolks into a medium mixing bowl and place the whites on a serving tray. Mash yolks into small crumbly pieces with a fork. In a food processor, blend salmon, avocado, lemon juice and dill until well mixed. Add salmon mixture, salt and pepper to the mixing bowl of yolks. Combine well. Fill eggs with yolk/salmon mixture. Garnish with scallions and paprika if desired.', 'Tip: to keep eggs from sliding all over your serving tray, before filling, slice just enough egg white off of the bottom of each half to make egg white flat. Alternatively, you can line serving tray with a bed of kale to keep eggs in place']

ingredients: ['1 tart apple, sliced', '4-6 ounces hard cheese, such as a sharp cheddar, sliced or cubed', '1/4 cup almonds, soaked and dried']
directions: ['Arrange attractively on a platter, or pack it up for an easy on the go snack!']

ingredients: ['1 cup blackberries', '1 tablespoon chia seeds', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon real maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place all ingredients in a food processor. Pulse until desired consistency is reached. Minimal blending results in a jam-like consistency. Further blending will produce jelly. Pour mixture into a glass jar and chill for 60 minutes before serving.']

ingredients: ['1/2 teaspoon coconut oil', '3-5 oz tempeh, seasoned and sliced into thin strips', '1/4 cup cultured cream cheese or vegan cream cheese', '1 sprouted grain tortilla', '1/2 cup spinach, sliced into thin ribbons', '1/2 avocado, sliced', '2 tablespoons mango chutney', '1 pinch freshly ground pepper', '1 pinch sea salt']
directions: ['In a small pan, melt coconut oil over medium-low heat. Add tempeh, warm gently, and set aside. Spread cream cheese or vegan substitute evenly over tortilla. Distribute spinach on one half of the tortilla. Place tempeh and avocado lengthwise on top of spinach layer. Drizzle with mango chutney and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Starting at the side of the tortilla with the fillings, begin rolling all ingredients up like a rug. Continue rolling tightly until wrap is complete. Cut in half on the diagonal and secure with toothpicks if needed.']

ingredients: ['15 medium-size cremini mushrooms, stems removed (save stems)', '1/2 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 cup finely chopped sweet onion', '1/4 cup finely chopped mushroom stems', '1/3 cup roasted red peppers', '5 oz frozen spinach, thawed and excess fluid squeezed out', '1-1 1/2 tablespoon nutritional yeast', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', 'Balsamic reduction for drizzling (optional)']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. In a skillet, over medium heat, sauté onions and mushrooms stems with olive oil for 8-10 minutes or until onions are translucent. Add roasted red peppers and spinach and heat another 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Add sea salt and pepper to taste. Dividing evenly, fill mushroom caps with veggie mix. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground turkey, cooked', '1 15oz can of low sodium white beans, including liquid', '2 cups chicken broth', '1/4 cup tomatillo salsa', 'White pepper and sea salt to taste', '1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro', '1/2 cup sour cream']
directions: ['Throw everything in a pot and let simmer for 30-45 minutes before serving. Great with tortilla chips or cornbread.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon gluten-free mustard', '1 tablespoon raw honey or maple syrup', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons celery seed', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 small head green cabbage, finely shredded', '1 large carrot, grated', '1 cup shredded vegetables of choice (such as snap peas, radishes, broccoli, etc.)']
directions: ['Whisk together dressing ingredients (vinegar, mustard, honey or maple syrup, olive oil, celery seed, and salt and pepper) in a bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste. Toss with cabbage and other veggies.']

ingredients: ['2 cups coarsely grated sweet potato or yam', '4 tablespoons ghee, divided', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped cauliflower', '1-2 cups chopped kale', '2-3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 eggs', 'Additional salt and pepper', '1/3 cup crumbled goat cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F and melt 2 tablespoons of ghee to be mixed with potato shreds. Squeeze sweet potato shreds with a paper towel or in cheesecloth to press out excess liquid. Add potato shreds to a 10″ pie pan with ghee, salt, and pepper, stir to combine, then press into the bottom of pan and up sides to form a crust. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes begin to brown on the surface and edges.', 'While crust bakes, sauté shallot in remaining 2 tablespoons of ghee until translucent. Add cauliflower, sauté until cauliflower is tender, 4-5 minutes. Covering pan will help soften cauliflower more quickly. Add garlic and kale, and sauté one more minute. Remove pie pan from oven and decrease oven temp to 350°F.', 'Distribute cooked veggies evenly over potato crust. Whisk together eggs, and a few shakes of salt and pepper, then pour over veggies. Add cheese and bake 25-30 minutes, or until eggs are set. Allow to cool 10 minutes prior to slicing.']

ingredients: ['1 can of your favorite sardines', '1/3 cup finely chopped onion', '1/2 celery stalk, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons horseradish mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 generous squeeze of fresh lemon juice (about 1 teaspoon)', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 pinch lemon pepper']
directions: ['Drain sardines, place in a bowl, and chop into chunks with a fork. Add celery and onion to sardines and stir. In a separate bowl, blend horseradish mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, sea salt and lemon pepper. Combine dressing with sardine mixture and serve.']

recipe_name: Gorgonzola Spread with Mango and Scallion
ingredients: ['8 oz Greek yogurt or labnah', '2-3 scallions, chopped. Include some green', '1 cup dried mango, coarsley chopped', '8 oz chopped Gorgonzola (or blue if preferred)']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together in medium mixing bowl. Chill. Serve with New Seasons Market Crostini, crackers or bread.']

ingredients: ['8 thin slices of prosciutto', '1 cantaloupe melon, peeled, seeded and sliced into 8 wedges', 'Toothpicks', 'Oil for grill grate- your choice, olive, coconut']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high. Wrap 1 piece of prosciutto around each piece of melon in a spiral shape so that you cover as much of the melon as possible. If necessary, use toothpicks to secure. Oil grill grate and grill each slice 3-4 minutes per side, prosciutto will crisp and turn slightly darker. Serve warm.']

recipe_name: Grilled Corn with Chipotle Lime Compound Butter
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened', '1 teaspoon chipotle chile in adobo sauce, minced', '1 teaspoon adobo sauce from chiles', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoons grated lime zest', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped cilantro', '1/2 teaspoon coarse salt', '3 tablespoons lime juice (add in two steps)', '4 ears of corn', 'Chipotle Lime Compound Butter', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Compound butter:', 'Using a food processor, combine all ingredients, adding lime juice in 2 additions, allowing it to incorporate before adding more.', 'Grilling the corn:', 'Preheat grill to high. Peel back the husk on the corn so that the kernels are exposed and you are able to use the husk as a handle. Remove the silk. Brush with compound butter and grill over high heat 8-10 minutes or until brown and starting to pop.']

ingredients: ['1 lb asparagus, trimmed', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', 'kosher salt to taste', '3 tablespoons shredded Parmesan Reggiano cheese']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high. In a bowl, drizzle oil over asparagus coating evenly. Grill for 2 to 3 minutes on each side. Plate asparagus and drizzle with lemon juice. Lightly salt and top with Parmesan Reggiano.']

ingredients: ['1 green plantain peeled and sliced', '3/4 to 1 cup coconut oil, plus more if needed for frying', 'salt, to taste']
directions: ['Heat the coconut oil in a sauté pan until hot. Carefully place plantain slices in pan, cook on each side until crispy and golden brown. Remove with slotted spoon and place on paper towels to drain. Sprinkle with salt and serve hot.']

ingredients: ['2 bunches of kale, stems removed and leaves sliced thinly', '2 large red beets, peeled and grated', '1 red onion, peeled and sliced paper thin', '1 pinch sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '2-3 teaspoons raw honey', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2-3/4 cup sprouted almonds', '1/2 cup feta cheese (optional)']
directions: ['Place kale, beets and onion in a large mixing bowl and season with salt and pepper. Mix the vinegar and honey together and pour over the veggies, mixing thoroughly. Set aside. (This can be done up to a couple of hours in advance to marinate the veggies.)', 'Whisk together the dill, garlic, and olive oil. Toss the oil mixture with the kale, beets and onion. Add sprouted almonds and feta cheese(optional). Mix and serve. It’s best the next day as it has the most time to marinate, but it’s great either way!']

ingredients: ['1 19oz can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and mashed with a fork', '2 tablespoon vegan mayo (or 1/2 ripe avocado)', '2 teaspoon spicy brown mustard', '1 tablespoon pickle relish (sweet or dill), or 1 medium pickle, finely diced', '2 green onions, chopped', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a medium bowl, combine bean mash, mayo or avocado, pickles, chopped onions, salt and pepper. Mix well.']

recipe_name: Sweet and Spicy Nut and Pretzel Mix
ingredients: ['4 cups large raw nuts (pecans, almonds or cashews)', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1/3 cup dark brown sugar', '1 teaspoon EACH ground allspice, cloves, ginger and cayenne', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 teaspoon kosher salt, if desired', '4 cups gluten free pretzels']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Line a large cookie sheet with foil and spread nuts in an even layer. Bake for about 10 minutes, turning the cookie sheet and stirring halfway through, just until nuts are lightly toasted.', 'Meanwhile, in a large bowl, mix the butter, brown sugar, spices, cocoa and maple syrup. Toss in warm nuts until all are coated. Add in the pretzels and salt, if using. Stir gently to mix, taking care not to break the pretzels. Return mixture to lined cookie sheet, bake for 12-15 minutes, stirring once or twice and watching so they don’t burn. Remove from oven and spread out on a another pan to cool completely.', 'Store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['20 large raw prawns, peeled and deveined', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 tart apple, cored and sliced thinly', '20 thin slices of bacon', '1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '2 lemons, cut into wedges', '1/4 cup fresh parsley, finely chopped', 'Extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling']
directions: ['Lightly season prawns with salt and pepper. Place a slice of apple on each prawn and wrap completely with bacon. In a large pan, melt ghee or coconut oil over medium heat. Arrange prawns on their sides in pan and cook for several minutes. Do not turn over until bacon is fully cooked and prawns become slightly crispy. Turn over and cook the other side until crispy. Remove from pan to serving tray. Garnish with lemon wedges, parsley and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil if desired.']

recipe_name: Grilled Halibut, Romaine and Tapenade Bundles
ingredients: ['12 very large romaine lettuce', '1/2 cup green olive tapenade', '1 lb cod or halibut fillets (1 in. thick)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh lemon juice or lemon wedges']
directions: ['Heat grill to medium (about 375°).', 'Cook lettuce leaves 2 or 3 at a time in a pot of boiling water until ribs are flexible, 2-3 minutes; as done, transfer to a bowl of ice water. Lay leaves flat with smooth sides up on kitchen towels and pat dry. Spread the 8 largest leaves with tapenade. Cut fish into 8 pieces; set 1 at base of each leaf. If leaf isn’t big enough to enclose fish, overlap leaf with another. Roll up each bundle from base, folding in sides. Brush bundles with oil.', 'Grill, turning once until fish is just opaque and up to temperature, about 8 minutes. Serve with lemon.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons minced shallot, about 1 medium shallot', '2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger', '1 medium garlic clove, minced', '2 cups blueberries', '1/4 cup balsamic vinegar', '1/4 cup cococnut sugar', '1/4 teaspoon kosher salt']
directions: ['Heat oil over medium heat. Add shallot and cook until softened, but not browned, about 4 minutes. Add ginger and garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add blueberries, vinegar, coconut sugar, salt and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until thickened, about 30-45 minutes. Let cool to room temperature, pour into an airtight container and store in refrigerator.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup coarsely chopped arugula', '1/2 cup packed fresh herbs—tarragon, oregano, parsley, thyme', '1/3 cup reduced fat plain Greek yogurt', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Pulse all ingredients in a food processor . Add salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 8" pizza crusts or dough to make', '1 large Walla Walla onion, sliced thin', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 lb New Seasons Market bulk Hot Italian Pork Sausage', '1/2 lb Beemster Vlaskaaas, shredded', '1 pint fresh figs, sliced thin']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. Heat skillet over medium heat. Toss the onions in the olive oil and then add them to the hot pan. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently until onions are caramelized. Salt and pepper onions to taste. Remove from the pan. You can use this same pan to cook the sausage. Cook meat until done breaking up as you go. Set aside. To assemble the pizzas: place both crusts on a cookie sheet, top with a little olive oil then the caramelized onion. Top with the cheese, sausage, and figs. Place in the hot oven about 15-20 minutes until crust is brown and bubbly.']

ingredients: ['12 ripe figs, stems removed', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 cup gorgonzola', '1/3 cup honey', '3 teaspoons rosemary leaves']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. With a paring knife, slice down through stem end of fig, about 3/4". Make a second 3/4” cut perpendicular to the first one so that you have an X shaped cut on top of each fig. Gently pry the edges apart and stuff each fig with a teaspoon of the gorgonzola. Place the figs upright on a baking sheet and drizzle the olive oil over the top. Place in preheated oven and bake for about 10 minutes or until figs are soft and tender. When serving, place figs on a plate and top with honey, rosemary and any remaining gorgonzola. Serve warm and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['8 oz goat cheese', '1 lb fresh figs, sliced', '1/2 lb arugula', 'drizzle of balsamic vinegar', 'drizzle of olive oil', '4 Naan breads']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F. Place breads on baking sheet and spread cheese on Naan breads evenly. Top with arugula. Arrange figs and drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil lightly over everything. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until cheese is melted, figs are cooked and crust is crisp. You may bake directly on oven shelf or pizza stone but times and crust will vary.']

ingredients: ['1 cup garbanzo bean flour', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2/3 cup cold water', '1/2 pound asparagus, trimmed and chopped into 1/2 inch pieces', 'several cups high heat oil, for deep frying']
directions: ['In a medium bowl, combine garbanzo flour, curry and garlic powders, and salt and whisk to combine. Add water and stir to make a smooth batter. Stir in asparagus and set aside until ready to use. Heat oil in a medium-sized heavy duty pot to 350 degrees, or in a deep fryer according to directions. Do not fill the pot more that 1/3 full of oil. When the oil reaches temperature, add fritters, one heaping tablespoon at a time. Do not crowd the pan. Fry the fritters until golden brown, turning over if necessary. Remove fritters with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Fry the remainder of the batter in batches. Serve with your favorite hot sauce, if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 dozen hard-boiled duck eggs', '2 tablespoons whole milk yogurt', '1 teaspoon pickle juice (from naturally fermented pickles if possible)', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1/8 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'smoked paprika for garnish']
directions: ['Peel eggs and slice in half lengthwise. Remove yolks and place in a mixing bowl. Mash yolks with a fork then stir in yogurt, pickle juice, mustard and garlic. Add salt and pepper to taste, mix well. Fill each egg white with a dollop of the yolk filling and garnish eggs with a sprinkle of smoked paprika.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup rice*', '1 1/2 cups water', '1/2 cup red lentils', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/4 cup olive oil', '1 cup scallions, chopped']
directions: ['Gently wash and drain the rice. In a pot, bring 1 1/2 cups water and 1/2 cup rice to boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 45 minutes. Remove from heat. In a separate pot, bring 1 cup water and 1/2 cup lentils to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Once fully cooked, combine lentils and rice and rinse in a strainer under cold water. In separate dish combine mustard, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt. Whisk until smooth and toss into rice and lentil combination. Add chopped scallions and mix again to combine all ingredients. Refrigerate and served chilled.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup (half a stick) butter', '1 small yellow onion, medium dice', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '3/4 pound mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 cup hazelnuts, roasted and skinned', '3 tablespoons hazelnut oil']
directions: ['Melt butter in a wide sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the onion, garlic, mushrooms, thyme, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until the onion is soft and most of the liquid from the mushrooms has evaporated. Set aside to cool slightly. Purée the hazelnuts in a food processor. With the motor running, add the hazelnut oil and mix until creamy. Add the mushroom mixture and blend until smooth, scraping down the sides as necessary. Season to taste with more salt and pepper if necessary. Pour pâté into a medium ramekin, smooth the top, and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate until cold.']

ingredients: ['½ cup pimento (well drained!)', '¼ cup mayo', '¼ cup sour cream', '1 tbsp chopped green onion', '1.5 tsp tabasco', '.5 tsp thyme', '1 cup shredded medium cheddar cheese', '1 cup shredded white cheddar cheese']
directions: ['Take half of the pimento and dice it small. Set Aside.', 'In a food processor, puree remaining undiced pimento, mayo, sour cream, green onion, tabasco and thyme. Puree until smooth.', 'In a bowl, hand mix small diced pimento, both cheddar cheeses and pureed ingredients.']

ingredients: ['1 pint blueberries', '2 or 3 ripe nectarines, white or yellow, sliced', '1 pint small mozzarella balls, halved', 'A few leaves fresh basil, thinly sliced', 'Extra virgin olive oil for drizzling', 'A fruity balsamic vinegar (we like Napa Valley Naturals Grand Reserve) for drizzling', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['Arrange blueberries, nectarines and cheese on a platter, or toss in a shallow serving bowl.', 'Sprinkle with shredded basil.', 'Drizzle lightly with olive oil and then balsamic vinegar.', 'Sprinkle very lightly with sea salt and serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['2 ripe avocados', '2 tbsp. fresh lime juice', '1 1/2 tbsp olive oil', 'Salt, to taste']
directions: ['Cut avocado in half and remove seed. Drizzle with fresh lime juice and brush lightly with olive oil. Gently place cut side down on grill over hot coals for 2-3 minutes. Season with salt to taste. Optional: fill with fresh salsa or your favorite fresh ingredients.']

recipe_name: Salade Niçoise Skewers with Fresh Pacific Albacore
ingredients: ['Zest and juice of 2 large lemons (about 2/3 cup juice)', '½ cup fresh basil', '4 anchovies', '3 garlic cloves', 'Pinch of salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2/3 cup olive oil, plus more for cooking the fish', '1 pound fresh pacific albacore tuna (if loins, cut into 1-inch-thick steaks)', '1 pound baby red or gold potatoes (about 8)', '1/4 cup white wine', '2 dozen quail eggs', '1 pint grape tomatoes', '1 cup pitted Niçoise olives', '1 cup fresh basil leaves, torn if large']
directions: ['To make the vinaigrette: In a food processor or blender, puree the lemon zest and juice, basil, anchovies, garlic, salt and pepper. With the machine running, drizzle in the olive oil until blended.', 'To make the salad: Place the tuna in a wide shallow baking dish and pour the vinaigrette over it. Allow to marinate at room temperature for 30 minutes, turning occasionally.', 'Meanwhile, place the potatoes in a pot, cover with water by about an inch, salt it well and bring to a boil. Cook until just tender when pierced with a sharp knife, about 8 to 10 minutes after the water starts boiling. Remove potatoes with a slotted spoon and set aside. When cool enough to handle but still hot, cut in half and place in a bowl. Sprinkle with the white wine (the potatoes will soak up some of the wine and be extra flavorful. If you don’t want to use wine, use chicken or vegetable broth).', 'Place the quail eggs in the hot water and boil for 4 minutes. Remove and place in cold water until cool. Carefully peel off the shells (you only need 16, but it’s good to have extras just in case).', 'When ready to cook the fish, heat a sauté pan over medium-high heat. When hot, add about 1 tablespoon of oil and the marinated fish (do not discard the marinade). Allow to sear until golden brown, about 1 to 2 minutes. Turn over and sear the other side for 1 to 2 minutes more. The fish should still be pink in the center. Transfer to a plate. Pour the marinade into the hot pan and simmer, stirring to scrape up and browned bits. Pour into a bowl and set aside.', 'To assemble: Cut the seared tuna into 11/2-inch chunks. Thread each 12-inch skewer in the following order for maximum prettiness: basil leaf, tomato, tuna, olive, potato, basil leaf, tomato, tuna, olive, egg, basil leaf, tomato, tuna, olive, potato, basil leaf and quail egg. Arrange skewers on a platter and brush or drizzle with the simmered vinaigrette before serving.']

ingredients: ['8 strawberries, diced', '2 nectarines, peeled and diced', '1/2 red onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tomato, diced', '1/2 jalapeno pepper, diced', '3 green onions, finely sliced', '1/2 cup chopped cilantro', '1/2 tsp sugar', '1/2 tsp salt', '1 lime, juiced']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a bowl and serve immediately with your favorite tortilla chips!']

recipe_name: Blistered Padrón Peppers with Tomato Salad
ingredients: ['1 Basket padron peppers', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (mixed variety)', '1 Tbsp. vegetable oil', 'Flaky sea salt (such as Maldon)', '2 Tbsp. grated Parmesans', 'Olive oil to taste', '½ Lemon']
directions: ['Slice cherry tomatoes in half. Put in a bowl and toss with 1/4 tsp. salt. Set aside.', 'Heat 1-tablespoon vegetable oil in a large cast iron skillet over high heat until just smoking. Add the peppers; cook, tossing occasionally, until skins are blistered and flesh is softened, about 4 minutes.', 'Transfer to a bowl, sprinkle with salt and toss to coat.', 'Divide peppers among 4 salad plates, stacking to give some height to each dish.', 'Divide tomatoes and sprinkle around peppers, finish with grated parmesan, a drizzle of olive oil, and a squeeze of lemon.']

ingredients: ['1 cup (8 oz.) cream cheese', '1/3 cup mayonnaise, full fat', '2 cups artichokes, canned, quartered in water', '1/2 cup milk, whole', '3 garlic cloves, peeled, raw', '1/3 cup green onion, chopped 1/4” wide', '1 cup Parmesan cheese, shredded', '2 tsp Kosher salt', '2 tsp black pepper, ground', 'Pinch of Cayenne pepper', '1 tsp lemon juice']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375*F.', 'Drain artichokes, reserve.', 'Drizzle peeled garlic with olive oil, wrap in foil and place in oven. After 30 minutes, check doneness by inserting a knife tip into a clove. Once completely roasted, remove garlic and allow to cool.', 'Puree the cream cheese, milk, garlic, cayenne, salt, pepper and lemon juice in a food processor until smooth, about 1-2 minutes, scraping down side once during the mixing.', 'Add the mayonnaise, artichokes, green onions and parmesan.', 'Pulse mixture until fully incorporated, about 10 pulses, scraping down the side once during mixing.', 'Transfer to a container and chill in the refrigerator until service.']

ingredients: ['1 NSM French or sourdough super boule', '¼ cup butter, melted', '1 tsp minced garlic', '1 tsp fresh sage, finely chopped', '8 oz. Brie cheese, thinly sliced', '3 strips cooked bacon, crumbled', '1 NSM French or sourdough super boule', '¼ cup butter, melted', '1 tsp minced garlic', '1 tsp Italian seasoning (plus a pinch more)', '3/4 cup shredded whole milk mozzarella', '1 cup pizza sauce (appx ½ a 15 oz. can)', '1 NSM French or sourdough super boule', '6 large strawberries, sliced', '5 oz dark chocolate chips', '1 tbsp milk of your choice (non-dairy works great, too!)']
directions:
['FOR BACON & BRIE BOULE:
Preheat oven to 350.
Cut boule into crosshatch pattern bringing cuts down to about halfway through the height of the bread boule.
Combine butter, garlic and sage in a small bowl.
Drizzle over bread.
Stuff cheese slices and bacon crumbles down into spaces in cut bread boule.
Bake on a parchment lined baking sheet for 15-20 minutes, until cheese is melted
Serve immediately.', 'FOR PIZZA BOULE:
Preheat oven to 350.
Cut boule into crosshatch pattern bringing cuts down to about halfway through the height of the bread boule.
Combine butter, garlic and 1 tsp of Italian seasoning in a small bowl.
Spoon pizza sauce into spaces in cut bread boule.
Stuff mozzarella cheese down into spaces, and sprinkle some over the top of the boule as well.
Sprinkle with a pinch of Italian seasoning.
Bake on a parchment lined baking sheet for 15-20 minutes, until cheese is melted.
Serve immediately.', 'FOR CHOCOLATE & STRAWBERRY:
Preheat oven to 350.
Cut boule into crosshatch pattern bringing cuts down to about halfway through the height of the bread boule.
Combine chocolate chips and milk in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave in 10 second increments, stirring between each, until fully melted.
Drizzle melted chocolate over top of boule, reserving appx. 2 tbsp.
Bake on a parchment lined baking sheet for appx. 15 minutes until bread is warmed through.
Remove from oven and stuff strawberry slices into spaces in cut bread boule.
Drizzle with remaining chocolate sauce (give it a quick zap in the microwave if it needs it!) and serve.']

ingredients: ['16 oz. sour cream', '2 cups chopped kale', '1/2 cup fresh parsley, finely chopped', '1/4 cup fresh dill, finely chopped', '1/2 tsp garlic powder', '1/2 tsp onion powder', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together until well combined. Serve with New Seasons Partner Brand Sea Salt and Vinegar Kettle Style Chips.']

ingredients: ['1 1/3 cup all purpose flour', '1 1/2 tsp baking powder', '1/2 tsp Kosher salt', '3/4 cup sugar', '1 Meyer lemon, juiced and zested with a fine zester', '3/4 cup plain yogurt, at room temperature', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 large eggs, at room temperature', '1 tsp vanilla extract', '2 tbls RAFT Hibiscus Lavender Syrup', '3/4 tsp powdered unflavored gelatin', '1 ½ tsp cold water', '4 oz. (1 stick) unsalted butter, at room temperature', '1 cup sugar', '4 Meyer lemons, juiced and zested with a fine zester', 'Pinch of Kosher salt', '2 large eggs, at room temperature', '4 large egg yolks, at room temperature', '8” Meyer Lemon Yogurt Cake', '1 pint Meyer Lemon Curd Filling', '1 quart fresh berries (Strawberries, Raspberries, Blackberries, Blueberries, Huckleberries, Marionberries, Cherries, Currants—whatever spring berries you desire!)', '1/4 cup Raft Hibiscus Lavender Syrup', 'Fresh lavender sprigs or other Edible flower petals']
directions: ['Prepare an 8” round cake pan by greasing the bottom and sides with butter and lining the bottom with a circle of parchment, dust the sides with flour, tap out excess.', 'Preheat oven to 350 F. In a mixing bowl, whisk together Flour, Baking Powder, and Salt. In another mixing bowl, whisk together the Meyer lemon zest, lemon juice, yogurt, olive oil, and vanilla extract. In a standing mixer with a whisk attachment, whip eggs and sugar at high speed until pale in color, light and fluffy and the mixture creates ribbons when it falls away from the whisk. Using a rubber spatula, alternating each, gently fold yogurt and flour mixtures into the eggs in three batches, blending well after each addition.', 'Pour batter into prepared cake pan and bake for 45 minutes until cake tester comes back clean, and top is golden-brown and springs back lightly when gently pressed. Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes, then un-mold onto wire rack and let cool completely.', 'Once cool, stab cake all over with a wooden skewer and pour the Raft Syrup over top of the cake, letting it soak in. Wrap in plastic until ready to assemble.', 'Covered in plastic wrap, the cake will last for up to four days.', 'Dissolve gelatin in water and set aside. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Once butter has melted, remove from heat and whisk in sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, and salt.', 'Slowly add eggs and egg yolks, making sure to whisk well. Over medium heat gently cook the curd, constantly stirring with heat-proof rubber spatula and scraping along the bottom of the pan. Cook until curd thickens, and the top appears glossy and starts to wrinkle a bit at the edges when scraping with rubber spatula. Remove from heat. Whisk in dissolved gelatin and strain curd with a fine mesh strainer into a bowl. Press a piece of plastic wrap along the surface of the curd so that a skin does not form.', 'Refrigerate at least 8 hrs., or overnight. Curd will last in refrigeration for up to 2 weeks.', 'Spread the Meyer Lemon Curd Filling over the top of the cake, and top with the Fresh Berries. Pour the Raft Syrup over the top of the berries and decorate with Fresh Lavender Sprigs or Edible Flower Petals.']

ingredients: ['1 pound apples (we prefer Honeycrisp or Pink Lady)', '1 cup pecans, toasted and chopped', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '2 1/4 cups sugar, divided', '2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour, sifted', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 cup orange juice', '2 1/2 teaspoons vanilla', '4 eggs', '1 cup vegetable oil', '1 cup powdered sugar', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons whole milk']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and lightly flour a 10’ bundt pan. Peel, core and chop apples into chunks. Toss with pecans, cinnamon, and ¼ cup of the sugar and set aside.', 'Stir together flour, baking powder and salt in a large mixing bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together oil, orange juice, sugar and vanilla. Mix wet ingredients into the dry ones, then add eggs, one at a time. Scrape down the bowl to ensure all ingredients are incorporated.', 'Pour half of batter into prepared pan. Spread half of apples over it. Pour the remaining batter over the apples and arrange the remaining apples on top. Bake for about 1½ hours, or until a tester comes out clean. Cool in pan on rack 15 minutes, then invert onto rack to cool completely in the pan, about 1 hour, and then turn it out onto a plate.', 'While the cake cools, add all the glaze ingredients to a small bowl and whisk together until smooth. Drizzle glaze over the top of cake, slice, add ice cream, and serve.', "*Adapted from Deb Perelman's smittenkitchen.com"]

ingredients: ['2-3 apples (Gala, Fuji or Granny Smith)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons coconut sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 200°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment and place a raised wire rack on top of parchment. Wash and thinly slice the apples using a sharp knife or mandolin, remove seeds. Mix cinnamon and coconut sugar together in a small bowl and set aside. Place the apple slices onto the wire racks in a single layer, making sure they do not overlap. Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar mixture.', 'Bake for 1 hour, then flip the apples over. Feel free to sprinkle with more cinnamon and sugar. Bake for another 1 to 1.5 hours. Turn the oven off and keep the apples inside as the oven cools down for 1 hour. Store apple chips at room temperature in an airtight container for up to one week.']

ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup unsalted butter, cubed and well-chilled', '1/4 to 1/3 cup ice water', '6-7 medium to large apples (use a mix of tart and sweet varietals)', 'juice of 2 lemons', '2 tabblespoons granulated sugar', '1/3 cup demerara sugar, plus additional for crust', '1/4 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon allspice', '1/8 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '2-3 dashes Agostora bitters', '1/2-3/4 cup jarred caramel sauce of your choice', '1 1/2 teaspoons flaky sea salt (we like Oregon-harvested Jacobsen salt)', '1 egg']
directions: ['Start by making your dough. Put the flour, sugar and salt in the processor bowl of a food processor and pulse once or twice to combine. Add the butter and continue to pulse until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Slowly add ¼ cup of water as you continue to pulse, adding more water a tablespoon at a time if necessary; stop pulsing when the dough just starts to come together. Remove the dough from the food processor and form into 2 disks. Wrap each one in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or up to 3 days.', 'Remove one disk of dough from the refrigerator and place on a lightly floured surface. Roll the dough out into a 13-inch circle. Transfer the dough to a 9-inch pie plate, and gently press the dough into the bottom of the pan and against the sides. Leave the overhanging dough in place and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or until completely chilled and firm.', 'Preheat oven to 375°F, then prepare your pie filling. Core, peel, and thinly slice apples. Combine with lemon juice and granulated sugar, and set aside to macerate for 20-30 minutes. In a large bowl, stir together demerara sugar, spices, and bitters. Remove apple slices from soaking liquid and add to sugar mixture, toss to coat evenly.', 'Place half the apple filling into prepared bottom crust. Pour ¼ cup of the caramel over top and sprinkle with ½ teaspoon of flaky salt. Follow that with remaining apple filling and then top with more caramel, ¼ to ½ cup depending on desired sweetness. Sprinkle remaining salt evenly over pie filling.', 'Roll out remaining pie dough and cut into strips. Place in a lattice pattern over apples. Crimp edges of crust. Brush with beaten egg and lightly sprinkle with additional demerara sugar. Place pie on a preheated baking sheet and bake 20 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 325F and continue baking 30 to 45 minutes. Test doneness of apples with a long toothpick or small knife. They should be just soft. Let cool at least 1 hour before slicing.', '*Heavily adapted from the Four & Twenty Blackbirds recipe']

ingredients: ['1 pound Granny Smith apples (3 to 4), peeled, cored, and sliced into rings', '1 1/2 cups rolled oats', '1/2 cup walnuts, chopped', '1/3 + 1 cup + tablespoon light brown sugar, divided, plus more for serving', '1/4 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 large egg', '1 3/4 cups whole milk', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted, plus extra for greasing dish']
directions: ['Adjust oven rack to middle position and preheat oven to 350°F. Lightly grease a shallow 2-quart baking dish. Scatter apples into dish and cover with foil. Bake until apples are just beginning to soften, about 20 minutes.', 'Remove foil and let cool slightly, about 10 minutes. Scatter oats and walnuts into dish. Whisk ⅓ cup brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, egg, milk, and melted butter in medium bowl to combine. Pour into baking dish. Using a spoon, gently press and stir oats into milk mixture to moisten and distribute apples evenly.', 'Sprinkle remaining tablespoon of brown sugar over top of oatmeal, and bake until center is just set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm.', '*Adapted from seriouseats.com']

ingredients: ['1 butternut squash peeled, seeded and cubed', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', '2 tablespoons bacon fat, tallow or lard, divided', '1 onion, diced', '2 stalks celery, diced', '1.5 pounds bulk sage pork sausage', '1 granny smith apple, diced', '1-2 tablespoons butter, greasing pan', '1 cup dried cranberries', '1 cup toasted pecans, chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh chopped herbs (sage, rosemary, thyme, et al)', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 cup turkey broth or apple cider']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375ºF and butter a 9”x13” baking dish. Set aside.', 'Lay out squash and sweet potatoes on a rimmed baking sheet and toss with 1 tablespoon of fat. Bake in preheated oven, 20-25 minutes or until mostly cooked.', 'Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat, sauté onion in remaining tablespoon of fat until translucent, 8-10 minutes. Add celery and continue to cook, 2-3 minutes. Add sausage and apple and cook, using a spoon to break up any large chunks, 6-8 minutes.', 'Using a large mixing bowl, combine squash, potatoes, sausage mixture, cranberries, pecans, fresh herbs and spices. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and add broth or cider to the top.', 'Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake in preheated oven, 15-20 minutes. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups all purpose flour', '1 t salt', '1 T sugar', '8 oz. Cold Butter, cut into slices', '1/3-1/2 cup cold water', '4 oz. Butter', '1 Vanilla bean pod, split, seeds scraped', '3lbs Assorted Apples, peeled, cored and sliced', '1/4 t salt', '3/4 cup White Sugar', '1/2 cup Brown sugar', '1/4 cup Cornstarch', '1 t ground cardamom', '1/4 t ground cinnamon', '12 oz. Raspberries (fresh or frozen)', '1 Lemon zest and juice', '1 t vanilla extract', '2 oz. candied ginger chopped, fine', '1 Egg beaten', '1 T + 1 t White Sugar', '1/4 t cinnamon', 'Pinch salt']
directions: ['Dough: In a large mixing bowl, stir together flour, salt and sugar. Cut Cold Butter into slices and toss into flour mix, work butter into flour; flattening butter slices with your fingers and rubbing into the flour. Do not over-blend, you want some large chunks of butter to be visible. Sprinkle mixture with water and blend together with a fork until dough starts to come together. Fold and knead the dough against itself inside the bowl until it comes together. Divide into two discs,wrap in plastic wrap, and chill for 2 hrs (or overnight, or freeze up to two weeks).', 'Flour surface and roll each disc into a 12” circle, trim edges. Line one 9” Pie plate and place other crust on a sheet tray, chill crusts while you make the filling.', 'Filling: Melt butter in a large skillet, add vanilla bean seeds, apples and salt, cook 5 minutes until apples just start to get tender and releases some juice, remove from heat and pour into large mixing bowl. Add the rest of the ingredients for the filling and set aside to cool. Mixture will be syrupy.', 'Topping: Stir together sugar, cinnamon and salt. Beat egg until well combined.', 'Preheat Oven to 400. Place Pie plate on parchment-lined sheet tray. Fill crust with filling and top with second crust, tucking down in around the filling. Pull up over-hanging crusts and fold against itself, then go around a second time and crimp into a decorative edge. Brush top and crimped edges with Egg and sprinkle with cinnamom-sugar. Place pie on sheet tray in the middle rack of the oven and bake for 15 minutes, reduce heat to 350 and bake for 1 hr. Let cool 1-2 hr before serving.']

recipe_name: Dina’s Pap Pap’s Sugar Cookies with Cherry Icing
ingredients: ['4 cups flour', '1 tsp baking powder', '½ tsp baking soda', '½ tsp salt', '1 cup softened butter', '1 ½ cups sugar', '1 egg', '½ cup dairy sour cream', '1sp vanilla', '4 cups powdered sugar', '2 tsp vanilla', 'Healthy tsp of softened butter', '2 tbsp cherry juice', '2-4 tbsp milk or water. (Note: add very carefully one at a time to desired consistency. You want this thick enough to hold on cookie. If it gets too thin, just add a bit more powdered sugar. Too thick? add more cherry juice)']
directions: ['Beat sugar, butter, egg until fluffy. Beat in sour cream and vanilla until smooth. Gradually mix in dry ingredients, and form a ball. Refrigerate several hours or overnight.', 'Roll out, cut in shape of choice and bake 375 degrees for 8-10 minutes.', 'Combine all icing ingredients and frost over cooled cookies.']

ingredients: ['1 lb macaroni, cooked according to package directions', '4 cups shredded Beecher’s Flagship', '5 tablespoons butter, slightly more for greasing the pan', '2 cups milk', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 tsp dry mustard powder', '½ tsp cayenne, optional', '2 tsp each salt and black pepper', '2 cups crushed potato chips (*could use bread crumbs or nothing if this is too low class for Beecher’s cheese)']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350ºF and butter a 9”x13” baking dish.', 'In a saucepan over medium heat melt butter. Add milk and stir to combine. Add flour, mustard powder, cayenne (if using) and salt and pepper. Add cheese and stir to combine and melt cheese entirely.', 'Turn off heat and stir in noodles. Transfer to greased baking dish.', 'Top with potato chips and bake in preheated oven for 15-20 minutes. Serve warm and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['4 large peaches, sliced', '2 cups fresh berries', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons arrowroot', '1/2 cup coconut sugar', '1 cup almond flour', '1/4 cup coconut flour', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1/2 cup gluten free oats', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1/2 cup coconut sugar', '1/2 cup coconut oil', '1/4 cup slivered almonds', '1/2 cups coconut flakes']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Place peaches and berries in a large bowl, sprinkle with lemon juice, vanilla and arrowroot and coconut sugar; toss to incorporate all ingredients. In a smaller bowl, combine almond & coconut flours, cinnamon, oats, salt, sugar, coconut oil, almonds and coconut flakes until crumbly for topping.\nPlace peach mixture in a 3 quart baking dish. Crumble topping over the peach mixture. Bake covered at 350° for 45 minutes until peach juice is bubbling. Remove cover and bake a few more minutes if topping is not yet browned.', 'Let cool and top with ice cream.']

ingredients: ['2 apples, cut into chunks', '2 tablespoons ghee or coconut oil (use coconut oil to make this vegan)', '2 teaspoons cinnamon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375°F. Combine all ingredients in heat-proof container, such as a Pyrex dish, and bake for 20 minutes.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups unsweetened shredded coconut', '4 oz semisweet chocolate']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Toast coconut until fragrant and lightly browned. Melt chocolate using a double boiler. When melted, remove from heat and stir in cooled toasted coconut. Place parchment or wax paper on a cookie sheet. Drop coconut chocolate mixture by spoonfuls onto cookie sheet and refrigerate until firm.']

ingredients: ['2 cups coarsely grated sweet potato or yam', '4 tablespoons ghee, divided', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped cauliflower', '1-2 cups chopped kale', '2-3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 eggs', 'Additional salt and pepper', '1/3 cup crumbled goat cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F and melt 2 tablespoons of ghee to be mixed with potato shreds. Squeeze sweet potato shreds with a paper towel or in cheesecloth to press out excess liquid. Add potato shreds to a 10″ pie pan with ghee, salt, and pepper, stir to combine, then press into the bottom of pan and up sides to form a crust. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes begin to brown on the surface and edges.', 'While crust bakes, sauté shallot in remaining 2 tablespoons of ghee until translucent. Add cauliflower, sauté until cauliflower is tender, 4-5 minutes. Covering pan will help soften cauliflower more quickly. Add garlic and kale, and sauté one more minute. Remove pie pan from oven and decrease oven temp to 350°F.', 'Distribute cooked veggies evenly over potato crust. Whisk together eggs, and a few shakes of salt and pepper, then pour over veggies. Add cheese and bake 25-30 minutes, or until eggs are set. Allow to cool 10 minutes prior to slicing.']

ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten', '2 cups coconut palm sugar', '1 cup olive or coconut oil', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground nutmeg', '2 cups shredded summer squash']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325°F. Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish. In a large bowl, use an electric mixer to beat the eggs until fluffy. Beat in the sugar, oil and vanilla. Next, gradually mix in the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Fold in shredded squash. Transfer to prepared baking dish and bake for 45 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.']

ingredients: ['1 New Seasons Market Pizza Dough', '1/3 cup Dalmatia Fig Spread', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped mint', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped italian parsley', '3 oz feta, crumbled', 'flakey sea salt', 'olive oil for drizzing']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400º F. Roll or stretch out pizza dough to the desired shape then place on an un-oiled sheet pan. Smear dough with fig spread, leaving a naked edge. Sprinkle flatbread with garlic, mint, and parsley then top with crumbled feta.\nBake 20 minutes, until dough has crisped and cooked through. Remove pizza from the oven, cut, and place on serving tray. Sprinkle with sea salt and drizzle with a good amount of olive oil.']

ingredients: ['8 oz goat cheese', '1 lb fresh figs, sliced', '1/2 lb arugula', 'drizzle of balsamic vinegar', 'drizzle of olive oil', '4 Naan breads']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F. Place breads on baking sheet and spread cheese on Naan breads evenly. Top with arugula. Arrange figs and drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil lightly over everything. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until cheese is melted, figs are cooked and crust is crisp. You may bake directly on oven shelf or pizza stone but times and crust will vary.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups almond flour', '3/4 cup finely chopped pecans', '1/2 cup coconut butter, melted', '3 tablespoons raw honey', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'Pinch of sea salt', '2 pounds carrots, peeled and halved', '1 cup canned coconut milk', '2 eggs from pastured hens', '1/2 cup coconut sugar', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 cup coconut flour']
directions: ['For crust:\nPreheat oven to 350°F. In a large bowl, combine almond flour, pecans and salt. In a separate bowl combine coconut butter, honey and vanilla extract. Slowly add dry ingredients to wet until completely combined. Using your fingers, press into a 9-1/2” pie pan. Bake in preheated oven for 12-14 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Remove and set aside to cool completely before filling.', 'For filling:\nPreheat oven to 425°F. Using a rimmed baking sheet, lay out carrot halves and roast 20-25 minutes. Allow to cool slightly. Reduce oven temperature to 350°F. Using a food processor or blender, puree roasted carrots until very smooth. Pour in coconut milk while continuing to blend. Add all remaining ingredients and blend until smooth. Pour filling into crust. Bake in preheated oven for 35 minutes, or until filling is set. Cool 15-20 minutes. Serve chilled or at room temperature. Top with cashew cream if desired.']

recipe_name: Marionberry Slab Pie with Oatmeal Crumb Topping
ingredients: ['5 cups local marionberries', '¾ cup sugar', '2 lemons, zest and juice', '1/4 cup cornstarch', '2 1/2 cups flour', '3 tablespoons sugar', '1 cup unsalted butter, cold and cut into 1” chunks', '2 egg yolks', '1/4 to 1/2 cup ice water', '1 cup almond flour', '1 cup brown sugar', '1/2 cup oats', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 cup unsalted butter, cold and cut into 1” chunks']
directions: ['CRUST: Put dry ingredients in bowl of food processor. Add butter and pule 8-10 times. In a small bowl, combine egg yolks and 1/4 cup ice water. Pour mixture into food processor while running until dough just holds together. Form dough into a solid disk and wrap in plastic. Chill at least one hour.', 'FILLING: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.', 'TOPPING: Put dry ingredients into the bowl of food processor. Pulse to combine. Add butter and pulse until ingredients resemble a coarse meal.', 'ASSEMBLY: Preheat oven to 375ºF. Using a rimmed baking sheet, use your hands to freeform pat the crust close to the edges. Layer on filling, centering in the dough. Add crumb topping. Bake in preheated oven about 40 minutes until filling is bubbly and top is golden brown. Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.']

ingredients: ['1 pie dough', '5 Swiss Gourmet apples,', '4 tablespoons lemon juice (about half a lemon)', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter', '5 tablespoons strawberry jam']
directions: ['Chill muffin pan while preparing dough. Roll out prepared pie dough and cut into 3-4” rounds. (The lid of a pint-sized mason jar works well if you don’t have a round cutter.) Gently press rounds into chilled muffin tin and return to the refrigerator while preparing filling.', 'Core and thinly slice apples (to about 1/16”) using a mandoline. In a large mixing bowl, toss apples with lemon juice.', 'In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Stir in brown sugar, cinnamon, sea salt and jam. Stir to combine and cook 3-4 minutes. Remove from heat and immediately add to apples. Strain apples slices and discard liquid.', 'Preheat oven to 350ºF. To form roses, arrange about 25 apple slices in a straight row, with each slice overlapping one another to create about an 18-inch line. Starting with one end, gently roll apples. Transfer rolled apples into pie crust. Repeat rolling apples, until all pie crusts are filled. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Cool and use a paring knife to carefully remove apple rose pies from muffin pan. Cool completely before serving. Serve with fresh whipped cream if desired.']

ingredients: ['3 ½ cups apple cider', '½ cup reduced cider', '1 cup finely chopped apple (we recommend Honeycrisp)', '2 tbls butter, softened', '3/4 cup sugar', '1 egg', '3 cups flour', '2 tsp Baking Powder', '½ tsp baking soda', '1 tsp salt', '½ tsp nutmeg', '1/3 cup buttermilk', '1 tsp vanilla', '1/3 cups reduced cider', '¾ cup sugar', '½ cup cream', '1 cup Sugar', '1 tbls cinnamon', 'Vegetable oil, for frying']
directions: ['Reduce 3 ½ cups apple cider to 1 cup. Divide.', 'In small bowl, add 1/2 cup of reduced cider to finely chopped apple. Let sit while you make doughnut batter.', 'For the batter:\nMix butter into sugar with your fingers until it resembles wet sand. Add egg and whisk until very pale in color. In separate bowl, whisk flour, baking powder, soda, salt and nutmeg together. Add buttermilk, vanilla & apple mixture to butter/sugar/egg mixture. Add flour mixture JUST until combined. Generously flour a piece of parchment, and pat dough out onto parchment about ½-3/4” thick. Dust top with flour, cover, and refrigerate until cold—preferably overnight.', 'In the morning, heat oil to 360 degrees. While the oil is heating, mix sugar and cinnamon for dipping—we recommend using a pie plate. Cut out or shape doughnuts and/or holes as desired. Fry one side until golden brown, then flip and cook another minute or two. Let cool on rack a minute or two, then roll in cinnamon sugar.', 'Serve with caramel sauce on side for dipping or drizzling!', 'For caramel sauce:\nCombine ¾ cup sugar and 1/3 cup reduced cider in medium saucepan over medium high heat. Boil until color changes to a darker brown and syrup-y (caramel colored). Carefully add cream (it will bubble at you—be careful!). Bring back to boil, and cook a few minutes. Cool slightly, then pour on everything.']

ingredients: ['1 1/4 cup sugar', '1 cup self-rising flour', '1 cup milk', '1/2 cup melted butter', '1 tsp vanilla', '2 cups diced strawberries']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350. Spray an 11" x 8" baking dish with non-stick cooking spray.', 'Whisk together 1 cup sugar and flour.', 'Add milk. Whisk until almost smooth.', 'Add melted butter and vanilla. Pour into your baking dish.', 'Top with strawberries and remaining sugar.', 'Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, until golden.', 'Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds beets', '2-3 beef short ribs', 'olive oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '2 stalks celery, diced', '2 carrots, peeled and diced', '2 sprigs parsley', '2 teaspoons caraway seeds', '1 teaspoon peppercorns', '8 cups beef stock or water', '1/2 pound cabbage, thinly shredded', 'apple cider vinegar', 'salt and pepper', 'sour cream, to taste', 'fresh dill, to taste']
directions: ['Place washed beets in a baking pan and drizzle with salt and pepper and a few tablespoons of olive oil. Cover with foil and roast in a 375’ oven for about 1 hour or until tender when pierced with a fork. Remove from oven and let cool. Meanwhile, in a large stock pot, salt ribs and brown on all sides. Add onions and sauté about 10 minutes or until translucent. Add celery, carrots, parsley, caraway seeds, peppercorns and stock and bring to a gentle boil.', 'Add the cabbage and lower heat. Simmer until the meat is fully cooked and tender. This may take 2 to 3 hours.', 'When beets are cool enough to handle, remove skins, dice and add all roasting juices and beets to soup.', 'When the meat is tender, remove the bones and fat and shred meat back into soup.', 'Season with salt pepper and vinegar and serve with sour cream and fresh chopped dill as a garnish.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds sirloin, cut into thin strips', '1 cup brown rice flour', '1/3 cup butter, divided use', '1 yellow onion, diced', '16 ounces sliced mushrooms', '1/4 cup dry sherry', '2 cups beef stock', '2/3 cup sour cream', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon salt', '3 teaspoons black pepper', '1 package egg noodles, cooked according to package directions', '3 tablespoons butter (for egg noodles)']
directions: ['Dredge the sirloin strips in flour. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter and brown the sirloin strips, about 3 minutes on each side, until fully cooked.', 'Set meat aside and add remaining butter to skillet. Sauté onions and mushrooms, about 5 minutes. Return meat to skillet and add salt and pepper. Stir well.', 'Add sherry, thyme and beef broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 1 hour.', 'Taste and adjust seasonings, adding more salt or pepper, if desired. Remove from heat and stir in sour cream. Serve immediately with buttered egg noodles.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable or olive oil', '3 pounds beef stew meat, cubed', '2 teaspoons salt & pepper', '2 yellow onions, diced', '1/4 cup flour', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 cup red wine', '1 1/2 cups beef broth', '1 1/2 cups chicken broh', '1 bay leaf', '3 large russet potatoes, diced', '4 carrots, diced', '1 10 ounce package frozen peas']
directions: ['Heat the oil in a large pot, then add the beef, seasoning with salt and pepper. Brown meat on all sides then remove and set aside. Next sauté the onions. When they start to become softened (about 5 min.) reduce the heat to med-low and add the flour. Cook 2 min, stirring often. Add garlic and thyme, cook 1 more minute. Stir in tomato paste. Add the wine and deglaze the pan, scraping any browned bits stuck to the bottom of the pan. The flour will start to thicken the wine as it comes to a simmer. Simmer for 5 min, then add the broth, bay leaf, and browned beef. Bring back up to a simmer, cover and cook on low for about an hour. Add the potatoes and carrots and simmer for another hour or until the vegetables are tender and meat is up to temperature. Taste and adjust seasoning to the desired level. Add frozen peas, heat for a few more minutes, then serve.', 'To allow the flavors to fully marry, this stew is BEST made a day in advance.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds ground beef', '3/4 pound ground pork', "1/2 cup Ian's gluten-free bread crumbs", '1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce', '1 medium onion', '4 cloves garlic', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '2 eggs', '1 can tomato paste', '1 pound bacon', '15-ounce can tomato sauce', '1/3 cup brown sugar', '1/4 cup Worcestershire', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375ºF.', 'Place onion and garlic in the bowl of a food processor and pulse to chop up. Chop until small, but not to liquid. Remove onions and garlic to a large bowl.', 'Add in the rest of the ingredients except for bacon and sauce ingredients. Stir together. Pat the mixture into a loaf shape in a 9" x 13" pan.', 'Open the package of bacon and lay over the top of the meatloaf to cover completely.', 'Bake in the oven for about an hour. Check the temperature in the center; meatloaf should be 155 degrees. While meatloaf is in the oven, heat and combine sauce ingredients in a small sauce pan over medium heat.', 'When the meatloaf is the correct temp and the bacon is browned, top with some of the sauce. Bake 10 minutes more or broil to finish sauce. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['5 Tbls unsalted butter, softened', '1 chipotle chile in adobo sauce, minced', '1 tsp adobo sauce from chiles', '1 clove of garlic', '3 Tbls lime juice', '1 Tbls grated lime zest', '1 tsp honey', '1 Tbls fresh cilantro leaves', '1/2 tsp coarse salt']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a mixer or food processor, adding the lime juice in 3 additions, allowing it to incorporate before adding more.', 'Store in an airtight container, refrigerated for up to 1 week.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs steak', '1/2 cup soy sauce', '1/2 cup honey', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1/2 cup olive oil']
directions: ['Score the steak by making crisscross cuts on the surface on both sides of the meat. Mix the ingredients for the marinade and pour over the steak. Marinate covered in the refrigeator for at least 45 minutes or overnight. Grill as desired and slice on the diagonal.']

ingredients: ['2 peaches, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 mango, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '½ red onion, finely chopped', '3 jalapenos, seeded and chopped', '1 cup cilantro, finely chopped', 'Juice of 1 lime and 1 lemon', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Toss all but the lemon and lime juice in a mixing bowl and stir together. Add the juice of the lemon and lime second, along with salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 medium head cauliflower', '1/2 pound ground meat (beef, lamb, turkey, etc.)', '1/4 pound chicken livers, chopped (optional)', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 medium carrot, chopped', '3-5 leaves kale, de-stemmed and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 inch ginger, minced or grated', '2 tablespoons coconut aminos', '2 tablespoons rice or coconut vinegar', 'fat of choice for cooking (lard, tallow, coconut oil, or ghee)', 'cilantro, chopped, for garnish']
directions: ['Core and separate cauliflower florets, pulse in food processor gently until the size of rice grains - do not over process. In a wide pan, heat cooking fat to medium, add onion and carrot and sauté until onion is translucent. Add ground meat and optional liver, breaking up a with wooden spoon into small crumbles. Add garlic, ginger, and kale. Mix well. Add cauliflower, mix well, and cover for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and toss well with vinegar or coconut aminos, and cilantro.']

ingredients: ['2T vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped fine', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '6 garlic cloves, minced', '1/4 c chilli powder', '1T ground cumin', '2t ground coriander', '1t red pepper flakes', '1t dried oregano', '1/2 t cayenne pepper', '2lb 10% ground beef', '2 15oz cans red kidney beans, rinsed', '1 28oz can diced tomatoes, drained', '1 28oz can tomato puree', '1/2t salt']
directions: ['Heat oil in large pot over medium heat. Add onions, bell peppers, garlic, chili powder, cumin, coriander, pepper flakes, oregano, and cayenne and cook until vegetables are softened. Increase heat to medium-high and add half of beef.', 'Add remaining beef and cook thoroughly. Add beans, tomatoes, tomato puree, and salt; bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, stirring occasionally for 1 hour.', 'Remove cover and simmer for another 1 hour.']

ingredients: ['1 Rio Star grapefruit', '1/2 medium garnet yam, peeled and cut into pieces', '1 large carrot', '1/2-1 inch piece fresh turmeric root', '1/2 Meyer lemon (peel can be left on if desired), seeds removed', 'Pinch of black pepper', 'Pinch of cayenne pepper (0ptional)']
directions: ['Run grapefruit, yam, carrot, turmeric and lemon through juicer. Strain if desired. Add a pinch of black pepper and cayenne. Enjoy!']

recipe_name: Raft Syrup’s West Coast Sparkle Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 oz. Momokawa Silver saké', '1 Tbls RAFT Hibiscus Lavender syrup', '1 Tbls fresh Meyer lemon juice', '4-5 oz. Scharffenberger Brut', 'ice']
directions: ['In a cocktail shaker or mason jar filled halfway with ice, add saké, RAFT Hibiscus Lavender syrup and lemon juice. Shake for 15-20 seconds. Strain into a glass and top with sparkling wine.', 'Mocktail version:\nYou can make a delicious non-alcoholic version of this drink. Substitute pear or apple juice for the saké, and sparkling water for the sparkling wine.']

ingredients: ['1 cup water', '1 cup sugar', '1 2-inch piece of fresh ginger, peeled and minced', '2 tablespoons ginger syrup', '1 peach, halved, pitted and thinly sliced OR 1/2 cup fresh peach puree', 'ice', 'sparkling water', 'fresh mint leaves']
directions: ['To make the syrup, combine water, sugar and ginger in a saucepan over medium low heat. Stir and cook until the sugar has completely dissolved. Remove from heat and steep at room temperature for about 30 minutes. Pour the syrup through a fine mesh sieve, using the back of a wooden spoon to press all the syrup out of the ginger. Place in a covered jar and refrigerate.', 'Evenly distribute peach slices into 4 tall glasses, (or 2 tablespoons peach puree) smash the peaches with a spoon to release their juice. Pour about 2 tablespoon ginger syrup over the peaches in each glass. (The remaining syrup can be stored for up to 2 weeks in the refrigerator.) Add ice cubes and then top off with sparkling water. Float a few mint leaves on top and serve.']

ingredients: ['1-2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '8 ounces water']
directions: ['Stir together and consume 15-20 minutes before meals.']

ingredients: ['Sparkling Apple cider or try a Hard Cider for a grown up twist', 'Ice cream or frozen Yogurt', 'Caramel sauce', 'Cinnamon']
directions: ['Pour sparkling cider into glass. Add a scoop of ice cream or frozen yogurt. Drizzle with a caramel sauce and then finish off with a sprinkle of cinnamon.']

ingredients: ['8 cups rice milk', '1/2 tablespoon almond extract', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '2 cinnamon sticks (more for garnish)', '2 whole vanilla beans, split to expose paste', 'ice']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and sweeten to taste. Pour over ice and add extra cinnamon sticks to the glass for decoration if you like.']

ingredients: ['4 cups brewed ginger tea', '2 tablespoons cacao powder', '4 dates, soaked for a few hours, pitted and chopped', '1/2 cup wide unsweetened coconut shreds, toasted', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch cayenne', '4 cinnamon sticks (for garnish)']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients (except the cinnamon sticks) in a blender. Strain through cheesecloth or a nut milk bag. Heat strained mixture gently in sauce pan until warm. Serve with a cinnamon stick for garnish.']

ingredients: ['1 cup water', '1 cup granulated sugar', '1-2 inches fresh, peeled and chopped ginger', '1 oz fresh lime juice', '1/4 oz Ginger Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz pineapple juice', 'ginger beer', 'ice']
directions: ['Simple Syrup:', 'Combine water and sugar in a pot on low heat and simmer until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat. Add the fresh ginger and let steep for 15-20 minutes or to taste. Cool syrup completely and store in the refrigerator. The ginger simple syrup makes a great mixer for cocktails, or you can use it for desserts or to top ice cream.', 'Making the cocktail:', 'Pour lime juice, ginger syrup and pineapple juice into a shaker with ice. Shake until chilled and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Top off with ginger beer and garnish with a lime wedge.']

ingredients: ['8 oz glass', '6 oz ginger beer', '1 tablespoon grenedine', 'marschino cherry']
directions: ['Place ice in glass; pour ginger beer over ice. Add grenadine and stir to combine. Top with cherry. Serve.']

ingredients: ['1 quart water', '1/2-3/4 cup sugar', '1/3 cup hibiscus flowers (Bulk Deptartment)', '1 quart ice', 'garnish with lemon or lime slicesl']
directions: ['Place the water, sugar, and hibiscus flowers in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Let boil 1-2 minutes then turn heat off. Let the flowers soak for about 30 minutes and allow to cool. Taste for sweetness and add more sugar if needed. Strain the mixture through a fine sieve. Cool to room temperature and then refrigerate until well chilled. Serve over ice. Garnish with lemon or lime wedges.']

ingredients: ['1 cup water', '1 cup sugar', 'Choose one of the following', '1.5 oz basil, mint, other non woody herb', '.5 oz rosemary, thyme or other woody herb', '3 tablespoons rose hips (found in our Bulk Spice Dept.)', '1 tablespoon lavendar flowers (found in our Bulk Spice Dept.)', '1 sprig mint, 5-7" long']
directions: ['Place sugar and water in a medium sized sauce pan. Add your choice of herbs from the Infusion Flavor list or the Floral Infusion ingredients to the pan. On a medium heat bring to a boil then turn off. Let sit for about 30 minutes to infuse. Strain through a very fine sieve lined with cheesecloth. Refrigerate until ready to use.', 'May be used in cocktail preparations, as an addition to lemonade or sparkling water garnished with a piece of the fresh herb.']

ingredients: ['6 oz pilsner beer', '2 oz bloody mary mix', '6 oz lager', '1 tablespoon hibiscus syrup', '6 oz lager', '1/2 cup ice', '4 oz grapefruit juice', '6 oz pale lager', '3 oz limeade or lemondade', '5 oz dark beer', '5 oz hard cider']
directions: ['Cocktail One: Combine ingredients in glass and garnish with pickled jalapenos.', 'Cocktail Two: Combine ingredients in glass.', 'Cocktail Three: Place lager in a blender with the ice and blend just until slushy. Salt rim a glass, pour in the grapefruit juice and then top with the beer slushy. Garnish with half slice of grapefruit.', 'Shandy: Combine ingredients in glass and garnish with lemon or lime.', 'Snakebite: Combine ingredients in glass.']

ingredients: ['1 part Full Sail Session or favorite lager', '1 part Santa Cruz Lemonade', 'Lager Suggestions: Truman Pilsner or Hopworks Lager']
directions: ['Chill the lager and the lemonade before hand. In a pitcher, combine the two and serve in chilled glass.']

ingredients: ['4 oz pink grapefruit juice', '1 oz fresh lime juice', '2 oz tonic water', '1 teaspoon The Bitter Housewife Grapefruit Bitters']
directions: ['Mix together the first four ingredients and serve over ice. If desired, garnish with a slice of grapefruit or lime.']

ingredients: ['1 (12 oz) can La Croix Grapefruit Sparkling Water', '2 oz fresh grapefruit juice', '1 oz fresh lime juice', '3 oz ginger beer', '1 sprig fresh rosemary']
directions: ['Mix together all ingredients and serve over ice.\nIf desired, garnish with a slice of grapefruit or lime.']

ingredients: ['1 cup coconut milk', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2-1 teaspoon raw honey', 'pinch black pepper', 'optional additions (pinch of ground ginger, drop of vanilla extract)']
directions: ['In a saucepan, warm coconut milk over medium heat. Stir in all other ingredients and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['1 tbsp. fresh-squeezed lime juice', '6 oz. grapefruit sparkling water', '1 ½ oz. fresh-squeezed Melogold grapefruit juice', 'Fresh mint for garnish']
directions: ['Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with a wedge of grapefruit and mint leaves.']

ingredients: ['1 tbsp. fresh-squeezed lime juice', '6 oz. grapefruit sparkling water', '1 ½ oz. freshly squeezed grapefruit juice', 'Fresh mint for garnish']
directions: ['Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with a wedge of grapefruit and mint leaves.']

ingredients: ['Zest of one orange, left in wide ribbons', '1/2 cup orange juice', '1 lemon, sliced in cartwheels', '1/2 cup lemon juice', '1 bottle dry, hearty red wine', '3/4 cup sugar', '2 fresh peaches', '1 cup sliced strawberries', '1 cup club soda']
