Lay out on prepared baking sheet and broil in preheated oven for 10-12 minutes.', 'Using a food processor, add all remaining ingredients to the broiled tomatoes. Pulse several times until mixture has reached desired consistency.', 'Season to taste with additional salt, pepper, hot sauce or lemon juice. Serve chilled or at room temperature.']

ingredients: ['1 lb macaroni, cooked according to package directions', '4 cups shredded Beecher’s Flagship', '5 tablespoons butter, slightly more for greasing the pan', '2 cups milk', '3 tablespoons flour', '2 tsp dry mustard powder', '½ tsp cayenne, optional', '2 tsp each salt and black pepper', '2 cups crushed potato chips (*could use bread crumbs or nothing if this is too low class for Beecher’s cheese)']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350ºF and butter a 9”x13” baking dish.', 'In a saucepan over medium heat melt butter. Add milk and stir to combine. Add flour, mustard powder, cayenne (if using) and salt and pepper. Add cheese and stir to combine and melt cheese entirely.', 'Turn off heat and stir in noodles. Transfer to greased baking dish.', 'Top with potato chips and bake in preheated oven for 15-20 minutes. Serve warm and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['1 cup San J brand soy sauce', '1 cup Colombia Gorge orange juice', '1 TBL minced garlic', '1 TBL minced ginger', '1 cup dark brown sugar', '5lbs New Seasons free range all natural fresh chicken wings', '¼ lb unsalted butter', '1 ½ TBL minced garlic', '1 ½ TBL minced ginger', '1 ½ cup dark brown sugar', '½ cup Nakano brand rice vinegar', '½ cup San J brand soy sauce', '1 TBL Sun Luk brand sesame oil', '¾ cup Hung Foy brand Sriracha']
directions: ['Prepare marinade and then coat raw wings in covered container. Let sit in refrigerator overnight.', 'Melt butter in a sauce pan over low heat.', 'When melted, add sesame oil. Add minced ginger and minced garlic, and cook until garlic begins to brown.', 'Using a wire whisk, blend in brown sugar until it melts, creating a caramel-like sauce. Add remaining ingredients while continually stirring. Note: an immersion blender is perfect to get the sauce to come together.', 'Set sauce aside. After an overnight marinade, preheat oven to 350 and cook wings. Arrange wings evenly spread out on baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Cook for 35 minutes until tender and internal temperature is 165 degrees.', 'To serve, toss hot wings in mixing bowl with sauce. Add Bobs Red Mill brown sesame seeds as you mix wings and sauce.']

recipe_name: Roasted Spaghetti Squash with Luxe Ragu
ingredients: ['1 Spaghetti Squash, Cut Length-wise, skin-on, seeds removed', '2-3 Tbls Olive Oil, divided', 'Salt and Pepper', '1 Tbls minced fresh marjoram (optional)', '1 cup onion, diced', '½ cup carrots, peeled and diced', '½ cup celery, diced', '½ cup orange bell pepper, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup Crimini mushrooms (about ¼ lb), coarse chopped', '1 cup Shiitake mushrooms (about ¼ lb), coarse chopped', '½ lb ground pork', '½ cup red wine', '1 cup water', '1 28 oz can crushed tomatoes', '1 Tbls tomato paste', '2 Tbls butter', '3 Tbls olive oil', 'Salt and Pepper', 'Chili flakes (optional)', '1 Tbls fresh rosemary, minced', '1 Tbls fresh thyme, minced']
directions: ['For spaghetti: Preheat Oven to 375. Rub insides of each half of the spaghetti squash with 1-2 Tbls olive oil, and season with salt and pepper. Place squash cut-side down on a parchment-lined sheet tray and bake for 40 minutes, rotating tray halfway through baking. Remove from the oven and let sit for 20 minutes. Flip squash over, and using a fork, shred the meat of the squash away from the skin into spaghetti-like strands, working from the sides of the squash into the middle. Scrape back onto the sheet tray, drizzle with 1 T olive oil, season with salt, pepper and marjoram.', 'While you roast the squash, prepare The Sauce.', 'In a large sauce pot over high heat, heat 1 Tbls olive oil. Add pork, season with salt and pepper, and sauté 5-7 minutes until browned. Remove from pot and set aside. Melt 1 Tbls butter and 1 Tbls olive oil in the pot. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper and sauté 5-7 minutes until browned. Remove and set aside. Add 1 Tbls butter and 1 Tbls olive oil to the pot, and add onions, carrots, celery, and bell peppers. Season with salt and pepper and sauté until just starting to brown—about 5-7 minutes. Add the minced garlic and chili flakes, and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add tomato paste and continue to brown the vegetables for about 2 minutes. Add pork and mushrooms back to the pan. Add herbs, and cook about 2 minutes. Deglaze the pot with the red wine, scraping and stirring the brown bits off the bottom, and cook down for about 2 minutes. Add crushed tomatoes and water, and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer and cook, uncovered, for about 20 minutes over low heat.']

recipe_name: Celery Root Remoulade with Smoked Trout and Peas
ingredients: ['1 Tbls olive oil', '4 scallions, sliced (1/2 Cup)', '1lb frozen peas', '2 Tbls Dijon mustard', '1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1 Tbls capers, minced', '1 Tbls preserved lemon, minced', '1 cup Fresh Basil Leaves, chopped', '1/4 Tbls Hot Sauce (optional)', '1lb Celery Root, peeled and cut into julienne strips (4 cups)', '4 stalks of celery, with tender leaves, small diced (1 Cup)', '2 cups fresh parsley leaves', '8 oz. can of smoked trout or salmon, flaked', '1 lemon, zested into strips', '1 head butterhead lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces', '3/4 cup lemon vinaigrette (divided)', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['In a large skillet, heat olive oil, add scallions and cook for about 2 minutes. Add peas, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat to cool while you prep other ingredients.', 'In a mixing bowl, make the dressing. Whisk together the mustard, mayonnaise, 1/2 cup of the lemon vinaigrette, capers, basil, preserved lemon and, if using, hot sauce. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Trim and cut the celery root into julienned matchsticks. A fast way of doing this: slice the root into large, thin slices using a mandolin slicer, then stack the slices and cut them into strips (or you can use the Mandoline Julienne attachment). Or just use a hand knife and cut it by hand. Your call.', 'Mix the julienned celery root with the celery, parsley leaves, lemon zest and smoked trout. Add the cooled peas and mix in the dressing. Season the lettuce with salt and pepper, and toss with the remaining 1/4 cup of lemon dressing. Serve the remoulade over the butterhead salad.']

ingredients: ['3 large russet potatoes', '2 lbs halibut or cod fillets (no skin)', '1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, divided', '1/4 cup cornstarch', '2 tsp salt', '2 tsp paprika', 'one 12 oz beer', 'Oil (for frying)']
directions: ['Peel potatoes and cut into French fries; place in a bowl of cool water and set aside.', 'In a medium bowl, sift together 1 cup flour, salt and paprika. Whisk in beer until well blended; set aside.', 'Heat oil to 375º F. While oil is heating; drain fries and pat dry with a paper towel. When oil is hot, cook fries in 2 to 3 small batches, draining on paper towels. Keep fries warm while cooking fish.', 'To cook fish, cut fillets into 2” wide strips and remove any pin bones. In a small bowl mix 1/4 cup flour and cornstarch. Lightly coat fish in dry flour mixture; shake off excess. Dip fish in beer batter then fry 2-3 fillets at a time until golden brown. Drain on paper towels.', 'Serve with fries and your favorite tartar sauce. Serves 4-6.']

ingredients: ['1/2 large head cauliflower, shredded', '2 pasture-raised eggs', '1 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning mix', '1/2 cup nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 450°F. Shred or process the cauliflower into small crumbles using a box grater or food processor. You’ll need a total of about 2 cups or so of cauliflower crumbles. Place the cauliflower on a baking sheet and place in oven until they feel dry, about 10 minutes. Give the cauliflower a chance to cool. Once cool, place the cooked cauliflower into a clean dishtowel and ring out as much water as possible. Lightly oil a pizza pan with olive oil. In a medium bowl, mix the cauliflower crumbles with remaining ingredients. Pat the “crust” into a 9-12" round on the prepared pan, and bake for 10-12 minutes (or until golden). Remove the crust from the oven and top with your favorite toppings. Place back into the oven until the toppings are hot, approximately 3-5 minutes. Remove from the oven and serve.']

recipe_name: Cedar Plank Salmon with Dijon Sauce
ingredients: ['2 lbs wild salmon filet, whole (skin on)', '1 cedar plank, soaked in water for 20 minutes, patted dry', '1/2 cup Dijon mustard', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon whole mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons red pepper flakes or lime juice']
directions: ['Preheat grill to high heat for 15 minutes and then adjust to medium low. If you’re using charcoal, simply move the coals to one side.', 'Whisk together the Dijon sauce ingredients.', 'Place salmon skin-side down on the plank and spread the sauce on top.', 'Place plank on grill (on the cool side if using coals).', 'Cover the grill and cook 15 minutes or until the salmon’s internal temperature reads 140° F.']

ingredients: ['1/2 teaspoon coconut oil', '3-5 oz tempeh, seasoned and sliced into thin strips', '1/4 cup cultured cream cheese or vegan cream cheese', '1 sprouted grain tortilla', '1/2 cup spinach, sliced into thin ribbons', '1/2 avocado, sliced', '2 tablespoons mango chutney', '1 pinch freshly ground pepper', '1 pinch sea salt']
directions: ['In a small pan, melt coconut oil over medium-low heat. Add tempeh, warm gently, and set aside. Spread cream cheese or vegan substitute evenly over tortilla. Distribute spinach on one half of the tortilla. Place tempeh and avocado lengthwise on top of spinach layer. Drizzle with mango chutney and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Starting at the side of the tortilla with the fillings, begin rolling all ingredients up like a rug. Continue rolling tightly until wrap is complete. Cut in half on the diagonal and secure with toothpicks if needed.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '1 cup spinach', '4 asparagus stalks, trimmed and chopped', '1 small zucchini, diced', '4 eggs from pastured hens', '4 ounces wild smoked salmon', '1 small avocado, cut into cubes']
directions: ['Melt the ghee or coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus, spinach and zucchini, and sauté until tender.', 'In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and then add to the vegetable mixture. Gently stir the eggs until they are scrambled and cooked through. Add the smoked salmon and avocado and serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 4-inch piece of kombu (dried seaweed)', '1 bunch green onions, chopped', '1/2 cup wakame (dried seaweed)', '1/4 cup chickpea miso paste*', '1/2 cup warm water for mixing miso']
directions: ['Rinse the kombu and allow to steep overnight in a quart of cold water. Remove kombu and heat up the seaweed broth but do not boil. Stir in green onion and wakame. Simmer for 3-5 minutes, and remove from heat. Dissolve miso paste in warm water, and then stir into soup mixture. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground turkey, cooked', '1 15oz can of low sodium white beans, including liquid', '2 cups chicken broth', '1/4 cup tomatillo salsa', 'White pepper and sea salt to taste', '1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro', '1/2 cup sour cream']
directions: ['Throw everything in a pot and let simmer for 30-45 minutes before serving. Great with tortilla chips or cornbread.']

ingredients: ['2 cups coarsely grated sweet potato or yam', '4 tablespoons ghee, divided', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped cauliflower', '1-2 cups chopped kale', '2-3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 eggs', 'Additional salt and pepper', '1/3 cup crumbled goat cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F and melt 2 tablespoons of ghee to be mixed with potato shreds. Squeeze sweet potato shreds with a paper towel or in cheesecloth to press out excess liquid. Add potato shreds to a 10″ pie pan with ghee, salt, and pepper, stir to combine, then press into the bottom of pan and up sides to form a crust. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes begin to brown on the surface and edges.', 'While crust bakes, sauté shallot in remaining 2 tablespoons of ghee until translucent. Add cauliflower, sauté until cauliflower is tender, 4-5 minutes. Covering pan will help soften cauliflower more quickly. Add garlic and kale, and sauté one more minute. Remove pie pan from oven and decrease oven temp to 350°F.', 'Distribute cooked veggies evenly over potato crust. Whisk together eggs, and a few shakes of salt and pepper, then pour over veggies. Add cheese and bake 25-30 minutes, or until eggs are set. Allow to cool 10 minutes prior to slicing.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons gluten-free mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon celery seed', 'Sea salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 can of your favorite sardines', '1/3 cup finely chopped onion', '1/2 celery stalk, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons horseradish mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 generous squeeze of fresh lemon juice (about 1 teaspoon)', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 pinch lemon pepper']
directions: ['Drain sardines, place in a bowl, and chop into chunks with a fork. Add celery and onion to sardines and stir. In a separate bowl, blend horseradish mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, sea salt and lemon pepper. Combine dressing with sardine mixture and serve.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup canned coconut milk', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon chili garlic sauce', '1-2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon coconut nectar', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon grated ginger', 'Cilantro (optional)']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a food processor, and refrigerate. Let sit at least 2 hours before serving. Can be thinned with more coconut milk. This sauce is great with chicken, as a dressing for Asian slaw, and for dipping veggies.']

recipe_name: Grilled Zucchini, Corn and Italian Sweet Pepper Quesadillas
ingredients: ['2 small, red sweet Italian or other heirloom peppers', '1 ear yellow corn, shucked', '1 medium zucchini, cut on bias into 1-inch thick slices', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 ½ cups grated part skim mozzarella or Monterey jack cheese', '4 (10-inch) flour tortillas']
directions: ['Preheat the grill over medium heat. Brush the peppers, corn, and zucchini, with a little of the oil. Grill the vegetables until the corn turns from milky-yellow to bright yellow all over (15 minutes) the peppers are charred and collapsed, and the zucchini is just tender (10 minutes).', 'When cool enough to handle, shave the corn off the cob, seed and chop the peppers, and chop the zucchini. Combine the grilled vegetables with the basil and lemon zest and season with salt and pepper.', 'Brush 1 side of each tortilla with the remaining oil and place them oiled side down on the grill. Sprinkle the tortillas evenly with the cheese. Spoon the vegetable mixture over half of each tortilla, leaving one side covered with cheese only. (This will make it easier to fold the quesadillas in half.)', 'Cover the grill and cook until the cheese has melted and the underside of the tortillas are crisp, 4 to 5 minutes. Carefully fold each tortilla in half (fold the side without vegetables up and over the half with vegetables) and gently press down with a spatula to sandwich the sides together.', 'Transfer the quesadillas to a cutting board and cut each into 4 wedges. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['5 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons sugar', '3 quarts water', '4 center cut boneless pork chops', 'Oil for grill', '1 (17 oz) bottle Podnah’s Mustard sauce']
directions: ['Dissolve salt and sugar in 3 quarts cold water in 2-gallon zipper-lock plastic bag. Add chops and seal bag, pressing out as much air as possible. Refrigerate at least 1 hour and as long as 24 hours. Remove chops and pat dry with a paper towel.', 'Preheat your grill to medium-high and cook until browned on each side, 3 to 4 minutes. Brush with mustard sauce on each side and continue to cook, 7 to 10 more minutes or until an internal probe thermometer register 140 °F. Remove to plate, tent with foil and allow to rest 5 minutes. Brush with additional mustard sauce if desired.']

ingredients: ['2 carrots, sliced', '2 onions, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '3-4 lb whole chicken', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 cup water or chicken broth or cooking wine', '1/2 teaspoon teaspoon dried basil']
directions: ['Put carrots, onion and celery in bottom of slow cooker. Place whole chicken on top of vegetables. Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper and add liquid over top. Sprinkle basil over top. Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours (or on high 4 to 5 hours, using an additional cup of water), or until fully cooked.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ground turmeric', '2 tablespoons ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground cardamom', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 large avocado', '1 (4.5 oz) pouch Frontera Guacamole Mix', 'salt to taste', '1 lb Yukon gold potatoes', "1 lb Mulay's Chorizo (found in freezer) or New Seasons Market bulk chorizo", '2 teaspoon dried oregono', 'salt to taste', '1 (10 oz) pkg. Three Sisters Tortilla (found in the refrigerator)', '1 (12 oz) pkg. Don Froylon Queso Fresco (Cheese Dept.)', 'choped fresh cilantro']
directions: ['If using Mulay’s Chorizo, thaw in the fridge overnight or in the microwave at 50% power.', 'For the guacamole:', 'Coarsely mash the avocados in a bowl. Add the Frontera Guacamole Mix. Stir to blend and add salt to taste. Smooth a piece of plastic wrap over the surface of the guacamole to seal out the air and help prevent darkening. Chill until serving.', 'For the tacos:', 'Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1/2” dice. Cook in a saucepan of boiling water until they are just cooked through and still hold their shape, about 5 minutes. Drain.', 'Crumble the chorizo into a large skillet. Cook over medium heat stirring until browned and cooked through. Drain off excess fat leaving a small amount in the skillet. Add the potatoes and 2 tsp. dried oregano, cook and stir till the potatoes are hot and starting to brown. Season with salt to taste.', 'Assemble:', 'Warm the tortillas by your favorite method. Fill tortillas with the chorizo-potato mixture and top with guacamole, crumbled queso fresco and chopped cilantro.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons avocado oil, divided', '1 lb tempeh, cubed and steamed (optional)', '1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '1 small red onion, thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, diced or pressed', '2 teaspoons dried thyme, (or 2 tablespoon fresh)', '4 cups greens (chard, spinach, kale), torn', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', 'Black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat a large skillet or other heavy-bottomed pan over medium heat. Add 2 tablespoons of oil and the tempeh and sauté for about 7 minutes, stirring often, until lightly browned. Add sliced bell pepper, onion, and the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil. Sauté for about 5 minutes until veggies are tender-crisp. Add garlic and thyme and sauté for 1-2 more minutes until fragrant (being careful not to burn the garlic). Add greens and sauté until lightly wilted. Remove from heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Try topping with nutritional yeast, hot sauce, avocado, sliced tomatoes, or more raw greens!']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '3 small sweet potatoes, diced', '1 small onion, diced', '1 bell pepper, diced', '1 small zucchini, diced', '2 cloves garlic, diced or pressed', '1 small tomato, diced', '1 pinch red pepper flakes (optional)', '1 package organic firm or extra firm tofu, drained', '1/3 cup unsweeteneed almond milk (or other milk alternatives)', '1 tablespoon corn starch (or other thickening agent)', '3 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon gluten-free mustard', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon Kala Namak (optional)', '1 pinch black pepper (optional)']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375°F. Prepare pie dish by lining bottom with parchment paper and greasing the edges with extra oil.', 'Heat a skillet over medium heat and add oil and sweet potatoes. Sauté for 5 minutes. Add onions and sauté for an additional 5 minutes or until translucent. Add peppers, zucchini and garlic and sauté until tender crisp. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and sauté for 1 minute. Remove from heat.', 'In a food processor or blender, combine remaining ingredients and process until creamy and smooth. Add additional seasonings to taste. In a large mixing bowl, combine cooked veggies and tofu mixture. Slowly spoon this into the prepared pie dish. Bake in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes until the top is firm to the touch. Remove from oven and let sit for 10-15 minutes. Carefully flip the frittata out onto a serving dish and remove parchment paper.', 'Try topping with avocado slices, tomato, hot sauce, or salsa. This frittata would also be great on a bed of leafy greens!']

ingredients: ['1 19oz can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and mashed with a fork', '2 tablespoon vegan mayo (or 1/2 ripe avocado)', '2 teaspoon spicy brown mustard', '1 tablespoon pickle relish (sweet or dill), or 1 medium pickle, finely diced', '2 green onions, chopped', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a medium bowl, combine bean mash, mayo or avocado, pickles, chopped onions, salt and pepper. Mix well.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 inch piece ginger, finely chopped', '1 small sweet potato, diced', '1 large carrot, chopped', '1 cup broccoli florets', '1 large red bell pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '3 tablespoons red curry paste (adjust to taste)*', '1 splash tamari or coconut aminos', '1 tablespoon fish sauce or mock fish sauce (optional)', '1 14 oz can full-fat coconut milk']
directions: ['Heat coconut oil in a large pan or wok. Sauté the onions until soft. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 1-2 minutes more. Add sweet potato and carrot and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add broccoli and red bell pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes more until broccoli and red bell pepper are tender-crisp. Add turmeric, curry paste, fish sauce, and tamari or coconut aminos, and stir to mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes and then immediately add coconut milk. Cover and simmer over low heat until potatoes and carrots are tender. Serve over cauliflower rice or spiralized zucchini.']

ingredients: ['1 cup green lentils, uncooked', '1 cup toasted walnuts, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon avocado oil or coconut oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 1/2 cups sweet onion, diced', '1 cup celery, diced', '1 cup carrot, grated', '1/3 cup apple, peeled/grated', '1/3 cup raisins', '3 tablespoon ground flax AND 1/2 cup water (thoroughly mixed in a bowl)', '1/2 cup oat flour', '3/4 cup breadcrumbs', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme (or 3/4 teaspoon dried thyme)', 'Salt and pepper to taste', 'Red pepper flakes, to taste', '1/4 cup ketchup or tomato paste', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '2 tablespoon apple butter (or unsweetened applesauce)', '2 tablespoon balsamic vinegar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Rinse lentils and place into a pot with 3 cups of water. Bring to a boil and sprinkle in a little salt. Reduce heat to medium/low and simmer uncovered for 40-45 minutes. Stir frequently and add water as needed. Cook lentils until slightly overcooked. Once done, mash with the back of a big spoon.', 'Heat avocado or coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and sauté for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with salt and add celery, carrot, apple, and raisins. Sauté for 5 minutes more and remove from heat. In a large mixing bowl, mix all remaining loaf ingredients together with lentils and veggies and season to taste. Grease a loaf pan with a little oil and line with parchment paper. Press mixture firmly into the pan.', 'Combine all glaze ingredients and mix until creamy. Spread ½ of this mixture onto prepared loaf. Reserve the remainder for dipping sauce. Bake loaf at 350°F for 40-45 minutes uncovered. Edges should be lightly brown. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 New Seasons Market Italian Sausages, mild or hot', '2 cups seedless red grapes, washed and destemmed', '2 sprigs marjoram', '1 sprig rosemary', '1/4 cup chopped parsley', '1 cup dry white wine']
directions: ['Heat shallow sauce pan to medium high heat. Add oil, then add sausage links. Cook just long enough to evenly brown and then remove to plate. Add destemmed grapes to pan along with the marjoram, rosemary and parsley reserving some to garnish dish when serving. Move pan occasionally to evenly wilt the skins. After 3-4 minutes, deglaze with wine. Add sausages back in and simmer for 30 minutes on low heat, or until fully cooked. Season with salt and pepper. Finish with reserved chopped herbs. Serve with pasta or polenta. Search for Baked Polenta in our recipe base.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs bulk New Seasons Market Italian Sausage', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 (16 oz) containers New Seasons Market Marinara', '1 (16 oz) container New Seasons Market Fresh Pasta Sheets (8 sheets)', '2 cups Calabro ricotta cheese', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350ºF.', 'In a large skillet over medium-high heat, sauté Italian sausage in olive oil, using a spoon to break sausage into small pieces as it cooks. Cook 8-10 minutes, or until cooked through.', 'Meanwhile, pour enough marinara sauce to cover the bottom of a 9” x 13” baking dish. Lay out 2 pasta sheets covering the bottom of the baking dish. Dollop ricotta, sausage, mozzarella and sauce to cover. Add another 2 sheets of pasta and repeat layering for 2 layers. Cover the last 2 pasta sheets with remaining sauce and mozzarella.', 'Cover tightly with foil and place in preheated oven for 25 minutes. Remove foil and cook 10 more minutes.']

recipe_name: Grilled Halibut, Romaine and Tapenade Bundles
ingredients: ['12 very large romaine lettuce', '1/2 cup green olive tapenade', '1 lb cod or halibut fillets (1 in. thick)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh lemon juice or lemon wedges']
directions: ['Heat grill to medium (about 375°).', 'Cook lettuce leaves 2 or 3 at a time in a pot of boiling water until ribs are flexible, 2-3 minutes; as done, transfer to a bowl of ice water. Lay leaves flat with smooth sides up on kitchen towels and pat dry. Spread the 8 largest leaves with tapenade. Cut fish into 8 pieces; set 1 at base of each leaf. If leaf isn’t big enough to enclose fish, overlap leaf with another. Roll up each bundle from base, folding in sides. Brush bundles with oil.', 'Grill, turning once until fish is just opaque and up to temperature, about 8 minutes. Serve with lemon.']

recipe_name: Chicken with Mushroom and Wine Sauce
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs boneless/skinless chicken', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '1/3 cup fresh chopped leeks, pale green & white parts', '3 cups mixed sliced mushrooms', '1/2 tablespoon fresh marjoram', '1/4 cup olive oil', '1 cup mushroom broth', '1/2 cup red wine', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a large saucepan, sauté the chicken in the olive oil until light brown in color. Stir in garlic, leeks, mushrooms and marjoram and continue to cook, stirring often, until mushrooms begin to wilt (about 5-10 minutes). Add broth and wine, reduce heat to simmer and cook for 20-30 minutes, uncovered.', 'Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve with rice, pasta or polenta.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs steak', '1/2 cup soy sauce', '1/2 cup honey', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1/2 cup olive oil']
directions: ['Score the steak by making crisscross cuts on the surface on both sides of the meat. Mix the ingredients for the marinade and pour over the steak. Marinate covered in the refrigeator for at least 45 minutes or overnight. Grill as desired and slice on the diagonal.']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower, roughly chopped', '2 garlic cloves', '2/3 cup hemp ricotta (see hemp ricotta recipe)', '2 tablespoons butter alternative', '1 tablespoon unrefined coconut oil', '6 tablespoons hemp whey (see hemp ricotta recipe)', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Bring a pot of lightly-salted water to a boil, add cauliflower and cook until tender. Add cooked cauliflower, garlic, hemp ricotta, pasture butter, and coconut oil to a blender. Slowly add hemp whey and blend until the mixture is smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons dried basil', '2 tablespoons dried marjoram', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '2 teaspoons crushed dried rosemary', '2 teaspoons red chili flakes']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['8-10 ounces wild-caught salmon', '2 teaspoons ghee, melted', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place salmon on parchment lined baking sheet, skin side down. Drizzle melted ghee and lemon juice over salmon and bake for 15-20 minutes or until salmon flakes easily with fork.', 'Note: Bake fish for 10 minutes per inch of thickness.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds wild salmon', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper', '2 tablespoons ghee', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. Grease the bottom of a 9x13 baking dish. Sprinkle salmon with salt and pepper and place in the prepared dish. Mix together ghee (room temperature), lemon zest and dill. Place half of the mixture on top of the seasoned salmon, and spread across the surface of the fish. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until fully cooked, checking for doneness after 10 minutes. Add the remaining ghee/dill/lemon zest mixture on top, add a squeeze of lemon juice and serve with lemon slices and dill for garnish.']

ingredients: ['2 cups loosely packed Italian parsley', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '3/4 cup walnuts', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/8 teaspoon lemon pepper']
directions: ['Wash and de-stem parsley. Blend all ingredients in blender or small food processor.']

ingredients: ['5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '1/2 large onion, chopped', '1/2 medium fennel bulb, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon Italian herb blend', '1 1/2 cups no-mato base (see recipe)', '4 splashes coconut aminos', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1-2 cups bone broth', '4 tablespoons basil, julienned', '2 tablespoons rendered animal fat', 'Sea salt, black pepper, and balsamic vinegar to taste']
directions: ['Add 3 tablespoons of olive oil to a medium saucepot. Add onion, fennel, garlic, and Italian seasoning and saute until vegetables start to brown. Add no-mato base, coconut aminos, garlic powder, and bone broth to pot and bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for approximately 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the fresh basil, remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil and rendered animal fat. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed with salt, pepper, and balsamic vinegar.']

ingredients: ['2 bunches red beets, washed', '1 bunch carrots, peeled', '1 clove garlic', '2 medium onions, peeled and cut in half', '1-2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/4-1 cup water, as needed', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Toss all the vegetables with extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper and place in baking dish. Cover dish with foil and bake until vegetables are soft, approximately 35 minutes. Once vegetables are cooled, peel beets and garlic. Place all the vegetables into a blender and puree until smooth, adding water as needed to get a smooth puree.']

ingredients: ['3 1/2 pounds chicken breasts/thighs', '1 1/2 cups coconut milk', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon coconut oil', '1 cup gluten-free breadcrumbs', '1 cup shredded coconut', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Cut chicken up into 2 inch slices. Mix coconut milk and lemon juice. Marinate chicken in this mixture for 2 hours. Preheat oven to 375 F. Coat a rectangular glass baking dish with coconut oil. Combine breadcrumbs, coconut, sage, oregano, parselyl, sea salt, and pepper in large bowl. Dip coated chicken strips in breadcrumb mixture and place in baking dish. Bake up to 1 hour and 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked thoroughly.']

ingredients: ['1 medium onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 celery stalks, finely chopped', '1 cup mushrooms, chopped', '1 tablespoon pasture butter or ghee', '2 pounds grass-fed beef, buffalo, or lamb', '1/2 pound pasture-raised or organic liver, finely chopped', '1 egg from a pastured hen', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/2 cup unsweetened ketchup']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Sauté onion, garlic, celery and mushrooms in butter or ghee until tender. In a large bowl, combine the ground meat, liver, egg, herbs, salt, pepper, and sautéed vegetables. Mix well. Place meat mixture in loaf pan and bake for 15 minutes. After baking for 15 minutes, gently spread the ketchup on top of the loaf. Continue to bake for another 40-45 minutes, or until fully cooked.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ghee or coconut oil', '3 sweet potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '3 jewel yams, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '2 pounds grass-fed ground meat of your choice', '1 large onion, diced', '8 shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '3 celery ribs, diced', '3 tablespoons ghee, coconut oil, or rendered animal fat', '1 tablespoon dried sage', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 cup white wine', '3 tart apples, cored and cut into 1/2-inch chunks', '1/2 cup chicken stock', '3/4 cup toasted hazelnuts or walnuts']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. In the oven, melt butter in roasting pan. Toss diced sweet potatoes and yams in roasting pan after butter has melted, stir to coat. Bake yams and sweet potatoes for 45 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside.\nIn a skillet, crumble meat and cook until lightly browned. Remove from heat. Set aside. Sauté onions, mushrooms, and celery in reserved fat in a saucepan until onions begin to caramelize. Add seasonings and cook over medium heat for 2 additional minutes. Add white wine and continue cooking over medium heat until liquid is reduced by half.\nIn a large bowl, combine sautéed vegetable mixture, browned meat, apple chunks, roasted sweet potato and yam cubes, chicken stock, and nuts. Transfer all ingredients to a baking dish and bake at 350°F for 20 minutes. Bake until all ingredients are tender. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 package New Seasons Market pizza dough and flour for working dough', '2-3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 1/2 cup red seedless grapes, halved', '5 oz. fontina cheese (about 1 cup), shredded', '2 oz. Gorgonzola dolce, crumbled', '1/2 tsp coarsely ground black pepper', '1/4 cup toasted walnuts, chopped']
directions: ['If you are using a pizza stone, put on oven rack in lower third of oven and preheat to 500°F 45 minutes before baking pizza. Lightly coat dough in flour and transfer to a parchment lined pan.', 'Pat out dough evenly with fingers and stretch into a 13” round. Allow to rest 10-15 minutes. Brush with olive oil.', 'Arrange both cheeses and grapes on dough, leaving a 1” border. Sprinkle walnuts on top.', 'Place baking sheet with pizza in oven and bake until dough is crisp and browned and pizza is bubbling in spots, 14-16 minutes. Transfer to cutting board and cool 5 min. before cutting.']

ingredients: ['1 cup soaked lentils', '3 cups water, stock or broth', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion small diced', '1 bell pepper small diced', '1/4-1/2 cup any vegetable small diced or chopped*', 'hamburger buns', '1 cup ketchup', '1/2 cup maple syrup or brown sugar to taste', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon vegan Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons tamari', '2 tablespoons mustard', 'favorite hot sauce to taste', '2 tablespoons chili powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons cumin', '2 teaspoons paprika', 'sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Place lentils and cooking liquid in a small pot, cover and bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Cook until lentils are tender, about 30 minutes. Meanwhile, heat a large skillet with olive oil over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper, and any other vegetables to the pan. Cook, stirring frequently until vegetables turn golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add sloppy sauce ingredients. Cook, stirring constantly until spices are fragrant, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low and let sauce simmer until it thickens, at least 10 minutes. When lentils are cooked, drain off any excess cooking liquid. Add lentils to the pan with sauce; stir well to combine. Mash some or all of the lentils using a wooden spoon. Toast hamburger buns in the oven, if desired. Ladle lentil mixture on each toasted bun and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['2 cups smoked turkey, cubed', '3 stalks celery, finely diced', '1/2 cup red onion, finely diced', '2 crisp apples, finely diced and tossed with 1-2 Tbls. of lemon juice', '1/2 cup dried apple juice-sweetened cranberries', '3/4 cup mayonnaise*', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a medium mixing bowl combine all ingredients. Taste for seasoning and adjust with salt and pepper. Use in a sandwich, a wrap or on a bed of lettuce and vegetables for a great salad!']

ingredients: ['1 medium head cauliflower', '1/2 pound ground meat (beef, lamb, turkey, etc.)', '1/4 pound chicken livers, chopped (optional)', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 medium carrot, chopped', '3-5 leaves kale, de-stemmed and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 inch ginger, minced or grated', '2 tablespoons coconut aminos', '2 tablespoons rice or coconut vinegar', 'fat of choice for cooking (lard, tallow, coconut oil, or ghee)', 'cilantro, chopped, for garnish']
directions: ['Core and separate cauliflower florets, pulse in food processor gently until the size of rice grains - do not over process. In a wide pan, heat cooking fat to medium, add onion and carrot and sauté until onion is translucent. Add ground meat and optional liver, breaking up a with wooden spoon into small crumbles. Add garlic, ginger, and kale. Mix well. Add cauliflower, mix well, and cover for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and toss well with vinegar or coconut aminos, and cilantro.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound chicken breast, cut into chunks', '1 medium yellow onion, small dice', '2 large cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons sweet smoked paprika', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 1/2 cups short grain rice', '1 (14.5 oz.) can diced tomatoes', '8 ounces dry chorizo, small dice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 cups frozen peas', '1/4 cup chopped fresh Italian parsley']
directions: ['Heat the olive oil in a wide saute pan over medium heat. Add the chicken breast and cook, stirring often, until no longer pink. Add the onion and garlic and saute a few minutes more, until the onions begin to soften. Add the paprika and stir to coat. Lastly, add the broth to the pan and bring to a simmer. In the meantime, place the rice, tomatoes, chorizo, and salt in the crock pot. Once the broth mixture simmers, carefully pour it into the crock pot. Turn the crock pot to high heat and stir the contents well. Cover and cook for approximately 90 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed. Lastly, stir in the peas, cover and cook 10 minutes more. Serve the paella immediately, garnished with the fresh parsley.']

ingredients: ['Fish fillet of choice']
directions: ['Pre-heat the oven to 450°F. Pat the fish dry with paper towels and season simply with salt and pepper. Preheat an oven proof skillet (cast iron is preferred) over medium-high heat. Add heat-tolerant fat to the pan and place the fish in the pan, flesh side down, careful not to crowd pan. Cook flesh side down for 2-3 minutes or until nicely browned. Flip fish over and transfer entire skillet to pre-heated oven. Cook for remaining time (use the rule of thumb for cooking times) in the oven. Remove the skillet from oven (WARNING: the skillet handle will be extremely hot). Place a pat of butter on top. Your fish will be perfectly cooked, crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '1/4-1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoons red pepper flakes', '2 pounds manila clams', '1 tablespoon fresh Italian flat-leaf parsley, coarsely chopped', '1/2 cup white wine']
directions: ['To clean clams, place in a bowl of cold tap water and soak for 5 minutes. Repeat for a total of 3 times, changing the water each time.\nIn a 6-quart heavy pot over medium heat, heat oil until hot but not smoking. Add garlic and saute for 2 minutes. Add black pepper and red pepper flakes: saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add clams, parsley and white wine. Cover and bring to a boil. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally until clams open- approximately 5-7 minutes, or until fully cooked. Discard any clams that do not open. Serve with your favorite crusty bread.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds Albacore tuna loin', '1/2 cup sesame seeds', '2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'prepared Wasabi paste', 'soy sauce']
directions: ['Put sesame oil on one plate and sesame seeds on another plate. Roll the tuna loin in the oil, season with salt and pepper and then roll in the sesame seeds.', 'Preheat a charcoal or gas grill to medium high heat. Oil the grill grates using paper towels soaked in vegetable oil. Place the tuna loin on the grill and cook to your desired doneness. Remove the tuna and slice into 1/2 inch slices. Serve with wasabi paste and soy sauce, steamed rice and your favorite Asian coleslaw.']

ingredients: ['16 oz brown rice penne or spirals', '1 ½ pound of ground turkey', '2 cups broccoli florets and stems', '3 garlic cloves', '½ cup macadamia nuts', '1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '2 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F. Lay broccoli on sheet pan in a single layer and roast in preheated oven 10-15 minutes, until cooked through and beginning to brown. Transfer to food processor and add all remaining ingredients except olive oil. Pulse for 5 seconds 2-3 times. Add olive oil and process for 20-20 seconds or until smooth. Taste and adjust salt and lemon juice.', 'Cook pasta according to manufacturer’s direction, drain and set aside. In a large skillet over medium heat, warm 1 tablespoon cooking oil of your choice. Add ground turkey, using a spoon to break up pieces, and cook, 8-10 minutes or until fully cooked. Remove from heat and stir in pasta and pesto. Serve warm with additional parmesan for topping, if desired.']

ingredients: ['16 oz rice noodles, soaked in boiling water for 10 minutes', '2lbs New Seasons carne asada', '1pt New Seasons guacamole', '1pt salsa (your choice–the thinner the better)', '1T rice vinegar', '1 cucumber, thinly sliced', '2 carrots, peeled and julienned', '1 lime, cut into wedges', 'Cilantro leaves']
directions: ['In a large skillet or on the grill, cook carne asada for about 10 minutes. Set aside to rest for 5 minutes and then thinly slice. In a small mixing bowl, combine salsa and rice vinegar; stir and taste for desired acidity. In 4 serving bowls, add rice noodles and top with 1/4 of salsa mixture. Add thinly sliced steak, guac, cucumber, carrots and cilantro leaves. Squeeze 1 lime wedge and serve!']

ingredients: ['1 flatbread pizza crust', '1/2 lb. Fresh mozzarella, sliced', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved or 1 Heirloom tomato, sliced', '5-6 basil leaves, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, pressed or 1 tsp dry garlic powder', '1.5 Tbsp olive oil', '1.5 Tbsp balsamic vinegar', 'Salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.', 'Mix your pressed garlic (or garlic powder) with olive oil.', 'Place flatbread on baking sheet and brush with half of the oil & garlic. Place in preheated oven for 3-5 minutes to crisp up the crust.', 'Remove from oven and place cheese on top of the flatbread, sprinkle with salt & pepper, then place tomatoes on top of the cheese and repeat with a sprinkling of salt & pepper.', 'Place back in the oven for another 5 minutes at 350oF until the crust is golden and the pizza is fully baked. If you want a crispier flatbread, place under the broiler for an additional 2-3 minutes while keeping a close eye so it won’t get too dark.', 'Remove from oven and drizzle combined remaining garlic olive oil mixture and balsamic vinegar.', 'Sprinkle with chopped basil leaves and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 cup balsamic vinegar', '1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts', '1 tbsp olive oil', '6 oz fresh mozzarella, cut into ½ inch slices', '3 medium peaches or nectarines', '1 cup fresh basil', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat the grill to medium heat.', 'Prepare balsamic reduction: Heat balsamic vinegar in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. When it starts to bubble, reduce to simmer. Simmer on low for approximately 15 minutes— stirring occasionally— until the vinegar reaches a thick, syrupy consistency. Reduction will thicken slightly as it cools—do not overcook. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Grill the chicken: Drizzle olive oil over chicken breasts to evenly coat. Sprinkle both sides with salt and pepper. Grill chicken for approximately 6-7 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165 degrees.', 'Slice peaches: Half and pit peaches and slice into thin, even slices.', 'Chiffonade basil: Remove basil leaves from stems and stack on top of each other. Gently roll together in a cigar, then slice into thin ribbons.', 'Plate the dish: Arrange grilled chicken on a serving platter. Evenly top chicken breasts with a layer of mozzarella slices. Layer peaches over mozzarella. Drizzle balsamic reduction on top and sprinkle with basil. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 package fresh pizza dough', '1/2 cup + 2 tbsp your fave BBQ sauce', '1 cup shredded rotisserie chicken', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 cup shredded smoked gouda cheese', '1/2 small red onion, thinly sliced', '1/4 cup sliced green onion']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425 and roll out pizza dough.', 'Toss shredded chicken with 2 tbsp BBQ sauce. Spread remaining BBQ sauce on pizza dough.', 'Layer on mozzarella, chicken, gouda, and red onion slices. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until cheese is bubbly and beginning to brown. Top pizza with green onion. Slice and serve immediately!']

recipe_name: Roasted Pork Loin with Apples & Onions
ingredients: ['2 lb boneless pork tenderloin', '2 tbsp brown sugar', '1 tsp paprika', '1 tsp rosemary, crushed', '1/2 tsp garlic powder', '1/2 tsp salt', '2 tbsp olive oil, divided', '2 medium Fuji apples, thinly sliced', '1 medium onion, thinly sliced']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F.', 'Mix brown sugar, paprika, rosemary, garlic powder, and salt in a large bowl. Once mixed, set aside 1 tbsp for later.', 'Brush pork with 1 tbsp of the olive oil and sprinkle seasoning mixture. Place in center of large, foil lined baking dish.', 'In a medium bowl, toss apples, onions and 1 tbsp olive oil.', 'Add remaining seasoning mixture and toss to coat well. Spread around pork in pan.', 'Roast 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has internal temperature of 145°.', 'Slice pork and serve with apples and onions on top.']

ingredients: ['6 orange bell peppers', '1 lb bulk Italian pork sausage', '1 tbsp butter', '1 small yellow onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (14.5 ounce) can fire roasted diced tomatoes', '1/2 cup white rice', '1/2 cup water', '1 cup shredded cheddar or gouda cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven 350 degrees.', 'Cut tops off bell peppers and set aside. Remove seeds and membranes and discard. Using a paring knife, cut Jack O’ Lantern faces into each pepper.', 'Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Sauté onion and garlic until softened. Add Italian sausage and cook until browned. Drain and discard any grease.', 'Stir in tomatoes, rice, water, and rice. Cover skillet and simmer until rice is tender, approximately 15 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in shredded cheese.', 'Stuff each pepper with rice and sausage mixture, and replace pepper tops. Arrange peppers, top-side up, in a baking dish and cover with foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven 30 to 35 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted.']

recipe_name: Crab & Avocado Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['2 cups crab meat', '1 ripe avocado, peeled and chopped', '1 head of romaine lettuce, chopped', '1 small shallot, finely chopped', '3/4c extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 c white balsamic vinegar', '1 navel orange, zest & juice', '1 Meyer lemon, zest & juice', '1 Tbs honey', '1 tsp salt', '1 tsp black pepper']
directions: ['Combine crab and avocado in a large bowl. In a small mixing bowl, combine vinaigrette ingredients and pour over crab avocado mixture. Enjoy on top of chopped romaine.']

ingredients: ['1 can sardines', '1 can Wild Planet Mackerel Filets', '3-4 Tbls avocado oil mayonnaise', '2 Tbls finely chopped shallot', '1/3 cup Farmhouse Culture Horseradish Leek sauerkraut', '3 Tbls Kalamata olives, chopped', '1 rib celery, finely chopped', '1 Tbls Dijon mustard', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Drain sardines and mackerel, place in a bowl and mash with a fork. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well. Serve with your favorite sliced veggies or atop toasted sourdough bread. For a sophisticated twist on the tuna melt, try this on sourdough with Sierra Nevada raw goat cheddar melted on top.']

ingredients: ['1 package of NSM Korean Meatballs', '1 tablespoon cooking fat (coconut oil, avocado oil, olive oil or butter)', '1 package NSM taco topper (available in produce)', '1 avocado, sliced', '3 carrots, peeled and julienned', '2 limes, juiced', '1 tsp sea salt, more to taste', 'Corn tortillas']
directions: ['In a medium skillet over medium heat, brown meatballs in cooking fat. Reduce heat slightly and allow to cook, turning frequently until fully cooked, 15-20 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, combine 2 ½ cups of taco topper with lime juice and salt. Add carrots and stir to combine. To serve, place 2 halved meatballs on corn tortilla and top with slaw and avocado.']

ingredients: ['NSM hoagie rolls', '1 tablespoons NSM marinara sauce', '1 package NSM Italian meatballs', '1 jar of NSM marinara', 'Mozzarella slices']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, brown meatballs in olive oil, turning a few times, about 10 minutes. Add sauce, reduce heat to medium-low and cook until meatballs are fully cooked, about 8-12 more minutes.\nMeanwhile, split hoagie rolls and lay cheese slices. Warm in preheated oven 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted and bun is warm. Top with sauce and meatballs and serve warm.']

ingredients: ['4 cups of liquid (any combination of broth, milk or water)', '1 cup polenta', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '3 tablespoons butter', 'Freshly ground pepper', '½ cup grated parmesan cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh herbs', '1 tablespoon NSM extra-virgin olive oil', '1 package of NSM Italian meatballs', '1 jar of NSM marinara sauce (we like the pomodoro for this)']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Add liquid to an 8”x8” baking dish. Stir in polenta and salt. Place in preheated oven and bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and stir in butter. Bake for 15 minutes. Remove from oven and stir in optional ingredients if using before serving. Top with marinara and meatballs (instructions below).', 'In a medium saucepan over medium heat, brown meatballs in olive oil, turning a few times, about 10 minutes. Add sauce, reduce heat to medium low and cook until meat balls are fully cooked, about 8-12 more minutes.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. Coho salmon fillet, skin on', '1 tablespoon blackening spice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Fresh lemon for garnish', '2 tablespoons sweet paprika', '2 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 teaspoons onion powder', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons cayenne', '1 1/2 teaspoons white pepper', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves', '1 teaspoon dried oregano leaves']
directions: ['Combine ingredients for Blackening Spice Mix. Keep unused portion in a sealable jar for another use.', 'Preheat grill to high heat for 15 minutes and then adjust to medium heat.', 'Combine 1 tablespoon of olive oil and 1 tablespoon of blackening spice to make a slurry. Slather the blackening slurry onto the Coho salmon.', 'Place the salmon on the grill skin side down, cook for 7-10 minutes, or to desired doneness.', 'Flip and continue cooking for an additional 5 minutes or until salmon is cooked through to 140 degrees.', 'Serve with a lemon wedge.']

recipe_name: Summer Salmon with Grapes and Olives
ingredients: ['4 each 6 ounce Coho salmon', '2 tablespoons butter', '1/2 cup minced sweet onion', '1 cup red seedless grapes cut in half', '12 each pitted Castelvetrano olives sliced thin', '1 tablespoon each chopped parsley and green onion', '4 teaspoons sherry vinegar', 'Zest of 1 small lemon and juice from half of the lemon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°. Salt and pepper salmon fillets and place on a parchment covered sheet pan. Bake 15-20 minutes, or until fully cooked (depending on thickness of fillets and desired doneness).', 'While salmon bakes, melt butter in a sauté pan on medium high heat and cook onions until they begin to soften. Add a pinch of salt. Add half of the grapes, olives, and cook until grapes start to release their juice. Remove from the heat and add parsley and green onion. Add remaining grapes, vinegar and zest. Add lemon juice to taste.', 'Top salmon with grapes and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 whole fryer chicken, around 4-5 lbs, cleaned and rinsed', '1 tbsp garlic powder', '1 tbsp ground cumin', '1/2 tbsp ground coriander', '1/2 tbsp smoked paprika', '1/2 tbsp sea salt', '1/4 tbsp ground black pepper', '2 tbsp olive oil', '½ can your favorite lager-style beer']
directions:
['Heat grill to medium heat (325-350 degrees).
Rub whole chicken liberally with olive oil.
In a small bowl mix together garlic powder, ground cumin, ground coriander, smoked paprika, sea salt and ground pepper.
Rub seasoning into chicken until well coated.
Place body cavity of chicken over beer can, and transfer to grill.
Grill chicken until it reaches an internal temperature of 160 (thigh) and 180 (breast). This is a low and slow process—approximately 1 ½ hours.
Let chicken rest before carving and serving.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds extra lean ground beef', '3 tablespoons FiMi Kingston Jerk Seasoning', '1 tablespoon Orange Juice', '1 tablespoon Soy Sauce', '4 to 6 hamburger buns', '4 to 6 slices of cheese', 'Fresh or canned pineapple slices']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together is a large bowl.', 'Use beef to form 4 to 6 beef patties.', 'Cook on a grill or in a skillet to your desired liking.', 'While burgers are being cooked, lightly toast the hamburger buns.', 'Place cooked beef patty on bun, top with 1 slice of cheese and 1 slice of pineapple. If canned pineapple is used, drain the slices first.', 'Serve warm!']

recipe_name: Grilled Albacore Loin with Pepper Cream Sauce
ingredients: ['2 tbsp butter', '1 shallot, minced', '1 tbsp fresh cracked black pepper', '3/4 cup dry white wine', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 tbsp Dijon mustard', '2 tbsp chopped fresh tarragon (plus extra for garnish)', '1 tsp lemon juice', 'Kosher salt', '2 trimmed albacore tuna loins, 3/4 to 1 lb', 'Salt and pepper', 'Olive oil', '4 lemon wedges']
directions: ['In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in shallot and pepper, and sauté until lightly browned. Reduce by half, then stir in cream and mustard and simmer until sauce is reduced to approximately 1 cup. Stir in fresh chopped tarragon, lemon juice, and salt to taste. Set aside.', 'Brush tuna loins with olive oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Heat grill to high heat. Arrange tuna loins directly on grill grate, and cook about 3 minutes per side, or to the desired doneness. Fish should stay rare in the center.', 'Transfer loins to cutting board and slice to 1” thick medallions. Serve with sauce spooned over top, and garnish with fresh tarragon and lemon wedges.']

ingredients: ['2 thick slices of New Seasons Sicilian bread', '1 oz fontina cheese, grated', '.5 oz gruyere cheese, grated', '1 oz medium cheddar, grated', '2 tbsp mayonnaise']
directions: ['Spread 1 tbsp of mayonnaise over one side of each slice of bread.', 'Heat skillet (use your cast iron if you have one) over medium heat.', 'Place one slice of bread, mayo side down onto skillet.', 'Layer grated cheese over top.', 'Place second slice of bread, mayo side up, on top.', 'When bottom side is golden brown (about 3-4 minutes) carefully flip sandwich.', 'Gently press down on sandwich to help brown and melt the cheese. Cook until golden and serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 tsp kosher salt', '1 tsp garlic powder', '1 1/2 tsp smoked paprika', '1/2 tsp freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp dried minced onion', '1/2 tsp cayenne pepper', '1/2 tsp dried oregano', '1/4 tsp crushed red pepper flakes', '1 tsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '4 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs', '2 links Olympia Provisions smoked chorizo sausage (or your favorite chorizo), sliced on a 1/4" bias', '1 medium yellow onion, diced', '1 jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely diced', '2 celery stalks, diced', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes', '1 tsp cayenne pepper', '1 cup long-grain rice, uncooked', '2 1/4 cup chicken stock', 'green onion, thinly sliced on a bias for garnish', 'fresh parsley, chopped for garnish', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 F.', 'Combine all marinade/rub ingredients in a medium mixing bowl. Add chicken thighs and massage/turn to coat. Set aside.', 'Add olive oil to dutch oven heated to medium-high heat. Cook sausage until browned on both sides, then transfer to a plate.', 'Add chicken thighs to dutch oven, skin-side-down, and sear 2-3 minutes per side until they develop a nice crispy browned skin. Move chicken to plate with sausage.', 'Lower heat to medium-low and sauté chopped onion, jalapeño, and celery for 2-3 minutes, until softened.', 'Stir in cayenne, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper.', 'Stir in rice and chicken stock, and allow to simmer for 1 minute.', 'Arrange chicken thighs and sausage over the rice, pouring in any juices from the plate, return to a summer, then cover.', 'Bake for 35 minutes at 350 F.', 'Uncover, then bake for another 10-15 minutes, until liquid all liquid is absorbed into rice and meat is fully cooked.', 'Garnish with green onions and parsley, then serve.']

ingredients: ['2 Tbsp olive oil', '2 bone-in pork chops', '3/4 tsp all spice', '3/4 tsp ground cloves', '1 Tbsp flour', '3/4 tsp salt', '3/4 tsp black pepper', 'fresh sage', 'fresh rosemary', '1 large apple, sliced', '2 Tbsp salted butter', '1 small red onion, sliced', '2 Tbsp brown sugar', '1 tsp cinnamon']
directions: ['Rub pork chops with all spice, cloves, salt, pepper, and flour', 'Heat olive oil in large skillet. Add pork chops to pan; cook 5 minutes on each side or until pork chops are done. Remove from pan.', 'Melt butter in skillet, add sliced apple, onion, brown sugar, and cinnamon. Cook until apples are soft. Return pork chops to the skillet. Top with fresh sage and rosemary.']

ingredients: ["6 tablespoons New Season's Market salted butter, divided use", '1 medium onion, diced', '1 1/2 tablespoons Madras curry powder, divided', '2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and diced', '2/3 cup apple juice or cider', '1/2 cup dried currants', '8 1" slices butternut squash discs, cut from 2 peeled butternut squash', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter. Add onion and sauté until tender; about 10-12 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon curry powder; cook for an additional minute, stirring constantly. Add apples, juice and currants; continue to cook until liquid evaporates. Season to taste with salt and pepper; remove from heat.', 'Preheat oven to 350° F. In a small skillet over medium heat, melt remaining 5 tablespoons butter. Add remaining ½ tablespoon curry powder and cook for 1 minute; remove from heat.', 'Lightly brush a rimmed baking sheet with some of the curry butter. Arrange squash discs in a single layer on buttered baking sheet. Sprinkle discs with salt and pepper. Divide apple filling evenly on tops of discs. Drizzle remaining curry butter over discs. Cover loosely with foil and bake until squash is tender; about 40-45 minutes.', 'Using a spatula, transfer discs to serving platter.']

ingredients: ['1 pound apples (we prefer Honeycrisp or Pink Lady)', '1 cup pecans, toasted and chopped', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '2 1/4 cups sugar, divided', '2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour, sifted', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 cup orange juice', '2 1/2 teaspoons vanilla', '4 eggs', '1 cup vegetable oil', '1 cup powdered sugar', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons whole milk']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and lightly flour a 10’ bundt pan. Peel, core and chop apples into chunks. Toss with pecans, cinnamon, and ¼ cup of the sugar and set aside.', 'Stir together flour, baking powder and salt in a large mixing bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together oil, orange juice, sugar and vanilla. Mix wet ingredients into the dry ones, then add eggs, one at a time. Scrape down the bowl to ensure all ingredients are incorporated.', 'Pour half of batter into prepared pan. Spread half of apples over it. Pour the remaining batter over the apples and arrange the remaining apples on top. Bake for about 1½ hours, or until a tester comes out clean. Cool in pan on rack 15 minutes, then invert onto rack to cool completely in the pan, about 1 hour, and then turn it out onto a plate.', 'While the cake cools, add all the glaze ingredients to a small bowl and whisk together until smooth. Drizzle glaze over the top of cake, slice, add ice cream, and serve.', "*Adapted from Deb Perelman's smittenkitchen.com"]

ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic, finely grated', '1/4 cup New Seasons Market olive oil', '1/4 cup pure maple syrup', '1 tablespoon harissa paste', '2 teaspoons cumin seeds', 'kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 1/2 pounds small rainbow carrots, scrubbed, tops trimmed, halved', '1 lemon, thinly sliced, seeds removed']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F.', 'Whisk garlic, oil, maple syrup, harissa, and cumin seeds in a small bowl.', 'Toss carrots and lemon with garlic mixture in a large roasting pan to coat; season with salt and pepper.', 'Roast, tossing occasionally, until carrots are tender and lemons are caramelized, 35–40 minutes.']

ingredients: ['1 cup flour', '1 cup brown sugar', '1 cup cold salted butter, cubed', '1 cup lightly toasted hazelnuts', '1/2 cup crystallized ginger', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg', '5 pears, peeled, cored, and cubed', '4 medium parsnips, peeled, and grated (about 6 cups grated)', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '1/2 cup raisins or dried figs', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', 'spoon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350ºF. Pulse crumble topping ingredients in a food processor until a coarse crumb forms. Set aside. Combine filling ingredients in a medium bowl until well blended. Spread filling in a 9” x 13” baking dish.', 'Top with crumble. Place on middle oven rack and bake 30 to 40 minutes until cooked through and crumble is browned. Serve warm with whipped cream, crème fraîche or ice cream.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds sirloin, cut into thin strips', '1 cup brown rice flour', '1/3 cup butter, divided use', '1 yellow onion, diced', '16 ounces sliced mushrooms', '1/4 cup dry sherry', '2 cups beef stock', '2/3 cup sour cream', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon salt', '3 teaspoons black pepper', '1 package egg noodles, cooked according to package directions', '3 tablespoons butter (for egg noodles)']
directions: ['Dredge the sirloin strips in flour. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter and brown the sirloin strips, about 3 minutes on each side, until fully cooked.', 'Set meat aside and add remaining butter to skillet. Sauté onions and mushrooms, about 5 minutes. Return meat to skillet and add salt and pepper. Stir well.', 'Add sherry, thyme and beef broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 1 hour.', 'Taste and adjust seasonings, adding more salt or pepper, if desired. Remove from heat and stir in sour cream. Serve immediately with buttered egg noodles.']

ingredients: ['30 cremini mushrooms, remove and reserve stems', '3/4 lb Italian sausage', '1/3 cup olive tapenade (store-bought or make your own)', '3 Tbls almond flour', 'Finely chopped parsley for garnish']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350° F.', 'Clean mushrooms and trim off end of stem if dried out. Remove stems and chop them finely, leaving caps whole.', 'Cook sausage and chopped stems over medium-low heat until sausage has browned. Stir in olive tapenade and almond flour and remove from heat.', 'Place mushroom caps snugly in a baking dish and fill with a spoonful of sausage mixture, mushrooms should be quite full.', 'Drizzle filled mushrooms with olive oil and bake for approximately 30 minutes, or until filling is brown and crusty. Remove from oven and garnish with finely chopped parsley prior to serving.']

ingredients: ['40 large cremini mushrooms', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper', '8 ounces mild bulk sweet Italian sausage', '½ cup finely chopped onion', '¼ cup finely chopped jarred roasted piquillo red pepper', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme', '1/3 cup freekeh', '1 cup chicken broth', '½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese', '2 tablespoons finely chopped Italian parsley']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. With a paring knife, carefully remove the stems from the mushroom caps. Finely chop the stems and set aside. Toss the mushroom caps with 2 tablespoons of the oil and place cup side-up on the baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Add 1 tablespoon of the oil to a medium sauté pan and heat over medium heat. Add the sausage and sauté, breaking it up with a spatula, until the meat is cooked through, transfer to a medium mixing bowl and set aside.', 'Add the remaining tablespoon of oil and heat over medium heat until hot. Add the chopped mushroom stems, onion, red pepper, and thyme and sauté until the onion is translucent, 8 minutes. Add the freekeh and stir to coat the grains with the vegetables and oil. Add the broth, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer gently until the grains are tender and have absorbed all the broth, 20 minutes.', 'Pour the freekeh into the bowl with the sausage. Add the cheese and parsley and season to taste with salt and pepper. Generously stuff the mushrooms with the freekeh mixture. (The mushrooms can be made up to this point and refrigerated, covered, for up to 8 hours.) Bake the mushrooms for 20 to 25 minutes, adding 10 minutes cooking time if the mushrooms have been refrigerated. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['2 apples, cut into chunks', '2 tablespoons ghee or coconut oil (use coconut oil to make this vegan)', '2 teaspoons cinnamon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375°F. Combine all ingredients in heat-proof container, such as a Pyrex dish, and bake for 20 minutes.']

recipe_name: Brussels Sprouts with Bacon and Raisins
ingredients: ['4 pieces bacon, rough chop', '1 lb Brussels sprouts, washed and', '1 shallot, finely diced', '1/4 cup golden raisins', '1/4-1/2 cups chicken broth', 'Balsamic vinegar']
directions: ['On medium heat, sauté bacon until crisp. Add shredded sprouts, shallots, and raisins. Sauté until sprouts are limp and tender. If too dry, add some broth and continue cooking.', 'Serve with a drizzle of balsamic vinegar.']

ingredients: ['5 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons sugar', '3 quarts water', '4 center cut boneless pork chops', 'Oil for grill', '1 (17 oz) bottle Podnah’s Mustard sauce']
directions: ['Dissolve salt and sugar in 3 quarts cold water in 2-gallon zipper-lock plastic bag. Add chops and seal bag, pressing out as much air as possible. Refrigerate at least 1 hour and as long as 24 hours. Remove chops and pat dry with a paper towel.', 'Preheat your grill to medium-high and cook until browned on each side, 3 to 4 minutes. Brush with mustard sauce on each side and continue to cook, 7 to 10 more minutes or until an internal probe thermometer register 140 °F. Remove to plate, tent with foil and allow to rest 5 minutes. Brush with additional mustard sauce if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 pound bones from poultry, fish, beef or lamb (from leftover cooked meat or raw*)', '4 cups water', '1 tablespoon unfiltered apple cider vinegar', 'optional: vegetables and spices such as celery, carrots (tops too), zucchini, spinach, garlic, onions, ginger root, turmeric root, rosemary and parsley']
directions: ['Place bones in a large pot and cover bones with cold water. Add apple cider vinegar and let pot stand for at least 30 minutes. Place pot on stove and bring water to a boil. Reduce heat to a slow simmer and skim off any froth that rises to the top. Allow broth to simmer for a minimum of 4 hours and up to 2 days. Mineral content increases with longer cooking time. If using vegetables and spices add them halfway through cooking time. Remove pot from heat and take out bones and vegetables. Strain remaining broth. Store broth in the refrigerator for up to five days. It will also last in the freezer for several months.', 'Chilled broth will gel if enough gelatin from bones is present.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup (half a stick) butter', '1 small yellow onion, medium dice', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '3/4 pound mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 cup hazelnuts, roasted and skinned', '3 tablespoons hazelnut oil']
directions: ['Melt butter in a wide sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the onion, garlic, mushrooms, thyme, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until the onion is soft and most of the liquid from the mushrooms has evaporated. Set aside to cool slightly. Purée the hazelnuts in a food processor. With the motor running, add the hazelnut oil and mix until creamy. Add the mushroom mixture and blend until smooth, scraping down the sides as necessary. Season to taste with more salt and pepper if necessary. Pour pâté into a medium ramekin, smooth the top, and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate until cold.']

recipe_name: Slow Cooker Butternut Squash and Apple Soup
ingredients: ['1 T avocado oil', '1 medium shallot', '1 medium yellow onion, roughly chopped', '1/8 tsp cinnamon', '1/8 tsp ground ginger', '1 medium butternut squash, peeled and seeded, cut into 1" cubes', '1 apple, roughly chopped', '1 medium carrot, roughly chopped', '3 cups vegetable stock or bone broth, divided', '1/2 cup canned full-fat coconut milk', 'lemon juice or apple cider vinegar', 'salt, pepper and coconut aminos to taste']
directions: ['Saute onion and shallot in avocado oil over medium heat until translucent. Season with cinnamon, ginger, and a couple pinches of salt and pepper. Add to slow cooker with squash, apple, carrot, and 2 1/2 cups of stock. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours. Stir in coconut milk and puree with an immersion blender, add remaining 1/2 cup stock if needed to thin out consistency. Taste and season with salt (start with 1/2 tsp), pepper, and a 5 or 6 dashes of coconut aminos. Add a a squeeze of fresh lemon or a splash of apple cider vinegar, stir to combine and taste for seasoning. Garnish with crumbled bacon, if desired.']

ingredients: ['4 cups your favorite veggies, cut into evenly sized pieces', '4 tbsp olive oil', 'Salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F.', 'In a large bowl, combine veggies and olive oil. Stir well to coat. Season with salt and pepper.', "Arrange veggies on baking sheet in a single layer. Be sure to leave enough space between veggies—it's the key to achieving that nice golden crisp on the outside.", 'Roast in the preheated oven until tender on the inside and golden on the outside, about 30 minutes. Give them a little stir about halfway through.']

ingredients: ['8 cups apple cider or juice', '1 cup caramel syrup*', '¼ cup lemon juice', '1 tsp vanilla bean paste', '2 cinnamon sticks', '1 tbsp whole allspice']
directions:
['Combine all ingredients in slow cooker.
Cover and cook on low for 2-3 hours or until heated through.
Remove or strain cinnamon sticks and spices.
Pour into mugs; garnish with whipped cream, caramel topping and additional cinnamon sticks if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 3/4 pounds asparagus spears, tough ends snapped, cut into 2-inch lengths', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'Sea salt, to taste', 'Freshly ground pepper, to taste', '6 cups chicken broth', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped onion', '1 1/2 cups Arborio rice', '1/2 cup dry vermouth', '1/2 cup finely grated “E Tartufo” sheep’s milk cheese', '1/4 cup finely grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 ½ teaspoon finely grated lemon zest']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°. Toss the asparagus with 1 tablespoon of the oil, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and roast until just tender. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.', 'Bring the broth to a simmer in a medium saucepan. Reduce heat to low. In a large saucepan, heat the remaining oil and the butter over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until translucent, 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Add the vermouth and stir until liquid is absorbed, 1 minute.', 'Add 1 ladle of hot broth to the rice and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, until the broth is absorbed. Continue adding stock one ladleful at a time until almost all of the stock is used, about 15 minutes. (Keep a ladleful of broth in reserve.)', 'Add the roasted asparagus (reserving 8 asparagus tips for garnish), cheeses, lemon juice, lemon zest, and parsley and stir to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (If you prefer it saucier, add the remaining broth now.)', 'Divide the risotto among 4 bowls and top each bowl with 2 of the asparagus spears and serve.']

ingredients: ["6 tablespoons New Season's Market salted butter, divided use", '1 medium onion, diced', '1 1/2 tablespoons Madras curry powder, divided', '2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and diced', '2/3 cup apple juice or cider', '1/2 cup dried currants', '8 1" slices butternut squash discs, cut from 2 peeled butternut squash', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter. Add onion and sauté until tender; about 10-12 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon curry powder; cook for an additional minute, stirring constantly. Add apples, juice and currants; continue to cook until liquid evaporates. Season to taste with salt and pepper; remove from heat.', 'Preheat oven to 350° F. In a small skillet over medium heat, melt remaining 5 tablespoons butter. Add remaining ½ tablespoon curry powder and cook for 1 minute; remove from heat.', 'Lightly brush a rimmed baking sheet with some of the curry butter. Arrange squash discs in a single layer on buttered baking sheet. Sprinkle discs with salt and pepper. Divide apple filling evenly on tops of discs. Drizzle remaining curry butter over discs. Cover loosely with foil and bake until squash is tender; about 40-45 minutes.', 'Using a spatula, transfer discs to serving platter.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon Madras curry powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 13.5 oz can diced tomatoes, with juice', '2 cups peeled and diced winter squash (butternut, et al)', '1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves chopped', '4 cups vegetable broth']
directions: ['In a large soup pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat until hot.', 'Add onion, garlic, curry powder, salt and pepper and cook, stirring frequently, until onion and garlic are soft and starting to caramelize.', 'Add tomatoes, squash, kale and vegetable broth and cook, covered, until squash is tender, about 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Taste soup. Add additional salt and pepper, if desired.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds ground beef', '3/4 pound ground pork', "1/2 cup Ian's gluten-free bread crumbs", '1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce', '1 medium onion', '4 cloves garlic', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '2 eggs', '1 can tomato paste', '1 pound bacon', '15-ounce can tomato sauce', '1/3 cup brown sugar', '1/4 cup Worcestershire', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375ºF.', 'Place onion and garlic in the bowl of a food processor and pulse to chop up. Chop until small, but not to liquid. Remove onions and garlic to a large bowl.', 'Add in the rest of the ingredients except for bacon and sauce ingredients. Stir together. Pat the mixture into a loaf shape in a 9" x 13" pan.', 'Open the package of bacon and lay over the top of the meatloaf to cover completely.', 'Bake in the oven for about an hour. Check the temperature in the center; meatloaf should be 155 degrees. While meatloaf is in the oven, heat and combine sauce ingredients in a small sauce pan over medium heat.', 'When the meatloaf is the correct temp and the bacon is browned, top with some of the sauce. Bake 10 minutes more or broil to finish sauce. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['1 15 oz can pumpkin puree', '1 13.5 oz can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '3 tablespoons tahini', '1 clove garlic', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon cumin powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne, optional', 'salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['In a food processor fitted with a blade, process pumpkin, chickpeas and garlic until fairly smooth.', 'Add olive oil, lemon juice, cumin, cayenne and a pinch of salt and pepper; process until smooth.', 'Add additional salt and pepper to taste. Serve with tortilla chips.']
