ingredients: ['4 large peaches, sliced', '2 cups fresh berries', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons arrowroot', '1/2 cup coconut sugar', '1 cup almond flour', '1/4 cup coconut flour', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1/2 cup gluten free oats', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1/2 cup coconut sugar', '1/2 cup coconut oil', '1/4 cup slivered almonds', '1/2 cups coconut flakes']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Place peaches and berries in a large bowl, sprinkle with lemon juice, vanilla and arrowroot and coconut sugar; toss to incorporate all ingredients. In a smaller bowl, combine almond & coconut flours, cinnamon, oats, salt, sugar, coconut oil, almonds and coconut flakes until crumbly for topping.\nPlace peach mixture in a 3 quart baking dish. Crumble topping over the peach mixture. Bake covered at 350° for 45 minutes until peach juice is bubbling. Remove cover and bake a few more minutes if topping is not yet browned.', 'Let cool and top with ice cream.']

ingredients: ['1 cup quinoa, rinsed', 'course ground salt and pepper', '3 tablespoons walnut oil', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoons minced shallot', '1/2 lb cherries, halved and pitted', '1/2 cup coarsley chopped walnuts, toasted', '1/2 cup chopped fresh herbs, such as tarragon, parlsey and/ or chives', '* Optional additions: crumbled feta cheese']
directions: ['In a medium saucepan with a lid, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Stir in quinoa and 1/4 tsp salt. Boil and stir occasionally until quinoa starts to sprout. Test for doneness, it will be tender. Remove from heat and drain in a sieve. Cool to room temperature. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, whisk together oil, lemon juice, and shallot; season with salt and pepper. Pour dressing on warm quinoa. Add cherries, herbs and walnuts and toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Optional: Crumbled feta cheese. Serve.']

ingredients: ['3-4 cups stone fruit jam', '3/4 cup butter', '1 cup packed brown sugar', '1 3/4 cups gluten free all-purpsoe flour', '1 teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 cups gluten free rolled oats']
directions: ['Preheat oven 350°. In a medium bowl, cream butter and brown sugar. In a separate bowl, stir together flour, soda and salt; add to butter mixture and mix well. Stir in rolled oats.', 'Press half of the mixture evenly into the bottom of a greased 9” x 13” baking dish. Evenly spread a generous layer of jam on top. Top with remaining oat mixture. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until light brown. Serve warm or at room temperature. These bars will keep well at room temperature for 3-5 days if tightly wrapped in plastic.', '***For additional flavor and texture, add chopped fresh fruit or berries on top of the jam before you put the final layer on.']

ingredients: ['1 sweet onion, diced', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '2 limes, juiced', '6 apricots, cubed', '1 large jalapeno, chopped fine', '1 cup cherries, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, taste and adjust for seasoning. Fruit salsas are a great accompaniment to grilled meat or fish. You can mix and match the fruit and herbs to create a multitude of combinations.']

ingredients: ['6 eggs, hardboiled, peeled and cooled', '3 ounces wild salmon, cooked', '1/2 large ripe avocado', '1-3 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1-2 tablespoons fresh dill, minced', '2 tablespoons scallions, finely sliced', 'paprika for sprinkling (optional)', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Slice peeled eggs in half lengthwise. Gently scoop the yolks into a medium mixing bowl and place the whites on a serving tray. Mash yolks into small crumbly pieces with a fork. In a food processor, blend salmon, avocado, lemon juice and dill until well mixed. Add salmon mixture, salt and pepper to the mixing bowl of yolks. Combine well. Fill eggs with yolk/salmon mixture. Garnish with scallions and paprika if desired.', 'Tip: to keep eggs from sliding all over your serving tray, before filling, slice just enough egg white off of the bottom of each half to make egg white flat. Alternatively, you can line serving tray with a bed of kale to keep eggs in place']

ingredients: ['1 can full-fat coconut milk', '1/4 cup maple syrup (or honey)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 1/2 cups fresh or frozen berries, rinsed and drained', '1 lime, zested', '1/4 cup lime juice', 'dash of sea salt']
directions: ['In a medium bowl, whisk together coconut milk, maple syrup, salt, and vanilla extract.\nIn a blender, puree berries and ½ cup of the coconut milk mixture.\nAdd the lime juice and zest to the remaining coconut milk mixture, and stir to combine. Pour alternating layers of the coconut milk mixture and the berry mixture into popsicle molds. Insert sticks and freeze until solid, this will take several hours.']

ingredients: ['1 cup blackberries', '1 tablespoon chia seeds', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon real maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place all ingredients in a food processor. Pulse until desired consistency is reached. Minimal blending results in a jam-like consistency. Further blending will produce jelly. Pour mixture into a glass jar and chill for 60 minutes before serving.']

ingredients: ['6 ears corn, sliced off cob', '1 medium red onion, diced', '1 pint blueberries', '1/4 cup fresh lime juice', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced & packed basil leaves', 'salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Steam the corn with water in a large saucepan over medium heat, covered, until bright yellow, about 4 minutes. Remove the lid and continue to cook the corn, stirring frequently, until the water evaporates, about 3 minutes longer. Transfer the corn to a large bowl and let cool slightly. Mix in red onion, blueberries, lime juice and olive oil. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover bowl and refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours. Remove the salad from the refrigerator and fold in basil. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 medium yellow onion, chopped', '1 bunch collard, thinly sliced', '2-3 tablespoons avocado oil', '1/4 cup water', '1/2 cup full fat coconut milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat oil in a 9 inch skillet over medium heat, add onions and saute until they just begin to turn translucent, about five minutes.', 'Trim the bottom inch from the collards, then cut into thin strips by rolling 4-5 leaves into a tight bundle and cut crosswise into 1/4-1/2 inch strips (it’s not necessary to remove the stalk). Add greens to the onions, add the water and cover, reduce heat to low, and cook for 30-40 minutes. Add the coconut milk and turmeric, stir to combine, increase heat to medium, and cook for about 10 minutes or until the mixture has thickened.']

recipe_name: Burrito Bowl with Kale and Black Beans
ingredients: ['1 cup brown rice, rinsed & cooked', '1 bunch curly kale, destemmed and chopped', '1/4 cup lime juice', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 jalapeno, deseeded & minced', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1 avocado pitted', '1/2 cup mild salsa verde', '1/2 cup coarsely chopped cilanto', '1 lime juiced', '2 cans black beans, rinsed & drained', '1 shallot, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced or pressed', '1/4 teaspoon chili powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne (optional)', 'sliced cherry tomatoes', 'avocado slices', 'hot sauce', 'vegan sour cream or plain yogurt', 'sliced almonds', 'hulled hemp seeds']
directions: ['Prepare and cook rice as directed.', 'Prepare kale: whisk lime juice, olive oil, jalapeno, cumin, and sea salt. Toss the sauce with the chopped kale in a medium-mixing bowl. Set aside.', 'Prepare the avocado Sauce: blend avocado, green salsa, cilantro, and lime juice in a food processor or blender until creamy.', 'Prepare beans: Warm a little olive oil or avocado oil in a sauce pan over medium-low heat. Sauté shallot and garlic until fragrant. Add beans, chili powder, and cayenne pepper and cook until beans are warmed/softened (about 5 minutes).', 'To serve, scoop a little rice, beans, and kale mixture into a bowl. Dollop or drizzle the avocado sauce and garnish with desired veggies/toppings.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '1 cup spinach', '4 asparagus stalks, trimmed and chopped', '1 small zucchini, diced', '4 eggs from pastured hens', '4 ounces wild smoked salmon', '1 small avocado, cut into cubes']
directions: ['Melt the ghee or coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus, spinach and zucchini, and sauté until tender.', 'In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and then add to the vegetable mixture. Gently stir the eggs until they are scrambled and cooked through. Add the smoked salmon and avocado and serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons sauerkraut brine or pickle brine', '2 tablespoons coconut milk', '2-3 tablespoons minced shallot', '1-2 tablespoons fresh herbs of choice such as parsley, chives and dill', '1 teaspoon maple syrup or raw honey (optional)', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['In a blender, combine all ingredients and blend until smooth. If dressing is too thick, add water 1 teaspoon at a time and blend until desired consistency is reached.']

ingredients: ['1 4-inch piece of kombu (dried seaweed)', '1 bunch green onions, chopped', '1/2 cup wakame (dried seaweed)', '1/4 cup chickpea miso paste*', '1/2 cup warm water for mixing miso']
directions: ['Rinse the kombu and allow to steep overnight in a quart of cold water. Remove kombu and heat up the seaweed broth but do not boil. Stir in green onion and wakame. Simmer for 3-5 minutes, and remove from heat. Dissolve miso paste in warm water, and then stir into soup mixture. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 medium sweet potato, baked and skin removed', '2 eggs from pastured hens', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice', 'Ghee or coconut oil for cooking', 'Pasture butter or coconut butter as topping']
directions: ['Beat eggs in a bowl. Stir in sweet potato flesh, salt, spices and vanilla, and mix thoroughly. (May combine ingredients in a blender if desired.) Heat a skillet over low-medium heat, and grease with ghee or coconut oil. Once skillet is warm, pour or scoop a few tablespoons of batter onto pan. Allow to cook 3-5 minutes or until golden brown and set. Flip and cook another few minutes until cooked through and lightly browned. Top with pasture butter or softened coconut butter.', 'For a savory twist, omit the cinnamon/pumpkin spice and use pepper and curry seasoning instead of, or in addition to, salt. Stir in chopped spinach and sautéed onions for more flavor and texture.']

ingredients: ['1 package Tempt hemp tofu', '1/4 cup raw apple cider vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon olive or avocado oil', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/8 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne']
directions: ['Smash hemp tofu cake with a fork or run through food processor until crumbly. In separate bowl, combine remaining ingredients, stir in hemp tofu crumbles and mix until well combined. You can use right away or let flavors meld in the refrigerator for an hour, or overnight.', 'To eat, heat over low/medium heat until warmed through and until mixture appears less wet. Tastes great scrambled with veggies or eggs. Try a vegan take on huevos rancheros and serve on a sprouted corn tortilla with black beans, sautéed onions and peppers, and Wildbrine fermented salsa verde. Garnish with cilantro.']

ingredients: ['2 cups coarsely grated sweet potato or yam', '4 tablespoons ghee, divided', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped cauliflower', '1-2 cups chopped kale', '2-3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 eggs', 'Additional salt and pepper', '1/3 cup crumbled goat cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F and melt 2 tablespoons of ghee to be mixed with potato shreds. Squeeze sweet potato shreds with a paper towel or in cheesecloth to press out excess liquid. Add potato shreds to a 10″ pie pan with ghee, salt, and pepper, stir to combine, then press into the bottom of pan and up sides to form a crust. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes begin to brown on the surface and edges.', 'While crust bakes, sauté shallot in remaining 2 tablespoons of ghee until translucent. Add cauliflower, sauté until cauliflower is tender, 4-5 minutes. Covering pan will help soften cauliflower more quickly. Add garlic and kale, and sauté one more minute. Remove pie pan from oven and decrease oven temp to 350°F.', 'Distribute cooked veggies evenly over potato crust. Whisk together eggs, and a few shakes of salt and pepper, then pour over veggies. Add cheese and bake 25-30 minutes, or until eggs are set. Allow to cool 10 minutes prior to slicing.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons gluten-free mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon celery seed', 'Sea salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 can of your favorite sardines', '1/3 cup finely chopped onion', '1/2 celery stalk, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons horseradish mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 generous squeeze of fresh lemon juice (about 1 teaspoon)', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 pinch lemon pepper']
directions: ['Drain sardines, place in a bowl, and chop into chunks with a fork. Add celery and onion to sardines and stir. In a separate bowl, blend horseradish mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, sea salt and lemon pepper. Combine dressing with sardine mixture and serve.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup canned coconut milk', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon chili garlic sauce', '1-2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon coconut nectar', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon grated ginger', 'Cilantro (optional)']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a food processor, and refrigerate. Let sit at least 2 hours before serving. Can be thinned with more coconut milk. This sauce is great with chicken, as a dressing for Asian slaw, and for dipping veggies.']

ingredients: ['1 raw nori sheet*', '2 tablespoons almond, cashew or other nut butter', '1 teaspoon raw honey', '1 pinch sea salt']
directions: ['Place nori sheet on a flat surface. Spread nut butter over the nori, drizzle with honey, and sprinkle salt on top. Roll or fold nori sheet so that fillings are contained inside.', 'For more sweetness, try adding chunks of banana inside your nori snack.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup ground ginger', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon anise seed', '2 teaspoons ground cloves']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons minced shallot', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon raw honey', '2 small grapefruits', '1/2 lb mustard greens, trimmed and cut into 1/2” pieces (about 4 cups)', '1/2 cup dried dates, pitted and chopped', 'pomegranate seeds']
directions: ['In a large salad bowl, whisk together the shallot and lime juice and let stand 5 minutes. Whisk in oil, salt, and honey. Prepare grapefruit by peeling and cutting away any pith. Using a sharp knife, cut away the sections from the membranes. Toss together grapefruit sections and mustard greens with the prepared vinaigrette. Add any optional toppings.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter or ghee', '1 onion, chopped', '3-4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon muchi curry or curry powder of your choice', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon coriander', '4 cups gluten-free chicken or vegetable broth', '1 cup dry lentils, rinsed', '1 small head cauliflower, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 can full fat coconut milk', 'cilantro, chopped (optional, for garnish)', 'cashews, toasted & chopped (optional, for garnish)']
directions: ['Heat a soup pot or large saucepan over medium heat. Add butter or ghee, and sauté onions and garlic for 2 minutes. Add spices and stir to coat onions and garlic thoroughly. Add broth and lentils and cover. Bring to a boil, turn back heat, and simmer for 30 minutes. Add cauliflower, salt, and coconut milk, and simmer for 15 more minutes. Serve in bowls with cilantro and cashews.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups full-fat coconut milk', '1 cup quinoa, rinsed and soaked overnight', '1-2 teaspoons fresh grated ginger', '1-2 teaspoons raw honey']
directions: ['Soak quinoa overnight and rinse. Bring coconut milk to a soft boil and add quinoa and ginger. Cover and reduce to a simmer. Cook for 15-20 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Drizzle honey over cooked quinoa and top with ground nuts/seeds and sliced fruit if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups full-fat coconut milk', '1 cup quinoa, soaked overnight in pure water, drained, rinsed']
directions: ['Bring coconut milk to a boil. Add quinoa, cover and reduce to a simmer. Cook 15-20 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Can be eaten plain or topped with nuts/seeds and fresh fruit.']

ingredients: ['Ice cream spinner, frozen overnight', '1 1/2 cups coconut cream', '1 1/2 cups nut/seed milk', '4-5 pitted dates', '1 can pumpkin puree', '8 pasture raised chicken egg yolks', '2/3 cup coconut sugar', '4 teaspoons maple syrup', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, to taste', 'pinch sea salt']
directions: ["Put your ice cream spinner into the freezer the night before. Heat milks, dates, and pumpkin together over medium-low. Using an immersion blender puree dates into the milks. In a separate bowl combine the remaining ingredients, and whisk until a thick ribbon stage. Slowly add warmed milk to egg yolks while whisking to temper the yolk mixture. Once warmed add yolk mixture back into the pot with the rest of the milk, and stir slowly with a wooden spoon till mixture starts to thicken. Strain liquid through a fine mesh strainer to remove any possible solids, and allow to cool. Set up your ice cream maker and add ice cream base to maker and follow manufacturer's directions. Once at soft serve stage pour ice cream out into a freezable storage container and allow to freeze solid."]

ingredients: ['2 fresh limes, juiced', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '1 head Napa cabbage, thinly sliced', '1 carrot, grated', '1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '4-6 green onions, chopped', '2 tablespoons grated ginger', '3 tablespoons chopped cilantro', '3/4 cup peanut butter', '2 tablespoons raw local honey', '3-4 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '1 dash crushed chili pepper', '3 cloves garlic', '3/4 cup coconut milk']
directions: ['Mix all dressing ingredients thoroughly. Toss all vegetables in a large bowl. Coat veggies with lime dressing.', 'Meanwhile, combine all peanut sauce ingredients in a food processor or blender and blend until thoroughly mixed. Pour one cup of peanut sauce over dressed vegetables; plate and garnish with peanuts and additional chili if desired.']

ingredients: ['4 cups unsweetened fruit juice*', '2 tablespoons Vital Proteins Beef Gelatin']
directions:
['Place 2 cups of juice into a large bowl. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of gelatin over the top of juice. Set aside. Allow to bloom for 5 minutes. Place remaining juice in a small saucepan over low heat. Warm juice until just steaming. Do not boil. Add warm juice to bloomed gelatin mixture. Stir until gelatin has fully dissolved. If desired, transfer into a shallow dish or your favorite mold. Chill for 4 hours or until set.', 'Optional toppings:
Coconut cream
Whipped cream
Fresh fruit']

ingredients: ['2 cups pinto beans (rinsed 3 times and sorted)', '8 cups water', '1-2 tablespoons sea salt']
directions: ['In a large pot, bring beans and water to a boil. Cover and reduce to simmer for 4 hours. Add 1 tablespoon sea salt, mash with potato masher (3-4 mashes to thicken liquid but keep most beans whole) and simmer another 30 minutes uncovered. Add more salt to taste if needed.']

ingredients: ['1/2 lb Wild Salmon Filet', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'sea salt & pepper to taste', '1/2 lemon', '1 sweet onion, sliced into rings']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F. Place salmon on a large sheet of tin foil. Rub salmon with 2 teaspoons of olive oil, a pinch of sea salt, and a pinch of black pepper. Squeeze half a lemon on top and place 4-5 sliced rings of onion on top of filet. Wrap entire piece of salmon in foil- make sure no filet is showing. Place the foil packet directly on oven rack and bake for 30-40 minutes or until cooked.']

ingredients: ['4 cups brewed ginger tea', '2 tablespoons cacao powder', '4 dates, soaked for a few hours, pitted and chopped', '1/2 cup wide unsweetened coconut shreds, toasted', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch cayenne', '4 cinnamon sticks (for garnish)']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients (except the cinnamon sticks) in a blender. Strain through cheesecloth or a nut milk bag. Heat strained mixture gently in sauce pan until warm. Serve with a cinnamon stick for garnish.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup Tamari nuts', '1/4 cup Tamari Pumpkin Seeds or Roasted Pumpkin seeds', '1/4 cup Goji berries', '1/4 cup goldenberries (can sub raisins or golden raisins)', '1/4 cup cacao nibs']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients together in a bowl. Store in container with lid.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '3 small sweet potatoes, diced', '1 small onion, diced', '1 bell pepper, diced', '1 small zucchini, diced', '2 cloves garlic, diced or pressed', '1 small tomato, diced', '1 pinch red pepper flakes (optional)', '1 package organic firm or extra firm tofu, drained', '1/3 cup unsweeteneed almond milk (or other milk alternatives)', '1 tablespoon corn starch (or other thickening agent)', '3 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon gluten-free mustard', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon Kala Namak (optional)', '1 pinch black pepper (optional)']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375°F. Prepare pie dish by lining bottom with parchment paper and greasing the edges with extra oil.', 'Heat a skillet over medium heat and add oil and sweet potatoes. Sauté for 5 minutes. Add onions and sauté for an additional 5 minutes or until translucent. Add peppers, zucchini and garlic and sauté until tender crisp. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and sauté for 1 minute. Remove from heat.', 'In a food processor or blender, combine remaining ingredients and process until creamy and smooth. Add additional seasonings to taste. In a large mixing bowl, combine cooked veggies and tofu mixture. Slowly spoon this into the prepared pie dish. Bake in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes until the top is firm to the touch. Remove from oven and let sit for 10-15 minutes. Carefully flip the frittata out onto a serving dish and remove parchment paper.', 'Try topping with avocado slices, tomato, hot sauce, or salsa. This frittata would also be great on a bed of leafy greens!']

recipe_name: Sweet and Spicy Nut and Pretzel Mix
ingredients: ['4 cups large raw nuts (pecans, almonds or cashews)', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1/3 cup dark brown sugar', '1 teaspoon EACH ground allspice, cloves, ginger and cayenne', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 teaspoon kosher salt, if desired', '4 cups gluten free pretzels']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Line a large cookie sheet with foil and spread nuts in an even layer. Bake for about 10 minutes, turning the cookie sheet and stirring halfway through, just until nuts are lightly toasted.', 'Meanwhile, in a large bowl, mix the butter, brown sugar, spices, cocoa and maple syrup. Toss in warm nuts until all are coated. Add in the pretzels and salt, if using. Stir gently to mix, taking care not to break the pretzels. Return mixture to lined cookie sheet, bake for 12-15 minutes, stirring once or twice and watching so they don’t burn. Remove from oven and spread out on a another pan to cool completely.', 'Store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 inch piece ginger, finely chopped', '1 small sweet potato, diced', '1 large carrot, chopped', '1 cup broccoli florets', '1 large red bell pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '3 tablespoons red curry paste (adjust to taste)*', '1 splash tamari or coconut aminos', '1 tablespoon fish sauce or mock fish sauce (optional)', '1 14 oz can full-fat coconut milk']
directions: ['Heat coconut oil in a large pan or wok. Sauté the onions until soft. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 1-2 minutes more. Add sweet potato and carrot and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add broccoli and red bell pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes more until broccoli and red bell pepper are tender-crisp. Add turmeric, curry paste, fish sauce, and tamari or coconut aminos, and stir to mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes and then immediately add coconut milk. Cover and simmer over low heat until potatoes and carrots are tender. Serve over cauliflower rice or spiralized zucchini.']

recipe_name: Spring Lentil Salad with Roasted Carrots
ingredients: ['1 cup lentils, cooked in broth or water', '6 whole carrots, peeled', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', 'Baby salad greens (for serving)', 'Feta cheese, crumbled for garnish (optional)', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/2 cup torn parsley leaves', '1/2 cup torn mint leaves', '1/4 cup very thinly sliced radishes', '1-2 green onions, thinly sliced', 'Sea salt and black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Place cooked lentils in a bowl. Cut carrots into finger size pieces, and place them onto a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and golden on the edges, then remove from heat and allow to cool.', 'In a separate bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Mix some of the dressing into the lentils. Make a bed of salad greens on a serving plate, and spoon lentils on top. Layer the carrots over the lentils and drizzle with the remaining salad dressing. Sprinkle with feta cheese if using and serve.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari or coconut aminos', '2 teaspoons peanut or sesame oil', '1/2 cup almond, cashew or peanut butter', '2 teaspoons vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '1-2 cloves garlic', '1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)', '2/3 cup water']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor with water and mix until smooth. Add more water if a thinner consistency is desired. Serve over steamed veggies.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup quinoa, rinsed and drained', '1 pinch sea salt', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup lime juice', '3 cloves garlic, pressed', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper', '1 1/2 cup cooked black beans, rinsed', '1 cup corn, steamed and cooled', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '1/2 cup chopped cilantro']
directions: ['Boil water in small sauce pan, slowly add quinoa, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until all water is absorbed. Remove quinoa from heat and set aside to cool. Meanwhile, whisk dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Combine all black beans, cooled steamed corn, diced pepper, and chopped cilantro. When quinoa is cool, fold it in with the rest of salad and dressing.']

ingredients: ['7-10 large dates, pitted', '3/4 cup walnuts, soaked in water for 2-8 hours and rinsed', '3/4 cup almond meal', '1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '1 tablespoon water', 'Raw or toasted coconut', 'Fresh berries']
directions: ['Toss dates, walnuts, and almond meal in a food processor, blend, and add in cocoa powder and maple syrup. Continue to process and add water. More water may be added to reach desired consistency. Press mixture into a glass baking dish and refrigerate or freeze. Keeps in the freezer for up to a month.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons garlic powder', '3 tablespoons dried lemon peel', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['1 cup filtered water, divided', '3 tablespoons beef gelatin*', '1 cup honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt']
directions: ['Grease an 8x8 (or larger) pan and line with unbleached parchment paper in both directions. Leave some length to use as handles when removing finished marshmallows.', 'In a mixing bowl, add gelatin with 1/2 cup of water. While the gelatin softens, pour the other 1/2 cup of water into a saucepan along with honey, vanilla and salt. Cook on medium-high heat until mixture begins to boil.', 'Place a candy thermometer in saucepan and continue to boil mixture until it reaches 240°F (the soft ball stage). This will take approximately 7-8 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat immediately.', 'Turn stand mixer to medium-low and pour the honey mixture into the bowl slowly, combining it with the softened gelatin. Turn the mixer to high and beat mixture until it becomes thick like marshmallow fluff (about 10 min). Transfer the marshmallow fluff to prepared pan.', 'Smooth fluff evenly in the pan with lightly-greased hands. Or, press marshmallows into place gently using parchment paper, leaving parchment paper in place until marshmallows set completely.']

ingredients: ['8-10 ounces wild-caught salmon', '2 teaspoons ghee, melted', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place salmon on parchment lined baking sheet, skin side down. Drizzle melted ghee and lemon juice over salmon and bake for 15-20 minutes or until salmon flakes easily with fork.', 'Note: Bake fish for 10 minutes per inch of thickness.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds wild salmon', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper', '2 tablespoons ghee', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. Grease the bottom of a 9x13 baking dish. Sprinkle salmon with salt and pepper and place in the prepared dish. Mix together ghee (room temperature), lemon zest and dill. Place half of the mixture on top of the seasoned salmon, and spread across the surface of the fish. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until fully cooked, checking for doneness after 10 minutes. Add the remaining ghee/dill/lemon zest mixture on top, add a squeeze of lemon juice and serve with lemon slices and dill for garnish.']

ingredients: ['2 cups pure pineapple juice', '2 limes, juiced', '1 tablespoon honey', '1/4 cup plum vinegar', '3 tablespoons mint, finely chopped', '2 cups cubed pineapple', '4 cups seasonal melon, cut into cubes or balls']
directions: ['In a sauce pan, mix pineapple juice, lime juice, honey, and vinegar. Bring to a boil and reduce for about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Add chopped mint. Transfer fruit to a large bowl. Pour reduced glaze over fruit and stir to coat.']

ingredients: ['1 4-inch piece of kombu, optional', '1 quart vegetable broth or water', '1 bunch green onions, chopped', '1 large sheet raw nori, cut into small strips', '1 pound sprouted tofu, cubed (optional)', '1/4 cup miso paste', '1/2 cup warm water (for mixing with miso)']
directions: ['Rinse the kombu and steep overnight in a quart of broth or water.', 'Remove kombu and heat up the broth to about 175°F, do not boil. Stir in green onion, nori, and tofu, if using. Simmer for 3-5 minutes, remove from heat. Dissolve miso paste in warm water, and then stir into soup mixture. Serve and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['3 medium zucchini', '3 large carrots', '2 green onions, chopped', '1 cup purple cabbage, shredded', '1 cup cauliflower florets', '1 cup mung bean sprouts', '1/2 cup crushed peanuts or almonds', '1/2 cup fresh cilantro, chopped', '1/4 cup tahini', '1/4 cup almond butter (or other nut butter)', '1/4 cup tamari', '2 tablespoons coconut nectar (or other natural sweetener)', '2 tablespoons lime or lemon juice', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon gingerroot, grated']
directions: ['Make zucchini and carrot noodles using spiralizer or other kitchen tool. Place them in a large bowl with other prepared vegetables. Combine all sauce ingredients (crushed nuts, cilantro, tahini, nut butter, tamari, coconut nectar, lemon or lime juice, garlic, and gingerroot) in a bowl and whisk well. The sauce may be thick, but the moisture from the veggies will thin it out. Pour sauce over veggies and toss to combine.']

ingredients: ['1 cup brown basmati rice', '4 cups nut milk of your choice', '1/3 vanilla bean', '1 cinnamon stick', 'Fingertip size of peeled ginger', 'Pinch of sea salt', 'Coconut nectar to taste', '2 tablespoons coconut cream']
directions:
['Add the first 6 ingredients to the pot and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to a simmer and cook for approximately 45 minutes or until the rice is cooked. When rice is cooked through remove cinnamon stick and ginger and scrape vanilla bean into cooked rice. Add sweetener and coconut cream and enjoy!', 'At this point you can add whatever flavors you would like:
Fresh mixed berries
Lime zest and toasted coconut
Toasted almonds and raisins
Caramelized banana
Stewed rhubarb and strawberries
Different spices to travel around the world!']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups almond flour', '3/4 cup finely chopped pecans', '1/2 cup coconut butter, melted', '3 tablespoons raw honey', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'Pinch of sea salt', '2 pounds carrots, peeled and halved', '1 cup canned coconut milk', '2 eggs from pastured hens', '1/2 cup coconut sugar', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 cup coconut flour']
directions: ['For crust:\nPreheat oven to 350°F. In a large bowl, combine almond flour, pecans and salt. In a separate bowl combine coconut butter, honey and vanilla extract. Slowly add dry ingredients to wet until completely combined. Using your fingers, press into a 9-1/2” pie pan. Bake in preheated oven for 12-14 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Remove and set aside to cool completely before filling.', 'For filling:\nPreheat oven to 425°F. Using a rimmed baking sheet, lay out carrot halves and roast 20-25 minutes. Allow to cool slightly. Reduce oven temperature to 350°F. Using a food processor or blender, puree roasted carrots until very smooth. Pour in coconut milk while continuing to blend. Add all remaining ingredients and blend until smooth. Pour filling into crust. Bake in preheated oven for 35 minutes, or until filling is set. Cool 15-20 minutes. Serve chilled or at room temperature. Top with cashew cream if desired.']

ingredients: ['2 peaches, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 mango, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '½ red onion, finely chopped', '3 jalapenos, seeded and chopped', '1 cup cilantro, finely chopped', 'Juice of 1 lime and 1 lemon', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Toss all but the lemon and lime juice in a mixing bowl and stir together. Add the juice of the lemon and lime second, along with salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 cup roasted and salted cashews', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus extra', '3 lbs ripe heirloom tomatoes, seeded', '1 lb strawberries, hulled', '1/2 cucumber, peeled and seeded', '1 red bell pepper, cored and seeded', '1/2 medium sweet onion, peeled', '1/2 cup mild olive oil, such as Arbequina', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar, plus extra', 'Finely diced cucumber, strawberry, and mint for garnish']
directions: ['Working in two batches in a blender, combine half the cashews, garlic, vegetables and strawberries. Puree until very smooth.', 'Add half the olive oil to the blender and puree until fully incorporated. Transfer the soup to a large bowl.', 'Repeat the blending process with the remaining ingredients and transfer to the same bowl.', 'Stir the vinegar and salt into the soup. Taste and adjust seasoning to your liking.', 'Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours before serving. Serve topped with cucumber, strawberry and mint.']

ingredients: ['1 pound gluten free pasta', '1/2 cup oil-packed sun dried tomatoes, drained and finely chopped', '1 cup green olives, halved', '1/2 cup diced salami', '1 1/2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 cup chopped Italian parsley, loosely packed', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Cook pasta according to package instructions, drain, and set aside to cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine the sun dried tomatoes, olives, salami, garlic, and parsley, and toss to combine. Add the pasta to the bowl and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Toss gently to mix. Season to taste with salt and pepper.']

ingredients: ['2 ears fresh corn, shucked and cut into 1/2 inch rings', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon neitral oil, such as safflower', '1 teaspoon minced fresh garlic', '1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger', '3 tablespoons mirin', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Prepare the corn rings and set aside in a medium bowl until ready to use. Heat a wide sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the butter and oil and swirl to coat the pan. Once the butter is hot, add the corn and stir-fry for 1 - 2 minutes, or until some bits of the corn are beginning to lightly brown. Add the garlic and ginger and continue to stir-fry for 1 - 2 more minutes or until fragrant. Next, carefully pour in the mirin and gently stir the mixture to coat the corn. Cover the pan for 1 minute to steam the corn lightly. Uncover and stir again, seasoning to taste with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 Yam', 'Dried apricots (minced) + thinly sliced ham + mustard', 'Macadamia nut butter + hemp seeds', 'Cream cheese + pumpkin seeds + chives', 'Sauteed greens + soft-boiled egg', 'Mushrooms + ground spiced lamb', 'Karam garlic sauce + spiced lentils', 'Leftover chimichurri + brisket', 'Wilted winter greens + pesto', 'Sunflower seed butter + roasted apples', 'Chevre + fermented pickles', 'Buffalo sauce + bleu cheese', 'Spiralized zucchini + drizzle of olive oil + balsamic vinegar', 'Shaved Brussels sprouts + chopped roasted pecans', 'Coconut butter + a sprinkle of cinnamon']
directions: ['Thinly slice a yam lengthwise (1/2" thick). Toast these slices a few times in your toaster, or use the highest/longest setting on your convection oven, until completely heated through and soft to the touch. (Careful, yam toast will be hot!)', 'Top toasty yam slices with toppings of your choice.']

ingredients: ['1 large bunch red beets, trimmed', '3 sweet - tart apples, such as Jonagold or Pink Lady', '6 ounces aged white cheddar cheese, crumbled', '1/3 cup roasted pumpkin seeds', '2 tablespoons sherry vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons honey', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons pumpkin seed oil']
directions: ['Place the beets in a large pot of salted water. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer and cook for 45 - 65 minutes or until tender. Once tender, immediately run the beets under cold water and slip off the skins. Cut the warm beets into a medium dice and place in a bowl in the refrigerator to cool. For the dressing, combine the vinegar, mustard, honey, and salt in a jar and shake vigorously. Add the oil and shake again vigorously. Cut the apples into a medium dice and place in a medium bowl. Add all of the dressing to the apples and toss to combine. To serve the salad, layer the beets on the bottom of a glass bowl. Layer the dressed apples on top. Top with crumbled cheddar cheese and pumpkin seeds.']

ingredients: ['1 cup soaked nuts or seeds of your choosing*', '2-4 cups purified water (for blending)', 'optional sweeteners (maple syrup, coconut nectar, raw honey, dates, stevia)', 'optional flavors (cocoa powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, cardamom, turmeric, pumpkin spice, sea salt)']
directions: ['Choose a mixture of nuts and seeds and soak (see below). Rinse the soaked nuts/seeds and place in blender along with 2 cups purified water and blend well, adding more water if needed to reach desired consistency. Pour the mixture through a nut milk bag or fine sieve. Add optional sweetener or flavors and re-blend. Enjoy. Store in the refrigerator for 4-5 days.', 'How to Soak Nuts and Seeds\nChoose raw, unsalted varieties. Place nuts and seeds* in a bowl and cover them completely with water. Nuts and seeds should be soaked for a minimum of 4 hours but overnight is best (the longer they soak the silkier the milk). After soaking, rinse and drain.', '*Hemp seeds do not need to be soaked.']

ingredients: ['1 medium head cauliflower', '1/2 pound ground meat (beef, lamb, turkey, etc.)', '1/4 pound chicken livers, chopped (optional)', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 medium carrot, chopped', '3-5 leaves kale, de-stemmed and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 inch ginger, minced or grated', '2 tablespoons coconut aminos', '2 tablespoons rice or coconut vinegar', 'fat of choice for cooking (lard, tallow, coconut oil, or ghee)', 'cilantro, chopped, for garnish']
directions: ['Core and separate cauliflower florets, pulse in food processor gently until the size of rice grains - do not over process. In a wide pan, heat cooking fat to medium, add onion and carrot and sauté until onion is translucent. Add ground meat and optional liver, breaking up a with wooden spoon into small crumbles. Add garlic, ginger, and kale. Mix well. Add cauliflower, mix well, and cover for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and toss well with vinegar or coconut aminos, and cilantro.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup rice*', '1 1/2 cups water', '1/2 cup red lentils', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/4 cup olive oil', '1 cup scallions, chopped']
directions: ['Gently wash and drain the rice. In a pot, bring 1 1/2 cups water and 1/2 cup rice to boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 45 minutes. Remove from heat. In a separate pot, bring 1 cup water and 1/2 cup lentils to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Once fully cooked, combine lentils and rice and rinse in a strainer under cold water. In separate dish combine mustard, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt. Whisk until smooth and toss into rice and lentil combination. Add chopped scallions and mix again to combine all ingredients. Refrigerate and served chilled.']

ingredients: ['1 cup steel-cut oats', '1 13.5oz can full-fat coconut milk (save can for measuring water)', '1 13.5oz can filled to brim with water', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/8 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons coconut oil', '2 medium carrots, grated', '1 large apple, chopped', '6 medjool dates, chopped', '2 tablespoons maple syrup (optional to add sweetness)']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker. Stir to combine, cook on low for 8 hours. If you prefer a chewier texture to your oats try cooking this during the day for 6 hours, then reheat the following day for breakfast.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup (half a stick) butter', '1 small yellow onion, medium dice', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '3/4 pound mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 cup hazelnuts, roasted and skinned', '3 tablespoons hazelnut oil']
directions: ['Melt butter in a wide sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the onion, garlic, mushrooms, thyme, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until the onion is soft and most of the liquid from the mushrooms has evaporated. Set aside to cool slightly. Purée the hazelnuts in a food processor. With the motor running, add the hazelnut oil and mix until creamy. Add the mushroom mixture and blend until smooth, scraping down the sides as necessary. Season to taste with more salt and pepper if necessary. Pour pâté into a medium ramekin, smooth the top, and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate until cold.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound chicken breast, cut into chunks', '1 medium yellow onion, small dice', '2 large cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons sweet smoked paprika', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 1/2 cups short grain rice', '1 (14.5 oz.) can diced tomatoes', '8 ounces dry chorizo, small dice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 cups frozen peas', '1/4 cup chopped fresh Italian parsley']
directions: ['Heat the olive oil in a wide saute pan over medium heat. Add the chicken breast and cook, stirring often, until no longer pink. Add the onion and garlic and saute a few minutes more, until the onions begin to soften. Add the paprika and stir to coat. Lastly, add the broth to the pan and bring to a simmer. In the meantime, place the rice, tomatoes, chorizo, and salt in the crock pot. Once the broth mixture simmers, carefully pour it into the crock pot. Turn the crock pot to high heat and stir the contents well. Cover and cook for approximately 90 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed. Lastly, stir in the peas, cover and cook 10 minutes more. Serve the paella immediately, garnished with the fresh parsley.']

ingredients: ['2 ripe bananas, sliced and frozen']
directions: ['Add frozen banana slices to food processor and begin pureeing them. Use a spatula to scrape down the sides and encourage uniform blending. The process may take a few minutes. Enjoy immediately in soft serve consistency or freeze for an hour for a firmer texture. Top with cacao nibs or a drizzle of almond butter.']

ingredients: ["4 cups chicken bone broth, we like Bare Bones, Bonafide Provisions, Butcher's Bone Broth, or homemade", '2-4 large eggs, whisked', '2 bunches baby bok choy, thinly sliced', 'coconut aminos, optional', 'fish sauce, optional']
directions: ['Bring broth to a simmer over medium-low heat, add greens, season with a few shakes of coconut aminos or fish sauce, if desired. While broth simmers, whisk eggs together in a separate bowl. Reduce heat so that broth is steaming but not bubbling. Slowly pour whisked eggs into broth, whisking broth with a fork while pouring egg in a thin stream. Let soup stand for a minute or two, allowing egg to finish cooking. Turn off heat, serve, and top with desired garnishes such as hot sauce, smoked salt, cilantro, or thinly sliced jalapeno.']

ingredients: ['1/2 lb stinging nettles', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 T extra virgin olive oil', '1 T red wine vinegar', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, optional', '']
directions: ['Bring 2 quarts of water to a rolling boil. Using tongs or wearing thick gloves, add the nettles and blanch for 60 seconds. Drain and allow to cool slightly, then squeeze out as much moisture as possible. Remove any tough stems, then chop coarsely and set aside. Heat a pan over medium heat, once warm, add the olive oil and chopped garlic with a generous pinch of salt. Saute garlic for about one minute, not allowing it to brown. Add the chopped nettles and cook, uncovered and stirring occasionally, for another 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add the vinegar and red pepper flakes, if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 15 oz can pumpkin puree', '1 13.5 oz can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '3 tablespoons tahini', '1 clove garlic', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon cumin powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne, optional', 'salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['In a food processor fitted with a blade, process pumpkin, chickpeas and garlic until fairly smooth.', 'Add olive oil, lemon juice, cumin, cayenne and a pinch of salt and pepper; process until smooth.', 'Add additional salt and pepper to taste. Serve with tortilla chips.']

ingredients: ['40 large cremini mushrooms', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper', '8 ounces mild bulk sweet Italian sausage', '½ cup finely chopped onion', '¼ cup finely chopped jarred roasted piquillo red pepper', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme', '1/3 cup freekeh', '1 cup chicken broth', '½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese', '2 tablespoons finely chopped Italian parsley']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. With a paring knife, carefully remove the stems from the mushroom caps. Finely chop the stems and set aside. Toss the mushroom caps with 2 tablespoons of the oil and place cup side-up on the baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Add 1 tablespoon of the oil to a medium sauté pan and heat over medium heat. Add the sausage and sauté, breaking it up with a spatula, until the meat is cooked through, transfer to a medium mixing bowl and set aside.', 'Add the remaining tablespoon of oil and heat over medium heat until hot. Add the chopped mushroom stems, onion, red pepper, and thyme and sauté until the onion is translucent, 8 minutes. Add the freekeh and stir to coat the grains with the vegetables and oil. Add the broth, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer gently until the grains are tender and have absorbed all the broth, 20 minutes.', 'Pour the freekeh into the bowl with the sausage. Add the cheese and parsley and season to taste with salt and pepper. Generously stuff the mushrooms with the freekeh mixture. (The mushrooms can be made up to this point and refrigerated, covered, for up to 8 hours.) Bake the mushrooms for 20 to 25 minutes, adding 10 minutes cooking time if the mushrooms have been refrigerated. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['2 quarts Pomegranate juice', '2 cups pineapple juice', '2 cups orange juice', '1/2 cup lemon juice', '1/2 cup lime juice', 'Sugar, to taste', '2 liters ginger ale']
directions: ['In punch bowl or large pitcher, mix together all fruit juices. Add sugar to taste. Chill all ingredients at least 1 hour or until serving.', 'Add chilled ginger ale to punch just before serving.', 'Recipe may be halved for smaller get togethers.']

ingredients: ['2 bags New Seasons Market salted honey popcorn', '1 cup New Seasons Market salted roasted peanuts', '3 cups mini pretzels', '1 cup candy corn', '1 cup chocolate peanut butter candy pieces', '1/2 cup honey', '1/2 cup granulated sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2/3 cup New Seasons Market creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup unsalted butter']
directions: ['In a large bowl, mix together the popcorn, peanuts, pretzels, candy corn, and peanut butter candy pieces. Set aside.', 'In a medium saucepan, bring the honey, sugar, salt and butter to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter. Drizzle over popcorn mixture. Stir to coat.', 'Spread the popcorn mixture onto two baking sheets covered in parchment. Allow to cool completely, then break apart to serve.']

ingredients: ['1 3/4 pounds asparagus spears, tough ends snapped, cut into 2-inch lengths', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'Sea salt, to taste', 'Freshly ground pepper, to taste', '6 cups chicken broth', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped onion', '1 1/2 cups Arborio rice', '1/2 cup dry vermouth', '1/2 cup finely grated “E Tartufo” sheep’s milk cheese', '1/4 cup finely grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 ½ teaspoon finely grated lemon zest']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°. Toss the asparagus with 1 tablespoon of the oil, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and roast until just tender. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.', 'Bring the broth to a simmer in a medium saucepan. Reduce heat to low. In a large saucepan, heat the remaining oil and the butter over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until translucent, 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Add the vermouth and stir until liquid is absorbed, 1 minute.', 'Add 1 ladle of hot broth to the rice and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, until the broth is absorbed. Continue adding stock one ladleful at a time until almost all of the stock is used, about 15 minutes. (Keep a ladleful of broth in reserve.)', 'Add the roasted asparagus (reserving 8 asparagus tips for garnish), cheeses, lemon juice, lemon zest, and parsley and stir to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (If you prefer it saucier, add the remaining broth now.)', 'Divide the risotto among 4 bowls and top each bowl with 2 of the asparagus spears and serve.']

recipe_name: Stuffing with Butternut Squash and Leeks
ingredients: ['16 cups cubed bread', '2 medium leeks, thinly sliced and soaked in water, drained', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided use', '1/2 cup dry white wine', '4 cups roasted butternut squash', '2 tablespoons each, salt and black pepper', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme leaves', '1 quart vegetable stock', '2 cups shredded Gruyere cheese, if desired']
directions: ['Place cubed bread on baking trays to dry out for a few hours or overnight. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat until hot. Sauté leeks until softened, stirring ocassionally. Add white wine and cook until wine evaporates; remove from heat.', 'In a large bowl combine bread, leeks, butternut squash, salt, pepper and thyme. Pour ½ of stock over bowl and mix to combine. Continue to add stock until desired consistency is reached.', 'Preheat oven to 350° F. Oil a 9x13-inch baking dish with the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil. Add the stuffing to the prepared baking dish, top with shredded gruyere cheese, if using, and bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until top is starting to brown.']

ingredients: ['1 pint whipping cream', '1/2 cup sugar, divided use', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups cranberried', '1/2 cup chopped toasted walnuts', '1 cup miniature marshmallows']
directions: ['Whip cream until stiff peaks form, mix in ¼ cup sugar and vanilla extract; set aside.', 'In a food processor fitted with blade, place cranberries and pulse until in small chunks. Add 2 tablespoons sugar and pulse 2 more times to combine.', 'Fold cranberries, walnuts and marshmallows into whipped cream. Taste and add more sugar to taste if desired. Chill until serving time.']

ingredients: ['4 pounds garnet sweet potatoes', '1/2 stick unsalted New Seasons Market butter, melted', '1/4 cup brown sugar', '1 teaspoon grated nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 cup New Seasons Market orange juice', '1/2 cup heavy cream', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground pepper (optional)', '3/4 cup crushed pineapple, drained']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.', 'Scrub the potatoes, prick them several times with a fork, and bake them for 1 hour or until very soft when pierced with a knife.', 'Remove from the oven and scoop out the insides as soon as they are cool enough to handle.', 'Place in a large bowl with butter, brown sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. Mash to a reasonably smooth consistency. Add orange juice, cream, salt and pepper and blend.', 'Transfer to a baking sheet, top with crushed pineapple, and bake for 20 - 30 minutes to heat through.']

recipe_name: Classic Bread Pudding with Vanilla Caramel Sauce
ingredients: ['7 cups day-old bread, cut into 1" cubes (we love Challah for this recipe)', '1/2 cup melted, unsalted butter', '3/4 cup granulated sugar', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '1/2 cup black currants', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', '2 cups whole milk', '2 cups half and half', '4 eggs', '1/2 cup unsalted butter', '1 cup light brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 can evaporated milk']
directions: ['Grease a 9”x13” oven safe pan with butter, and place the bread cubes into the pan. Sprinkle the currants over the bread. Drizzle the melted butter over the bread and currants, do not mix/ toss the bread cubes. Set aside. In a large bowl beat the eggs until broken up, and blend in the sugar, nutmeg, half and half, and whole milk. Be careful to not over-beat the egg mixture!! Just whisk together gently until ingredients are combined. Pour egg mixture over the bread cubes and let it soak in, patting the bread down into the mixture as necessary. For best results allow to sit for at least an hour. Preheat oven to 350, and bake uncovered for about 45 minutes. (Check at 35 minutes, if its starting to brown on the top cover loosely with foil.) Remove from oven and pour caramel sauce evenly over the top. Return to oven and bake an additional 10 minutes or until the pudding is puffy all over and golden brown. Allow to cool before serving. (Tastes even better the next day!)', 'For sauce:\nIn a saucepan over medium heat, melt together the butter and brown sugar. Stir constantly until completely melted. Whisk in the evaporated milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and whisk in the vanilla and salt.']

ingredients: ['2 turkey wings, tip and middle sections only', '1 turkey neck', '1 turkey tail', 'salt & pepper', '1 medium onion, roughly chopped', '2 large carrots, roughly chopped', '2 celery ribs, roughly chopped', '10 peppercorns, cracked*', '1 bay leaf', '10 parsley stems (no leaves)', 'water']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425° F. Place turkey wings, neck and tail onto a foil-lined and sprayed baking sheet. Season turkey parts lightly with salt and pepper. Roast until lightly browned, 20-30 minutes (turkey does not need to be cooked through). Remove from oven.', 'Place turkey parts into a 4 to 6-quart slow cooker. Add onion, carrots, celery, peppercorns, bay leaf and parsley stems. Fill slow cooker with water. Place lid on slow cooker and set heat to low; let cook overnight (about 10-12 hours). Strain stock; discard solids. If not using stock right away for recipes or gravy, chill and store, covered, in refrigerator for up to 5 days or freeze for up to 3 months.', 'Makes 2 to 5 quarts of delicious turkey stock (depending on the size of your slow cooker)', '*To crack peppercorns, place peppercorns on cutting board; using a small skillet, place skillet over peppercorns and press with hand on skillet to crack peppercorns.']

recipe_name: Pumpkin Bread Pudding with Caramel Sauce
ingredients: ['2 cups half & half', '1 15 ounce can pumpkin pie filling', '1 1/4 cup brown sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '8 cups cubed day-old bread', '1/2 cup golden raisins, optional', '1 jar your favorite caramel sauce*', 'powdered sugar, optional garnish']
directions: ['In a large bowl whisk together half and half, pumpkin pie filling, brown sugar, eggs, cinnamon and vanilla extract until well combined. Fold in bread cubes and golden raisins. Let stand 20-30 minutes. Transfer mixture to an ovenproof baking dish.', 'Preheat oven to 350° F. Bake bread pudding, uncovered, until test inserted into center comes out clean, about 40-50 minutes.', 'Serve warm drizzled with caramel sauce and dusted with powdered sugar.', '*Our favorite caramel sauce is dulce de leche you can make at home: remove label from 1 can of sweetened condensed milk. Place unopened can in a heavy bottomed sauce pan and cover can completely with water, making sure top of can is at least 2 inches under water. Bring to a simmer and cook for 3 hours, making sure that can does not hard boil and that water level does not drop below top of can. Remove can from water and let cool. When you open the can—viola!—delicious caramel sauce.']

ingredients: ['3/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup balsamic vinegar', '2 inches ginger, peeled and minced', '2 teaspoons Kosher salt', '1 acorn squash, seeded and cut into wedges', '2 medium fennel bulbs, cut in half and sliced into 1/4" wedges', '3 sweet potatoes or yams, peeled and cut into wedges', '2 red onions, sliced', '1/4 cup tamari or soy sauce', '6 tablespoons water', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 teaspoons sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425° F. In a large bowl whisk together extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, ginger and kosher salt; whisk until salt is dissolved. Add squash, fennel, sweet potatoes and red onions; toss to coat and transfer to a large rimmed baking sheet. Roast 45 to 50 minutes, flipping vegetables once about halfway through. Remove from oven and let cool to room temperature.', 'While vegetables are roasting, make dressing. In a small bowl, whisk together tamari (or soy sauce), water, garlic and sugar until sugar is dissolved.', 'To serve, transfer roasted vegetables to serving bowl or platter and top with dressing. Serve at room temperature.']

ingredients: ['1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon Kosher salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 large sweet-tart apple, cored and thinly sliced', '1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion', '1 pound spinach leaves', '1/2 cup chopped toasted pecans']
directions: ['In a large serving bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt and black pepper until thick and emulsified. Add apple and onion and toss to coat. Add spinach and pecans and toss again. Serve.']

ingredients: ['1 butternut squash peeled, seeded and cubed', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', '2 tablespoons bacon fat, tallow or lard, divided', '1 onion, diced', '2 stalks celery, diced', '1.5 pounds bulk sage pork sausage', '1 granny smith apple, diced', '1-2 tablespoons butter, greasing pan', '1 cup dried cranberries', '1 cup toasted pecans, chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh chopped herbs (sage, rosemary, thyme, et al)', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 cup turkey broth or apple cider']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375ºF and butter a 9”x13” baking dish. Set aside.', 'Lay out squash and sweet potatoes on a rimmed baking sheet and toss with 1 tablespoon of fat. Bake in preheated oven, 20-25 minutes or until mostly cooked.', 'Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat, sauté onion in remaining tablespoon of fat until translucent, 8-10 minutes. Add celery and continue to cook, 2-3 minutes. Add sausage and apple and cook, using a spoon to break up any large chunks, 6-8 minutes.', 'Using a large mixing bowl, combine squash, potatoes, sausage mixture, cranberries, pecans, fresh herbs and spices. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and add broth or cider to the top.', 'Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake in preheated oven, 15-20 minutes. Serve warm.']

recipe_name: Brussels Sprouts with Bacon and Raisins
ingredients: ['4 pieces bacon, rough chop', '1 lb Brussels sprouts, washed and', '1 shallot, finely diced', '1/4 cup golden raisins', '1/4-1/2 cups chicken broth', 'Balsamic vinegar']
directions: ['On medium heat, sauté bacon until crisp. Add shredded sprouts, shallots, and raisins. Sauté until sprouts are limp and tender. If too dry, add some broth and continue cooking.', 'Serve with a drizzle of balsamic vinegar.']

recipe_name: Butternut Squash Mash with Chevre and Harissa
ingredients: ['2 1/2 lbs butternut squash, cubed', '4 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 yellow onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, mined', '4 oz fresh goat cheese', '2 teaspoons harissa or more to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a large heavy bottom skillet or saucepan, sauté cubed squash in butter over medium heat until very tender, set aside. Discard excess butter remaining in pan and add olive oil, sauté onions and garlic in olive over medium high heat until lightly browned. Add squash back to pan and rewarm. Keep warm over low heat, and add goat cheese, thoroughly mash squash and cheese together. Season to taste with harissa, salt, and pepper. Serve immediately, or store refrigerated in a baking dish and reheat in a 350º degree oven for 25-35 mins before serving.', 'Inspired by Harissa Stewed Butternut Squash from the Toro Bravo Cookbook']

ingredients: ['Ice cream spinner, frozen overnight', '1 1/2 cups coconut cream', '1 1/2 cups nut/seed milk', '4-5 pitted dates', '1 can pumpkin puree', '8 pasture raised chicken egg yolks', '2/3 cup coconut sugar', '4 teaspoons maple syrup', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, to taste', 'pinch sea salt']
directions: ["Put your ice cream spinner into the freezer the night before. Heat milks, dates, and pumpkin together over medium-low. Using an immersion blender puree dates into the milks. In a separate bowl combine the remaining ingredients, and whisk until a thick ribbon stage. Slowly add warmed milk to egg yolks while whisking to temper the yolk mixture. Once warmed add yolk mixture back into the pot with the rest of the milk, and stir slowly with a wooden spoon till mixture starts to thicken. Strain liquid through a fine mesh strainer to remove any possible solids, and allow to cool. Set up your ice cream maker and add ice cream base to maker and follow manufacturer's directions. Once at soft serve stage pour ice cream out into a freezable storage container and allow to freeze solid."]

ingredients: ['1 cup green lentils, uncooked', '1 cup toasted walnuts, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon avocado oil or coconut oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 1/2 cups sweet onion, diced', '1 cup celery, diced', '1 cup carrot, grated', '1/3 cup apple, peeled/grated', '1/3 cup raisins', '3 tablespoon ground flax AND 1/2 cup water (thoroughly mixed in a bowl)', '1/2 cup oat flour', '3/4 cup breadcrumbs', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme (or 3/4 teaspoon dried thyme)', 'Salt and pepper to taste', 'Red pepper flakes, to taste', '1/4 cup ketchup or tomato paste', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '2 tablespoon apple butter (or unsweetened applesauce)', '2 tablespoon balsamic vinegar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Rinse lentils and place into a pot with 3 cups of water. Bring to a boil and sprinkle in a little salt. Reduce heat to medium/low and simmer uncovered for 40-45 minutes. Stir frequently and add water as needed. Cook lentils until slightly overcooked. Once done, mash with the back of a big spoon.', 'Heat avocado or coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and sauté for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with salt and add celery, carrot, apple, and raisins. Sauté for 5 minutes more and remove from heat. In a large mixing bowl, mix all remaining loaf ingredients together with lentils and veggies and season to taste. Grease a loaf pan with a little oil and line with parchment paper. Press mixture firmly into the pan.', 'Combine all glaze ingredients and mix until creamy. Spread ½ of this mixture onto prepared loaf. Reserve the remainder for dipping sauce. Bake loaf at 350°F for 40-45 minutes uncovered. Edges should be lightly brown. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.']

ingredients: ['4 cups cubed butternut squash', '2 large shallots, peeled and cut into 1/4 inch slices', '3 tablespoons PLUS 2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper', '4 cups of your favorite New Seasons Market bakery bread, cubed', '1/4 cup dried cranberries', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 firm ripe pears, medium dice', '4 ounces gorgonzola cheese, crumbled']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Combine the cubed squash, sliced shallots, and 3 tablespoons olive oil on a baking sheet. Season generously with salt and pepper and toss to coat. Roast in the oven for about 25 minutes or until the squash is tender. While the squash roasts, use a serrated knife to cut the bread into ½-inch cubes. Spread the bread cubes onto a second baking sheet and toast lightly, 5-7 minutes total. Allow the squash to cool slightly and then transfer to a large bowl. Drizzle with the additional oil, vinegar, and maple syrup. Add the bread cubes, cranberries, pears, and half of the crumbled gorgonzola cheese. Toss the mixture together thoroughly to soften the bread and transfer to a large platter or bowl. Sprinkle the remaining gorgonzola cheese on top and serve.']

ingredients: ['6 large eggs', '1/2 cup whole milk', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '8 slices challah, cut 1-inch thick', '1-1/2 tablespoons unsalted butter']
directions: ['Beat the eggs, milk and vanilla extract in a bowl and pour into a wide pan. Add the slices of challah and let them soak for 2-3 minutes, turning once. Heat the butter over medium heat. When the butter has fully melted and started to gently bubble, cook the soaked bread slices for 2-3 minutes per side or until lightly browned and crispy.', 'Use two pans or cook half the slices at a time and keep cooked slices warm in a preheated 140-degree oven (repeat with the remaining slices).']

ingredients: ['Zest from 2 Cara Cara oranges', '1 ½ cups Cara Cara orange juice', '1 ½ cups sugar', '1 ½ tsp vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine zest, juice and sugar. Bring to a boil, stirring to allow sugar to dissolve. Reduce heat and simmer, roughly 8-10 minutes. Remove from heat and cool, 15 minutes before stirring in vanilla. Refrigerate and shake before using.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons finely minced shallots', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 + 1/4 cups chopped Swiss chard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '½ cup of diced ham or lamb, depending on preference', '4 eggs', '1 + 1/4 cups whipping cream', '1 generous pinch nutmeg', 'one 9” pie shell', '1 cup grated swiss cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F and bake pie shell on a baking sheet for 9-10 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Reduce oven temperature to 375°.', 'In a medium skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add shallots and sauté 3-5 minutes . Add chard and stir for several minutes, until most of its water has cooked out.', 'In a medium mixing bowl, beat eggs, cream, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Place sautéed chard, meat, and about 2/3 of the cheese into the bottom of the pie shell. Pour in egg mixture. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese.', 'Bake in preheated oven for 25 - 30 minutes. The quiche is done when a knife plunged into the center comes out clean.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into bite sized pieces', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 lb mushrooms, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'Generous pinch cayenne', '2 tablespoons flour', '3/4 cup vegetable broth', '1 tbsp dry sherry', '3/4 cup soy creamer', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 1/2 slices whole grain bread', '1 tablespoon earth balance buttery sticks', '1/2 tsp each sea salt and black pepper', '1 3 oz can fried onions']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425. Bring 2 quarts of water to boil in a large pot. Add salt and beans, cover and cook for 6 minutes. Drain and shock with cold water (to halt cooking). Set aside. In a large skillet over medium heat, heat olive oil. Add mushrooms, garlic, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Cook until mushrooms are very soft and release their juices, 6-8 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together flour, vegetable broth and sherry and add to mushrooms. Bring to a simmer, stirring until mixture thickens. Add creamer and continue to simmer, 5-6 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and stir in beans.', 'Topping: Pulse together bread, earth balance, salt, and pepper in a food processor until it resembles coarse crumbs.', 'Place green beans in an oiled 9”x13” baking dish and top with bread. Bake in preheated oven for 15 or until warmed through.']

ingredients: ['2 flour burrito-sized tortillas', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '1/2 pound sliced leftover turkey', '1/4 cup leftover cranberry sauce', '8 slices thick Brie cheese (8 ounces)', 'Salt and ground pepper', '1 tbsp olive oil']
directions:
['Preheat oven to 425 and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Spread one side of each tortilla with 1 tbsp mustard.
Arrange turkey over one half of each tortilla (on the side with mustard).
Spoon cranberry sauce over turkey.
Layer with 4 slices of brie on each tortilla and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Fold in half and press to flatten slightly.
Brush both sides with olive oil.', 'Bake, rotating baking sheet halfway through, until cheese is melted and tortillas are golden, about 10-15 minutes. Allow to cool for five minutes before slicing into wedges.']

recipe_name: Mashed Potatoes with Blue Cheese & Celery Root
ingredients: ['5 Large unpeeled Yukon Gold potatoes cut in 1.5" pieces', '1 Celery root, peeled and cut in 1" pieces', '1/4 Stick of butter for frying', '4 Medium shallots, diced', '1/3 lb. Blue cheese, such as Rogue blue or Gorgonzola', '2 tbls Butter', '1/3 cup Milk']
directions: ['In a saucepan, melt butter, add shallots and cook until caramelized, about 8-10 min.', 'Cook vegetables in saucepan of boiling salted water until tender, about 20 minutes.', 'Drain and transfer to heavy-duty mixer fitted with whisk attachment.', 'Beat potatoes and celery root until mashed.', 'Add cheese, shallots and butter; beat until butter melts.', 'Mix in milk & season with salt and pepper.']

ingredients: ['2 cups extra sharp cheddar, shredded', '1/2 cup melted butter (hot)', '1 cup flour', '1/2 tsp salt', '1/2 tsp black pepper', '1 cup sesame seeds']
directions: ['Pour hot butter over cheese. Mix well and add flour salt and pepper. Blend well. Form dough into teaspoon size balls and roll in sesame seeds. Chill for at least 1 hour. Bake on an un-greased baking sheet at 400 degrees for approximately 10-15 minutes. Serve hot! Can be reheated and refreshed.']

ingredients: ['24 Brussels sprouts, washed and sliced crosswise in 1/4" pieces', '1/2 cup Ghee', '2 cloves Garlic, minced', '1 Lemon', 'Salt & Pepper']
directions: ['In a medium skillet, heat ghee on medium high heat. Add Brussels sprouts and cook 10-15 minutes. Stir often, and cook until crispy and caramelized .\nTurn off heat and add garlic. Add salt and pepper and serve immediately with lemon wedges for squeezing over Brussels sprouts.', 'Enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 lb chanterelle mushrooms, chopped', '1/2 lb bacon, cut in 1" pieces', '1 loaf day old bread, cubed', '3 tbls butter', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1/3 cup fresh herb mixture: thyme, oregano, marjoram and sage', '1 cup celery', '2 small shallots, chopped', '3/4 cup chicken broth', 'sale & pepper']
directions: ['Sautee bacon pieces in frying pan on medium heat; add in mushrooms, garlic, her mix, celery and shallots when bacon is starting to get crispy. Cook down and set aside.', 'Melt butter and toss is with the bread chunks. Combine bread mushroom mixture and broth and place in a baking sheet.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes covered and an additional 15 minutes uncovered or until golden brown and fully cooked.']

recipe_name: Tiffany’s Scottish Shortbread with Meyer Lemon Glaze
ingredients: ['1 cup soft (not melted) butter', '1/2 cup sugar (or 3/4 cup bakers sugar)', '2.5 cups flour (sifted with pinch of salt)', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '2 Tablespoons fresh Meyer lemon juice, plus more as needed', '1 teaspoon grated zest from Meyer lemon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.', 'Cream together butter and 1/2 cup sugar. Add 2.5 cups flour/salt mixture. Mix well.', 'Press into 8x8x2 pan and prick all over with fork or chopstick end and bake for 35 minutes, or press into cookie mold and unmold onto cookie sheet and bake for 20 minutes.', "Make the Meyer lemon glaze. In a small bowl, whisk together the confectioners' sugar, lemon juice, and zest until it forms a thick but pourable glaze (add more lemon juice if necessary). Dip the top of each cooled cookie into the glaze and let set, about 30 minutes."]

ingredients: ['1 pound bulk New Seasons Partner Brand Country Sage pork sausage', '1 bag (16 oz) New Seasons Partner Brand Artisan Bread Stuffing broken into small pieces OR 16 oz Gluten free bread stuffing', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 medium onions, diced', '4 large celery stalks, diced', '2 whole Pink Lady or Envy apples, cored and diced', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1/2 cup dried cranberries, plumped in 1 cup warm apple cider', '1/2 cup chopped parsley', '1 quart chicken or turkey stock', '2 eggs, beaten (optional)', '4 tablespoons butter, cut into small bits', 'Kosher salt and fresh ground pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook pork sausage about 10 minutes, breaking into smaller pieces.', 'Place bread stuffing in a large bowl and pour cooked sausage and pan drippings on top. Mix and let rest while flavors to soak in.', 'Add butter to skillet and sauté onions and celery with a dash of salt over medium heat until soft, about 5 minutes, then add apples and continue to sauté for 4 more minutes. Remove from heat and add to bread mixture.', 'Add thyme, sage, parsley and cranberries in cider, to the bread mixture. Add 2 teaspoons of salt and ½ teaspoon of pepper. Mix to combine. Continue mixing while slowly adding in 4 cups of stock until all bread is evenly soft. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.', 'If using eggs, add to stuffing and mix well to combine. The eggs are not necessary, but act as a binding agent to hold stuffing together and create a moister texture.', 'Place stuffing in buttered 9’ x 13” baking dish, and gently pat down. Dot with butter bits. At this point you can cover and refrigerate stuffing for up to 3 days.', 'Place in preheated 350° oven and bake for 35 to 45 minutes or until heated through and golden on top.']

ingredients: ['5 pounds medium sweet potatoes, halved lengthwise', '1/3 cup rosemary leaved, chopped and divided in half', '1/3 cup sage leaves (about 30) roughly chopped and divided in half', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 1/2 cup Panko or coarse breadcrumbs', '1/2 cup chopped pecans', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 1/2 cups chopped shallots (4 small or 2 large)', '1 cup heavy cream', '1/4 teaspoon grated nutmeg', '1 cup (3oz) finely grated Parmesan cheese', '2 large eggs blended', 'Kosher salt and fresh ground pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Prick potato skins with a fork and place cut side down on two foil-lined rimmed baking sheets. Roast potatoes, rotating sheets halfway through, until very tender when squeezed, 70-90 minutes. Let cool on sheets. If serving the casserole immediately, increase oven to 400°.', 'While potatoes roast, in a small saucepan over medium heat, cook half of rosemary and half of sage in 6 tablespoons of butter, stirring occasionally, until butter foams, then browns and herbs are golden and crisp, about 4 minutes; let cool. Add Panko (or breadcrumbs), pecans, 1 teaspoon of Kosher salt and a few cracks of pepper, stir and transfer to a small bowl.', 'Scoop out flesh from potatoes and transfer to a large bowl (discard skins). Add the remaining half of the fresh rosemary and fresh sage to the potatoes.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons of butter in the same saucepan over medium. Add shallots and ½ teaspoon Kosher salt, cook, stirring often until translucent and golden around the edges, about 5 minutes. Add cream and nutmeg and bring to a simmer. Remove from heat and let cool 10 minutes, then carefully blend with an immersion blender (or place in a blender and puree). Transfer mixture to the potatoes and add parmesan cheese. Blend with immersion blender, taste and adjust seasoning and then blend in eggs until light and smooth.', 'Transfer potato mixture to a shallow 2-quart baking dish, smoothing top. Using a spatula, create some peaks and valleys. Top with breadcrumb mixture. Bake casserole until top is golden and crisp, 25-30 minutes. Let cool 10 minutes before serving.']
