ingredients: ['2-3 apples (Gala, Fuji or Granny Smith)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons coconut sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 200°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment and place a raised wire rack on top of parchment. Wash and thinly slice the apples using a sharp knife or mandolin, remove seeds. Mix cinnamon and coconut sugar together in a small bowl and set aside. Place the apple slices onto the wire racks in a single layer, making sure they do not overlap. Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar mixture.', 'Bake for 1 hour, then flip the apples over. Feel free to sprinkle with more cinnamon and sugar. Bake for another 1 to 1.5 hours. Turn the oven off and keep the apples inside as the oven cools down for 1 hour. Store apple chips at room temperature in an airtight container for up to one week.']

ingredients: ['1 butternut squash peeled, seeded and cubed', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', '2 tablespoons bacon fat, tallow or lard, divided', '1 onion, diced', '2 stalks celery, diced', '1.5 pounds bulk sage pork sausage', '1 granny smith apple, diced', '1-2 tablespoons butter, greasing pan', '1 cup dried cranberries', '1 cup toasted pecans, chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh chopped herbs (sage, rosemary, thyme, et al)', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 cup turkey broth or apple cider']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375ºF and butter a 9”x13” baking dish. Set aside.', 'Lay out squash and sweet potatoes on a rimmed baking sheet and toss with 1 tablespoon of fat. Bake in preheated oven, 20-25 minutes or until mostly cooked.', 'Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat, sauté onion in remaining tablespoon of fat until translucent, 8-10 minutes. Add celery and continue to cook, 2-3 minutes. Add sausage and apple and cook, using a spoon to break up any large chunks, 6-8 minutes.', 'Using a large mixing bowl, combine squash, potatoes, sausage mixture, cranberries, pecans, fresh herbs and spices. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and add broth or cider to the top.', 'Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake in preheated oven, 15-20 minutes. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['1 pint fresh salsa', '2 limes, zest and juice', '1-2 teaspoons hot sauce of your choice', '4 tablespoons prepared horseradish', '2 tablespoons ketchup']
directions: ['Simply mix all ingredients together in a bowl. Taste and adjust seasonings as necessary. Great served with shrimp!']

ingredients: ['1 ½ pint of cherry tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive or grapeseed oil', '1 teaspoon each salt and black pepper', '2-3 tablespoons freshly grated horseradish root (available in produce year-round)', '1 lemon, juice and zest', '1 Tablespoon hot sauce of your choice']
directions: ['Preheat broiler to high and line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment or foil.', 'In a large mixing bowl, toss cherry tomatoes with oil, salt and pepper. Lay out on prepared baking sheet and broil in preheated oven for 10-12 minutes.', 'Using a food processor, add all remaining ingredients to the broiled tomatoes. Pulse several times until mixture has reached desired consistency.', 'Season to taste with additional salt, pepper, hot sauce or lemon juice. Serve chilled or at room temperature.']

ingredients: ['2 lbs raw medium shrimp', '4 oz. shrimp and crab boil or 2 Tbsp Old Bay Seasoning', '1 Tbsp. kosher salt']
directions: ['Peel and devein the shrimp.', 'Bring 8 cups of water, seasoning and salt to boil in a large pot.', 'Add the shrimp to the pot and simmer until the shrimp float to the top and are just cooked through, about 3 minutes.', 'Drain the shrimp in a colander and top with ice to cool. Serve with your favorite cocktail sauce or remoulade for a spicy kick.']

ingredients: ['2 pints ripe blackberries', '1 bunch basil', '4 cups sparkling water', '1/4 cup local honey']
directions: ['Gently rinse blackberries. Spread one pint loosely on sheet tray and place in freezer until frozen. Take other pint and pour in sauce pan with honey. Chiffonade 20 leaves of basil and add to the berry mixture. Add 1 cup of sparkling water to berry mixture. Cook on low heat, until berries soften and honey is incorporated, stirring frequently. Let cool then strain through a fine mesh sieve. Add cooled berry mixture to remaining 3 cups of sparkling water. Place individually frozen berries in popsicle molds. Place one whole basil leaf on top and fill with berry mixture. Place in freezer until set.']

ingredients: ['6 eggs, hardboiled, peeled and cooled', '3 ounces wild salmon, cooked', '1/2 large ripe avocado', '1-3 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1-2 tablespoons fresh dill, minced', '2 tablespoons scallions, finely sliced', 'paprika for sprinkling (optional)', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Slice peeled eggs in half lengthwise. Gently scoop the yolks into a medium mixing bowl and place the whites on a serving tray. Mash yolks into small crumbly pieces with a fork. In a food processor, blend salmon, avocado, lemon juice and dill until well mixed. Add salmon mixture, salt and pepper to the mixing bowl of yolks. Combine well. Fill eggs with yolk/salmon mixture. Garnish with scallions and paprika if desired.', 'Tip: to keep eggs from sliding all over your serving tray, before filling, slice just enough egg white off of the bottom of each half to make egg white flat. Alternatively, you can line serving tray with a bed of kale to keep eggs in place']

ingredients: ['1-2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '8 ounces water']
directions: ['Stir together and consume 15-20 minutes before meals.']

ingredients: ['2 apples, cut into chunks', '2 tablespoons ghee or coconut oil (use coconut oil to make this vegan)', '2 teaspoons cinnamon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375°F. Combine all ingredients in heat-proof container, such as a Pyrex dish, and bake for 20 minutes.']

ingredients: ['4 large beets', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 fennel bulb cored and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Scrub beets to remove any dirt or soil. Cut each beet in half and then each half into 4 wedges. Place in a saucepan fit with a steamer basket and enough water to almost reach the base of the steamer basket. Cover with a lid, bring to a boil then reduce to a simmer to steam the beets. Cook for 10-15 minutes or until tender. Remove from the pan and chill in an ice bath or under some running cold water. Drain and place into a bowl with the minced garlic, thinly sliced fennel bulb, olive oil and vinegar, and salt and pepper. Mix to combine. Chill for several hours before serving.']

recipe_name: Cedar Plank Salmon with Dijon Sauce
ingredients: ['2 lbs wild salmon filet, whole (skin on)', '1 cedar plank, soaked in water for 20 minutes, patted dry', '1/2 cup Dijon mustard', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon whole mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons red pepper flakes or lime juice']
directions: ['Preheat grill to high heat for 15 minutes and then adjust to medium low. If you’re using charcoal, simply move the coals to one side.', 'Whisk together the Dijon sauce ingredients.', 'Place salmon skin-side down on the plank and spread the sauce on top.', 'Place plank on grill (on the cool side if using coals).', 'Cover the grill and cook 15 minutes or until the salmon’s internal temperature reads 140° F.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '1 cup spinach', '4 asparagus stalks, trimmed and chopped', '1 small zucchini, diced', '4 eggs from pastured hens', '4 ounces wild smoked salmon', '1 small avocado, cut into cubes']
directions: ['Melt the ghee or coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus, spinach and zucchini, and sauté until tender.', 'In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and then add to the vegetable mixture. Gently stir the eggs until they are scrambled and cooked through. Add the smoked salmon and avocado and serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons sauerkraut brine or pickle brine', '2 tablespoons coconut milk', '2-3 tablespoons minced shallot', '1-2 tablespoons fresh herbs of choice such as parsley, chives and dill', '1 teaspoon maple syrup or raw honey (optional)', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['In a blender, combine all ingredients and blend until smooth. If dressing is too thick, add water 1 teaspoon at a time and blend until desired consistency is reached.']

ingredients: ['1 medium sweet potato, baked and skin removed', '2 eggs from pastured hens', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice', 'Ghee or coconut oil for cooking', 'Pasture butter or coconut butter as topping']
directions: ['Beat eggs in a bowl. Stir in sweet potato flesh, salt, spices and vanilla, and mix thoroughly. (May combine ingredients in a blender if desired.) Heat a skillet over low-medium heat, and grease with ghee or coconut oil. Once skillet is warm, pour or scoop a few tablespoons of batter onto pan. Allow to cook 3-5 minutes or until golden brown and set. Flip and cook another few minutes until cooked through and lightly browned. Top with pasture butter or softened coconut butter.', 'For a savory twist, omit the cinnamon/pumpkin spice and use pepper and curry seasoning instead of, or in addition to, salt. Stir in chopped spinach and sautéed onions for more flavor and texture.']

ingredients: ['1 package Tempt hemp tofu', '1/4 cup raw apple cider vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon olive or avocado oil', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/8 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne']
directions: ['Smash hemp tofu cake with a fork or run through food processor until crumbly. In separate bowl, combine remaining ingredients, stir in hemp tofu crumbles and mix until well combined. You can use right away or let flavors meld in the refrigerator for an hour, or overnight.', 'To eat, heat over low/medium heat until warmed through and until mixture appears less wet. Tastes great scrambled with veggies or eggs. Try a vegan take on huevos rancheros and serve on a sprouted corn tortilla with black beans, sautéed onions and peppers, and Wildbrine fermented salsa verde. Garnish with cilantro.']

ingredients: ['1 raw nori sheet*', '2 tablespoons almond, cashew or other nut butter', '1 teaspoon raw honey', '1 pinch sea salt']
directions: ['Place nori sheet on a flat surface. Spread nut butter over the nori, drizzle with honey, and sprinkle salt on top. Roll or fold nori sheet so that fillings are contained inside.', 'For more sweetness, try adding chunks of banana inside your nori snack.']

ingredients: ['1 cup water', '1 tablespoon dried nettle leaves OR 1/2 cup fresh nettle leaves', '1 teaspoon honey or maple syrup (optional)', '1 slice lemon (optional)', 'Fresh mint (optional)']
directions: ['Bring one cup of water to a boil, and pour over nettles and steep. Nettles can steep anywhere from 15 minutes to several hours, depending on strength of tea desired. Strain tea and add your favorite accent such as honey, maple syrup, a slice of lemon, or fresh mint.']

ingredients: ['2 carrots, sliced', '2 onions, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '3-4 lb whole chicken', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 cup water or chicken broth or cooking wine', '1/2 teaspoon teaspoon dried basil']
directions: ['Put carrots, onion and celery in bottom of slow cooker. Place whole chicken on top of vegetables. Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper and add liquid over top. Sprinkle basil over top. Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours (or on high 4 to 5 hours, using an additional cup of water), or until fully cooked.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup ground ginger', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon anise seed', '2 teaspoons ground cloves']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons minced shallot', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon raw honey', '2 small grapefruits', '1/2 lb mustard greens, trimmed and cut into 1/2” pieces (about 4 cups)', '1/2 cup dried dates, pitted and chopped', 'pomegranate seeds']
directions: ['In a large salad bowl, whisk together the shallot and lime juice and let stand 5 minutes. Whisk in oil, salt, and honey. Prepare grapefruit by peeling and cutting away any pith. Using a sharp knife, cut away the sections from the membranes. Toss together grapefruit sections and mustard greens with the prepared vinaigrette. Add any optional toppings.']

ingredients: ['1/2 lb Wild Salmon Filet', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'sea salt & pepper to taste', '1/2 lemon', '1 sweet onion, sliced into rings']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F. Place salmon on a large sheet of tin foil. Rub salmon with 2 teaspoons of olive oil, a pinch of sea salt, and a pinch of black pepper. Squeeze half a lemon on top and place 4-5 sliced rings of onion on top of filet. Wrap entire piece of salmon in foil- make sure no filet is showing. Place the foil packet directly on oven rack and bake for 30-40 minutes or until cooked.']

ingredients: ['2 medium zucchini']
directions: ['After trimming ends of zucchini, shave zucchini lengthwise using a vegetable peeler, making long wide noodles. Once you have made all the noodles, cook them in a skillet with a tablespoon of water over medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes or until noodles soften. Serve with your favorite pasta sauce.']

ingredients: ['12 pasture raised eggs', '1 1/2 cups cubed sweet potatoes, ¼ to ½ inch cube', '1/2 cup diced onion', '1 1/2 cups chopped greens (spinach, kale, chard)', '1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese (optional)', 'sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375°F. In a skillet, sauté sweet potatoes and onion in ghee or coconut oil until sweet potatoes are tender. Remove from heat and stir in greens. In a large mixing bowl, whisk eggs, salt and pepper. Add sautéed veggies to eggs. Pour into lined or greased muffin pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes. Leftover muffins can be refrigerated and reheated.']

ingredients: ['4 cups brewed ginger tea', '2 tablespoons cacao powder', '4 dates, soaked for a few hours, pitted and chopped', '1/2 cup wide unsweetened coconut shreds, toasted', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch cayenne', '4 cinnamon sticks (for garnish)']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients (except the cinnamon sticks) in a blender. Strain through cheesecloth or a nut milk bag. Heat strained mixture gently in sauce pan until warm. Serve with a cinnamon stick for garnish.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 inch piece ginger, finely chopped', '1 small sweet potato, diced', '1 large carrot, chopped', '1 cup broccoli florets', '1 large red bell pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '3 tablespoons red curry paste (adjust to taste)*', '1 splash tamari or coconut aminos', '1 tablespoon fish sauce or mock fish sauce (optional)', '1 14 oz can full-fat coconut milk']
directions: ['Heat coconut oil in a large pan or wok. Sauté the onions until soft. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 1-2 minutes more. Add sweet potato and carrot and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add broccoli and red bell pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes more until broccoli and red bell pepper are tender-crisp. Add turmeric, curry paste, fish sauce, and tamari or coconut aminos, and stir to mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes and then immediately add coconut milk. Cover and simmer over low heat until potatoes and carrots are tender. Serve over cauliflower rice or spiralized zucchini.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari or coconut aminos', '2 teaspoons peanut or sesame oil', '1/2 cup almond, cashew or peanut butter', '2 teaspoons vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '1-2 cloves garlic', '1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)', '2/3 cup water']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor with water and mix until smooth. Add more water if a thinner consistency is desired. Serve over steamed veggies.']

ingredients: ['7-10 large dates, pitted', '3/4 cup walnuts, soaked in water for 2-8 hours and rinsed', '3/4 cup almond meal', '1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '1 tablespoon water', 'Raw or toasted coconut', 'Fresh berries']
directions: ['Toss dates, walnuts, and almond meal in a food processor, blend, and add in cocoa powder and maple syrup. Continue to process and add water. More water may be added to reach desired consistency. Press mixture into a glass baking dish and refrigerate or freeze. Keeps in the freezer for up to a month.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons garlic powder', '3 tablespoons dried lemon peel', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 cups hemp seeds', '8 cups water', '1/3 cup unrefined coconut oil', '3 1/2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['Add the hemp seeds, water, and coconut oil to a blender. Blend until very smooth, about 3 minutes. It may be best to do this in two batches. Pour the hemp milk mixture into a large pot and cook on the stove over medium heat. Heat mixture until it bubbles around the edges but has not reached a full boil. Turn off the heat and add apple cider vinegar and salt. Stir gently for 2 minutes while curds form. Remove from burner, cover and let rest at room temperature for 90 minutes. After it has rested, line a large strainer with cheesecloth and place over a large bowl. Reserve the hemp seed whey for another use. Let the curds sit in cheesecloth and strainer for an hour or so to finish draining. The finished hemp ricotta will have a smooth consistency. Store hemp ricotta in the fridge.']

ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower, roughly chopped', '2 garlic cloves', '2/3 cup hemp ricotta (see hemp ricotta recipe)', '2 tablespoons butter alternative', '1 tablespoon unrefined coconut oil', '6 tablespoons hemp whey (see hemp ricotta recipe)', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Bring a pot of lightly-salted water to a boil, add cauliflower and cook until tender. Add cooked cauliflower, garlic, hemp ricotta, pasture butter, and coconut oil to a blender. Slowly add hemp whey and blend until the mixture is smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 medium onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 celery stalks, finely chopped', '1 cup mushrooms, chopped', '1 tablespoon pasture butter or ghee', '2 pounds grass-fed beef, buffalo, or lamb', '1/2 pound pasture-raised or organic liver, finely chopped', '1 egg from a pastured hen', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/2 cup unsweetened ketchup']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Sauté onion, garlic, celery and mushrooms in butter or ghee until tender. In a large bowl, combine the ground meat, liver, egg, herbs, salt, pepper, and sautéed vegetables. Mix well. Place meat mixture in loaf pan and bake for 15 minutes. After baking for 15 minutes, gently spread the ketchup on top of the loaf. Continue to bake for another 40-45 minutes, or until fully cooked.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ghee or coconut oil', '3 sweet potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '3 jewel yams, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '2 pounds grass-fed ground meat of your choice', '1 large onion, diced', '8 shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '3 celery ribs, diced', '3 tablespoons ghee, coconut oil, or rendered animal fat', '1 tablespoon dried sage', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 cup white wine', '3 tart apples, cored and cut into 1/2-inch chunks', '1/2 cup chicken stock', '3/4 cup toasted hazelnuts or walnuts']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. In the oven, melt butter in roasting pan. Toss diced sweet potatoes and yams in roasting pan after butter has melted, stir to coat. Bake yams and sweet potatoes for 45 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside.\nIn a skillet, crumble meat and cook until lightly browned. Remove from heat. Set aside. Sauté onions, mushrooms, and celery in reserved fat in a saucepan until onions begin to caramelize. Add seasonings and cook over medium heat for 2 additional minutes. Add white wine and continue cooking over medium heat until liquid is reduced by half.\nIn a large bowl, combine sautéed vegetable mixture, browned meat, apple chunks, roasted sweet potato and yam cubes, chicken stock, and nuts. Transfer all ingredients to a baking dish and bake at 350°F for 20 minutes. Bake until all ingredients are tender. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups almond flour', '3/4 cup finely chopped pecans', '1/2 cup coconut butter, melted', '3 tablespoons raw honey', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'Pinch of sea salt', '2 pounds carrots, peeled and halved', '1 cup canned coconut milk', '2 eggs from pastured hens', '1/2 cup coconut sugar', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 cup coconut flour']
directions: ['For crust:\nPreheat oven to 350°F. In a large bowl, combine almond flour, pecans and salt. In a separate bowl combine coconut butter, honey and vanilla extract. Slowly add dry ingredients to wet until completely combined. Using your fingers, press into a 9-1/2” pie pan. Bake in preheated oven for 12-14 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Remove and set aside to cool completely before filling.', 'For filling:\nPreheat oven to 425°F. Using a rimmed baking sheet, lay out carrot halves and roast 20-25 minutes. Allow to cool slightly. Reduce oven temperature to 350°F. Using a food processor or blender, puree roasted carrots until very smooth. Pour in coconut milk while continuing to blend. Add all remaining ingredients and blend until smooth. Pour filling into crust. Bake in preheated oven for 35 minutes, or until filling is set. Cool 15-20 minutes. Serve chilled or at room temperature. Top with cashew cream if desired.']

ingredients: ['2 peaches, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 mango, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '½ red onion, finely chopped', '3 jalapenos, seeded and chopped', '1 cup cilantro, finely chopped', 'Juice of 1 lime and 1 lemon', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Toss all but the lemon and lime juice in a mixing bowl and stir together. Add the juice of the lemon and lime second, along with salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 cup roasted and salted cashews', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus extra', '3 lbs ripe heirloom tomatoes, seeded', '1 lb strawberries, hulled', '1/2 cucumber, peeled and seeded', '1 red bell pepper, cored and seeded', '1/2 medium sweet onion, peeled', '1/2 cup mild olive oil, such as Arbequina', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar, plus extra', 'Finely diced cucumber, strawberry, and mint for garnish']
directions: ['Working in two batches in a blender, combine half the cashews, garlic, vegetables and strawberries. Puree until very smooth.', 'Add half the olive oil to the blender and puree until fully incorporated. Transfer the soup to a large bowl.', 'Repeat the blending process with the remaining ingredients and transfer to the same bowl.', 'Stir the vinegar and salt into the soup. Taste and adjust seasoning to your liking.', 'Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours before serving. Serve topped with cucumber, strawberry and mint.']

ingredients: ['1 medium head cauliflower', '1/2 pound ground meat (beef, lamb, turkey, etc.)', '1/4 pound chicken livers, chopped (optional)', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 medium carrot, chopped', '3-5 leaves kale, de-stemmed and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 inch ginger, minced or grated', '2 tablespoons coconut aminos', '2 tablespoons rice or coconut vinegar', 'fat of choice for cooking (lard, tallow, coconut oil, or ghee)', 'cilantro, chopped, for garnish']
directions: ['Core and separate cauliflower florets, pulse in food processor gently until the size of rice grains - do not over process. In a wide pan, heat cooking fat to medium, add onion and carrot and sauté until onion is translucent. Add ground meat and optional liver, breaking up a with wooden spoon into small crumbles. Add garlic, ginger, and kale. Mix well. Add cauliflower, mix well, and cover for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and toss well with vinegar or coconut aminos, and cilantro.']

ingredients: ['2 ripe bananas, sliced and frozen']
directions: ['Add frozen banana slices to food processor and begin pureeing them. Use a spatula to scrape down the sides and encourage uniform blending. The process may take a few minutes. Enjoy immediately in soft serve consistency or freeze for an hour for a firmer texture. Top with cacao nibs or a drizzle of almond butter.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds tomatillos, husks removed, washed and coarsely chopped', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 white onion, diced small', '2 jalapeños, seeded and diced small', '3 garlic cloves, minced', 'salt and ground pepper', '12 corn tortillas', '3 cups shredded roasted chicken', '3 tablespoons sour cream', '2 ounces cotija cheese, crumbled (1/2 cup)', '1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F. In a blender, puree tomatillos until smooth. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high. Add onion and jalapenos and cook until softened, 8 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, 30 seconds. Add tomatillo puree and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce is thickened slightly, 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Grease a 9” by13” baking dish and then spoon about ½ cup of tomatillo enchilada sauce across the bottom. Arrange half of the tortillas in baking dish, cutting to fit and overlapping as necessary. Top with half the chicken and half tomatillo sauce. Repeat layering with 6 tortillas, the rest of the chicken, and remaining tomatillo sauce. Cover and bake until bubbling, 25 minutes. Let cool 5 minutes before serving. In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream and 2 tablespoons water. To serve, drizzle casserole with sour cream mixture and sprinkle with cotija cheese and cilantro.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons New Seasons Market Butter', '1 cup minced sweet onion', '2 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 cup Arborio rice (short-grain)', '4 cups dry white wine', '1/4 cup chicken broth', '14 ounces can artichokes, drained', '3 cups chopped New Seasons Market roasted chicken', '2 medium zucchini, chopped', '1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '(to taste) salt & pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425° F.', 'Melt butter in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic, and sauté 5 for about minutes. Add rice, and cook 2 minutes, until golden. Add wine, and cook a few minutes until wine is absorbed. Add chicken broth.', 'Bring to a boil, cover, and transfer to oven. Bake 20 minutes.', 'Chop artichokes, if not pre-chopped. Remove rice from oven, and stir in artichokes, chicken, and zucchini. Cover and bake 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in cheese, parsley, and lemon zest. Season with salt & pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 pound New Seasons Market penne pasta', '1 tablespoon New Seasons Market extra-virgin olive oil', '3-4 links New Seasons Market chicken spinach feta sausage', '2 roasted red peppers, chopped', '15 ounce can artichokes, drained and chopped', '1/2 cup chipped Kalamata olives', '1/2 medium red onion, finely chopped', '1/2 cup chopped flat leaf parsley', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '12 ounces Greek feta salad dressing', 'salt & pepper']
directions: ['Cook pasta according to package directions, drain.', 'Toss with olive oil and spread out on baking sheet to cool slightly.', 'Simmer sausages covered in a large skillet with ½ inch water over medium-high heat until done.', 'Set aside to cool and then slice. Combine cooled pasta, cooled cooked sausage, red peppers, artichokes, olives, onion, parsley, tomatoes and salad dressing in large bowl. Toss to mix evenly. Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Serve hot, cold or at room temperature.']

ingredients: ['2 cups chilled roasted chicken, chopped', '1/2 cup diced cucumbers, seeded', '1/2 cup chopped cherry tomatoes, drained', '1/3 cup feta cheese, crumbled', '1/4 cup chopped red onion', '1/4 cup Kalamata olives, diced', '1 package cucumber labneh', 'Pita or flat bread']
directions: ['In a mixing bowl add chopped chicken, cucumbers, tomatoes, feta cheese, red onion, and Kalamata olives.', 'Add New Seasons Market cucumber labneh and stir to combine.', 'Chill for one hour prior to serving on the Pita or other flat bread.']

ingredients: ['3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, divided', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', 'salt & pepper, freshly ground', '4 medium carrots, thinly sliced', '1 cup couscous', '2 cups coarsely shredded New Seasons Market roasted chicken', '3 tablespoons New Seasons Market unsalted butter', '1/2 cup sliced almonds', '1/4 cup golden raisins', '4 scallions, white and light green parts, roughly chopped', '1/2 cup roughly chopped fresh cilantro, plus more for topping', 'Greek yogurt and harissa for topping']
directions: ['Bring 2 ½ cups water to a boil in saucepan over medium-high heat.', 'Add ½ teaspoon cinnamon, the ginger, 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper. Add the carrots and cook until crisp-tender, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Drain the carrots, reserving the cooking liquid. Put the couscous and chicken in a medium bowl, pouring 1 cup of the hot cooking liquid on top. Stir, then cover tightly and let sit 5 minutes. Meanwhile, melt butter in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add the almonds, raisins, scallions and the remaining ¼ teaspoon cinnamon. Cook, stirring, until the nuts are toasted, about 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Stir in the cilantro. Fluff couscous with a fork. Divide the couscous and chicken among bowls. Top with the carrots and more of the cooking liquid, if desired. Sprinkle with the almond mixture and more cilantro. Top with yogurt and harissa.']

ingredients: ['1 cup San J brand soy sauce', '1 cup Colombia Gorge orange juice', '1 TBL minced garlic', '1 TBL minced ginger', '1 cup dark brown sugar', '5lbs New Seasons free range all natural fresh chicken wings', '¼ lb unsalted butter', '1 ½ TBL minced garlic', '1 ½ TBL minced ginger', '1 ½ cup dark brown sugar', '½ cup Nakano brand rice vinegar', '½ cup San J brand soy sauce', '1 TBL Sun Luk brand sesame oil', '¾ cup Hung Foy brand Sriracha']
directions: ['Prepare marinade and then coat raw wings in covered container. Let sit in refrigerator overnight.', 'Melt butter in a sauce pan over low heat.', 'When melted, add sesame oil. Add minced ginger and minced garlic, and cook until garlic begins to brown.', 'Using a wire whisk, blend in brown sugar until it melts, creating a caramel-like sauce. Add remaining ingredients while continually stirring. Note: an immersion blender is perfect to get the sauce to come together.', 'Set sauce aside. After an overnight marinade, preheat oven to 350 and cook wings. Arrange wings evenly spread out on baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Cook for 35 minutes until tender and internal temperature is 165 degrees.', 'To serve, toss hot wings in mixing bowl with sauce. Add Bobs Red Mill brown sesame seeds as you mix wings and sauce.']

ingredients: ['1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 lb bonesless skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 large onion chopped', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 (14 oz) can diced tomatoes', '1/3 cup apricot jam', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '4 apricots, pitted and diced', 'hot cooked rice', 'chopped cilantro and green onions, chopped', 'plain yogurt']
directions: ['In a large skillet heat olive oil over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add previously prepared chicken, onions and curry to skillet and cook until chicken is no longer pink; stirring constantly. Add tomatoes, apricot jam, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil and reduce heat to simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Add vinegar and stir to blend. Stir in diced apricots and cook just until apricots are heated through. Serve over hot cooked rice. May garnish with cilantro, green onions and plain yogurt.']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground turkey, cooked', '1 15oz can of low sodium white beans, including liquid', '2 cups chicken broth', '1/4 cup tomatillo salsa', 'White pepper and sea salt to taste', '1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro', '1/2 cup sour cream']
directions: ['Throw everything in a pot and let simmer for 30-45 minutes before serving. Great with tortilla chips or cornbread.']

ingredients: ['2 carrots, sliced', '2 onions, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '3-4 lb whole chicken', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 cup water or chicken broth or cooking wine', '1/2 teaspoon teaspoon dried basil']
directions: ['Put carrots, onion and celery in bottom of slow cooker. Place whole chicken on top of vegetables. Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper and add liquid over top. Sprinkle basil over top. Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours (or on high 4 to 5 hours, using an additional cup of water), or until fully cooked.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ground turmeric', '2 tablespoons ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground cardamom', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['1 medium head cauliflower', '1/2 pound ground meat (beef, lamb, turkey, etc.)', '1/4 pound chicken livers, chopped (optional)', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 medium carrot, chopped', '3-5 leaves kale, de-stemmed and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 inch ginger, minced or grated', '2 tablespoons coconut aminos', '2 tablespoons rice or coconut vinegar', 'fat of choice for cooking (lard, tallow, coconut oil, or ghee)', 'cilantro, chopped, for garnish']
directions: ['Core and separate cauliflower florets, pulse in food processor gently until the size of rice grains - do not over process. In a wide pan, heat cooking fat to medium, add onion and carrot and sauté until onion is translucent. Add ground meat and optional liver, breaking up a with wooden spoon into small crumbles. Add garlic, ginger, and kale. Mix well. Add cauliflower, mix well, and cover for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and toss well with vinegar or coconut aminos, and cilantro.']

recipe_name: Han Ly Hwang’s Spicy Marshals Coconut Curry Wing Sauce
ingredients: ["4 oz bottle of Marshall's Haute Sauce Habanero Carrot Curry", '1/2 cup Thai Kitchen coconut milk', '1/2 cup coconut butter', '1 tsp mild curry powder', '1/4 cup rice vinegar', '1/3 cup white sugar', '4 TB honey', 'Salt to taste', 'Pinch of Tikka Masala', 'Cilantro to garnish']
directions: ['Start with albs of New Seasons free-range chicken wings (about 25 whole wings). Cook wings as per instructions. Combine all sauce ingredients into sauce pot and bring to boil. Reduce sauce and let cool. Toss fried wings with sauce in a mixing bowl. Sprinkle with Tikka Masala and garnish with cilantro. Goes great with an iced mint tea.']

ingredients: ['16 oz brown rice penne or spirals', '1 ½ pound of ground turkey', '2 cups broccoli florets and stems', '3 garlic cloves', '½ cup macadamia nuts', '1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '2 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F. Lay broccoli on sheet pan in a single layer and roast in preheated oven 10-15 minutes, until cooked through and beginning to brown. Transfer to food processor and add all remaining ingredients except olive oil. Pulse for 5 seconds 2-3 times. Add olive oil and process for 20-20 seconds or until smooth. Taste and adjust salt and lemon juice.', 'Cook pasta according to manufacturer’s direction, drain and set aside. In a large skillet over medium heat, warm 1 tablespoon cooking oil of your choice. Add ground turkey, using a spoon to break up pieces, and cook, 8-10 minutes or until fully cooked. Remove from heat and stir in pasta and pesto. Serve warm with additional parmesan for topping, if desired.']

ingredients: ['Kaiser Roll', 'Sliced fresh mozzarella', '2-3 fresh basil leaves', 'Slice of tomato', 'Prepared pesto']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F and crisp Kaiser roll. Cut roll in half and spread prepared pesto to taste on both sides. Layer with fresh ingredients and serve warm.']

recipe_name: BABY BACK RIBS WITH BOURBON BBQ SAUCE
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 racks (about 5 pounds) baby back or country-style pork ribs', '½ cup Podnah’s Barbecue Sauce', '¼ cup bourbon (preferably Woodford Reserve Double Oaked)', '2 to 3 tablespoons packed dark brown sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine smoked paprika, garlic powder, cumin, cayenne, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Place each rack of ribs on a sheet of foil large enough to wrap around it. Sprinkle both sides of each rack generously with the spice mixture and rub it in (you may not use it all). Wrap racks in the foil and place each on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake ribs until fully cooked and tender, roughly 2 hours for baby backs and 3 hours for spareribs.', 'Unwrap the ribs and pour the meat juices into a measuring cup (reserve for making the sauce). When ribs have cooled, rewrap in the foil and refrigerate (ribs can be cooked several days ahead).', 'In a small saucepan, combine the barbecue sauce, bourbon, brown sugar, and ½ cup of the meat juices. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat and cook until reduced by one-third, about 5 minutes. (Sauce can be made several days ahead and refrigerated.)', 'Preheat a charcoal or gas grill to medium-hot (you should be able to hold your hand 5 inches above the grate for 5 to 7 seconds before it gets too hot). Lightly oil the cooking grate, set the ribs on it and brush with barbecue sauce. Grill, brushing with the sauce and turning every few minutes, until ribs are hot and coated with a few layers of sauce, about 10 minutes.', 'To serve, cut between each rib and divide among plates. Serve the leftover sauce at the table.']

ingredients: ['1 tsp kosher salt', '1 tsp garlic powder', '1 1/2 tsp smoked paprika', '1/2 tsp freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp dried minced onion', '1/2 tsp cayenne pepper', '1/2 tsp dried oregano', '1/4 tsp crushed red pepper flakes', '1 tsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '4 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs', '2 links Olympia Provisions smoked chorizo sausage (or your favorite chorizo), sliced on a 1/4" bias', '1 medium yellow onion, diced', '1 jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely diced', '2 celery stalks, diced', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes', '1 tsp cayenne pepper', '1 cup long-grain rice, uncooked', '2 1/4 cup chicken stock', 'green onion, thinly sliced on a bias for garnish', 'fresh parsley, chopped for garnish', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 F.', 'Combine all marinade/rub ingredients in a medium mixing bowl. Add chicken thighs and massage/turn to coat. Set aside.', 'Add olive oil to dutch oven heated to medium-high heat. Cook sausage until browned on both sides, then transfer to a plate.', 'Add chicken thighs to dutch oven, skin-side-down, and sear 2-3 minutes per side until they develop a nice crispy browned skin. Move chicken to plate with sausage.', 'Lower heat to medium-low and sauté chopped onion, jalapeño, and celery for 2-3 minutes, until softened.', 'Stir in cayenne, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper.', 'Stir in rice and chicken stock, and allow to simmer for 1 minute.', 'Arrange chicken thighs and sausage over the rice, pouring in any juices from the plate, return to a summer, then cover.', 'Bake for 35 minutes at 350 F.', 'Uncover, then bake for another 10-15 minutes, until liquid all liquid is absorbed into rice and meat is fully cooked.', 'Garnish with green onions and parsley, then serve.']

ingredients: ['pre-made pie crust', '1 cup diced yukon gold potatoes', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1/3 cup yellow onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic', '1 cup sliced carrots', '1/2 cup sliced celery', '1/3 cup all purpose flour', '1 3/4 cups chicken stock', '1/2 cup heavy cream', 'fresh thyme', 'salt and pepper', 'flat leaf parsley', '2 1/2 cups chopped rotisserie chicken', '1 cup frozen peas', '1 egg, beaten']
directions: ['Heat the butter over medium-high heat in a large skillet. Add the onions. Cook for 2-3 minutes and then add in the garlic. Next add in the carrots, celery, potato and cook until tender, stirring occasionally, about 6-8 minutes. Whisk in the flour. Gradually add the chicken stock and then the heavy cream whisking constantly while adding. Whisk until the sauce is smooth. Next add in the salt, black pepper, thyme, parsley. Simmer sauce over medium-low heat for 10 minutes. Gently stir in the chicken and frozen peas.', 'Fill containers with mixture and top with pie crust. Gently tuck it in with your fingers, and crimp the edges of the crust. With sharp knife, slice a few small slits in the center of the top crust. Using a pastry brush, brush crust and edges with beaten egg white. Bake for 45 minutes, or until crust is golden brown.']

ingredients: ['3 large celery stalks, sliced see-through thin (reserve any celery leaves)', '4 pink pearl apples, cored with skin-on, cut into sixths, and then thinly sliced*', '4 handfuls arugula or mâche salad greens', '1/3 cup toasted hazelnuts, walnuts, almonds, or pine nuts', '2 ounces Pecorino Romano cheese, shaved into thin slices', '1/4 teaspoon fine grain sea salt', '12 rosemary leaves, minced', '1 medium garlic clove, peeled', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 cup crème fraîche', '2 1/2 teaspoons white wine vinegar', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['To make the dressing, crush the sea salt, rosemary, garlic, and sugar into a paste with a mortar and pestle (or smash it all together with a knife); work in the crème fraîche and vinegar, taste and adjust with a bit of pepper and more salt if needed.', 'Combine the celery, apples, salad greens, and most of the nuts in a large serving bowl with half of the dressing. Toss well, adding more dressing until it is to your liking. Finish with the remaining nuts, and any torn celery leaves.', 'adapted from Heidi Swanson’s 101cookbooks.com', '*Pink Pearls have a very short season, if you’ve missed it—try swapping in other heirloom apple varieties. 2 large, crisp apples should do the trick.']

recipe_name: New Seasons Market Kale & Carrot Salad
ingredients: ['1 large bunch curly kale, stems removed, leaves thinly sliced', '3/4 cup grated or shredded carrots', '1/3 cup roasted, salted sunflower seeds', '1/4 cup mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon tamari', '1 1/2 tablespoon rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt, to taste']
directions: ['In a large salad bowl combine carrots, kale, and sunflower seeds. In a small bowl whisk together dressing ingredients.', 'Pour over kale mixture; toss well to combine. Add salt to taste.']

ingredients: ['1/3 cup fish sauce', '1/4 cup palm sugar (or brown sugar)', '1 teaspoon red chili flakes', '2 teaspoons ginger, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '5 tablespoons lime juice', '1/2 chilled New Seasons Market roasted chicken', '1 pound green cabbage, shredded', '1/2 pound carrots, grated', '2/3 cup peanuts, coarsely chopped', '1/2 cup basil leaves, torn', '1/2 cup mint leaves, torn']
directions: ['Bring fish sauce and brown sugar to a simmer in a small saucepan, over low heat, stirring until sugar has dissolved. Remove from heat and whisk together with chiles, ginger, garlic, and lime juice. Coarsely shred chicken into a large bowl. Add cabbage and carrot to bowl with chicken and toss with dressing. Plate salad and top with peanuts, basil, and mint.']

ingredients: ['3/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup balsamic vinegar', '2 inches ginger, peeled and minced', '2 teaspoons Kosher salt', '1 acorn squash, seeded and cut into wedges', '2 medium fennel bulbs, cut in half and sliced into 1/4" wedges', '3 sweet potatoes or yams, peeled and cut into wedges', '2 red onions, sliced', '1/4 cup tamari or soy sauce', '6 tablespoons water', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 teaspoons sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425° F. In a large bowl whisk together extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, ginger and kosher salt; whisk until salt is dissolved. Add squash, fennel, sweet potatoes and red onions; toss to coat and transfer to a large rimmed baking sheet. Roast 45 to 50 minutes, flipping vegetables once about halfway through. Remove from oven and let cool to room temperature.', 'While vegetables are roasting, make dressing. In a small bowl, whisk together tamari (or soy sauce), water, garlic and sugar until sugar is dissolved.', 'To serve, transfer roasted vegetables to serving bowl or platter and top with dressing. Serve at room temperature.']

ingredients: ['1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 teaspoon Kosher salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 large sweet-tart apple, cored and thinly sliced', '1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion', '1 pound spinach leaves', '1/2 cup chopped toasted pecans']
directions: ['In a large serving bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt and black pepper until thick and emulsified. Add apple and onion and toss to coat. Add spinach and pecans and toss again. Serve.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup sesame oil', '1/4 cup toasted sesame oil', '1/2 cup rice wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon peeled & minced ginger', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon tahini', 'Hot chili paste or sriracha (optional) to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.', 'Finely slice a head of cabbage, add a cup of shredded carrots, and toss with the dressing for a crunchy salad that will last a few days in the fridge even after it’s been tossed.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup balsamic vinegar', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '1 clove garlic, minced', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk ingredients together in a small bowl or combine in a food processor for a thicker dressing']

ingredients: ['4 large beets', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 fennel bulb cored and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Scrub beets to remove any dirt or soil. Cut each beet in half and then each half into 4 wedges. Place in a saucepan fit with a steamer basket and enough water to almost reach the base of the steamer basket. Cover with a lid, bring to a boil then reduce to a simmer to steam the beets. Cook for 10-15 minutes or until tender. Remove from the pan and chill in an ice bath or under some running cold water. Drain and place into a bowl with the minced garlic, thinly sliced fennel bulb, olive oil and vinegar, and salt and pepper. Mix to combine. Chill for several hours before serving.']

ingredients: ['6 ears corn, sliced off cob', '1 medium red onion, diced', '1 pint blueberries', '1/4 cup fresh lime juice', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced & packed basil leaves', 'salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Steam the corn with water in a large saucepan over medium heat, covered, until bright yellow, about 4 minutes. Remove the lid and continue to cook the corn, stirring frequently, until the water evaporates, about 3 minutes longer. Transfer the corn to a large bowl and let cool slightly. Mix in red onion, blueberries, lime juice and olive oil. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover bowl and refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours. Remove the salad from the refrigerator and fold in basil. Serve immediately.']

recipe_name: Bluebird Farro Salad with Cherries and Almonds
ingredients: ['4 cups cooked and cooled Bluebird Farro*', '3/4 cup slivered almonds, toasted', '1 cup cherries pitted and roughly chopped or dried cherries if not in season', '2 teaspoons finely chopped rosemary', '2 tablespoons chopped Italian parsley', '1/2-3/4 cup Lucini Cherry Balsamic and Rosemary Vinaigrette', 'optional additions: goat cheese or Parmesan Reggiano']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and gently mix. Taste and adjust seasoning with additional salt and pepper and more vinaigrette to taste. Options: serve with crumbled goat cheese or shaved Parmesan Reggiano.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons gluten-free mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon celery seed', 'Sea salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 can of your favorite sardines', '1/3 cup finely chopped onion', '1/2 celery stalk, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons horseradish mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 generous squeeze of fresh lemon juice (about 1 teaspoon)', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 pinch lemon pepper']
directions: ['Drain sardines, place in a bowl, and chop into chunks with a fork. Add celery and onion to sardines and stir. In a separate bowl, blend horseradish mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, sea salt and lemon pepper. Combine dressing with sardine mixture and serve.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup canned coconut milk', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon chili garlic sauce', '1-2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon coconut nectar', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon grated ginger', 'Cilantro (optional)']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a food processor, and refrigerate. Let sit at least 2 hours before serving. Can be thinned with more coconut milk. This sauce is great with chicken, as a dressing for Asian slaw, and for dipping veggies.']

ingredients: ['3 cups corn kernels (about 6 ears), steamed lightly', '3 Italian sweet flat red onions, minced', '2 cups blueberries', '1/4 cup lime juice', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '8 basil leaves, thinly sliced', '3 big handfuls of leaf lettuce']
directions: ['In a medium mixing bowl, combine corn, red onions, and blueberries.', 'In a small mixing bowl, combine lime juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Add the lime juice mixture to corn mixture and stir well. Adjust seasoning.', 'In a large serving bowl, toss leaf lettuce and basil leaves with corn mixture and serve chilled or at room temperature.']

recipe_name: Grilled Skirt Steak and Arugula Salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons grainy mustard', '1/4 teaspoon sugar', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1/3 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon pepper', '1 lb skirt steak, trimmed of excess fat and halved crosswise', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '2 bunches arugula, tough stems discarded', '1/2 cup crumbled Roquefort']
directions: ['For dressing:', 'Whisk together mustard, sugar, lemon juice, vinegar, oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper.', 'Steak preparation:', 'Season steak with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Grill steak, turning halfway through, to your desired doneness. Transfer steak to a cutting board and let rest 3 minutes.', 'Salad assembly:', 'Toss arugula with enough dressing to coat. Thinly slice steak diagonally across the grain. Serve steak over salad sprinkled with Roquefort.']

ingredients: ['1 cup mayo', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon celery seed', '1 tablespoon sugar or honey', '1/4 cup apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon white vinegar']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.', 'Finely slice a head of cabbage, add a cup of shredded carrots, and toss with dressing for a crunchy salad that will last a few days in the fridge even after it’s been tossed.']

ingredients: ['1 (12 oz) bottle Natural Directions Ranch Dressing', '1 (16 oz) jar Natural Directions Corn and Bean Salsa', '3 tablespoons finely minced fresh cilantro', '2 whole boneless, skinnless chicken breasts', '2 tablespoons taco seasoning, available in our Bulk Spice Dept.', '1/4 cup vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 lbs iceburg lettuce, shredded thin', '1 (6 oz) pkg. Organic Valley Shredded Mexican Blend Cheese', "2 large avocado's diced", '3 green onions, sliced', '2 large tomatoes, deseeded and chopped', '1/2 cups chopped cilarnto leaves', '1 bag New Seasons Market Tortilla Chips', 'limes, cut and quartered', '*optional: Don Froylon Queso Fresco or Cotija final garnish']
directions: ['Dressing:', 'Prepare by mixing together and refrigerate until use.', 'Preparing the chicken:', 'Generously season both sides of the chicken breasts. Heat the oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the chicken on both sides until deep golden brown on the outside and done in the middle, about 4 minutes per side. Remove and set aside to cool for 10 minutes, then cut it into cubes.', 'To assemble the salad:', 'Mound shredded lettuce, chicken, cheese, avocado, green onion, tomatoes and cilantro on a large platter. Top with desired amount of crushed tortilla chips. Drizzle dressing over the top. Place limes around platter.', '*Optional: garnish with your choice of Don Froylon cheese.']

ingredients: ['2 fresh limes, juiced', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '1 head Napa cabbage, thinly sliced', '1 carrot, grated', '1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '4-6 green onions, chopped', '2 tablespoons grated ginger', '3 tablespoons chopped cilantro', '3/4 cup peanut butter', '2 tablespoons raw local honey', '3-4 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '1 dash crushed chili pepper', '3 cloves garlic', '3/4 cup coconut milk']
directions: ['Mix all dressing ingredients thoroughly. Toss all vegetables in a large bowl. Coat veggies with lime dressing.', 'Meanwhile, combine all peanut sauce ingredients in a food processor or blender and blend until thoroughly mixed. Pour one cup of peanut sauce over dressed vegetables; plate and garnish with peanuts and additional chili if desired.']

ingredients: ['2 bunches of kale, stems removed and leaves sliced thinly', '2 large red beets, peeled and grated', '1 red onion, peeled and sliced paper thin', '1 pinch sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '2-3 teaspoons raw honey', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2-3/4 cup sprouted almonds', '1/2 cup feta cheese (optional)']
directions: ['Place kale, beets and onion in a large mixing bowl and season with salt and pepper. Mix the vinegar and honey together and pour over the veggies, mixing thoroughly. Set aside. (This can be done up to a couple of hours in advance to marinate the veggies.)', 'Whisk together the dill, garlic, and olive oil. Toss the oil mixture with the kale, beets and onion. Add sprouted almonds and feta cheese(optional). Mix and serve. It’s best the next day as it has the most time to marinate, but it’s great either way!']

ingredients: ['1 19oz can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and mashed with a fork', '2 tablespoon vegan mayo (or 1/2 ripe avocado)', '2 teaspoon spicy brown mustard', '1 tablespoon pickle relish (sweet or dill), or 1 medium pickle, finely diced', '2 green onions, chopped', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a medium bowl, combine bean mash, mayo or avocado, pickles, chopped onions, salt and pepper. Mix well.']

ingredients: ['2 cups loosely packed Italian parsley', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '3/4 cup walnuts', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/8 teaspoon lemon pepper']
directions: ['Wash and de-stem parsley. Blend all ingredients in blender or small food processor.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 garlic clove, minced', '1 teaspoon sea salt, or more to taste', '1/2 teaspoon fresh cracked black pepper', '1/2 cup cilantro, chopped']
directions: ['Combine and whisk all ingredients together thoroughly.', 'Note: An immersion blender works best to emulsify the dressing.']

ingredients: ['3 ears fresh corn, shucked', '1 cup chopped tomatoes or cherry tomatoes cut in half', '1/2 cup fresh mozzarella balls', '1/3-34 cup basil pesto', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cut kernels from fresh corn into a medium sized bowl. Add tomatoes and mozzarella balls and stir to combine. Toss with pesto, add salt and pepper to taste and add more pesto if desired.']

recipe_name: Chicken Basil and Feta Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['1 lb penne pasta', '1-2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 lb New Seasons Market Chicken Basil Sausages (4)', '2 roasted red pepper, chopped', '1 (14-15 oz) can artichoke bottoms, drained and chopped', '1/2 cup chopped Kalamata olives', '1/2 medium red onion, finely chopped', '1/2 cup chopped Italian flat leaf parsley', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 (8 oz) bottle vinaigrette or 1 cup homemade', '1/2 cup crumbled feta', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cook pasta according to package directions, drain. Toss with olive oil and spread out on baking sheet to cool slightly. Set aside to cool. Grill sausages or cook on stove until done. Set aside to cool and then cut into 10-12 slices each. Combine cooled pasta, cooled cooked sausage, red peppers, artichoke bottoms, olives, onion, parsley, tomatoes, feta and salad dressing in large bowl. Toss to mix evenly. Add salt and pepper to taste. May be served at room temperature or cold.']

ingredients: ['6 cups spinach', '1 1/2 cups fresh blueberries', '1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese', '1/2 cup chopped Valencia almonds', 'Optional boneless, skinless chicken breast, cooked', 'Toss with your fave dressing']
directions: ['In salad bowl, toss greens, blueberries, feta, almonds and chicken. Mix in dressing to taste. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 bunch kale, stemmed and finely chopped*', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1/3 cup toasted nuts, such as almonds, pistachios, or walnuts', '1/4 cup unsweetened dried cherries or apple juice sweetened dried cranberries', '1/2 cup pitted kalamata olives, chopped', '1 tablespoon hempseeds']
directions: ['Place the kale in a large bowl, add lemon juice, lemon zest, olive oil, garlic, and salt. Wash hands, then massage mixture until kale is softened, about 1 minute. Add nuts, dried fruit, olives, and hempseeds. Toss to combine ingredients. Rather than serving immediately, let salad rest for 15-20 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.']

ingredients: ['2 cups pure pineapple juice', '2 limes, juiced', '1 tablespoon honey', '1/4 cup plum vinegar', '3 tablespoons mint, finely chopped', '2 cups cubed pineapple', '4 cups seasonal melon, cut into cubes or balls']
directions: ['In a sauce pan, mix pineapple juice, lime juice, honey, and vinegar. Bring to a boil and reduce for about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Add chopped mint. Transfer fruit to a large bowl. Pour reduced glaze over fruit and stir to coat.']

ingredients: ['1 cup plain yogurt', '2 tablespoons mustard', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh dill', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk all ingredients together thoroughly.']

ingredients: ['1 cup raw hazelnuts', '1 tablespoon raw honey', '4 medium beets, scrubbed and cubed', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons real maple syrup', '1/4 cup berries of your choice', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'Sea salt to taste', '10 ounces spinach or spring mix', '3-4 ounces goat cheese']
directions: ['Soak raw hazelnuts in water with a pinch of salt for at least four hours. Drain, rinse, and dry in the oven at the lowest temperature setting for up to 8 hours. After drying hazelnuts, remove from heat and pulse in a food processor until coarsely chopped. Transfer back to warm pan and coat with honey. In a saucepan, cover beets with water. Bring to boil, and then reduce heat to a simmer. Simmer for 40 minutes until beets are tender. For dressing, place oil, maple syrup, berries, and balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, and sea salt in a blender. Blend until thoroughly mixed. Pour dressing mixture over cooked, drained beets and stir to coat. Divide greens on plates and top with hazelnuts, beets, and goat cheese.']

ingredients: ['1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon dried mustard', '2 tablespoons pickle brine', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil']
directions: ['Whisk ingredients together. Can be stored in the refrigerator for 1-2 weeks.']

ingredients: ['1 pound gluten free pasta', '1/2 cup oil-packed sun dried tomatoes, drained and finely chopped', '1 cup green olives, halved', '1/2 cup diced salami', '1 1/2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 cup chopped Italian parsley, loosely packed', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Cook pasta according to package instructions, drain, and set aside to cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine the sun dried tomatoes, olives, salami, garlic, and parsley, and toss to combine. Add the pasta to the bowl and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Toss gently to mix. Season to taste with salt and pepper.']

ingredients: ['4 cups cubed butternut squash', '2 large shallots, peeled and cut into 1/4 inch slices', '3 tablespoons PLUS 2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper', '4 cups of your favorite New Seasons Market bakery bread, cubed', '1/4 cup dried cranberries', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 firm ripe pears, medium dice', '4 ounces gorgonzola cheese, crumbled']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Combine the cubed squash, sliced shallots, and 3 tablespoons olive oil on a baking sheet. Season generously with salt and pepper and toss to coat. Roast in the oven for about 25 minutes or until the squash is tender. While the squash roasts, use a serrated knife to cut the bread into ½-inch cubes. Spread the bread cubes onto a second baking sheet and toast lightly, 5-7 minutes total. Allow the squash to cool slightly and then transfer to a large bowl. Drizzle with the additional oil, vinegar, and maple syrup. Add the bread cubes, cranberries, pears, and half of the crumbled gorgonzola cheese. Toss the mixture together thoroughly to soften the bread and transfer to a large platter or bowl. Sprinkle the remaining gorgonzola cheese on top and serve.']

ingredients: ['1 large bunch red beets, trimmed', '3 sweet - tart apples, such as Jonagold or Pink Lady', '6 ounces aged white cheddar cheese, crumbled', '1/3 cup roasted pumpkin seeds', '2 tablespoons sherry vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons honey', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons pumpkin seed oil']
directions: ['Place the beets in a large pot of salted water. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer and cook for 45 - 65 minutes or until tender. Once tender, immediately run the beets under cold water and slip off the skins. Cut the warm beets into a medium dice and place in a bowl in the refrigerator to cool. For the dressing, combine the vinegar, mustard, honey, and salt in a jar and shake vigorously. Add the oil and shake again vigorously. Cut the apples into a medium dice and place in a medium bowl. Add all of the dressing to the apples and toss to combine. To serve the salad, layer the beets on the bottom of a glass bowl. Layer the dressed apples on top. Top with crumbled cheddar cheese and pumpkin seeds.']

ingredients: ['2 cups smoked turkey, cubed', '3 stalks celery, finely diced', '1/2 cup red onion, finely diced', '2 crisp apples, finely diced and tossed with 1-2 Tbls. of lemon juice', '1/2 cup dried apple juice-sweetened cranberries', '3/4 cup mayonnaise*', '2 tablespoons dijon mustard', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a medium mixing bowl combine all ingredients. Taste for seasoning and adjust with salt and pepper. Use in a sandwich, a wrap or on a bed of lettuce and vegetables for a great salad!']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup rice*', '1 1/2 cups water', '1/2 cup red lentils', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/4 cup olive oil', '1 cup scallions, chopped']
directions: ['Gently wash and drain the rice. In a pot, bring 1 1/2 cups water and 1/2 cup rice to boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 45 minutes. Remove from heat. In a separate pot, bring 1 cup water and 1/2 cup lentils to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Once fully cooked, combine lentils and rice and rinse in a strainer under cold water. In separate dish combine mustard, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt. Whisk until smooth and toss into rice and lentil combination. Add chopped scallions and mix again to combine all ingredients. Refrigerate and served chilled.']

ingredients: ['1 pound heirloom tomatoes, cut into eights and then each segment cut in half', '1 pound ripe nectarines and peaches, cut into eighths and then halved', '2 Tbsp fresh basil leaves, chiffonade (rolled up together and cut into strips)', '4 ounces fresh buffalo mozzarella, sliced into chunks', '3 Tbsp olive oil', '2 Tbsp balsamic vinegar', '1/2 tsp sea salt', '1/2 tsp ground black pepper']
directions: ['In a large mixing bowl, combine all the salad ingredients except for the mozzarella and toss well. Whisk the vinaigrette ingredients together in a small bowl and pour onto salad. Mix again. Add the chunks of mozzarella, toss gently and serve at once.']

ingredients: ['½ bag New Seasons Market pre-shredded kale (sold in a bag in the produce department)', 'Juice and zest of one lemon', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/8 tsp sea salt', '1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved', '½ large cucumber, chopped', '½ cup pitted Kalamata olives, chopped', '½ cup crunchy chickpeas (we used Biena Sea Salt Chickpea Snacks)']
directions: ['Place the kale in a large bowl, add lemon zest and juice, olive oil, garlic, and salt. Wash hands, then massage mixture for 1–2 minutes until kale is softened. Add tomatoes, cucumber, and olives, toss to combine ingredients. Top with crunchy chickpeas and serve.']

recipe_name: Grilled Peach and Mozzarella Summer Salad
ingredients: ['3/4 cup balsamic vinegar', '2 ripe peaches, halved and pitted', '4 tsp. extra-virgin olive oil', '4 cups lightly packed baby spring mix', '1 cup Ciliegine (cherry-sized fresh mozzarella balls)', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat a gas or charcoal grill to medium heat.', 'Bring vinegar to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat.', 'Reduce heat and simmer until the mixture is thick and syrupy\xad—reduced to about ¼ cup. (Reduction will thicken a bit as it cools, do not overcook.) Remove from heat.', 'Coat peaches with half the olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill flesh side down until lightly charred, about 3-4 minutes. Allow to cool and slice each half into thirds.', 'In a medium bowl, toss the greens with the remaining 2 teaspoons of olive oil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Plate greens and top with mozzarella and peaches. Drizzle with balsamic reduction and season with salt and pepper to taste.']

recipe_name: Heirloom Melon, Prosciutto and Savory Granola Salad
ingredients: ['1 large egg, separated', '1/2 tsp kosher salt', '1/4 cup chopped raw pistachios', '1/4 cup old fashioned rolled oats', '2 Tbls sesame seeds', '1 Tbls sugar', '1 tsp fennel seeds', '1/16 tsp cayenne pepper', '1/2 small heirloom orange melon, seeded (such as Red Cap or Charentais)', '1/4 small honeydew melon, seeded', '3 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto, torn into 1/2-inch wide strips', '1 1/2 tsp balsamic vinegar', '1/4 cup fresh mint or basil leaves, torn into bite size pieces']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and spray generously with cooking spray. Place the egg white and salt in a medium mixing bowl, reserve yolk for another use. Whisk egg white until frothy and white, 1 minute. Add the pistachios, oats, sesame seeds, sugar, fennel seeds, and cayenne pepper, and toss to coat. Arrange the mixture in a single layer on the baking sheet and bake, stirring occasionally, until the mixture is crispy and golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes. Let cool completely.', 'Cut the top and bottom off of the melon so that it sits securely on your cutting board. Peel the skin off with a thin knife, then shave thin strips of the melon until you have about 6 cups of loosely packed strips; reserve the remaining melon for another use. Arrange the melon slices on 6 salad plates and top with the strips of prosciutto. Drizzle the vinegar evenly over the salads and scatter the granola and mint or basil over the top.']

recipe_name: Blistered Padrón Peppers with Tomato Salad
ingredients: ['1 Basket padron peppers', '1 cup cherry tomatoes (mixed variety)', '1 Tbsp. vegetable oil', 'Flaky sea salt (such as Maldon)', '2 Tbsp. grated Parmesans', 'Olive oil to taste', '½ Lemon']
directions: ['Slice cherry tomatoes in half. Put in a bowl and toss with 1/4 tsp. salt. Set aside.', 'Heat 1-tablespoon vegetable oil in a large cast iron skillet over high heat until just smoking. Add the peppers; cook, tossing occasionally, until skins are blistered and flesh is softened, about 4 minutes.', 'Transfer to a bowl, sprinkle with salt and toss to coat.', 'Divide peppers among 4 salad plates, stacking to give some height to each dish.', 'Divide tomatoes and sprinkle around peppers, finish with grated parmesan, a drizzle of olive oil, and a squeeze of lemon.']

recipe_name: Crab & Avocado Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['2 cups crab meat', '1 ripe avocado, peeled and chopped', '1 head of romaine lettuce, chopped', '1 small shallot, finely chopped', '3/4c extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 c white balsamic vinegar', '1 navel orange, zest & juice', '1 Meyer lemon, zest & juice', '1 Tbs honey', '1 tsp salt', '1 tsp black pepper']
directions: ['Combine crab and avocado in a large bowl. In a small mixing bowl, combine vinaigrette ingredients and pour over crab avocado mixture. Enjoy on top of chopped romaine.']

recipe_name: Kathy Unger’s Spinach and Strawberry Salad—Unger Farms
ingredients: ['1/2 cup walnut oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced shallots', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', 'Kosher salt', 'black pepper', '2 ounces Parmesan–shaved on top', '2 bunches of spinach (about 8 cups, loosely packed)', '1 pint strawberries, hulled (stems/leaves removed) and thinly sliced, divided', '1/2 cup coarsely chopped toasted walnuts', '2 ounces Parmesan–shaved on top']
directions: ['In a small saucepan over medium heat, warm the oil with the shallots.', 'Reduce heat to low and cook until the shallots are softened, but not browned.', 'Add the vinegar and mustard, whisking to emulsify.', 'Season to taste with salt/pepper.', 'In a large serving blow, place the spinach and season with salt/pepper then add strawberries and walnuts.', 'Add half of the vinaigrette, toss well to coat and then add more, one tablespoon at a time.', 'Shave Parmesan on top and garnish.']

ingredients: ['1 pound potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 1/2 pounds clams, chopped', '1/4 pound bacon, diced', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1/2 cup butter', '1/2 cup flour', '4 cups clam juice', '1 pint half and half', '1/4 cup chopped parsley', 'salt & pepper']
directions: ['Bring the potatoes and clam juice to a boil, and cook potatoes until tender. Set aside. In a separate pot, sauté onions, celery, and bacon until onions are translucent. Add clams and sauté for about five minutes.', 'Add the butter and allow to melt. Add the flour and cook until slightly brown. Stir in clam juice and potatoes. Bring to boil to thicken. Add parsley and half and half.', 'Cook on medium for 30 minutes. Serve with bread!']

ingredients: ['1 pint fresh salsa', '2 limes, zest and juice', '1-2 teaspoons hot sauce of your choice', '4 tablespoons prepared horseradish', '2 tablespoons ketchup']
directions: ['Simply mix all ingredients together in a bowl. Taste and adjust seasonings as necessary. Great served with shrimp!']

ingredients: ['1 ½ pint of cherry tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive or grapeseed oil', '1 teaspoon each salt and black pepper', '2-3 tablespoons freshly grated horseradish root (available in produce year-round)', '1 lemon, juice and zest', '1 Tablespoon hot sauce of your choice']
directions: ['Preheat broiler to high and line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment or foil.', 'In a large mixing bowl, toss cherry tomatoes with oil, salt and pepper. Lay out on prepared baking sheet and broil in preheated oven for 10-12 minutes.', 'Using a food processor, add all remaining ingredients to the broiled tomatoes. Pulse several times until mixture has reached desired consistency.', 'Season to taste with additional salt, pepper, hot sauce or lemon juice. Serve chilled or at room temperature.']

ingredients: ['2 lbs raw medium shrimp', '4 oz. shrimp and crab boil or 2 Tbsp Old Bay Seasoning', '1 Tbsp. kosher salt']
directions: ['Peel and devein the shrimp.', 'Bring 8 cups of water, seasoning and salt to boil in a large pot.', 'Add the shrimp to the pot and simmer until the shrimp float to the top and are just cooked through, about 3 minutes.', 'Drain the shrimp in a colander and top with ice to cool. Serve with your favorite cocktail sauce or remoulade for a spicy kick.']

ingredients: ['5 Tbls unsalted butter, softened', '1 chipotle chile in adobo sauce, minced', '1 tsp adobo sauce from chiles', '1 clove of garlic', '3 Tbls lime juice', '1 Tbls grated lime zest', '1 tsp honey', '1 Tbls fresh cilantro leaves', '1/2 tsp coarse salt']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a mixer or food processor, adding the lime juice in 3 additions, allowing it to incorporate before adding more.', 'Store in an airtight container, refrigerated for up to 1 week.']

ingredients: ['1 can of your favorite sardines', '1/3 cup finely chopped onion', '1/2 celery stalk, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons horseradish mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 generous squeeze of fresh lemon juice (about 1 teaspoon)', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 pinch lemon pepper']
directions: ['Drain sardines, place in a bowl, and chop into chunks with a fork. Add celery and onion to sardines and stir. In a separate bowl, blend horseradish mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, sea salt and lemon pepper. Combine dressing with sardine mixture and serve.']

ingredients: ['1 cedar plank, long enough to fit salmon but short enough to fit inside your grill', '2 lb salmon fillet, skin on, no more than ¾” thick', 'olive oil', 'flakey sea salt', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Soak the plank in water, up to 2 hours. Coat the salmon meat with olive oil and season generously with salt and pepper. Allow the salmon to rest at room temperature 30 minutes before grilling. Prepare your grill, charcoal or gas, and bring it up to medium-high temperature. Transfer salmon to plank, skin side down, and place in the center of your grill. Cover and cook, 8-10 minutes. Turn off or decrease heat as much as possible and allow the salmon to remain on the covered grill an additional 6-8 minutes, or until fully cooked. Carefully remove plank from grill. You can serve directly from the plank. This is easiest accomplished by placing the whole plank on a baking sheet as the bottom may be sooty and will be hot.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ground turmeric', '2 tablespoons ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground cardamom', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['1/2 lb Wild Salmon Filet', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'sea salt & pepper to taste', '1/2 lemon', '1 sweet onion, sliced into rings']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F. Place salmon on a large sheet of tin foil. Rub salmon with 2 teaspoons of olive oil, a pinch of sea salt, and a pinch of black pepper. Squeeze half a lemon on top and place 4-5 sliced rings of onion on top of filet. Wrap entire piece of salmon in foil- make sure no filet is showing. Place the foil packet directly on oven rack and bake for 30-40 minutes or until cooked.']

ingredients: ['20 large raw prawns, peeled and deveined', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 tart apple, cored and sliced thinly', '20 thin slices of bacon', '1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '2 lemons, cut into wedges', '1/4 cup fresh parsley, finely chopped', 'Extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling']
directions: ['Lightly season prawns with salt and pepper. Place a slice of apple on each prawn and wrap completely with bacon. In a large pan, melt ghee or coconut oil over medium heat. Arrange prawns on their sides in pan and cook for several minutes. Do not turn over until bacon is fully cooked and prawns become slightly crispy. Turn over and cook the other side until crispy. Remove from pan to serving tray. Garnish with lemon wedges, parsley and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 lb prawns, shelled and deveined', '2 Tbsp taco seasoning mix', '3 garlic cloves, minced', '3 Tbsp fresh lime juice', '2 Tbsp cooking oil', '1 pkg organic tortillas', '2 C shredded iceberg lettuce', '1 medium tomato, chopped', '1 ripe avocado, peeled and diced', '1 C shredded Mexican Blend cheese Salsa']
directions: ['In medium bowl, combine prawns, taco seasoning mix, garlic and 2 tablespoons of the lime juice; toss to coat.', 'Heat cooking oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Add prawn mixture; cook and stir 2-4 minutes or until prawns turn pink. Remove prawns from skillet and set aside. Cook remaining juices\nin skillet for 3 to 4 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally. Return prawns to skillet, stir to coat, and remove from heat.', 'In small bowl, toss avocado with remaining lime juice. Scoop a spoonful of the prawn mixture onto each tortilla. Top with cheese, lettuce, tomato, avocado, and salsa.']

ingredients: ['Fish fillet of choice']
directions: ['Pre-heat the oven to 450°F. Pat the fish dry with paper towels and season simply with salt and pepper. Preheat an oven proof skillet (cast iron is preferred) over medium-high heat. Add heat-tolerant fat to the pan and place the fish in the pan, flesh side down, careful not to crowd pan. Cook flesh side down for 2-3 minutes or until nicely browned.
