recipe_name: Roasted Pork Loin with Apples & Onions
ingredients: ['2 lb boneless pork tenderloin', '2 tbsp brown sugar', '1 tsp paprika', '1 tsp rosemary, crushed', '1/2 tsp garlic powder', '1/2 tsp salt', '2 tbsp olive oil, divided', '2 medium Fuji apples, thinly sliced', '1 medium onion, thinly sliced']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F.', 'Mix brown sugar, paprika, rosemary, garlic powder, and salt in a large bowl. Once mixed, set aside 1 tbsp for later.', 'Brush pork with 1 tbsp of the olive oil and sprinkle seasoning mixture. Place in center of large, foil lined baking dish.', 'In a medium bowl, toss apples, onions and 1 tbsp olive oil.', 'Add remaining seasoning mixture and toss to coat well. Spread around pork in pan.', 'Roast 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has internal temperature of 145°.', 'Slice pork and serve with apples and onions on top.']

ingredients: ['2 bags New Seasons Market salted honey popcorn', '1 cup New Seasons Market salted roasted peanuts', '3 cups mini pretzels', '1 cup candy corn', '1 cup chocolate peanut butter candy pieces', '1/2 cup honey', '1/2 cup granulated sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2/3 cup New Seasons Market creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup unsalted butter']
directions: ['In a large bowl, mix together the popcorn, peanuts, pretzels, candy corn, and peanut butter candy pieces. Set aside.', 'In a medium saucepan, bring the honey, sugar, salt and butter to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter. Drizzle over popcorn mixture. Stir to coat.', 'Spread the popcorn mixture onto two baking sheets covered in parchment. Allow to cool completely, then break apart to serve.']

ingredients: ['12 ounces white chocolate chips', '8 cups milk of your choice (nondairy is fine, too!)', '1 tsp vanilla', 'Food coloring in your choice of colors', 'Sprinkles', 'Candy for garnish (candy corns, chocolate peanut butter candies, etc.)', 'Whipped cream']
directions:
['Place white chocolate chips in a large bowl and set aside.
Warm milk in a saucepan over medium heat, until it just starts to bubble.
Pour warm milk over white chocolate chips. Whisk together until chocolate is melted and consistency is smooth.
Mix in vanilla and your choice of food coloring.
Pour into glass mugs and garnish with whipped cream and candies.']

recipe_name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Squash with Dried Cranberries
ingredients: ['1 lb butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1” chunks', '1 lb Brussels sprouts, trimmed and sliced lengthwise in half', '½ cup dried cranberries (sweetened or unsweetened is fine)', '2 tsp Dijon mustard', '1 tbsp rice wine vinegar', '4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tsp salt', 'Freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 degrees.', 'In a large bowl, toss together Brussels sprouts, butternut squash chunks, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp salt, and pepper. Mix until vegetables are coated evenly.', 'Arrange veggies on a large baking sheet with Brussels sprouts facing cut side-down. Be sure to leave some space between everything so they can get nice and caramelized.', 'Roast for 20-30 minutes, tossing gently about halfway through, or until veggies are tender and caramelized/golden brown. During the last five minutes of roasting, scatter dried cranberries on baking sheet.', 'Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly.', 'In a small bowl, whisk together rice wine vinegar and Dijon. While whisking continuously, slowly pour in olive oil until emulsified. Season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Gently toss roasted veggies with vinaigrette in a serving bowl until lightly dressed. Serve warm, room temperature, or chilled.']

ingredients: ['4 tablespoons almond butter', '1 tsp vanilla extract', '2 tbsp maple syrup or honey', '½ cup canned pumpkin', '2/3 cup vanilla almond milk (you may use unsweetened here, too, though you may want to add extra honey or maple syrup)', '1 cup old fashioned oats', '½ tsp cinnamon', '½ tsp pumpkin pie spice', 'Pinch of salt', '4 tablespoons chocolate chips']
directions:
['In a small bowl, combine almond butter, vanilla extract, and honey or maple syrup and stir until well combined.
Add in the pumpkin, milk, and oats and stir well.
Add in the cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, salt and give it all another good stir.
Mix in chocolate chips.
Divide mixture into two small jars or sealed containers.
Place in the fridge overnight until oats are completely softened.
In the morning, garnish with additional chocolate chips and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into bite sized pieces', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 lb mushrooms, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'Generous pinch cayenne', '2 tablespoons flour', '3/4 cup vegetable broth', '1 tbsp dry sherry', '3/4 cup soy creamer', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 1/2 slices whole grain bread', '1 tablespoon earth balance buttery sticks', '1/2 tsp each sea salt and black pepper', '1 3 oz can fried onions']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425. Bring 2 quarts of water to boil in a large pot. Add salt and beans, cover and cook for 6 minutes. Drain and shock with cold water (to halt cooking). Set aside. In a large skillet over medium heat, heat olive oil. Add mushrooms, garlic, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Cook until mushrooms are very soft and release their juices, 6-8 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together flour, vegetable broth and sherry and add to mushrooms. Bring to a simmer, stirring until mixture thickens. Add creamer and continue to simmer, 5-6 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and stir in beans.', 'Topping: Pulse together bread, earth balance, salt, and pepper in a food processor until it resembles coarse crumbs.', 'Place green beans in an oiled 9”x13” baking dish and top with bread. Bake in preheated oven for 15 or until warmed through.']

ingredients: ['2 flour burrito-sized tortillas', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '1/2 pound sliced leftover turkey', '1/4 cup leftover cranberry sauce', '8 slices thick Brie cheese (8 ounces)', 'Salt and ground pepper', '1 tbsp olive oil']
directions:
['Preheat oven to 425 and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Spread one side of each tortilla with 1 tbsp mustard.
Arrange turkey over one half of each tortilla (on the side with mustard).
Spoon cranberry sauce over turkey.
Layer with 4 slices of brie on each tortilla and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Fold in half and press to flatten slightly.
Brush both sides with olive oil.', 'Bake, rotating baking sheet halfway through, until cheese is melted and tortillas are golden, about 10-15 minutes. Allow to cool for five minutes before slicing into wedges.']

ingredients: ['Cooking spray', '2 cups cooked mashed potatoes', '3 eggs, beaten', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1/4 cup + 2 tbsp fresh chives, minced', 'Salt and black pepper', 'Sour cream (for garnish)']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. Lightly spray cups of a muffin tin with cooking spray.', 'Combine mashed potatoes, eggs, 3/4 cup of the cheese, chives (reserve 2 tbsp for garnish) in a large bow. Season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Fill each muffin cup with the mashed potatoes. Sprinkle tops with the remaining 1/4 cup cheese.', 'Bake until the potato cups browned on top, and heated through—about 30 minutes. Let cool for about 5 minutes in the pan, then transfer to serving plate. Garnish with sour cream and remaining chives.']

recipe_name: Pressure Cooker Curried Cauliflower and Squash Soup
ingredients: ['2 T avocado oil', '1 small yellow onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '½ tsp ground ginger', '2 tsp curry powder', '2 tsp sea salt (may need to decrease if your curry powder has salt in it)', '1 tsp ground cumin', '1 med-large head cauliflower, cut into florets', '2 10oz bags frozen butternut squash (or use leftover cooked squash)', '2-3 cups low-sodium chicken or vegetable broth, divided', '1 can full-fat coconut milk', '2 TBSP coconut aminos', 'Apple cider vinegar to taste (we like about 3 splashes)']
directions: ['Set your pressure cooker to sauté mode and add avocado oil. Sauté onion until translucent, about 7 minutes. Add garlic, ginger, curry powder, salt, and cumin. Sauté for about 1 min. Add cauliflower florets and squash, stir to coat with spices. Add 2 cups of broth and can of coconut milk, stir to combine. Turn off pressure cooker, lock lid in place and turn vent to “sealing” mode. Set the pressure cooker to manual high pressure mode and use the buttons to adjust time down to 5 minutes. Once done, cover the vent with a towel and turn it to venting mode to quick release pressure. Contents will be very hot. Use an immersion blender to puree until very smooth. Alternatively use a traditional blender and work in batches to puree the soup. Thin to desired consistency with remaining cup of broth. Add coconut aminos and a few splashes of apple cider vinegar, the vinegar adds acidity that helps balance and brighten the flavors of the soup. Taste and adjust seasoning by adding salt, pepper, or more coconut aminos. Garnish with chives and a drizzle of coconut milk or sour cream.', 'This can be made on the stovetop in a large soup pot, just sauté over medium heat, and rather than cooking under pressure, simmer for 20 minutes, or until vegetables are softened. Follow instructions above for pureeing and seasoning.']

ingredients: ['1/2 lb stinging nettles', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 T extra virgin olive oil', '1 T red wine vinegar', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, optional', '']
directions: ['Bring 2 quarts of water to a rolling boil. Using tongs or wearing thick gloves, add the nettles and blanch for 60 seconds. Drain and allow to cool slightly, then squeeze out as much moisture as possible. Remove any tough stems, then chop coarsely and set aside. Heat a pan over medium heat, once warm, add the olive oil and chopped garlic with a generous pinch of salt. Saute garlic for about one minute, not allowing it to brown. Add the chopped nettles and cook, uncovered and stirring occasionally, for another 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add the vinegar and red pepper flakes, if desired.']

recipe_name: Durst Organic Farm’s Marinated Citrus and Garlic Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus-set aside for several days to wilt and achieve thirst', '1 cup of orange juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon of corn starch', '3 tablespoons of minced garlic', 'Tall container to hold asparagus']
directions: ['In the tall container, combine the orange juice and garlic. Place wilted asparagus into the container and allow to rehydrate overnight. To the liquid that remains add sea salt, olive oil and cornstarch. Mix well into the citrus sauce. Set aside.', 'The next day sauté asparagus until tender (3 to 4 minutes) Add the citrus sauce to the asparagus and cook until sauce thicken.']

recipe_name: Klamath Basin Fresh Organic’s Huckleberry Gold Potatoes
ingredients: ['2 pounds of huckleberry gold potatoes', '2 tablespoons kosher salt', 'Olive oil to coat', '4 tablespoons of chopped fresh chives', '6 tablespoons of chopped fresh dill', '1/4 cup of chopped fresh parsley', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a saucepan, cover the potatoes in cold water, add salt and bring to a boil uncovered. Reduce to simmer and cook for 15 to 20 minutes until fork tender. Drain and cover with a dish towel for 10 minutes. Then toss with the olive oil and fresh herbs and salt/pepper.']

ingredients: ['1 cup fresh basil leaves-packed', '1 to 2 cloves of garlic', '3 tablespoons pine nuts', '3/4 cup grated parmesan cheese', '1/2 cup olive oil', '1/8 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Place washed and dried basil, garlic, pine nuts, salt and cheese in a blender or food processor.', 'Add olive oil and pulse until mixture forms a thick puree.', 'Pour over cooked hot pasta and serve.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup olive oil', '1 tsp sea salt', '1/2 tsp ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp paprika', '1/2 tsp cumin', '1/4 tsp cayenne pepper', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '3 tbsp chopped shallots', '1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 1/2 cups your fave local lager', '¾ cup orange juice', '½ cup reduced-sodium tamari sauce', '¼ cup honey', '¼ cup chopped fresh garlic', '2 tbsp grated peeled ginger root', '¾ tsp crushed red pepper flake (optional)', '.5 cup olive oil', '2/3 cup vegetable broth', '.5 cup fresh lemon juice', '2 tbsp maple syrup', '4 tsp minced garlic', '2 tsp Italian seasoning', 'Salt and fresh ground black pepper to taste', '2 cup finely chopped shallots', '2 cup ketchup', '2/3 cup packed brown sugar', '2/3 cup red wine vinegar', '2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce', '1/4 tsp crushed red pepper', '2 cup soy sauce', '1 cup sugar', '1 cup sesame oil', '2 1/2 tbsp sesame seeds', '2 1/2 tbsp ginger', '2 1/2 tbsp garlic powder']
directions:
['FOR HERB MARINADE: Pour olive oil into mixing bowl.
In another small bowl, combine salt, pepper, paprika, cumin, and cayenne pepper. Whisk into olive oil.
Add garlic, onions, and parsley. Whisk together until combined. Slowly add beer (so as not to add bubbles/foam).
Pour marinade over the chicken in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator 1 hour or overnight for best results.', 'FOR TERIYAKI: Whisk together orange juice, tamari, maple, garlic, ginger and red pepper in mixing bowl.
Pour marinade over the meat in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator: chicken or meat 4 to 12 hours, fish or seafood 30 to 45 minutes.', 'FOR PALEO LEMON GARLIC MARINADE: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, chicken broth, lemon juice, honey, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper.
Pour marinade over the meat in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator 1 hour or overnight for best results.', 'FOR BBQ MARINADE: Combine all ingredients in small saucepan, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Remove 2 cup to use as marinade. Bring remaining suace to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer about 10 to 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until desired sauce consistency is reached. Set aside for use as sauce on cooked beef.
Marinade beef in 2 cups of sauce for 15 minutes to 2 hours for tender steaks; 6 hours or as long as overnight for less tender steaks, turning occasionally.
Discard marinade and grill steaks until desired doneness, then serve with previously set aside sauce.', 'FOR THAI MARINADE: In a small bowl, whisk together all ingredients.
Pour marinade over the meat in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator for 15 minutes to 2 hours for tender steaks; 6 hours or as long as overnight for less tender steaks, turning occasionally.']

recipe_name: Kathy Unger’s Spinach and Strawberry Salad—Unger Farms
ingredients: ['1/2 cup walnut oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced shallots', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', 'Kosher salt', 'black pepper', '2 ounces Parmesan–shaved on top', '2 bunches of spinach (about 8 cups, loosely packed)', '1 pint strawberries, hulled (stems/leaves removed) and thinly sliced, divided', '1/2 cup coarsely chopped toasted walnuts', '2 ounces Parmesan–shaved on top']
directions: ['In a small saucepan over medium heat, warm the oil with the shallots.', 'Reduce heat to low and cook until the shallots are softened, but not browned.', 'Add the vinegar and mustard, whisking to emulsify.', 'Season to taste with salt/pepper.', 'In a large serving blow, place the spinach and season with salt/pepper then add strawberries and walnuts.', 'Add half of the vinaigrette, toss well to coat and then add more, one tablespoon at a time.', 'Shave Parmesan on top and garnish.']

recipe_name: Kathy Unger’s No Cooking Freezer Jam—Unger Farms
ingredients: ['2 cups crushed strawberries', '4 cups sugar', '3/4 cup water', '1 box of pectin']
directions: ['Remove strawberry caps. Crush berries one layer at a time.', 'Combine strawberries and sugar. Mix thoroughly and let stand 10 minutes.', 'Combine 1 box of pectin and water in a small sauce pan. Boil hard 1 minute, stirring constantly', 'Add pectin mixture to fruit mixture. Stir 3 minutes.', 'Ladle into 8 oz. jelly jam or freezer jam jars, leaving 1/2" headspace.', 'Store in freezer. (May be stored in refrigerator up to 3 weeks.)']

recipe_name: Kiss of Ginger Melon—Savor Fresh Farms
ingredients: ['1 cup water', '2-3 inches peeled, minced ginger', '2 tbsp. sugar', '2 Kiss Melons (try one Honey and one Golden or Sugar) cut into bite-sized chunks', '3 tbsp. chopped basil, mint, or tarragon']
directions: ['Place water, ginger and sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. (For a less intense ginger flavor, keep the ginger whole while boiling and remove from the syrup after cooking.)', 'Boil for 10-15 minutes, uncovered, until the liquid has reduced by about half and turns syrupy. Let the syrup cool before use.', 'Drizzle the ginger syrup over the melon chunks and top with fresh herbs.']

ingredients: ['2 cups flour', '1 cup butter or margarine', '4 tablespoons powdered sugar', '6 ounces (2 packages) cream cheese', '8 ounces (1 container) whipped topping', '1 cup powdered sugar', '1 pint strawberries, 1/2 pint blueberries, 1/2 pint blackberries, washed']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray round pizza pan and set aside.', 'Crust: In a medium bowl, cut flour, butter and powdered sugar into coarse crumbs. Press evenly into prepared pan. Bake 8-10 minutes or until lightly brown. Let cool.', 'Filling: Mix cream cheese, whipped topping and powdered sugar. Spread over crust and refrigerate until ready to use.', 'Arrange fresh sliced berries on top.']

ingredients: ['1.5 oz aquavit', '.25 oz RAFT Ginger Syrup', '.25 oz lemon juice', '4-6 dashes The Bitter Housewife Cardamom Bitters', '3 oz soda water']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.', 'Stir to mix.', 'Garnish with an orange twist.']

ingredients: ['1 cup pomegranate juice', '1 cup blueberries', '1 cup coconut water', 'Sparkling water', 'Small splash of vodka']
directions: ['Pour pomegranate juice into ice cube tray. Freeze.', 'Place blueberries in another ice cube tray and pour coconut water over berries. Freeze.', 'When frozen, place pomegranate and coconut blueberry cubes in glasses. Pour sparkling water over the cubes, plus vodka.']

recipe_name: Summer Salmon with Grapes and Olives
ingredients: ['4 each 6 ounce Coho salmon', '2 tablespoons butter', '1/2 cup minced sweet onion', '1 cup red seedless grapes cut in half', '12 each pitted Castelvetrano olives sliced thin', '1 tablespoon each chopped parsley and green onion', '4 teaspoons sherry vinegar', 'Zest of 1 small lemon and juice from half of the lemon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°. Salt and pepper salmon fillets and place on a parchment covered sheet pan. Bake 15-20 minutes, or until fully cooked (depending on thickness of fillets and desired doneness).', 'While salmon bakes, melt butter in a sauté pan on medium high heat and cook onions until they begin to soften. Add a pinch of salt. Add half of the grapes, olives, and cook until grapes start to release their juice. Remove from the heat and add parsley and green onion. Add remaining grapes, vinegar and zest. Add lemon juice to taste.', 'Top salmon with grapes and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 whole fryer chicken, around 4-5 lbs, cleaned and rinsed', '1 tbsp garlic powder', '1 tbsp ground cumin', '1/2 tbsp ground coriander', '1/2 tbsp smoked paprika', '1/2 tbsp sea salt', '1/4 tbsp ground black pepper', '2 tbsp olive oil', '½ can your favorite lager-style beer']
directions:
['Heat grill to medium heat (325-350 degrees).
Rub whole chicken liberally with olive oil.
In a small bowl mix together garlic powder, ground cumin, ground coriander, smoked paprika, sea salt and ground pepper.
Rub seasoning into chicken until well coated.
Place body cavity of chicken over beer can, and transfer to grill.
Grill chicken until it reaches an internal temperature of 160 (thigh) and 180 (breast). This is a low and slow process—approximately 1 ½ hours.
Let chicken rest before carving and serving.']

ingredients: ['1 bottle of New Seasons Partners in Crime Rosé', '½ sweet summer melon, peeled and seeded-cut into chunks', '¼ cup lime juice', 'Garnish of basil leaf and slice of cucumber']
directions: ['Pour rosé into a 13 x 9" pan and freeze until almost solid (at least 6 hours)', 'Scrape rosé into a blender. Add melon and lime juice, Transfer blender jar to freezer and freeze until frozé is thickened 25–35 minutes', 'Serve in party glasses with a garnish of basil leaf and a slice of cucumber']

ingredients: ['1 1/4 cup sugar', '1 cup self-rising flour', '1 cup milk', '1/2 cup melted butter', '1 tsp vanilla', '2 cups diced strawberries']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350. Spray an 11" x 8" baking dish with non-stick cooking spray.', 'Whisk together 1 cup sugar and flour.', 'Add milk. Whisk until almost smooth.', 'Add melted butter and vanilla. Pour into your baking dish.', 'Top with strawberries and remaining sugar.', 'Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, until golden.', 'Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.']

ingredients: ['8 tablespoons New Seasons Partner Brand Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided', '5 lbs butternut squash, peeled and cubed (6-8 cups)', '2 medium leeks, light green and white portion, sliced and soaked in cold water', '2 cups diced celery (about 4 large stalks)', '1 cup New Seasons Partners in Crime Pinot Gris wine', '1 16 oz bag New Seasons Partner Brand Artisan Bread Stuffing (broken into small pieces) or 16oz Gluten Free Bread Stuffing', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme or sage, or combination', '1 quart vegetable stock or mushroom stock', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°. Toss squash in 3 tablespoons of olive oil and place in one layer on a rimmed baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and roast approximately 25 minutes or until tender. Stir halfway through.', 'On medium heat, heat 3 tablespoons of olive oil in a sauté pan and add drained leeks, celery and 1 teaspoon salt. Stir and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes, and add wine. Increase heat to medium high and let wine reduce by half. Remove from heat.', 'Place bread stuffing in a large bowl and add roasted squash, celery-leek mixture, herbs, 2 teaspoons salt and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. With a large spoon, mix to combine and add stock and stir until all bread is softened.', 'Place in an oiled 9” x 13” baking dish and drizzle the top with 2 tablespoons of olive oil.', 'At this point, you can cover and refrigerate stuffing for 3 days.', 'When ready to serve, remove from refrigerator, uncover and place in a preheated 350° oven, for approximately 30 minutes or until the top is golden brown and it is heated through.']

recipe_name: Fresh Green Bean and Crispy Onion Casserole
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon Kosher salt', '1 pound fresh green beans, rinsed, trimmed and cut into thirds', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '12 ounces Cremini mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 cup half and half', '1 1/4 cup crispy onions, divided']
directions: ['Bring a gallon of water and 2 tablespoons of salt to a boil in an 8-quart saucepan. Add the beans and blanch for 5 minutes.', 'While beans are cooking, ready a large bowl full ice and water. Drain beans and plunge into the ice bath to stop the cooking.', 'Drain and set aside.', 'Melt butter in a 12-inch cast iron skillet over medium-high heat. Add the mushrooms, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms begin to release some of their liquid, approximately 4 to 5 minutes. Add garlic and nutmeg and continue to cook for 2 minutes. Sprinkle the flour over the mixture, cook 1 minute then add broth and simmer for 1-2 minutes. Decrease heat to medium-low and add the half and half. Cook until the mixture thickens, stirring occasionally, for approximately 6 to 8 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and stir in ½ cup of the onions and the green beans.', 'Sprinkle the remaining onions over the top. Place in the oven preheated to 400°and bake until bubbly- about 15 minutes.', 'Make Ahead: If you are making this dish ahead of time, follow instructions thru step 5. Transfer to a 9” x 9” baking dish, let cool a bit, then cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days. When ready to bake, remove cover, sprinkle with the remaining onions and place in an oven preheated to 350° for 20 minutes or until bubbly and heated through.']

ingredients: ['5 pounds Jewel or Garnet Yams, halved lengthwise', 'Kosher salt, to taste', '6 tablespoons New Seasons Partner Brand coconut milk (or melted butter)', '4 tablespoons fresh grated gingerroot', 'fresh ground pepper, to taste', '6 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1/2 cup chopped cilantro']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Prick yam skins with a fork and place cut side down on two foil-lined rimmed baking sheets. Roast yams, rotating sheets halfway through, until very tender when squeezed, 50-80 minutes. Let cool on sheets.', 'Peel and discard skin from yams and place flesh in a large bowl. Smash yams with a potato masher or large fork. Add coconut cream (or butter), 2 teaspoons of Kosher salt, grated gingerroot, lime juice and 6 turns of pepper to the yams. Stir to combine, taste and adjust seasoning.', 'If eating immediately, place in a saucepan and gently reheat on the stovetop, stirring constantly as to prevent scorching the yams. Serve and garnish with cilantro.', 'May be made up to 3 days ahead and refrigerated in a covered 8 x 8 (2 quart) baking dish. Reheat in a 350° oven for 20 to 30 minutes and garnish with chopped cilantro.']

recipe_name: Oregon Salad with Pears and Hazelnuts
ingredients: ['4-5 ounces mixed Spring greens or Arugula', '1/4 to 1/3 cup New Seasons Partner Brand Red Wine Vinegar & Shallot Dressing', '1 whole ripe Bartlett or Concorde pear, cored and diced, divided', '1/2 cup Albina City Sweet and Salty Hazlenuts, roughly chopped, divided', '2 ounces Rogue Oregon Blue Cheese or fresh goat cheese, crumbled', 'fresh ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Place greens in a large salad bowl with half of the diced pears and half of the hazelnuts.', 'Drizzle with ¼ cup dressing and gently toss greens. May need to add more dressing to evenly coat the greens.', 'Divide on four salad plates and garnish each with remaining pears, hazelnuts and crumbled cheese.', 'Finish with freshly ground pepper.']

ingredients: ["6 tablespoons New Season's Market salted butter, divided use", '1 medium onion, diced', '1 1/2 tablespoons Madras curry powder, divided', '2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and diced', '2/3 cup apple juice or cider', '1/2 cup dried currants', '8 1" slices butternut squash discs, cut from 2 peeled butternut squash', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter. Add onion and sauté until tender; about 10-12 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon curry powder; cook for an additional minute, stirring constantly. Add apples, juice and currants; continue to cook until liquid evaporates. Season to taste with salt and pepper; remove from heat.', 'Preheat oven to 350° F. In a small skillet over medium heat, melt remaining 5 tablespoons butter. Add remaining ½ tablespoon curry powder and cook for 1 minute; remove from heat.', 'Lightly brush a rimmed baking sheet with some of the curry butter. Arrange squash discs in a single layer on buttered baking sheet. Sprinkle discs with salt and pepper. Divide apple filling evenly on tops of discs. Drizzle remaining curry butter over discs. Cover loosely with foil and bake until squash is tender; about 40-45 minutes.', 'Using a spatula, transfer discs to serving platter.']

recipe_name: Stuffing with Butternut Squash and Leeks
ingredients: ['16 cups cubed bread', '2 medium leeks, thinly sliced and soaked in water, drained', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided use', '1/2 cup dry white wine', '4 cups roasted butternut squash', '2 tablespoons each, salt and black pepper', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme leaves', '1 quart vegetable stock', '2 cups shredded Gruyere cheese, if desired']
directions: ['Place cubed bread on baking trays to dry out for a few hours or overnight. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat until hot. Sauté leeks until softened, stirring ocassionally. Add white wine and cook until wine evaporates; remove from heat.', 'In a large bowl combine bread, leeks, butternut squash, salt, pepper and thyme. Pour ½ of stock over bowl and mix to combine. Continue to add stock until desired consistency is reached.', 'Preheat oven to 350° F. Oil a 9x13-inch baking dish with the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil. Add the stuffing to the prepared baking dish, top with shredded gruyere cheese, if using, and bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until top is starting to brown.']

ingredients: ['1 pint whipping cream', '1/2 cup sugar, divided use', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups cranberried', '1/2 cup chopped toasted walnuts', '1 cup miniature marshmallows']
directions: ['Whip cream until stiff peaks form, mix in ¼ cup sugar and vanilla extract; set aside.', 'In a food processor fitted with blade, place cranberries and pulse until in small chunks. Add 2 tablespoons sugar and pulse 2 more times to combine.', 'Fold cranberries, walnuts and marshmallows into whipped cream. Taste and add more sugar to taste if desired. Chill until serving time.']

ingredients: ['3 large celery stalks, sliced see-through thin (reserve any celery leaves)', '4 pink pearl apples, cored with skin-on, cut into sixths, and then thinly sliced*', '4 handfuls arugula or mâche salad greens', '1/3 cup toasted hazelnuts, walnuts, almonds, or pine nuts', '2 ounces Pecorino Romano cheese, shaved into thin slices', '1/4 teaspoon fine grain sea salt', '12 rosemary leaves, minced', '1 medium garlic clove, peeled', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 cup crème fraîche', '2 1/2 teaspoons white wine vinegar', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['To make the dressing, crush the sea salt, rosemary, garlic, and sugar into a paste with a mortar and pestle (or smash it all together with a knife); work in the crème fraîche and vinegar, taste and adjust with a bit of pepper and more salt if needed.', 'Combine the celery, apples, salad greens, and most of the nuts in a large serving bowl with half of the dressing. Toss well, adding more dressing until it is to your liking. Finish with the remaining nuts, and any torn celery leaves.', 'adapted from Heidi Swanson’s 101cookbooks.com', '*Pink Pearls have a very short season, if you’ve missed it—try swapping in other heirloom apple varieties. 2 large, crisp apples should do the trick.']

recipe_name: Apple-Cranberry Crisp with Polenta Streusel Topping
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon aniseed', '1 /12 cups pastry flour', '3/4 cup polenta (coarse cornmeal)', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 cup chilled unsalted butter, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '1 large egg, beaten', '2 cups fresh cranberries', '1/3 cup granulated sugar', '1/2 cup (packed) golden brown sugar', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 pounds tart, crisp apples (we like Grannysmith, Pink Lady, or Braeburn)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice']
directions: ['To make streusel topping, toast aniseed in a small skillet over medium heat until slightly darker in color, about 3 minutes. Place seeds in processor. Add next 5 ingredients; blend 5 seconds. Add butter; pulse blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Transfer mixture to large bowl. Drizzle egg over and stir until ingredients are evenly moistened.', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Combine first 8 ingredients in large bowl; stir to combine. Add apples and lemon juice; toss to blend. Transfer filling to a shallow 2-quart baking dish. Crumble topping finely over filling.', 'Bake crisp until apples are tender, juices bubble thickly, and topping is crisp and golden, about 1 hour. Cool 15 minutes. Serve warm, with vanilla ice cream or freshly whipped cream.', '*Adapted from Bon Appetit']

ingredients: ['2 small bulbs fennel, thinly sliced', '1 medium yellow onions, sliced', '2 tablespoons New Seasons Market olive oil', '1 tablespoon New Seasons Market unsalted butter', '2 pounds Russet potatoes, thinly sliced', '2 cups heavy cream', '2 1/2 cups Gruyere cheese, grated', '1 teaspoon, each salt and black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat an oven to 350º. Butter a 9”x9” baking dish.', 'In a medium skillet over medium heat, sauté fennel and onion in butter and olive oil until tender. In a mixing bowl, combine heavy cream, 2 cups of cheese and potato slices. Add onion mixture, salt and pepper. Pour into baking dish and smooth the top. Top with remaining cheese and bake 1 1/2 hours, or until the potatoes are tender and the top is brown and bubbly.', 'Allow to rest at least ten minutes before serving.']

recipe_name: New Seasons Market Kale & Carrot Salad
ingredients: ['1 large bunch curly kale, stems removed, leaves thinly sliced', '3/4 cup grated or shredded carrots', '1/3 cup roasted, salted sunflower seeds', '1/4 cup mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon tamari', '1 1/2 tablespoon rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt, to taste']
directions: ['In a large salad bowl combine carrots, kale, and sunflower seeds. In a small bowl whisk together dressing ingredients.', 'Pour over kale mixture; toss well to combine. Add salt to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 cans whole peeled San Marzano tomatoes', '2 sticks butter', '1 yellow onion, peeled and halved', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['In a saucepan over medium heat, combine tomatoes, butter, oregano, basil, and onion halves. Break up larger tomato chunks with a wooden spoon.', 'Cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture forms a thick sauce, 2-3 hours. Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Remove onions halves before serving.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1/2 cup sour cream', '1 cup Grana Padano cheese, grated', '1 can artichoke hearts, drained and roughly chopped', '1/2 cup minced red onion', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt & black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400ºF. In a medium-sized mixing bowl mix together mayonnaise, sour cream, Grana Padano cheese and onion. Add artichoke hearts, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Transfer mixture to shallow baking dish. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until light brown on top.']

ingredients: ['1 bag New Seasons Market stuffing mix', '1 pound chanterelle mushrooms, chopped', '1/3 pound pancetta, diced small', '10 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, chopped', '1/4 cup minced shallots', '1/3 cup white wine', '4 pears, diced', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves', '1/4 cup minced chives', '1/3 cup chopped flat leaf parsley', '2 cups turkey stock', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 ºF.', 'In a large skillet over medium heat, cook pancetta for about 7 minutes.', 'Remove pancetta to large mixing bowl but keep fat in skillet. Add 2 tablespoons of butter to pan and turn heat to medium-high. Add onion and shallots, season with salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally until just soft, 5-7 minutes.', 'Remove to mixing bowl. Add 3 tablespoons of butter to pan. Add mushrooms and quickly sauté until starting to brown. Add wine to pan and deglaze over medium heat until reduced by half.', 'Remove wine and mushrooms to mixing bowl with pancetta. Wipe out pan and add remaining butter. Add pears and sugar. Sauté pears over medium high heat until they begin to brown slightly. Add pears to mixing bowl and stir in bread, herbs and 1 cup of stock. Toss lightly to combine. Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Put mixture into 9”x13” baking dish, add additional cup of stock and cover with foil. Bake in preheated oven, 30-35 minutes. Remove foil and continue to bake 10 minutes until lightly browned on top. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['4 large garnet or jewel yams, scrubbed and split', '¼ cup crème fraîche or 2 tablespoons coconut butter', 'Sea salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Place split yams face-down in glass baking dish containing one inch of water. Cover dish and bake yams at 350 F for 75 minutes.', 'When cool enough to handle, remove skins from yams. This will make texture creamy when mashing.', 'Mash or whip yams with crème fraîche or coconut butter. Add sea salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups quinoa, rinsed and drained', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 cup beets, peeled and grated', '1/2 cup finely chopped parsley', '1/2 cup chopped scallions', '2 1/2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '3 cups baby salad greens', '1 medium carrot, julienned']
directions: ['Place quinoa and 2 1/4 cups water and salt in a sauce pan, bring to boil. Turn down to low heat, cover. Simmer until done, about 15 minutes. Remove, fluff up quinoa.', 'Stir in beets, until all the grains turn scarlet. Stir in parsley, scallions, olive oil and lemon juice. Serve on a bed of salad greens, surrounded with carrot sticks. This may be served warm, room temperature or chilled. Additional lemon juice and sea salt may be added if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 cup quinoa, rinsed', 'course ground salt and pepper', '3 tablespoons walnut oil', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoons minced shallot', '1/2 lb cherries, halved and pitted', '1/2 cup coarsley chopped walnuts, toasted', '1/2 cup chopped fresh herbs, such as tarragon, parlsey and/ or chives', '* Optional additions: crumbled feta cheese']
directions: ['In a medium saucepan with a lid, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Stir in quinoa and 1/4 tsp salt. Boil and stir occasionally until quinoa starts to sprout. Test for doneness, it will be tender. Remove from heat and drain in a sieve. Cool to room temperature. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, whisk together oil, lemon juice, and shallot; season with salt and pepper. Pour dressing on warm quinoa. Add cherries, herbs and walnuts and toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Optional: Crumbled feta cheese. Serve.']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons mustard seeds', '2 teaspoons coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon cardamom seeds', '1 cup vinegar', '1 1/2 cup packed brown sugar', '1 medium yellow onion, peeld and thinly sliced', '1/3 cup peeled and grated ginger', '3 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '4 lbs plums, pitted and quartered', '1 1/2 cups golden raisins', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes']
directions: ['Add mustard, coriander, and cardamom seeds to a skillet and toast, stirring frequently, until they pop, about 6-8 minutes. In a non-reactive pan on medium heat, add vinegar and brown sugar and allow sugar to dissolve. Add onions, ginger, and garlic and sauté for 10 minutes. Add plums, raisins, salt, pepper flakes, and toasted seeds and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 45-50 minutes, stirring consistently to prevent scorching. Allow to cool and place in a non reactive container with a lid.']

ingredients: ['1 sweet onion, diced', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '2 limes, juiced', '6 apricots, cubed', '1 large jalapeno, chopped fine', '1 cup cherries, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, taste and adjust for seasoning. Fruit salsas are a great accompaniment to grilled meat or fish. You can mix and match the fruit and herbs to create a multitude of combinations.']

ingredients: ['1 cup Medjool dates, pitted (about 8)', 'Just enough hot water to cover dates', '1/2 cup New Seasons Market Cashew Butter', '1/4 cup grade B maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['In a small bowl, pour hot water over pitted dates just to cover. Let soak 20 minutes. Drain and reserve the date soaking water. In a blender combine cashew butter, drained dates, maple syrup, vanilla and salt. Blend until very smooth, scraping down sides as needed and adding only enough of the reserved date soaking water to allow the mixture to be blended.', 'Serve with sliced apples, as a spread on bread, as an icing for cake or cupcakes']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup sesame oil', '1/4 cup toasted sesame oil', '1/2 cup rice wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon peeled & minced ginger', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon tahini', 'Hot chili paste or sriracha (optional) to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.', 'Finely slice a head of cabbage, add a cup of shredded carrots, and toss with the dressing for a crunchy salad that will last a few days in the fridge even after it’s been tossed.']

ingredients: ['4 large beets', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 fennel bulb cored and thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Scrub beets to remove any dirt or soil. Cut each beet in half and then each half into 4 wedges. Place in a saucepan fit with a steamer basket and enough water to almost reach the base of the steamer basket. Cover with a lid, bring to a boil then reduce to a simmer to steam the beets. Cook for 10-15 minutes or until tender. Remove from the pan and chill in an ice bath or under some running cold water. Drain and place into a bowl with the minced garlic, thinly sliced fennel bulb, olive oil and vinegar, and salt and pepper. Mix to combine. Chill for several hours before serving.']

ingredients: ['6 ears corn, sliced off cob', '1 medium red onion, diced', '1 pint blueberries', '1/4 cup fresh lime juice', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced & packed basil leaves', 'salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Steam the corn with water in a large saucepan over medium heat, covered, until bright yellow, about 4 minutes. Remove the lid and continue to cook the corn, stirring frequently, until the water evaporates, about 3 minutes longer. Transfer the corn to a large bowl and let cool slightly. Mix in red onion, blueberries, lime juice and olive oil. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover bowl and refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours. Remove the salad from the refrigerator and fold in basil. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 medium yellow onion, chopped', '1 bunch collard, thinly sliced', '2-3 tablespoons avocado oil', '1/4 cup water', '1/2 cup full fat coconut milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat oil in a 9 inch skillet over medium heat, add onions and saute until they just begin to turn translucent, about five minutes.', 'Trim the bottom inch from the collards, then cut into thin strips by rolling 4-5 leaves into a tight bundle and cut crosswise into 1/4-1/2 inch strips (it’s not necessary to remove the stalk). Add greens to the onions, add the water and cover, reduce heat to low, and cook for 30-40 minutes. Add the coconut milk and turmeric, stir to combine, increase heat to medium, and cook for about 10 minutes or until the mixture has thickened.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups raw cashews, soaked, rinsed and drained', '1 teaspoon apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '3 tablespoons unsweetened nut milk', '1/2-1 tablespoon unrefined coconut oil', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Add water until desired consistency is reached, if necessary. Dress this vegan cream cheese up with optional flavors.', 'Optional cream vegan cream cheese flavors include:', 'Strawberry, lemon zest and dill, garlic and chive, pumpkin, olive, garden vegetable']

ingredients: ['1 medium sweet potato, baked and skin removed', '2 eggs from pastured hens', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice', 'Ghee or coconut oil for cooking', 'Pasture butter or coconut butter as topping']
directions: ['Beat eggs in a bowl. Stir in sweet potato flesh, salt, spices and vanilla, and mix thoroughly. (May combine ingredients in a blender if desired.) Heat a skillet over low-medium heat, and grease with ghee or coconut oil. Once skillet is warm, pour or scoop a few tablespoons of batter onto pan. Allow to cook 3-5 minutes or until golden brown and set. Flip and cook another few minutes until cooked through and lightly browned. Top with pasture butter or softened coconut butter.', 'For a savory twist, omit the cinnamon/pumpkin spice and use pepper and curry seasoning instead of, or in addition to, salt. Stir in chopped spinach and sautéed onions for more flavor and texture.']

ingredients: ['4 cups water (or a combo of water, broth and milk)', '1 cup polenta', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '3 tablespoons butter', 'freshly ground pepper', 'optional:', '1/2 cup cheese', '1/4 cup chopped fresh herbs']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Add water or liquids to an 8 x 8 ovenproof baking dish. Stir in polenta and salt. Place in preheated oven and bake 40 minutes.', 'Remove and stir in butter and pepper. Return to oven and bake an additional 15 minutes. Remove from oven and stir in optional ingredients.', 'Polenta is delicious topped with sautéed greens and crumbled cheese for a simple vegetarian meal. Toasted nuts and herbs are also great additions. When cooled, polenta can be cut in to slices or squares and reheated for use later.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup yogurt', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 clove minced garlic', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons chopped dill', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine yogurt, lemon juice and garlic in a bowl. Mix well and slowly incorporate olive oil. Fold in dill, salt and pepper.', 'Use as salad dressing or dip. Pairs great with fish or cucumbers.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup toasted almonds', '1 lb asparagus', '1/2 cup packed fresh basil leaves', '2 cloves garlic', '2/3 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '3/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Remove woody portion of stem from asparagus and cut into 2-inch sections.', 'Combine the asparagus, basil, garlic, almonds and cheese in a food processor and pulse a few times to coarsely chop. Careful not to over process!', 'With the motor running, slowly pour in the oil and process until emulsified. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', 'Try on crostini, crackers, sandwiches, pasta, pizza, eggs and anything else your heart desires!']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground turkey, cooked', '1 15oz can of low sodium white beans, including liquid', '2 cups chicken broth', '1/4 cup tomatillo salsa', 'White pepper and sea salt to taste', '1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro', '1/2 cup sour cream']
directions: ['Throw everything in a pot and let simmer for 30-45 minutes before serving. Great with tortilla chips or cornbread.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon gluten-free mustard', '1 tablespoon raw honey or maple syrup', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons celery seed', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 small head green cabbage, finely shredded', '1 large carrot, grated', '1 cup shredded vegetables of choice (such as snap peas, radishes, broccoli, etc.)']
directions: ['Whisk together dressing ingredients (vinegar, mustard, honey or maple syrup, olive oil, celery seed, and salt and pepper) in a bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste. Toss with cabbage and other veggies.']

ingredients: ['2 cups coarsely grated sweet potato or yam', '4 tablespoons ghee, divided', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped cauliflower', '1-2 cups chopped kale', '2-3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 eggs', 'Additional salt and pepper', '1/3 cup crumbled goat cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F and melt 2 tablespoons of ghee to be mixed with potato shreds. Squeeze sweet potato shreds with a paper towel or in cheesecloth to press out excess liquid. Add potato shreds to a 10″ pie pan with ghee, salt, and pepper, stir to combine, then press into the bottom of pan and up sides to form a crust. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes begin to brown on the surface and edges.', 'While crust bakes, sauté shallot in remaining 2 tablespoons of ghee until translucent. Add cauliflower, sauté until cauliflower is tender, 4-5 minutes. Covering pan will help soften cauliflower more quickly. Add garlic and kale, and sauté one more minute. Remove pie pan from oven and decrease oven temp to 350°F.', 'Distribute cooked veggies evenly over potato crust. Whisk together eggs, and a few shakes of salt and pepper, then pour over veggies. Add cheese and bake 25-30 minutes, or until eggs are set. Allow to cool 10 minutes prior to slicing.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons gluten-free mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon celery seed', 'Sea salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 can of your favorite sardines', '1/3 cup finely chopped onion', '1/2 celery stalk, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons horseradish mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 generous squeeze of fresh lemon juice (about 1 teaspoon)', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 pinch lemon pepper']
directions: ['Drain sardines, place in a bowl, and chop into chunks with a fork. Add celery and onion to sardines and stir. In a separate bowl, blend horseradish mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, sea salt and lemon pepper. Combine dressing with sardine mixture and serve.']

ingredients: ['1 stick stick unsalted butter, melted', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 ripe pineapple, skin removed and cut into rounds, use knife to remove core']
directions: ['Prepare grill for medium-high, direct heat. Combine butter, cinnamon, sugar and cloves in a small bowl. Dip pineapple rounds in butter mixture, shake off excess and place directly on the grill, 4-6 minutes per side or until sizzling and brown.']

ingredients: ['1 package New Seasons Market pizza dough', 'olive oil', 'The following ingredients are divided between the pizzas-', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 fresh basil leaves, torn in half, more if desired', '8 oz fresh mozzarella, sliced into ¼” rounds', '2 large ripe tomatoes, cored and diced', '3 oz grated Parmesan Reggiano', 'salt and black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat grill for medium heat and oil the grill grate well.', 'Using a generous amount of olive oil, grease a baking sheet. Lay out pizza dough and use your hands to pull it out, making a larger, flatter shape. Allow to rest 30 minutes. Break shape into 2 equal pieces and stretch each into a 10” x 7” rectangle. You may need additional olive oil for your hands as you want to keep the dough well oiled.', 'Carefully place 1 dough at a time on the grill. After about 1-2 minutes, the bottom should get crisp and dark. Turn over and as quickly as possible, brush with olive oil, sprinkle with garlic and lay out mozzarella, basil leaves and diced tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and continue to cook 2-4 additional minutes. Cheese will start to melt. Remove pizza to a plate and sprinkle with Parmesan, salt and pepper to taste.', 'Repeat with second dough. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['8 thin slices of prosciutto', '1 cantaloupe melon, peeled, seeded and sliced into 8 wedges', 'Toothpicks', 'Oil for grill grate- your choice, olive, coconut']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high. Wrap 1 piece of prosciutto around each piece of melon in a spiral shape so that you cover as much of the melon as possible. If necessary, use toothpicks to secure. Oil grill grate and grill each slice 3-4 minutes per side, prosciutto will crisp and turn slightly darker. Serve warm.']

recipe_name: Grilled Corn with Chipotle Lime Compound Butter
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened', '1 teaspoon chipotle chile in adobo sauce, minced', '1 teaspoon adobo sauce from chiles', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoons grated lime zest', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped cilantro', '1/2 teaspoon coarse salt', '3 tablespoons lime juice (add in two steps)', '4 ears of corn', 'Chipotle Lime Compound Butter', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Compound butter:', 'Using a food processor, combine all ingredients, adding lime juice in 2 additions, allowing it to incorporate before adding more.', 'Grilling the corn:', 'Preheat grill to high. Peel back the husk on the corn so that the kernels are exposed and you are able to use the husk as a handle. Remove the silk. Brush with compound butter and grill over high heat 8-10 minutes or until brown and starting to pop.']

ingredients: ['1 lb asparagus, trimmed', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', 'kosher salt to taste', '3 tablespoons shredded Parmesan Reggiano cheese']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high. In a bowl, drizzle oil over asparagus coating evenly. Grill for 2 to 3 minutes on each side. Plate asparagus and drizzle with lemon juice. Lightly salt and top with Parmesan Reggiano.']

ingredients: ['1 cup mayo', '2 teaspoons dijon mustard', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon celery seed', '1 tablespoon sugar or honey', '1/4 cup apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon white vinegar']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.', 'Finely slice a head of cabbage, add a cup of shredded carrots, and toss with dressing for a crunchy salad that will last a few days in the fridge even after it’s been tossed.']

ingredients: ['2 fresh limes, juiced', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '1 head Napa cabbage, thinly sliced', '1 carrot, grated', '1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '4-6 green onions, chopped', '2 tablespoons grated ginger', '3 tablespoons chopped cilantro', '3/4 cup peanut butter', '2 tablespoons raw local honey', '3-4 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '1 dash crushed chili pepper', '3 cloves garlic', '3/4 cup coconut milk']
directions: ['Mix all dressing ingredients thoroughly. Toss all vegetables in a large bowl. Coat veggies with lime dressing.', 'Meanwhile, combine all peanut sauce ingredients in a food processor or blender and blend until thoroughly mixed. Pour one cup of peanut sauce over dressed vegetables; plate and garnish with peanuts and additional chili if desired.']

ingredients: ['2 cups pinto beans (rinsed 3 times and sorted)', '8 cups water', '1-2 tablespoons sea salt']
directions: ['In a large pot, bring beans and water to a boil. Cover and reduce to simmer for 4 hours. Add 1 tablespoon sea salt, mash with potato masher (3-4 mashes to thicken liquid but keep most beans whole) and simmer another 30 minutes uncovered. Add more salt to taste if needed.']

ingredients: ['2 medium zucchini']
directions: ['After trimming ends of zucchini, shave zucchini lengthwise using a vegetable peeler, making long wide noodles. Once you have made all the noodles, cook them in a skillet with a tablespoon of water over medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes or until noodles soften. Serve with your favorite pasta sauce.']

ingredients: ['1 (16oz) jar creamy or crunchy peanut butter', '1 (16 oz) container container ricotta cheese']
directions: ['Combine peanut butter and ricotta in a bowl and mix until smooth and blended. Serve as a dip with your favorite cracker, pita, or crudité or use as a protein packed sandwich spread with veggies, tempeh, or grilled chicken.']

ingredients: ['20 large raw prawns, peeled and deveined', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 tart apple, cored and sliced thinly', '20 thin slices of bacon', '1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '2 lemons, cut into wedges', '1/4 cup fresh parsley, finely chopped', 'Extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling']
directions: ['Lightly season prawns with salt and pepper. Place a slice of apple on each prawn and wrap completely with bacon. In a large pan, melt ghee or coconut oil over medium heat. Arrange prawns on their sides in pan and cook for several minutes. Do not turn over until bacon is fully cooked and prawns become slightly crispy. Turn over and cook the other side until crispy. Remove from pan to serving tray. Garnish with lemon wedges, parsley and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast', '1 teaspoon minced ginger', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper', '3 tablespoons Riverwave My Thai Sauce', '1 cup seasoned rice wine vinegar', '1/2 lb mixed greens', '1/3 cup basil, thai basil if available', '1 medium canteloupe, 1" cubes', '1 medium onion, cut in half and sliced thin', '1/2 cup packed mint leaves', '2 limes, cut into quarters', '2/3 cup roasted peanuts, salted or plain']
directions: ['Preparing the chicken:', 'In a bowl or plastic bag, combine the chicken, ginger, garlic, salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or over night.', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Remove chicken from the marinade and place on cookie sheet. Bake 15-20 min until done. Can grill or prepare in pan on stovetop alternatively. Allow chicken to cook and then cut into strips or cubes.', 'The dressing:', 'Mix the My Thai Sauce and seasoned rice wine vinegar together and shake well.', 'The salad:', 'Place greens in bowl. Cut the basil into thin strips and add to greens along with the cubed cantaloupe, sliced onion and cooked chicken. Add enough dressing so the greens glisten. Serve on plates and top with nuts and mint cut into very thin strips. Squeeze lime wedges over the top.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari or coconut aminos', '2 teaspoons peanut or sesame oil', '1/2 cup almond, cashew or peanut butter', '2 teaspoons vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '1-2 cloves garlic', '1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)', '2/3 cup water']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor with water and mix until smooth. Add more water if a thinner consistency is desired. Serve over steamed veggies.']

ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 3/4 cups whole pitted olives (Kalamata, black or green)', '1 anchovy fillet', '2 tablespoons capers', '1 teaspooon chopped fresh thyme or 1/4 tsp dried thyme leaves', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '6 olive oil', 'Optional: red pepper flakes to taste for a spicy version']
directions: ['Combine garlic, olives, anchovies, capers, thyme, and lemon juice in the bowl of a food processor or in a blender. Slowly add the olive oil while the machine is running. Blend until a paste has formed or alternatively pulse several times to achieve a chunky and coarse tapenade. Add red pepper flakes, if using.', 'Use as a sandwich spread, as a dip with crackers or bread, toss with hot pasta for a quick meal, toss with hot rice for a quick and different side dish, use as a condiment with grilled chicken or fish.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup quinoa, rinsed and drained', '1 pinch sea salt', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup lime juice', '3 cloves garlic, pressed', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper', '1 1/2 cup cooked black beans, rinsed', '1 cup corn, steamed and cooled', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '1/2 cup chopped cilantro']
directions: ['Boil water in small sauce pan, slowly add quinoa, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until all water is absorbed. Remove quinoa from heat and set aside to cool. Meanwhile, whisk dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Combine all black beans, cooled steamed corn, diced pepper, and chopped cilantro. When quinoa is cool, fold it in with the rest of salad and dressing.']

ingredients: ['3 ears fresh corn, shucked', '1 cup chopped tomatoes or cherry tomatoes cut in half', '1/2 cup fresh mozzarella balls', '1/3-34 cup basil pesto', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cut kernels from fresh corn into a medium sized bowl. Add tomatoes and mozzarella balls and stir to combine. Toss with pesto, add salt and pepper to taste and add more pesto if desired.']

recipe_name: Chicken Basil and Feta Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['1 lb penne pasta', '1-2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 lb New Seasons Market Chicken Basil Sausages (4)', '2 roasted red pepper, chopped', '1 (14-15 oz) can artichoke bottoms, drained and chopped', '1/2 cup chopped Kalamata olives', '1/2 medium red onion, finely chopped', '1/2 cup chopped Italian flat leaf parsley', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 (8 oz) bottle vinaigrette or 1 cup homemade', '1/2 cup crumbled feta', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cook pasta according to package directions, drain. Toss with olive oil and spread out on baking sheet to cool slightly. Set aside to cool. Grill sausages or cook on stove until done. Set aside to cool and then cut into 10-12 slices each. Combine cooled pasta, cooled cooked sausage, red peppers, artichoke bottoms, olives, onion, parsley, tomatoes, feta and salad dressing in large bowl. Toss to mix evenly. Add salt and pepper to taste. May be served at room temperature or cold.']

ingredients: ['6 cups spinach', '1 1/2 cups fresh blueberries', '1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese', '1/2 cup chopped Valencia almonds', 'Optional boneless, skinless chicken breast, cooked', 'Toss with your fave dressing']
directions: ['In salad bowl, toss greens, blueberries, feta, almonds and chicken. Mix in dressing to taste. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 lb orzo', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/4 cup red wine vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 cup feta cheese, crumbled', '2 red bell peppers, seeded and diced', '1 cucumber, diced', '1 cup Kalamtata olives, pitted and chopped', '2 Roma tomatoes, diced', '1 small red onion, diced']
directions: ['Cook orzo according to manufacturers’ directions. Drain well and toss with olive oil and oregano. Refrigerate overnight or at least 2 hours until orzo is chilled. In a large bowl, toss chilled orzo with vinegar, salt, pepper, feta cheese, bell peppers, cucumber, olives, tomatoes and red onion. Taste and add additional salt and/or pepper, if desired.']

ingredients: ['1/2 tablespoon olive oil, plus more for brushing grill', '2 jalapeno chiles', '3-3 1/2 cups blueberries', '1/2 small red onion, finely chopped', '3 1/2 tablespoons fresh squeezed lime juice', '1/4 teaspoon kosher sea salt', '1/2 cup loosley packed basil leaves, plus whole leaves for garnish', '1/2 cup loosley packed cilantro leaves , plus whole leaves for garnish']
directions: ['Heat grill to medium-high; lightly oil it. Grill jalapenos until slightly charred and blistered, turning frequently, about 15 minutes. Using a paper towel, pull off stems and remove skins from chiles. Roughly chop flesh and seeds; set aside. Place 2 cups blueberries in a food processor; pulse until coarsely chopped, about five times. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add onion, jalapenos, lime juice, and 1/4 teaspoon salt; stir to combine. Add basil, cilantro, remaining blueberries, and oil; stir to combine. Try with grilled chicken.']

ingredients: ['1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves', '1 cup fresh cilantro leaves', '2 garlic cloves', '1/4 cup fresh oregano leaves', '1/2 teaspoon grated lime zest', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '2-3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes']
directions: ['Combine parsley, cilantro, garlic and oregano in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Add lime zest, lime juice, olive oil, salt and red pepper flakes to herb mixture; process until herbs are very finely chopped and mixture is well combined.', 'Try this classic Argentinean meat condiment with: grilled steak, chicken or fish; roasted leg of lamb, roasted new potatoes, fingerling potatoes or baby carrots; grilled bread, on sandwiches as a spread or dipping sauce, or on raw oysters on the half shell.', 'adapted from Cooking Light, April 2012']

ingredients: ['2 cups cooked basmati or jasmine rice', 'juice of one lemon', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup each finely chopped: parsley, mint, basil and or cilantro', '1/4 cup green onion, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['When rice is cooled down, combine with lemon juice, olive oil, herbs and onions. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve at room temperature or cold. Great additions would be Garbanzo beans, feta cheese or bay shrimp. This is a versatile salad and great side with seafood or grilled meat.']

ingredients: ['2 celery roots, trimmed and cubed', '4 tablespoons pasture butter or extra virgin olive oil', '1-2 garlic cloves, roasted', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Steam the cubed celery root until tender, approximately 15-20 minutes. Drain and place in food processor. Add butter or olive oil, garlic, turmeric, sea salt and pepper. Puree until mixture is smooth and creamy.']

ingredients: ['1 bunch kale, stemmed and finely chopped*', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1/3 cup toasted nuts, such as almonds, pistachios, or walnuts', '1/4 cup unsweetened dried cherries or apple juice sweetened dried cranberries', '1/2 cup pitted kalamata olives, chopped', '1 tablespoon hempseeds']
directions: ['Place the kale in a large bowl, add lemon juice, lemon zest, olive oil, garlic, and salt. Wash hands, then massage mixture until kale is softened, about 1 minute. Add nuts, dried fruit, olives, and hempseeds. Toss to combine ingredients. Rather than serving immediately, let salad rest for 15-20 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.']

ingredients: ['2 cups pure pineapple juice', '2 limes, juiced', '1 tablespoon honey', '1/4 cup plum vinegar', '3 tablespoons mint, finely chopped', '2 cups cubed pineapple', '4 cups seasonal melon, cut into cubes or balls']
directions: ['In a sauce pan, mix pineapple juice, lime juice, honey, and vinegar. Bring to a boil and reduce for about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Add chopped mint. Transfer fruit to a large bowl. Pour reduced glaze over fruit and stir to coat.']

ingredients: ['8 ears corn in husks', '1/3 cup butter, cubed', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1/4 teaspoon kosher salt', '1/3 cup Parmigiano Reggiano, grated', '3/4 tsp black pepper, ground']
directions: ['Preheat a grill on medium heat.', 'Soak the corn in cold water for 20 minutes.', 'While the corn is soaking, combine the butter, garlic and salt in a small saucepan. Melt over low heat, stirring often. Remove from the heat and reserve 3 Tbsp of the butter mixture.', 'Carefully pull back the corn husks to about 1 inch form the base. Remove the silk. Brush each ear with the butter mixture from the saucepan. Re-wrap the corn with the husks and tie with kitchen string.', 'Grill the corn, covered for 25-30 minutes until tender, turning occasionally.', 'Mix together the cheese and pepper.', 'Cut the string on each ear of corn and pull back the husks. Brush with the reserved butter and roll each ear in the cheese and pepper mixture to coat. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['4 oz. herbs or leafy greens', '3 oz. nuts or seeds, lightly toasted', '1/4 cup parmesan, grated', '2 cloves garlic', '1/4 to 1/2 cup olive oil', 'Coarse salt']
directions: ['Combine nuts and garlic in food processor and pulse until finely ground.', 'Roughly chop basil, then add to processor and pulse for a few seconds.', 'While machine is running, drizzle in olive oil, and process until desired consistency is reached.', 'Mix in cheese and add salt to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 ears fresh corn, shucked and cut into 1/2 inch rings', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon neitral oil, such as safflower', '1 teaspoon minced fresh garlic', '1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger', '3 tablespoons mirin', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Prepare the corn rings and set aside in a medium bowl until ready to use. Heat a wide sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the butter and oil and swirl to coat the pan. Once the butter is hot, add the corn and stir-fry for 1 - 2 minutes, or until some bits of the corn are beginning to lightly brown. Add the garlic and ginger and continue to stir-fry for 1 - 2 more minutes or until fragrant. Next, carefully pour in the mirin and gently stir the mixture to coat the corn. Cover the pan for 1 minute to steam the corn lightly. Uncover and stir again, seasoning to taste with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['4 cups cubed butternut squash', '2 large shallots, peeled and cut into 1/4 inch slices', '3 tablespoons PLUS 2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper', '4 cups of your favorite New Seasons Market bakery bread, cubed', '1/4 cup dried cranberries', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 firm ripe pears, medium dice', '4 ounces gorgonzola cheese, crumbled']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Combine the cubed squash, sliced shallots, and 3 tablespoons olive oil on a baking sheet. Season generously with salt and pepper and toss to coat. Roast in the oven for about 25 minutes or until the squash is tender. While the squash roasts, use a serrated knife to cut the bread into ½-inch cubes. Spread the bread cubes onto a second baking sheet and toast lightly, 5-7 minutes total. Allow the squash to cool slightly and then transfer to a large bowl. Drizzle with the additional oil, vinegar, and maple syrup. Add the bread cubes, cranberries, pears, and half of the crumbled gorgonzola cheese. Toss the mixture together thoroughly to soften the bread and transfer to a large platter or bowl. Sprinkle the remaining gorgonzola cheese on top and serve.']

ingredients: ['1 Yam', 'Dried apricots (minced) + thinly sliced ham + mustard', 'Macadamia nut butter + hemp seeds', 'Cream cheese + pumpkin seeds + chives', 'Sauteed greens + soft-boiled egg', 'Mushrooms + ground spiced lamb', 'Karam garlic sauce + spiced lentils', 'Leftover chimichurri + brisket', 'Wilted winter greens + pesto', 'Sunflower seed butter + roasted apples', 'Chevre + fermented pickles', 'Buffalo sauce + bleu cheese', 'Spiralized zucchini + drizzle of olive oil + balsamic vinegar', 'Shaved Brussels sprouts + chopped roasted pecans', 'Coconut butter + a sprinkle of cinnamon']
directions: ['Thinly slice a yam lengthwise (1/2" thick). Toast these slices a few times in your toaster, or use the highest/longest setting on your convection oven, until completely heated through and soft to the touch. (Careful, yam toast will be hot!)', 'Top toasty yam slices with toppings of your choice.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs red or Yukon gold potatoes', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon or stoneground mustard', '1-2 tablespoons raw honey', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1/3 cup fresh parsley leaves, finely chopped', '1/4 cup finely chopped onion, green, red, or white - you pick!']
directions: ['Scrub potatoes, then cut into 1-inch cubes, leaving skin on. Boil or steam potatoes until tender, but not mushy. Drain off water and transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, mustard, honey, salt and pepper until well combined. Add dressing mixture, parsley and onion to cooked potatoes. Toss to combine. Season with additional salt and pepper, if needed. Place in refrigerator until well-chilled.']

ingredients: ['4 cups your favorite veggies, cut into evenly sized pieces', '4 tbsp olive oil', 'Salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F.', 'In a large bowl, combine veggies and olive oil. Stir well to coat. Season with salt and pepper.', "Arrange veggies on baking sheet in a single layer. Be sure to leave enough space between veggies—it's the key to achieving that nice golden crisp on the outside.", 'Roast in the preheated oven until tender on the inside and golden on the outside, about 30 minutes. Give them a little stir about halfway through.']

recipe_name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Squash with Dried Cranberries
ingredients: ['1 lb butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1” chunks', '1 lb Brussels sprouts, trimmed and sliced lengthwise in half', '½ cup dried cranberries (sweetened or unsweetened is fine)', '2 tsp Dijon mustard', '1 tbsp rice wine vinegar', '4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tsp salt', 'Freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 degrees.', 'In a large bowl, toss together Brussels sprouts, butternut squash chunks, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp salt, and pepper. Mix until vegetables are coated evenly.', 'Arrange veggies on a large baking sheet with Brussels sprouts facing cut side-down. Be sure to leave some space between everything so they can get nice and caramelized.', 'Roast for 20-30 minutes, tossing gently about halfway through, or until veggies are tender and caramelized/golden brown. During the last five minutes of roasting, scatter dried cranberries on baking sheet.', 'Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly.', 'In a small bowl, whisk together rice wine vinegar and Dijon. While whisking continuously, slowly pour in olive oil until emulsified. Season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Gently toss roasted veggies with vinaigrette in a serving bowl until lightly dressed. Serve warm, room temperature, or chilled.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into bite sized pieces', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 lb mushrooms, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'Generous pinch cayenne', '2 tablespoons flour', '3/4 cup vegetable broth', '1 tbsp dry sherry', '3/4 cup soy creamer', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 1/2 slices whole grain bread', '1 tablespoon earth balance buttery sticks', '1/2 tsp each sea salt and black pepper', '1 3 oz can fried onions']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425. Bring 2 quarts of water to boil in a large pot. Add salt and beans, cover and cook for 6 minutes. Drain and shock with cold water (to halt cooking). Set aside. In a large skillet over medium heat, heat olive oil. Add mushrooms, garlic, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Cook until mushrooms are very soft and release their juices, 6-8 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together flour, vegetable broth and sherry and add to mushrooms. Bring to a simmer, stirring until mixture thickens. Add creamer and continue to simmer, 5-6 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and stir in beans.', 'Topping: Pulse together bread, earth balance, salt, and pepper in a food processor until it resembles coarse crumbs.', 'Place green beans in an oiled 9”x13” baking dish and top with bread. Bake in preheated oven for 15 or until warmed through.']

ingredients: ['1 lb parsnip, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces', '3 medium baked potatoes', '1/2 cup sour cream', '4 tablespoon butter, softened', '1 teaspoon freshly grated ginger', 'Pinch nutmeg', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cook parsnips in boiling salted water for about 20 minutes or until tender. Drain and mash along with scooped put potato flesh. Add cream, butter and ginger. Mash until well blended. Season with salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 cups extra sharp cheddar, shredded', '1/2 cup melted butter (hot)', '1 cup flour', '1/2 tsp salt', '1/2 tsp black pepper', '1 cup sesame seeds']
directions: ['Pour hot butter over cheese. Mix well and add flour salt and pepper. Blend well. Form dough into teaspoon size balls and roll in sesame seeds. Chill for at least 1 hour. Bake on an un-greased baking sheet at 400 degrees for approximately 10-15 minutes. Serve hot! Can be reheated and refreshed.']

ingredients: ['24 Brussels sprouts, washed and sliced crosswise in 1/4" pieces', '1/2 cup Ghee', '2 cloves Garlic, minced', '1 Lemon', 'Salt & Pepper']
directions: ['In a medium skillet, heat ghee on medium high heat. Add Brussels sprouts and cook 10-15 minutes. Stir often, and cook until crispy and caramelized .\nTurn off heat and add garlic. Add salt and pepper and serve immediately with lemon wedges for squeezing over Brussels sprouts.', 'Enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 lb chanterelle mushrooms, chopped', '1/2 lb bacon, cut in 1" pieces', '1 loaf day old bread, cubed', '3 tbls butter', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1/3 cup fresh herb mixture: thyme, oregano, marjoram and sage', '1 cup celery', '2 small shallots, chopped', '3/4 cup chicken broth', 'sale & pepper']
directions: ['Sautee bacon pieces in frying pan on medium heat; add in mushrooms, garlic, her mix, celery and shallots when bacon is starting to get crispy. Cook down and set aside.', 'Melt butter and toss is with the bread chunks. Combine bread mushroom mixture and broth and place in a baking sheet.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes covered and an additional 15 minutes uncovered or until golden brown and fully cooked.']

recipe_name: Roasted Carrots with Maple Pistachio Carrot Top Pesto
ingredients: ['2 large bunches of carrots with fresh, green tops attached', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1/8 teaspoon kosher salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1/4 cup shelled pistachios', '1 large peeled garlic clove', '1 cup loosely packed carrot top leafy greens', 'zest of 1 lemon', '2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt', 'freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit with a rack in the center position.', 'Trim the stems from the carrots, leaving roughly ¼-inch stem attached. Rinse and scrub the carrots. Slice in half lengthwise.', 'Place the carrot halves on the sheet and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Distribute the carrots evenly across the sheet pan.', 'Roast the carrots, flipping them halfway through, until they are caramelized and just fork tender, roughly 18 to 24 minutes depending on the thickness of your carrots.', 'Rinse and dry the carrot top greens to remove any grit and dirt. Pulse the pistachios and garlic in the bowl of a food processor. Add the carrot stems, lemon juice, lemon zest, pinch of kosher salt, and freshly ground black pepper. Add the olive oil, maple syrup and two tablespoons warm water and process until mostly smooth. Season to taste with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.', 'Toss the still-warm roasted carrots with carrot-top pesto.']

ingredients: ['1 Ratto Farms herb pack', '1 lb Pork chorizo', '1 Package of New Seasons Market stuffing', '24 oz New Seasons Market Miso Broth', '3 Eggs', '2 Egg yolks', '1 Yellow onion, diced', '4 cups Celery, diced', '2 cups Dried Turkish apricots, diced', '2 T Crushed garlic', '1 stick Butter', '2 t olive oil', 'Salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a heavy skillet brown chorizo in olive oil on medium high heat. Once browned add celery, chopped herbs, and onion, continue to cook until vegetables are soft. Reduce heat and add butter, garlic, and apricots. Once the butter is melted turn off heat and set aside.', 'Whisk eggs, egg yolks, and broth together in a separate container.', 'In a large bowl mix stuffing, chorizo mixture, and broth egg combo. Combine until bread is well coated.', 'Move contents into a greased deep baking pan or dutch oven, cover. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Stir half way through.']
