ingredients: ['2-3 apples (Gala, Fuji or Granny Smith)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons coconut sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 200°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment and place a raised wire rack on top of parchment. Wash and thinly slice the apples using a sharp knife or mandolin, remove seeds. Mix cinnamon and coconut sugar together in a small bowl and set aside. Place the apple slices onto the wire racks in a single layer, making sure they do not overlap. Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar mixture.', 'Bake for 1 hour, then flip the apples over. Feel free to sprinkle with more cinnamon and sugar. Bake for another 1 to 1.5 hours. Turn the oven off and keep the apples inside as the oven cools down for 1 hour. Store apple chips at room temperature in an airtight container for up to one week.']

ingredients: ['5 pounds ripe firm apples, peeled, cored, and quartered (we like Gala or Honeycrisp for this recipe)', '1 cup apple cider, plus more as needed', '1/4 cup light brown sugar, plus more as needed', '1 large cinnamon stick', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, plus more as needed', '2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 vanilla bean, split lengthwise and scraped']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a wide, heavy saucepan over medium heat. Cook, covered, stirring occasionally with a wooden spoon and adding more cider as needed to prevent scorching, until apples have broken down, about an hour. Mash any large pieces with the spoon. Add more sugar and spices, as desired. Remove from heat; discard cinnamon stick and vanilla pod, and serve warm.', '*Adapted from marthastewart.com']

ingredients: ['1 15 oz can pumpkin puree', '1 13.5 oz can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '3 tablespoons tahini', '1 clove garlic', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon cumin powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne, optional', 'salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['In a food processor fitted with a blade, process pumpkin, chickpeas and garlic until fairly smooth.', 'Add olive oil, lemon juice, cumin, cayenne and a pinch of salt and pepper; process until smooth.', 'Add additional salt and pepper to taste. Serve with tortilla chips.']

ingredients: ['3 Tbls pasture butter or coconut oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '3 cups raw unsalted nuts', '3 tsp curry powder', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 degrees.', 'In a small saucepan over medium low heat, melt butter or coconut oil with garlic and simmer for 2 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'In a 9 x 13 inch pan, spread nuts evenly. Drizzle with garlic butter/coconut oil. Toss to coat evenly and spread into one layer.', 'Bake for 20 minutes stirring occasionally.', 'Sprinkle curry powder over nuts, toss and bake an additional 5-7 minutes. Season to taste with salt. Drain on paper towel until cool.', 'Store in an airtight container for up to 1 week.']

ingredients: ['2 pints ripe blackberries', '1 bunch basil', '4 cups sparkling water', '1/4 cup local honey']
directions: ['Gently rinse blackberries. Spread one pint loosely on sheet tray and place in freezer until frozen. Take other pint and pour in sauce pan with honey. Chiffonade 20 leaves of basil and add to the berry mixture. Add 1 cup of sparkling water to berry mixture. Cook on low heat, until berries soften and honey is incorporated, stirring frequently. Let cool then strain through a fine mesh sieve. Add cooled berry mixture to remaining 3 cups of sparkling water. Place individually frozen berries in popsicle molds. Place one whole basil leaf on top and fill with berry mixture. Place in freezer until set.']

ingredients: ['1 can full-fat coconut milk', '1/4 cup maple syrup (or honey)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 1/2 cups fresh or frozen berries, rinsed and drained', '1 lime, zested', '1/4 cup lime juice', 'dash of sea salt']
directions: ['In a medium bowl, whisk together coconut milk, maple syrup, salt, and vanilla extract.\nIn a blender, puree berries and ½ cup of the coconut milk mixture.\nAdd the lime juice and zest to the remaining coconut milk mixture, and stir to combine. Pour alternating layers of the coconut milk mixture and the berry mixture into popsicle molds. Insert sticks and freeze until solid, this will take several hours.']

ingredients: ['1 cup blackberries', '1 tablespoon chia seeds', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon real maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place all ingredients in a food processor. Pulse until desired consistency is reached. Minimal blending results in a jam-like consistency. Further blending will produce jelly. Pour mixture into a glass jar and chill for 60 minutes before serving.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup coconut oil, melted', '1/2 cup raw cacao powder', '1/2 cup almond butter', '1/4 cup raw honey', '1/4 cup unsweetened shredded coconut', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Line a muffin tin with paper muffin cups. Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor and blend/process until smooth. Divide the liquid between muffin cups, filling 1/4-1/2 inch full. Place in refrigerator for 30 minutes and enjoy once solidified. For quicker results, place in freezer. Store in an airtight container in the fridge or freezer.']

ingredients: ['1/2 large head cauliflower, shredded', '2 pasture-raised eggs', '1 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning mix', '1/2 cup nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 450°F. Shred or process the cauliflower into small crumbles using a box grater or food processor. You’ll need a total of about 2 cups or so of cauliflower crumbles. Place the cauliflower on a baking sheet and place in oven until they feel dry, about 10 minutes. Give the cauliflower a chance to cool. Once cool, place the cooked cauliflower into a clean dishtowel and ring out as much water as possible. Lightly oil a pizza pan with olive oil. In a medium bowl, mix the cauliflower crumbles with remaining ingredients. Pat the “crust” into a 9-12" round on the prepared pan, and bake for 10-12 minutes (or until golden). Remove the crust from the oven and top with your favorite toppings. Place back into the oven until the toppings are hot, approximately 3-5 minutes. Remove from the oven and serve.']

recipe_name: Granola with Coffee, Nuts and Fruit
ingredients: ['4 cups rolled oats, thick cut', '1/2 cup walnuts, broken pieces', '1/2 cup shelled pistachios', '1/2 cup sesame seeds', '1/3 cup honey', '1 tablespoon course ground coffee', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'zest and juice of one orange', '1/2 cup raisins', '1/2 cup ground flax seeds', '1/2 cup dark chocolate chips']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 300°F .', 'In a large bowl, mix oats, walnuts, pistachios, and sesame seeds. Set aside. In a small sauce pan, heat honey to a simmer and add ground coffee. Let steep 10 minutes and strain.', 'To honey, add paprika, zest, and juice. Stir into the large bowl of oats, walnuts, pistachios and sesame seeds coating evenly. Pour onto a large baking sheet and toast mixture in oven until oats are crisp. Pour into large bowl and add cherries, raisins, flax and chocolate chips. Chips will melt, so mix well at this point.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup toasted almonds', '1 lb asparagus', '1/2 cup packed fresh basil leaves', '2 cloves garlic', '2/3 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '3/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Remove woody portion of stem from asparagus and cut into 2-inch sections.', 'Combine the asparagus, basil, garlic, almonds and cheese in a food processor and pulse a few times to coarsely chop. Careful not to over process!', 'With the motor running, slowly pour in the oil and process until emulsified. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', 'Try on crostini, crackers, sandwiches, pasta, pizza, eggs and anything else your heart desires!']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup cup hemp seed butter OR 1 cup hemp seeds', '1/4 cup tamari', '1/4 cup maple syrup', '1/4 cup water', '1/3 cup lemon juice', '2 cloves garlic', '1/2 cup hemp seed oil']
directions: ['Combine hemp seed butter or hemp seeds, tamari, maple syrup, water, lemon juice and garlic in blender. Blend until smooth, cleaning sides once. Add hemp seed oil slowly while blending. Refrigerate one hour before use.', 'Use as salad dressing or dip.']

ingredients: ['1 package Tempt hemp tofu', '1/4 cup raw apple cider vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon olive or avocado oil', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/8 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne']
directions: ['Smash hemp tofu cake with a fork or run through food processor until crumbly. In separate bowl, combine remaining ingredients, stir in hemp tofu crumbles and mix until well combined. You can use right away or let flavors meld in the refrigerator for an hour, or overnight.', 'To eat, heat over low/medium heat until warmed through and until mixture appears less wet. Tastes great scrambled with veggies or eggs. Try a vegan take on huevos rancheros and serve on a sprouted corn tortilla with black beans, sautéed onions and peppers, and Wildbrine fermented salsa verde. Garnish with cilantro.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups unsweetened shredded coconut', '4 oz semisweet chocolate']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Toast coconut until fragrant and lightly browned. Melt chocolate using a double boiler. When melted, remove from heat and stir in cooled toasted coconut. Place parchment or wax paper on a cookie sheet. Drop coconut chocolate mixture by spoonfuls onto cookie sheet and refrigerate until firm.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon gluten-free mustard', '1 tablespoon raw honey or maple syrup', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons celery seed', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 small head green cabbage, finely shredded', '1 large carrot, grated', '1 cup shredded vegetables of choice (such as snap peas, radishes, broccoli, etc.)']
directions: ['Whisk together dressing ingredients (vinegar, mustard, honey or maple syrup, olive oil, celery seed, and salt and pepper) in a bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste. Toss with cabbage and other veggies.']

recipe_name: Gorgonzola Spread with Mango and Scallion
ingredients: ['8 oz Greek yogurt or labnah', '2-3 scallions, chopped. Include some green', '1 cup dried mango, coarsley chopped', '8 oz chopped Gorgonzola (or blue if preferred)']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together in medium mixing bowl. Chill. Serve with New Seasons Market Crostini, crackers or bread.']

ingredients: ['8 thin slices of prosciutto', '1 cantaloupe melon, peeled, seeded and sliced into 8 wedges', 'Toothpicks', 'Oil for grill grate- your choice, olive, coconut']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high. Wrap 1 piece of prosciutto around each piece of melon in a spiral shape so that you cover as much of the melon as possible. If necessary, use toothpicks to secure. Oil grill grate and grill each slice 3-4 minutes per side, prosciutto will crisp and turn slightly darker. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['1 cup coconut oil', '1 cup coconut butter', '3/4 cup dried unsweetened cherries, chopped', '3/4 cup slivered almonds, lightly toasted']
directions: ['Melt coconut oil and coconut butter in a medium saucepan. Gently stir in cherries and almonds. Pour mixture into a 12” x 12” parchment-lined pan. (For thinner bark, use a larger pan). With a wooden spoon, arrange cherries and almonds so that they are evenly distributed throughout coconut mixture. Place in freezer for about 30 minutes. When mixture is solid, break it into pieces and serve. Store in freezer to maintain texture.']

ingredients: ['1 green plantain peeled and sliced', '3/4 to 1 cup coconut oil, plus more if needed for frying', 'salt, to taste']
directions: ['Heat the coconut oil in a sauté pan until hot. Carefully place plantain slices in pan, cook on each side until crispy and golden brown. Remove with slotted spoon and place on paper towels to drain. Sprinkle with salt and serve hot.']

ingredients: ['1 15 oz can chickpeas/garbanzo beans, rinsed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning -or-', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon sea salt, ¼ teaspoon pepper -or-', '1 1/2 teaspoon smoked sea salt']
directions: ['Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and preheat oven to 350° F. Drain and rinse beans, then pat dry. In a bowl or bag, toss with oil and seasoning.']

ingredients: ['1 cup Pamela’s Baking and Pancake Mix', '1 large egg', '3/4 water', '1 tablespoon oil', '1/4 cup shredded carrots', '1/4 cup shredded daikon', '1/4 cup julienned shiitake mushroom', '1/4 cup spinach or kale shredded', '1/4 lb pork (optional)', '2 tablespoon soy sauce or tamari', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 teaspoon chopped scallions', '1/4 teaspoon ground pepper', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon cider or rice vinegar']
directions: ['For the pancakes make one batch of Pamela’s Pancakes. Mix thoroughly. Mix in any or all of the vegetables and fillings directly into the batter. Cook over medium heat in a skillet or on a flat grill, flipping once until golden brown. Mix all ingredients for dipping sauce in a small bowl. Serve pancakes immediately with a side of sauce.']

ingredients: ['4 cups brewed ginger tea', '2 tablespoons cacao powder', '4 dates, soaked for a few hours, pitted and chopped', '1/2 cup wide unsweetened coconut shreds, toasted', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch cayenne', '4 cinnamon sticks (for garnish)']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients (except the cinnamon sticks) in a blender. Strain through cheesecloth or a nut milk bag. Heat strained mixture gently in sauce pan until warm. Serve with a cinnamon stick for garnish.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup Tamari nuts', '1/4 cup Tamari Pumpkin Seeds or Roasted Pumpkin seeds', '1/4 cup Goji berries', '1/4 cup goldenberries (can sub raisins or golden raisins)', '1/4 cup cacao nibs']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients together in a bowl. Store in container with lid.']

recipe_name: Sweet and Spicy Nut and Pretzel Mix
ingredients: ['4 cups large raw nuts (pecans, almonds or cashews)', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1/3 cup dark brown sugar', '1 teaspoon EACH ground allspice, cloves, ginger and cayenne', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 teaspoon kosher salt, if desired', '4 cups gluten free pretzels']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Line a large cookie sheet with foil and spread nuts in an even layer. Bake for about 10 minutes, turning the cookie sheet and stirring halfway through, just until nuts are lightly toasted.', 'Meanwhile, in a large bowl, mix the butter, brown sugar, spices, cocoa and maple syrup. Toss in warm nuts until all are coated. Add in the pretzels and salt, if using. Stir gently to mix, taking care not to break the pretzels. Return mixture to lined cookie sheet, bake for 12-15 minutes, stirring once or twice and watching so they don’t burn. Remove from oven and spread out on a another pan to cool completely.', 'Store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups unsweetened shredded coconut', '1 tablespoon coconut flour', 'Pinch of sea salt', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', '2 tablespoons raw honey', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Using a food processor, combine shredded coconut and coconut flour. Pulse in salt, coconut oil, honey and vanilla. Dough should form a ball. Form teaspoon sized balls onto a parchment-lined baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven for 7 minutes.']

ingredients: ['4 cups kale', '2 tablespoons cashew butter', '1 tablespoon avocado oil', '1 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', 'Pinch of sea salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 275°F. Wash kale and chop into small pieces. Pat dry with a towel or spin in a salad spinner to remove as much moisture as possible, which will help prevent kale from becoming soggy. In a bowl, combine cashew butter, avocado oil, nutritional yeast, garlic powder and sea salt. Cover the kale with the cashew butter mixture and mix with hands until evenly coated. Bake for 20-25 minutes until kale is crispy.']

ingredients: ['1 bunch kale', '1-3 tablespoons pasture butter or coconut oil, melted', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325°F. Wash kale and remove stems. Pat dry with clean kitchen towel. Roughly chop kale into 1" pieces and place in an oven-safe pan. Drizzle melted butter or coconut oil over kale. Sprinkle coated kale with sea salt. Bake 10-15 minutes, watching closely so chips do not burn.']

ingredients: ['1 can full-fat coconut milk', '1/2 cup chia seeds', '2-4 tablespoons maple syrup or honey', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/8 teaspoon lemon zest']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a bowl and whisk together, ensuring all clumps of chia seeds are broken up. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight to thicken.', 'Note: Serve garnished with additional lemon zest, pistachios, or toasted coconut shreds.']

ingredients: ['High heat oil or ghee', 'sweet potatoes, peeled and spiralized', 'garlic salt']
directions: ['Heat non-stick pan to medium high and add ghee or high heat oil. Once fat is heated add spiralized sweet potatoes taking care to not over crowd pan.', 'Allow the potatoes to brown a bit before turning carefully. Move and turn gently until cooked. Transfer to plate or bowl and then add garlic salt. If strands are too long snip with kitchen scissors.']

ingredients: ['2 1/2 tablespoons unflavored gelatin', '1 1/2 cups granulated sugar', '1 cup light corn syrup', '1 1/4 teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons pure vanilla extract', 'confectioners sugar for dusting']
directions: ['Combine gelatin and half cup cold water in the bowl of an electric mixer with whisk attachment and let stand for half hour. Combine granulated sugar, corn syrup, salt and 1/2 cup water in a small heavy saucepan; place over low heat and stir until sugar has dissolved. Wash down sides of pan with a wet pastry brush to dissolve sugar crystals. Clip on candy thermometer, raise heat to high. Cook syrup without stirring until it reaches 244 degrees (firm ball stage). IMMEDIATELY remove pan from heat. With mixer on low speed, slowly and carefully add syrup to softened gelatin. Increase speed to high, beat until mixture is very thick and white and has almost tripled in volume, about fifteen minutes. Add vanilla, beat to incorporate. Generously dust and 8x12 inch pan with confectioners sugar. Pour marshmallow mixture into pan. Dust with confectioners sugar, let stand overnight, uncovered.']

ingredients: ['2 cups of your favorite nuts, lightly toasted', '1/2 cup almond or hazelnut meal', '1/4 cup unsweetened shredded coconut, toasted', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 pinch sea salt', '3/4 cup nut butter of your choice', '1/2 cup coconut oil', '2 tablespoons real maple syrup', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['Line a 9x9 baking pan with parchment paper. In a bowl, place the mixed nuts, almond or hazelnut meal, coconut, cinnamon and salt. Stir ingredients until combined and set aside. In a saucepan, add the nut butter, coconut oil, maple syrup and vanilla extract. Keep heat on and stir gently. Continue stirring until a smooth paste forms. Add paste to nut mix and stir until nut mix is coated with paste. Pour the mixture into baking pan and distribute evenly. Place pan in the refrigerator for one hour or until mixture has set. Cut into 12 pieces and wrap individually; store extra portions in the refrigerator.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups unsweetened almond milk (or other milk alternative)', '1/3 cup chia seeds', '1/4 cup cacao powder or unsweetened cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '2-5 tablespoons pure maple syrup']
directions: ['Add all ingredients except maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk to combine. Add maple syrup slowly and taste (sweeten to your personal preference). Cover and let rest in the fridge for at least 3-5 hours (or overnight) to thicken. You may also portion out in 4 mason jars to have prepared servings ready to go!\nFor toppings, try berries, paleo-friendly granola, or shelled hemp seed. Leftovers should keep 2-3 days in the fridge.']

ingredients: ['2 peaches, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 mango, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '½ red onion, finely chopped', '3 jalapenos, seeded and chopped', '1 cup cilantro, finely chopped', 'Juice of 1 lime and 1 lemon', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Toss all but the lemon and lime juice in a mixing bowl and stir together. Add the juice of the lemon and lime second, along with salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['4 oz. herbs or leafy greens', '3 oz. nuts or seeds, lightly toasted', '1/4 cup parmesan, grated', '2 cloves garlic', '1/4 to 1/2 cup olive oil', 'Coarse salt']
directions: ['Combine nuts and garlic in food processor and pulse until finely ground.', 'Roughly chop basil, then add to processor and pulse for a few seconds.', 'While machine is running, drizzle in olive oil, and process until desired consistency is reached.', 'Mix in cheese and add salt to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups coconut milk', '1/2 cup unsweetened shredded coconut', '4 tablespoons chia seeds', '2 tablespoons coconut nectar', '2 teaspoons vanilla bean paste', '1/2 medium banana, diced']
directions: ['In a Mason jar or medium bowl, combine the coconut milk, shredded coconut, chia seeds, coconut nectar, and vanilla paste. Shake jar or mix well to combine. Gently stir in diced banana. Cover and refrigerate overnight to soften chia seeds.']

ingredients: ['One 8oz package of cream cheese', '1/2 cup grated cheddar cheese', '1/2 cup beer', '¼ lb bacon, diced', '1 tsp minced yellow onion', '1 tsp garlic powder', '1 tsp paprika']
directions: ['Dice bacon into small pieces. Cook in pot on medium heat until fat is rendered and bacon is crispy. Add the onions and sauté until golden brown.', 'Add the beer, cheddar cheese and cream cheese, and garlic powder. Cook on low heat until melted. Sprinkle top with paprika.', 'Serve with veggies or salty potato chips.']

ingredients: ['2 bags New Seasons Market salted honey popcorn', '1 cup New Seasons Market salted roasted peanuts', '3 cups mini pretzels', '1 cup candy corn', '1 cup chocolate peanut butter candy pieces', '1/2 cup honey', '1/2 cup granulated sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2/3 cup New Seasons Market creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup unsalted butter']
directions: ['In a large bowl, mix together the popcorn, peanuts, pretzels, candy corn, and peanut butter candy pieces. Set aside.', 'In a medium saucepan, bring the honey, sugar, salt and butter to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter. Drizzle over popcorn mixture. Stir to coat.', 'Spread the popcorn mixture onto two baking sheets covered in parchment. Allow to cool completely, then break apart to serve.']

ingredients: ['4 full-sized fresh pork sausage links (bratwurst or Italian are nice here)', '1 pound prepared New Seasons Market pizza dough, refrigerated', '1 large egg', '1 tbsp water', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '4 tbsp sesame seeds', 'Yellow mustard for dipping']
directions: ['Cook sausages until browned and cooked through. Allow to cool. Cut each sausage into four even pieces length-wise, for a total of 16 sausage sections.', 'Preheat oven to 425 degrees.', 'Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface into a rectangle approximately 9”x12” in size.', 'Cut dough into 16 strips horizontally, approximately ¼” wide.', 'Line baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Roll strips of dough around sausage sections, covering each piece from top to bottom. Tuck the end under the roll and place on baking sheet. Repeat for each sausage section.', 'Whisk together egg, water and salt in a small bowl. Brush over top and sides of each roll.', 'Sprinkle sesame seeds evenly over each roll.', 'Bake approximately 25 minutes or until golden brown, turning pan once halfway through.', 'Allow to cool 5 minutes before serving with mustard for dipping.']

ingredients: ['2 cups raw cashews', '3/4 - 1 cup water', '1 TBSP nutritional yeast', '2-3 TBSP lemon juice', '3/4 tsp sea salt', '2 TBSP fresh chopped parsley']
directions: ['Place cashews in a medium mixing bowl and add enough boiled water to cover. Let soak for 1 hour then drain. In a food processor, add ¾ cup water, soaked cashews and all remaining ingredients. Blend until creamy – mixture should be thick. Add additional water if needed. Adjust seasoning to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon Madras curry powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 13.5 oz can diced tomatoes, with juice', '2 cups peeled and diced winter squash (butternut, et al)', '1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves chopped', '4 cups vegetable broth']
directions: ['In a large soup pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat until hot.', 'Add onion, garlic, curry powder, salt and pepper and cook, stirring frequently, until onion and garlic are soft and starting to caramelize.', 'Add tomatoes, squash, kale and vegetable broth and cook, covered, until squash is tender, about 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Taste soup. Add additional salt and pepper, if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 pound potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 1/2 pounds clams, chopped', '1/4 pound bacon, diced', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1/2 cup butter', '1/2 cup flour', '4 cups clam juice', '1 pint half and half', '1/4 cup chopped parsley', 'salt & pepper']
directions: ['Bring the potatoes and clam juice to a boil, and cook potatoes until tender. Set aside. In a separate pot, sauté onions, celery, and bacon until onions are translucent. Add clams and sauté for about five minutes.', 'Add the butter and allow to melt. Add the flour and cook until slightly brown. Stir in clam juice and potatoes. Bring to boil to thicken. Add parsley and half and half.', 'Cook on medium for 30 minutes. Serve with bread!']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 yellow onion, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 28 ounce cans diced tomatoes', '2 tablespoons chopped thyme leaves', '2 cups vegetable broth', '8 ounces sour cream', 'sea salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['In a large soup pot over medium heat, warm olive oil. Add onion and sauté until soft and translucent, about 12 minutes. Add garlic and continue to cook for 1-2 minutes or until garlic becomes fragrant. Add tomatoes, thyme, and vegetable broth. Simmer, covered for about 20 minutes. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly. Add in the sour cream. Using a food processor or immersion blender blend together until smooth with a few chunky pieces. Add sea salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breast, chopped', '1 onion, julienned', '1 carrot, chopped', '1/2 head red kale, deveined and leaves chopped', '1 quart chicken broth', '1/2 pound pasta', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 pinch each nutmeg and clove', '1 quart water', 'salt, to taste']
directions: ['In a large soup pot, bring garlic and chicken breast to boil in chicken stock until chicken is cooked through, roughly 10-12 minutes.', 'Add water, vegetables (except for kale), herbs and spices and pasta. Bring to a boil and simmer until pasta is tender.', 'Add kale and cook for 2 minutes more, until kale is wilted. Serve hot!']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, peeled , trimmed and thinly sliced', '1 medium leek, white part only, thinly sliced, washed and dried', '2 large apples, peeled, cored and cut into 1/2-inch cubes (we like McIntosh or Braeburn)', '10 ounces celeriac, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '3 bay leaves', '2 sprigs thyme', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg', 'salt and freshly ground white pepper', '3/4 pound peeled fresh chestnuts (from about 1 1/4 pounds chestnuts in the shell)', '2 quarts chicken stock or store-bought chicken broth', '1/2 cup heavy cream', '2 cups canola oil', '2 cups thinly sliced shallots (about 4 large shallots']
directions: ['Begin by making your crispy shallot topping. In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil until it registers 275°F on a deep-frying thermometer. Add shallots and cook, stirring, until light golden brown, about 8 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer shallots to a paper-towel-lined plate to drain. Increase heat to high and place a fine-mesh sieve over a heatproof bowl. When oil reaches 350°F on the thermometer, add the fried shallots and cook just until they are crisp and well-browned, a few seconds, watching carefully so they do not burn. Immediately pour oil and shallots through sieve to stop cooking, then transfer shallots to paper-towel-lined plate to drain. Shallots will keep in an airtight container at room temperature for 1 day.', 'Heat the oil in a stockpot or large casserole over medium heat. Add the onion, leek, apples, celery root, bay leaves, thyme, nutmeg and salt and pepper to taste and cook, stirring occasionally, for about 10 minutes, or until the onions and leeks are soft but not browned. Add the chestnuts and chicken stock and bring to the boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and cook, skimming the surface regularly, for 35-40 minutes, or until the chestnuts can be mashed easily with a fork. Add the heavy cream and simmer for 5-10 minutes more, then remove from the heat and discard the bay leaves and thyme.', 'Puree the soup until smooth using an immersion blender, then pass it through a fine-mesh strainer. You should have about 2 quarts soup at the point. If you have more, or if you think the soup is too thin -- it should have the consistency of a light cream soup - simmer it over medium heat until slightly thickened. Taste and, adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve soup warm, top with shallots just before serving.', 'adapted from recipes by Daniel Boulud and the New York Times']

ingredients: ['1 lb ground turkey, cooked', '1 15oz can of low sodium white beans, including liquid', '2 cups chicken broth', '1/4 cup tomatillo salsa', 'White pepper and sea salt to taste', '1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro', '1/2 cup sour cream']
directions: ['Throw everything in a pot and let simmer for 30-45 minutes before serving. Great with tortilla chips or cornbread.']

recipe_name: White Bean and Smokey Greens Soup
ingredients: ['1 bunch greens (kale or swiss chard) washsed and chopped to 1" pieces, set aside', '1 onion, chopped', '4 slices bacon, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon thyme', '1 teaspoon rosemary', '1 large stalk celery, chopped', '2 (15 oz) cans great northern beans, rinsed', '4 cups vegetable broth', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'extra virgin olive oil for garnish']
directions: ['In a large stockpot, sauté the onion and bacon for 5 minutes. Add garlic, thyme, rosemary and celery. Sauté for another 2 minutes.\nAdd beans and greens along with broth to the soup pan and bring to a simmer. Simmer 20 minutes. Add salt and pepper and up to an additional 1 cup of water to taste. Heat through and serve with a drizzle of olive oil as garnish.', 'Serve with your favorite New Seasons Market crusty bread.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons garlic powder', '3 tablespoons dried lemon peel', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['1 4-inch piece of kombu, optional', '1 quart vegetable broth or water', '1 bunch green onions, chopped', '1 large sheet raw nori, cut into small strips', '1 pound sprouted tofu, cubed (optional)', '1/4 cup miso paste', '1/2 cup warm water (for mixing with miso)']
directions: ['Rinse the kombu and steep overnight in a quart of broth or water.', 'Remove kombu and heat up the broth to about 175°F, do not boil. Stir in green onion, nori, and tofu, if using. Simmer for 3-5 minutes, remove from heat. Dissolve miso paste in warm water, and then stir into soup mixture. Serve and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['1 cup roasted and salted cashews', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus extra', '3 lbs ripe heirloom tomatoes, seeded', '1 lb strawberries, hulled', '1/2 cucumber, peeled and seeded', '1 red bell pepper, cored and seeded', '1/2 medium sweet onion, peeled', '1/2 cup mild olive oil, such as Arbequina', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar, plus extra', 'Finely diced cucumber, strawberry, and mint for garnish']
directions: ['Working in two batches in a blender, combine half the cashews, garlic, vegetables and strawberries. Puree until very smooth.', 'Add half the olive oil to the blender and puree until fully incorporated. Transfer the soup to a large bowl.', 'Repeat the blending process with the remaining ingredients and transfer to the same bowl.', 'Stir the vinegar and salt into the soup. Taste and adjust seasoning to your liking.', 'Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours before serving. Serve topped with cucumber, strawberry and mint.']

ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil', '½ cup diced onion', '4 stalks celery, sliced', '4 carrots, peeled sliced', '1 bulb of fennel, sliced (fronds reserved to season the soup before serving)', '2 cloves minced garlic', '½ tsp chili flake', '2 cups fish stock or vegetable stock', '12 oz. can crushed tomato', '2 sprigs fresh thyme, leaves only', 'Kosher salt and fresh black pepper to taste', '12 oz. package of Bristol Fair Trade Scallops, defrosted']
directions: ['In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions, celery, carrots and fennel bulb. Sauté for 5 minutes.', 'Add garlic, chili flake, ½ tsp kosher salt and ¼ tsp of fresh black pepper to the vegetables; stir until aromatic, about 1 minute.', 'Add tomatoes and stock; bring to a simmer and reduce heat to medium low.', 'Simmer for 30 minutes, uncovered. 5 minutes before serving add the fresh thyme leaves and 1 TBSP of fennel fronds to the stew. Turn the heat up to medium and gently place the defrosted scallops into the stew.', 'Simmer until scallops are cooked, about 5 minutes. Adjust seasoning and serve with your favorite bread and butter.']

ingredients: ['2 Tbls refined avocado oil', '1 yellow onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tsp salt, plus more to taste', '¼ tsp black pepper', '6 cups vegetable stock', '6 Huckleberry gold potatoes, washed and cubed', '1/3 cup raw cashews', 'Splash of apple cider vinegar']
directions: ['In a large pot, heat avocado oil over medium heat, add onion, sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic, salt and pepper, sauté 1 minute.', 'Add vegetable stock, potatoes and cashews. Simmer until potatoes are fork tender, 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and puree in batches in the blender, alternatively, use an immersion blender to blend until smooth, add a splash of apple cider vinegar and stir to combine.', 'Taste for seasoning and add salt or pepper if needed. Top with your favorite baked potato toppings, such as scallions, vegan sour cream and grated dairy-free cheese, or finely chopped broccoli.']

recipe_name: Pressure Cooker Curried Cauliflower and Squash Soup
ingredients: ['2 T avocado oil', '1 small yellow onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '½ tsp ground ginger', '2 tsp curry powder', '2 tsp sea salt (may need to decrease if your curry powder has salt in it)', '1 tsp ground cumin', '1 med-large head cauliflower, cut into florets', '2 10oz bags frozen butternut squash (or use leftover cooked squash)', '2-3 cups low-sodium chicken or vegetable broth, divided', '1 can full-fat coconut milk', '2 TBSP coconut aminos', 'Apple cider vinegar to taste (we like about 3 splashes)']
directions: ['Set your pressure cooker to sauté mode and add avocado oil. Sauté onion until translucent, about 7 minutes. Add garlic, ginger, curry powder, salt, and cumin. Sauté for about 1 min. Add cauliflower florets and squash, stir to coat with spices. Add 2 cups of broth and can of coconut milk, stir to combine. Turn off pressure cooker, lock lid in place and turn vent to “sealing” mode. Set the pressure cooker to manual high pressure mode and use the buttons to adjust time down to 5 minutes. Once done, cover the vent with a towel and turn it to venting mode to quick release pressure. Contents will be very hot. Use an immersion blender to puree until very smooth. Alternatively use a traditional blender and work in batches to puree the soup. Thin to desired consistency with remaining cup of broth. Add coconut aminos and a few splashes of apple cider vinegar, the vinegar adds acidity that helps balance and brighten the flavors of the soup. Taste and adjust seasoning by adding salt, pepper, or more coconut aminos. Garnish with chives and a drizzle of coconut milk or sour cream.', 'This can be made on the stovetop in a large soup pot, just sauté over medium heat, and rather than cooking under pressure, simmer for 20 minutes, or until vegetables are softened. Follow instructions above for pureeing and seasoning.']

ingredients: ['1 3/4 pounds asparagus spears, tough ends snapped, cut into 2-inch lengths', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'Sea salt, to taste', 'Freshly ground pepper, to taste', '6 cups chicken broth', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped onion', '1 1/2 cups Arborio rice', '1/2 cup dry vermouth', '1/2 cup finely grated “E Tartufo” sheep’s milk cheese', '1/4 cup finely grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 ½ teaspoon finely grated lemon zest']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°. Toss the asparagus with 1 tablespoon of the oil, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and roast until just tender. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.', 'Bring the broth to a simmer in a medium saucepan. Reduce heat to low. In a large saucepan, heat the remaining oil and the butter over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until translucent, 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Add the vermouth and stir until liquid is absorbed, 1 minute.', 'Add 1 ladle of hot broth to the rice and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, until the broth is absorbed. Continue adding stock one ladleful at a time until almost all of the stock is used, about 15 minutes. (Keep a ladleful of broth in reserve.)', 'Add the roasted asparagus (reserving 8 asparagus tips for garnish), cheeses, lemon juice, lemon zest, and parsley and stir to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (If you prefer it saucier, add the remaining broth now.)', 'Divide the risotto among 4 bowls and top each bowl with 2 of the asparagus spears and serve.']

ingredients: ["6 tablespoons New Season's Market salted butter, divided use", '1 medium onion, diced', '1 1/2 tablespoons Madras curry powder, divided', '2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and diced', '2/3 cup apple juice or cider', '1/2 cup dried currants', '8 1" slices butternut squash discs, cut from 2 peeled butternut squash', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter. Add onion and sauté until tender; about 10-12 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon curry powder; cook for an additional minute, stirring constantly. Add apples, juice and currants; continue to cook until liquid evaporates. Season to taste with salt and pepper; remove from heat.', 'Preheat oven to 350° F. In a small skillet over medium heat, melt remaining 5 tablespoons butter. Add remaining ½ tablespoon curry powder and cook for 1 minute; remove from heat.', 'Lightly brush a rimmed baking sheet with some of the curry butter. Arrange squash discs in a single layer on buttered baking sheet. Sprinkle discs with salt and pepper. Divide apple filling evenly on tops of discs. Drizzle remaining curry butter over discs. Cover loosely with foil and bake until squash is tender; about 40-45 minutes.', 'Using a spatula, transfer discs to serving platter.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon Madras curry powder', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 13.5 oz can diced tomatoes, with juice', '2 cups peeled and diced winter squash (butternut, et al)', '1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves chopped', '4 cups vegetable broth']
directions: ['In a large soup pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat until hot.', 'Add onion, garlic, curry powder, salt and pepper and cook, stirring frequently, until onion and garlic are soft and starting to caramelize.', 'Add tomatoes, squash, kale and vegetable broth and cook, covered, until squash is tender, about 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Taste soup. Add additional salt and pepper, if desired.']

ingredients: ['2-3 apples (Gala, Fuji or Granny Smith)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons coconut sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 200°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment and place a raised wire rack on top of parchment. Wash and thinly slice the apples using a sharp knife or mandolin, remove seeds. Mix cinnamon and coconut sugar together in a small bowl and set aside. Place the apple slices onto the wire racks in a single layer, making sure they do not overlap. Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar mixture.', 'Bake for 1 hour, then flip the apples over. Feel free to sprinkle with more cinnamon and sugar. Bake for another 1 to 1.5 hours. Turn the oven off and keep the apples inside as the oven cools down for 1 hour. Store apple chips at room temperature in an airtight container for up to one week.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds ground beef', '3/4 pound ground pork', "1/2 cup Ian's gluten-free bread crumbs", '1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce', '1 medium onion', '4 cloves garlic', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '2 eggs', '1 can tomato paste', '1 pound bacon', '15-ounce can tomato sauce', '1/3 cup brown sugar', '1/4 cup Worcestershire', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375ºF.', 'Place onion and garlic in the bowl of a food processor and pulse to chop up. Chop until small, but not to liquid. Remove onions and garlic to a large bowl.', 'Add in the rest of the ingredients except for bacon and sauce ingredients. Stir together. Pat the mixture into a loaf shape in a 9" x 13" pan.', 'Open the package of bacon and lay over the top of the meatloaf to cover completely.', 'Bake in the oven for about an hour. Check the temperature in the center; meatloaf should be 155 degrees. While meatloaf is in the oven, heat and combine sauce ingredients in a small sauce pan over medium heat.', 'When the meatloaf is the correct temp and the bacon is browned, top with some of the sauce. Bake 10 minutes more or broil to finish sauce. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['30 cremini mushrooms, remove and reserve stems', '3/4 lb Italian sausage', '1/3 cup olive tapenade (store-bought or make your own)', '3 Tbls almond flour', 'Finely chopped parsley for garnish']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350° F.', 'Clean mushrooms and trim off end of stem if dried out. Remove stems and chop them finely, leaving caps whole.', 'Cook sausage and chopped stems over medium-low heat until sausage has browned. Stir in olive tapenade and almond flour and remove from heat.', 'Place mushroom caps snugly in a baking dish and fill with a spoonful of sausage mixture, mushrooms should be quite full.', 'Drizzle filled mushrooms with olive oil and bake for approximately 30 minutes, or until filling is brown and crusty. Remove from oven and garnish with finely chopped parsley prior to serving.']

ingredients: ['3 Tbls pasture butter or coconut oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '3 cups raw unsalted nuts', '3 tsp curry powder', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 degrees.', 'In a small saucepan over medium low heat, melt butter or coconut oil with garlic and simmer for 2 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'In a 9 x 13 inch pan, spread nuts evenly. Drizzle with garlic butter/coconut oil. Toss to coat evenly and spread into one layer.', 'Bake for 20 minutes stirring occasionally.', 'Sprinkle curry powder over nuts, toss and bake an additional 5-7 minutes. Season to taste with salt. Drain on paper towel until cool.', 'Store in an airtight container for up to 1 week.']

ingredients: ['4 large garnet or jewel yams, scrubbed and split', '¼ cup crème fraîche or 2 tablespoons coconut butter', 'Sea salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Place split yams face-down in glass baking dish containing one inch of water. Cover dish and bake yams at 350 F for 75 minutes.', 'When cool enough to handle, remove skins from yams. This will make texture creamy when mashing.', 'Mash or whip yams with crème fraîche or coconut butter. Add sea salt and pepper to taste.']

recipe_name: Roasted Red Pepper and Spinach Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ['15 medium-size cremini mushrooms, stems removed (save stems for filling)', '1/2 tablespoon ½ Tbsp olive oil', '1/4 cup ¼ cup sweet onion, finely chopped', '1/2 cup ½ cup mushroom stems, finely chopped', '1/3 cup 1/3 cup roasted red peppers, finely chopped', '5 ounces 5 ounces frozen spinach, thawed and excess liquid squeezed out', '1-1 1/2 tablespoon 1-1½ Tbsp nutritional yeast', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 drizzle Balsamic reduction']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.', 'In a skillet, over medium heat, sauté onions and mushrooms stems with olive oil for 8-10 minutes or until onions are translucent.', 'Add roasted red peppers and spinach and heat another 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Add sea salt and pepper to taste.', 'Dividing evenly, fill mushroom caps with filling. Bake for 25-30 minutes.', 'Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving if desired.']

ingredients: ['½ – ¾ cups canned full-fat coconut milk depending on thickness desired', '1 ½ cups baby spinach leaves', '1 frozen banana', '1 cup frozen pineapple', '1 kiwi', '1 mandarin', '2 Tbls coconut oil', '1 scoop of your favorite protein powder', 'Handful of ice', '1 Tbls hemp hearts', '2 Tbls granola or nuts', '1 Tbls unsweetened flake coconut', 'Sliced fruit or berries for garnish']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients together until smooth. Serve in a bowl with your choice of toppings.']

ingredients: ['3-4 cups stone fruit jam', '3/4 cup butter', '1 cup packed brown sugar', '1 3/4 cups gluten free all-purpsoe flour', '1 teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 cups gluten free rolled oats']
directions: ['Preheat oven 350°. In a medium bowl, cream butter and brown sugar. In a separate bowl, stir together flour, soda and salt; add to butter mixture and mix well. Stir in rolled oats.', 'Press half of the mixture evenly into the bottom of a greased 9” x 13” baking dish. Evenly spread a generous layer of jam on top. Top with remaining oat mixture. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until light brown. Serve warm or at room temperature. These bars will keep well at room temperature for 3-5 days if tightly wrapped in plastic.', '***For additional flavor and texture, add chopped fresh fruit or berries on top of the jam before you put the final layer on.']

ingredients: ['1 sweet onion, diced', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '2 limes, juiced', '6 apricots, cubed', '1 large jalapeno, chopped fine', '1 cup cherries, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, taste and adjust for seasoning. Fruit salsas are a great accompaniment to grilled meat or fish. You can mix and match the fruit and herbs to create a multitude of combinations.']

ingredients: ['6 eggs, hardboiled, peeled and cooled', '3 ounces wild salmon, cooked', '1/2 large ripe avocado', '1-3 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '1-2 tablespoons fresh dill, minced', '2 tablespoons scallions, finely sliced', 'paprika for sprinkling (optional)', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Slice peeled eggs in half lengthwise. Gently scoop the yolks into a medium mixing bowl and place the whites on a serving tray. Mash yolks into small crumbly pieces with a fork. In a food processor, blend salmon, avocado, lemon juice and dill until well mixed. Add salmon mixture, salt and pepper to the mixing bowl of yolks. Combine well. Fill eggs with yolk/salmon mixture. Garnish with scallions and paprika if desired.', 'Tip: to keep eggs from sliding all over your serving tray, before filling, slice just enough egg white off of the bottom of each half to make egg white flat. Alternatively, you can line serving tray with a bed of kale to keep eggs in place']

ingredients: ['1-2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '8 ounces water']
directions: ['Stir together and consume 15-20 minutes before meals.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup sesame oil', '1/4 cup toasted sesame oil', '1/2 cup rice wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon peeled & minced ginger', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon tahini', 'Hot chili paste or sriracha (optional) to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.', 'Finely slice a head of cabbage, add a cup of shredded carrots, and toss with the dressing for a crunchy salad that will last a few days in the fridge even after it’s been tossed.']

ingredients: ['1 cup blackberries', '1 tablespoon chia seeds', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon real maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place all ingredients in a food processor. Pulse until desired consistency is reached. Minimal blending results in a jam-like consistency. Further blending will produce jelly. Pour mixture into a glass jar and chill for 60 minutes before serving.']

ingredients: ['6 ears corn, sliced off cob', '1 medium red onion, diced', '1 pint blueberries', '1/4 cup fresh lime juice', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced & packed basil leaves', 'salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Steam the corn with water in a large saucepan over medium heat, covered, until bright yellow, about 4 minutes. Remove the lid and continue to cook the corn, stirring frequently, until the water evaporates, about 3 minutes longer. Transfer the corn to a large bowl and let cool slightly. Mix in red onion, blueberries, lime juice and olive oil. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover bowl and refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours. Remove the salad from the refrigerator and fold in basil. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 medium yellow onion, chopped', '1 bunch collard, thinly sliced', '2-3 tablespoons avocado oil', '1/4 cup water', '1/2 cup full fat coconut milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat oil in a 9 inch skillet over medium heat, add onions and saute until they just begin to turn translucent, about five minutes.', 'Trim the bottom inch from the collards, then cut into thin strips by rolling 4-5 leaves into a tight bundle and cut crosswise into 1/4-1/2 inch strips (it’s not necessary to remove the stalk). Add greens to the onions, add the water and cover, reduce heat to low, and cook for 30-40 minutes. Add the coconut milk and turmeric, stir to combine, increase heat to medium, and cook for about 10 minutes or until the mixture has thickened.']

recipe_name: Burrito Bowl with Kale and Black Beans
ingredients: ['1 cup brown rice, rinsed & cooked', '1 bunch curly kale, destemmed and chopped', '1/4 cup lime juice', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 jalapeno, deseeded & minced', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1 avocado pitted', '1/2 cup mild salsa verde', '1/2 cup coarsely chopped cilanto', '1 lime juiced', '2 cans black beans, rinsed & drained', '1 shallot, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced or pressed', '1/4 teaspoon chili powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne (optional)', 'sliced cherry tomatoes', 'avocado slices', 'hot sauce', 'vegan sour cream or plain yogurt', 'sliced almonds', 'hulled hemp seeds']
directions: ['Prepare and cook rice as directed.', 'Prepare kale: whisk lime juice, olive oil, jalapeno, cumin, and sea salt. Toss the sauce with the chopped kale in a medium-mixing bowl. Set aside.', 'Prepare the avocado Sauce: blend avocado, green salsa, cilantro, and lime juice in a food processor or blender until creamy.', 'Prepare beans: Warm a little olive oil or avocado oil in a sauce pan over medium-low heat. Sauté shallot and garlic until fragrant. Add beans, chili powder, and cayenne pepper and cook until beans are warmed/softened (about 5 minutes).', 'To serve, scoop a little rice, beans, and kale mixture into a bowl. Dollop or drizzle the avocado sauce and garnish with desired veggies/toppings.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups butternut squash, cooked', '1/4 teaspoon Italian herbs', '1/4 cup water or broth, or more as needed', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat squash, water and seasonings in a sauce pan over medium-low heat. Stir frequently and mash squash with spoon. For a smooth sauce, blend mixture in a food processor.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '1 cup spinach', '4 asparagus stalks, trimmed and chopped', '1 small zucchini, diced', '4 eggs from pastured hens', '4 ounces wild smoked salmon', '1 small avocado, cut into cubes']
directions: ['Melt the ghee or coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus, spinach and zucchini, and sauté until tender.', 'In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and then add to the vegetable mixture. Gently stir the eggs until they are scrambled and cooked through. Add the smoked salmon and avocado and serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons sauerkraut brine or pickle brine', '2 tablespoons coconut milk', '2-3 tablespoons minced shallot', '1-2 tablespoons fresh herbs of choice such as parsley, chives and dill', '1 teaspoon maple syrup or raw honey (optional)', 'Sea salt to taste']
directions: ['In a blender, combine all ingredients and blend until smooth. If dressing is too thick, add water 1 teaspoon at a time and blend until desired consistency is reached.']

ingredients: ['1 4-inch piece of kombu (dried seaweed)', '1 bunch green onions, chopped', '1/2 cup wakame (dried seaweed)', '1/4 cup chickpea miso paste*', '1/2 cup warm water for mixing miso']
directions: ['Rinse the kombu and allow to steep overnight in a quart of cold water. Remove kombu and heat up the seaweed broth but do not boil. Stir in green onion and wakame. Simmer for 3-5 minutes, and remove from heat. Dissolve miso paste in warm water, and then stir into soup mixture. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 medium sweet potato, baked and skin removed', '2 eggs from pastured hens', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice', 'Ghee or coconut oil for cooking', 'Pasture butter or coconut butter as topping']
directions: ['Beat eggs in a bowl. Stir in sweet potato flesh, salt, spices and vanilla, and mix thoroughly. (May combine ingredients in a blender if desired.) Heat a skillet over low-medium heat, and grease with ghee or coconut oil. Once skillet is warm, pour or scoop a few tablespoons of batter onto pan. Allow to cook 3-5 minutes or until golden brown and set. Flip and cook another few minutes until cooked through and lightly browned. Top with pasture butter or softened coconut butter.', 'For a savory twist, omit the cinnamon/pumpkin spice and use pepper and curry seasoning instead of, or in addition to, salt. Stir in chopped spinach and sautéed onions for more flavor and texture.']

ingredients: ['1 package Tempt hemp tofu', '1/4 cup raw apple cider vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon olive or avocado oil', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/8 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne']
directions: ['Smash hemp tofu cake with a fork or run through food processor until crumbly. In separate bowl, combine remaining ingredients, stir in hemp tofu crumbles and mix until well combined. You can use right away or let flavors meld in the refrigerator for an hour, or overnight.', 'To eat, heat over low/medium heat until warmed through and until mixture appears less wet. Tastes great scrambled with veggies or eggs. Try a vegan take on huevos rancheros and serve on a sprouted corn tortilla with black beans, sautéed onions and peppers, and Wildbrine fermented salsa verde. Garnish with cilantro.']

ingredients: ['2 cups coarsely grated sweet potato or yam', '4 tablespoons ghee, divided', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped cauliflower', '1-2 cups chopped kale', '2-3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 eggs', 'Additional salt and pepper', '1/3 cup crumbled goat cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F and melt 2 tablespoons of ghee to be mixed with potato shreds. Squeeze sweet potato shreds with a paper towel or in cheesecloth to press out excess liquid. Add potato shreds to a 10″ pie pan with ghee, salt, and pepper, stir to combine, then press into the bottom of pan and up sides to form a crust. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes begin to brown on the surface and edges.', 'While crust bakes, sauté shallot in remaining 2 tablespoons of ghee until translucent. Add cauliflower, sauté until cauliflower is tender, 4-5 minutes. Covering pan will help soften cauliflower more quickly. Add garlic and kale, and sauté one more minute. Remove pie pan from oven and decrease oven temp to 350°F.', 'Distribute cooked veggies evenly over potato crust. Whisk together eggs, and a few shakes of salt and pepper, then pour over veggies. Add cheese and bake 25-30 minutes, or until eggs are set. Allow to cool 10 minutes prior to slicing.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons gluten-free mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon celery seed', 'Sea salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 can of your favorite sardines', '1/3 cup finely chopped onion', '1/2 celery stalk, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons horseradish mustard', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 generous squeeze of fresh lemon juice (about 1 teaspoon)', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 pinch lemon pepper']
directions: ['Drain sardines, place in a bowl, and chop into chunks with a fork. Add celery and onion to sardines and stir. In a separate bowl, blend horseradish mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, sea salt and lemon pepper. Combine dressing with sardine mixture and serve.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup canned coconut milk', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon chili garlic sauce', '1-2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon coconut nectar', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon grated ginger', 'Cilantro (optional)']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a food processor, and refrigerate. Let sit at least 2 hours before serving. Can be thinned with more coconut milk. This sauce is great with chicken, as a dressing for Asian slaw, and for dipping veggies.']

ingredients: ['1 raw nori sheet*', '2 tablespoons almond, cashew or other nut butter', '1 teaspoon raw honey', '1 pinch sea salt']
directions: ['Place nori sheet on a flat surface. Spread nut butter over the nori, drizzle with honey, and sprinkle salt on top. Roll or fold nori sheet so that fillings are contained inside.', 'For more sweetness, try adding chunks of banana inside your nori snack.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup ground ginger', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon anise seed', '2 teaspoons ground cloves']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 teaspoons minced shallot', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon raw honey', '2 small grapefruits', '1/2 lb mustard greens, trimmed and cut into 1/2” pieces (about 4 cups)', '1/2 cup dried dates, pitted and chopped', 'pomegranate seeds']
directions: ['In a large salad bowl, whisk together the shallot and lime juice and let stand 5 minutes. Whisk in oil, salt, and honey. Prepare grapefruit by peeling and cutting away any pith. Using a sharp knife, cut away the sections from the membranes. Toss together grapefruit sections and mustard greens with the prepared vinaigrette. Add any optional toppings.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter or ghee', '1 onion, chopped', '3-4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon muchi curry or curry powder of your choice', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon coriander', '4 cups gluten-free chicken or vegetable broth', '1 cup dry lentils, rinsed', '1 small head cauliflower, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 can full fat coconut milk', 'cilantro, chopped (optional, for garnish)', 'cashews, toasted & chopped (optional, for garnish)']
directions: ['Heat a soup pot or large saucepan over medium heat. Add butter or ghee, and sauté onions and garlic for 2 minutes. Add spices and stir to coat onions and garlic thoroughly. Add broth and lentils and cover. Bring to a boil, turn back heat, and simmer for 30 minutes. Add cauliflower, salt, and coconut milk, and simmer for 15 more minutes. Serve in bowls with cilantro and cashews.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups full-fat coconut milk', '1 cup quinoa, rinsed and soaked overnight', '1-2 teaspoons fresh grated ginger', '1-2 teaspoons raw honey']
directions: ['Soak quinoa overnight and rinse. Bring coconut milk to a soft boil and add quinoa and ginger. Cover and reduce to a simmer. Cook for 15-20 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Drizzle honey over cooked quinoa and top with ground nuts/seeds and sliced fruit if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups full-fat coconut milk', '1 cup quinoa, soaked overnight in pure water, drained, rinsed']
directions: ['Bring coconut milk to a boil. Add quinoa, cover and reduce to a simmer. Cook 15-20 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Can be eaten plain or topped with nuts/seeds and fresh fruit.']

ingredients: ['Ice cream spinner, frozen overnight', '1 1/2 cups coconut cream', '1 1/2 cups nut/seed milk', '4-5 pitted dates', '1 can pumpkin puree', '8 pasture raised chicken egg yolks', '2/3 cup coconut sugar', '4 teaspoons maple syrup', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, to taste', 'pinch sea salt']
directions: ["Put your ice cream spinner into the freezer the night before. Heat milks, dates, and pumpkin together over medium-low. Using an immersion blender puree dates into the milks. In a separate bowl combine the remaining ingredients, and whisk until a thick ribbon stage. Slowly add warmed milk to egg yolks while whisking to temper the yolk mixture. Once warmed add yolk mixture back into the pot with the rest of the milk, and stir slowly with a wooden spoon till mixture starts to thicken. Strain liquid through a fine mesh strainer to remove any possible solids, and allow to cool. Set up your ice cream maker and add ice cream base to maker and follow manufacturer's directions. Once at soft serve stage pour ice cream out into a freezable storage container and allow to freeze solid."]

ingredients: ['2 fresh limes, juiced', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '1 head Napa cabbage, thinly sliced', '1 carrot, grated', '1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '4-6 green onions, chopped', '2 tablespoons grated ginger', '3 tablespoons chopped cilantro', '3/4 cup peanut butter', '2 tablespoons raw local honey', '3-4 tablespoons gluten-free tamari', '1 dash crushed chili pepper', '3 cloves garlic', '3/4 cup coconut milk']
directions: ['Mix all dressing ingredients thoroughly. Toss all vegetables in a large bowl. Coat veggies with lime dressing.', 'Meanwhile, combine all peanut sauce ingredients in a food processor or blender and blend until thoroughly mixed. Pour one cup of peanut sauce over dressed vegetables; plate and garnish with peanuts and additional chili if desired.']

ingredients: ['4 cups unsweetened fruit juice*', '2 tablespoons Vital Proteins Beef Gelatin']
directions:
['Place 2 cups of juice into a large bowl. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of gelatin over the top of juice. Set aside. Allow to bloom for 5 minutes. Place remaining juice in a small saucepan over low heat. Warm juice until just steaming. Do not boil. Add warm juice to bloomed gelatin mixture. Stir until gelatin has fully dissolved. If desired, transfer into a shallow dish or your favorite mold. Chill for 4 hours or until set.', 'Optional toppings:
Coconut cream
Whipped cream
Fresh fruit']

ingredients: ['2 cups pinto beans (rinsed 3 times and sorted)', '8 cups water', '1-2 tablespoons sea salt']
directions: ['In a large pot, bring beans and water to a boil. Cover and reduce to simmer for 4 hours. Add 1 tablespoon sea salt, mash with potato masher (3-4 mashes to thicken liquid but keep most beans whole) and simmer another 30 minutes uncovered. Add more salt to taste if needed.']

ingredients: ['1/2 lb Wild Salmon Filet', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'sea salt & pepper to taste', '1/2 lemon', '1 sweet onion, sliced into rings']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F. Place salmon on a large sheet of tin foil. Rub salmon with 2 teaspoons of olive oil, a pinch of sea salt, and a pinch of black pepper. Squeeze half a lemon on top and place 4-5 sliced rings of onion on top of filet. Wrap entire piece of salmon in foil- make sure no filet is showing. Place the foil packet directly on oven rack and bake for 30-40 minutes or until cooked.']

ingredients: ['4 cups brewed ginger tea', '2 tablespoons cacao powder', '4 dates, soaked for a few hours, pitted and chopped', '1/2 cup wide unsweetened coconut shreds, toasted', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch cayenne', '4 cinnamon sticks (for garnish)']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients (except the cinnamon sticks) in a blender. Strain through cheesecloth or a nut milk bag. Heat strained mixture gently in sauce pan until warm. Serve with a cinnamon stick for garnish.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup Tamari nuts', '1/4 cup Tamari Pumpkin Seeds or Roasted Pumpkin seeds', '1/4 cup Goji berries', '1/4 cup goldenberries (can sub raisins or golden raisins)', '1/4 cup cacao nibs']
directions: ['Blend all ingredients together in a bowl. Store in container with lid.']

ingredients: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '3 small sweet potatoes, diced', '1 small onion, diced', '1 bell pepper, diced', '1 small zucchini, diced', '2 cloves garlic, diced or pressed', '1 small tomato, diced', '1 pinch red pepper flakes (optional)', '1 package organic firm or extra firm tofu, drained', '1/3 cup unsweeteneed almond milk (or other milk alternatives)', '1 tablespoon corn starch (or other thickening agent)', '3 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon gluten-free mustard', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon Kala Namak (optional)', '1 pinch black pepper (optional)']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375°F. Prepare pie dish by lining bottom with parchment paper and greasing the edges with extra oil.', 'Heat a skillet over medium heat and add oil and sweet potatoes. Sauté for 5 minutes. Add onions and sauté for an additional 5 minutes or until translucent. Add peppers, zucchini and garlic and sauté until tender crisp. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and sauté for 1 minute. Remove from heat.', 'In a food processor or blender, combine remaining ingredients and process until creamy and smooth. Add additional seasonings to taste. In a large mixing bowl, combine cooked veggies and tofu mixture. Slowly spoon this into the prepared pie dish. Bake in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes until the top is firm to the touch. Remove from oven and let sit for 10-15 minutes. Carefully flip the frittata out onto a serving dish and remove parchment paper.', 'Try topping with avocado slices, tomato, hot sauce, or salsa. This frittata would also be great on a bed of leafy greens!']

recipe_name: Sweet and Spicy Nut and Pretzel Mix
ingredients: ['4 cups large raw nuts (pecans, almonds or cashews)', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1/3 cup dark brown sugar', '1 teaspoon EACH ground allspice, cloves, ginger and cayenne', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 teaspoon kosher salt, if desired', '4 cups gluten free pretzels']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Line a large cookie sheet with foil and spread nuts in an even layer. Bake for about 10 minutes, turning the cookie sheet and stirring halfway through, just until nuts are lightly toasted.', 'Meanwhile, in a large bowl, mix the butter, brown sugar, spices, cocoa and maple syrup. Toss in warm nuts until all are coated. Add in the pretzels and salt, if using. Stir gently to mix, taking care not to break the pretzels. Return mixture to lined cookie sheet, bake for 12-15 minutes, stirring once or twice and watching so they don’t burn. Remove from oven and spread out on a another pan to cool completely.', 'Store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 inch piece ginger, finely chopped', '1 small sweet potato, diced', '1 large carrot, chopped', '1 cup broccoli florets', '1 large red bell pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '3 tablespoons red curry paste (adjust to taste)*', '1 splash tamari or coconut aminos', '1 tablespoon fish sauce or mock fish sauce (optional)', '1 14 oz can full-fat coconut milk']
directions: ['Heat coconut oil in a large pan or wok. Sauté the onions until soft. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 1-2 minutes more. Add sweet potato and carrot and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add broccoli and red bell pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes more until broccoli and red bell pepper are tender-crisp. Add turmeric, curry paste, fish sauce, and tamari or coconut aminos, and stir to mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes and then immediately add coconut milk. Cover and simmer over low heat until potatoes and carrots are tender. Serve over cauliflower rice or spiralized zucchini.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups unsweetened shredded coconut', '1 tablespoon coconut flour', 'Pinch of sea salt', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', '2 tablespoons raw honey', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Using a food processor, combine shredded coconut and coconut flour. Pulse in salt, coconut oil, honey and vanilla. Dough should form a ball. Form teaspoon sized balls onto a parchment-lined baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven for 7 minutes.']

recipe_name: Spring Lentil Salad with Roasted Carrots
ingredients: ['1 cup lentils, cooked in broth or water', '6 whole carrots, peeled', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', 'Baby salad greens (for serving)', 'Feta cheese, crumbled for garnish (optional)', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/2 cup torn parsley leaves', '1/2 cup torn mint leaves', '1/4 cup very thinly sliced radishes', '1-2 green onions, thinly sliced', 'Sea salt and black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Place cooked lentils in a bowl. Cut carrots into finger size pieces, and place them onto a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and golden on the edges, then remove from heat and allow to cool.', 'In a separate bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Mix some of the dressing into the lentils. Make a bed of salad greens on a serving plate, and spoon lentils on top. Layer the carrots over the lentils and drizzle with the remaining salad dressing. Sprinkle with feta cheese if using and serve.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari or coconut aminos', '2 teaspoons peanut or sesame oil', '1/2 cup almond, cashew or peanut butter', '2 teaspoons vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '1-2 cloves garlic', '1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)', '2/3 cup water']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor with water and mix until smooth. Add more water if a thinner consistency is desired. Serve over steamed veggies.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup quinoa, rinsed and drained', '1 pinch sea salt', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup lime juice', '3 cloves garlic, pressed', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper', '1 1/2 cup cooked black beans, rinsed', '1 cup corn, steamed and cooled', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '1/2 cup chopped cilantro']
directions: ['Boil water in small sauce pan, slowly add quinoa, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until all water is absorbed. Remove quinoa from heat and set aside to cool. Meanwhile, whisk dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Combine all black beans, cooled steamed corn, diced pepper, and chopped cilantro. When quinoa is cool, fold it in with the rest of salad and dressing.']

ingredients: ['7-10 large dates, pitted', '3/4 cup walnuts, soaked in water for 2-8 hours and rinsed', '3/4 cup almond meal', '1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '1 tablespoon water', 'Raw or toasted coconut', 'Fresh berries']
directions: ['Toss dates, walnuts, and almond meal in a food processor, blend, and add in cocoa powder and maple syrup. Continue to process and add water. More water may be added to reach desired consistency. Press mixture into a glass baking dish and refrigerate or freeze. Keeps in the freezer for up to a month.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds grass-fed beef (flank steak or London broil), still partially frozen for easier slicing', '2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons coconut aminos', '2 tablespoons maple syrup or honey', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon sea salt', 'Black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons warm water']
directions: ['Using a very sharp knife and cutting against the grain of the meat, slice beef thinly into approximately 1/8-inch slices.\nWhisk all remaining ingredients in a glass bowl.\nTransfer sliced meat and marinade into a shallow glass container and refrigerate for up to an hour. Arrange the meat on the trays of a food dehydrator and heat at 135-145°F degrees until dry (3-5 hours). Jerky may also be dried in the oven on the lowest heat setting but it will likely finish much faster.', 'Note: The marinade should be made to-taste; test the flavor before marinating the sliced meat. The measurements are approximate and will vary based on preferences.']

ingredients: ['1 cup filtered water, divided', '3 tablespoons beef gelatin*', '1 cup honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt']
directions: ['Grease an 8x8 (or larger) pan and line with unbleached parchment paper in both directions. Leave some length to use as handles when removing finished marshmallows.', 'In a mixing bowl, add gelatin with 1/2 cup of water. While the gelatin softens, pour the other 1/2 cup of water into a saucepan along with honey, vanilla and salt. Cook on medium-high heat until mixture begins to boil.', 'Place a candy thermometer in saucepan and continue to boil mixture until it reaches 240°F (the soft ball stage). This will take approximately 7-8 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat immediately.', 'Turn stand mixer to medium-low and pour the honey mixture into the bowl slowly, combining it with the softened gelatin. Turn the mixer to high and beat mixture until it becomes thick like marshmallow fluff (about 10 min). Transfer the marshmallow fluff to prepared pan.', 'Smooth fluff evenly in the pan with lightly-greased hands. Or, press marshmallows into place gently using parchment paper, leaving parchment paper in place until marshmallows set completely.']

ingredients: ['1 small/medium jicama, peeled', '1 tablespoon avocado oil', '1/3 cup almond or cashew meal', '1 teaspoon nutritional yeast', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 teaspoon onion powder', '1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika']
directions: ['Line baking sheet with parchment paper and preheat oven to 375°F.', 'Cut jicama into 1/4" thick lengthwise slices, then cut again into 1/4" sticks to resemble fries. Slice as evenly as possible for even baking. Add sticks to a plastic bag and add oil, almond or cashew meal, nutritional yeast, and spices. Seal bag and shake to coat sticks with the mixture. Place sticks on a lined baking sheet, spaced apart so they are not touching each other. Bake for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, flip fries, return to oven for another 10 minutes or until golden brown.']

ingredients: ['4 cups kale', '2 tablespoons cashew butter', '1 tablespoon avocado oil', '1 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', 'Pinch of sea salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 275°F. Wash kale and chop into small pieces. Pat dry with a towel or spin in a salad spinner to remove as much moisture as possible, which will help prevent kale from becoming soggy. In a bowl, combine cashew butter, avocado oil, nutritional yeast, garlic powder and sea salt. Cover the kale with the cashew butter mixture and mix with hands until evenly coated. Bake for 20-25 minutes until kale is crispy.']

ingredients: ['1 bunch kale', '1-3 tablespoons pasture butter or coconut oil, melted', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325°F. Wash kale and remove stems. Pat dry with clean kitchen towel. Roughly chop kale into 1" pieces and place in an oven-safe pan. Drizzle melted butter or coconut oil over kale. Sprinkle coated kale with sea salt. Bake 10-15 minutes, watching closely so chips do not burn.']

ingredients: ['2 celery roots, trimmed and cubed', '4 tablespoons pasture butter or extra virgin olive oil', '1-2 garlic cloves, roasted', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Steam the cubed celery root until tender, approximately 15-20 minutes. Drain and place in food processor. Add butter or olive oil, garlic, turmeric, sea salt and pepper. Puree until mixture is smooth and creamy.']

ingredients: ['1 bunch kale, stemmed and finely chopped*', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1/3 cup toasted nuts, such as almonds, pistachios, or walnuts', '1/4 cup unsweetened dried cherries or apple juice sweetened dried cranberries', '1/2 cup pitted kalamata olives, chopped', '1 tablespoon hempseeds']
directions: ['Place the kale in a large bowl, add lemon juice, lemon zest, olive oil, garlic, and salt. Wash hands, then massage mixture until kale is softened, about 1 minute. Add nuts, dried fruit, olives, and hempseeds. Toss to combine ingredients. Rather than serving immediately, let salad rest for 15-20 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.']

ingredients: ['2 cups pure pineapple juice', '2 limes, juiced', '1 tablespoon honey', '1/4 cup plum vinegar', '3 tablespoons mint, finely chopped', '2 cups cubed pineapple', '4 cups seasonal melon, cut into cubes or balls']
directions: ['In a sauce pan, mix pineapple juice, lime juice, honey, and vinegar. Bring to a boil and reduce for about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Add chopped mint. Transfer fruit to a large bowl. Pour reduced glaze over fruit and stir to coat.']
