ingredients: ['1 4-inch piece of kombu, optional', '1 quart vegetable broth or water', '1 bunch green onions, chopped', '1 large sheet raw nori, cut into small strips', '1 pound sprouted tofu, cubed (optional)', '1/4 cup miso paste', '1/2 cup warm water (for mixing with miso)']
directions: ['Rinse the kombu and steep overnight in a quart of broth or water.', 'Remove kombu and heat up the broth to about 175°F, do not boil. Stir in green onion, nori, and tofu, if using. Simmer for 3-5 minutes, remove from heat. Dissolve miso paste in warm water, and then stir into soup mixture. Serve and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '1/2 large onion, chopped', '1/2 medium fennel bulb, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon Italian herb blend', '1 1/2 cups no-mato base (see recipe)', '4 splashes coconut aminos', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1-2 cups bone broth', '4 tablespoons basil, julienned', '2 tablespoons rendered animal fat', 'Sea salt, black pepper, and balsamic vinegar to taste']
directions: ['Add 3 tablespoons of olive oil to a medium saucepot. Add onion, fennel, garlic, and Italian seasoning and saute until vegetables start to brown. Add no-mato base, coconut aminos, garlic powder, and bone broth to pot and bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for approximately 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the fresh basil, remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil and rendered animal fat. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed with salt, pepper, and balsamic vinegar.']

ingredients: ['3 1/2 pounds chicken breasts/thighs', '1 1/2 cups coconut milk', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon coconut oil', '1 cup gluten-free breadcrumbs', '1 cup shredded coconut', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Cut chicken up into 2 inch slices. Mix coconut milk and lemon juice. Marinate chicken in this mixture for 2 hours. Preheat oven to 375 F. Coat a rectangular glass baking dish with coconut oil. Combine breadcrumbs, coconut, sage, oregano, parselyl, sea salt, and pepper in large bowl. Dip coated chicken strips in breadcrumb mixture and place in baking dish. Bake up to 1 hour and 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked thoroughly.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups unsweetened almond milk (or other milk alternative)', '1/3 cup chia seeds', '1/4 cup cacao powder or unsweetened cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '2-5 tablespoons pure maple syrup']
directions: ['Add all ingredients except maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk to combine. Add maple syrup slowly and taste (sweeten to your personal preference). Cover and let rest in the fridge for at least 3-5 hours (or overnight) to thicken. You may also portion out in 4 mason jars to have prepared servings ready to go!\nFor toppings, try berries, paleo-friendly granola, or shelled hemp seed. Leftovers should keep 2-3 days in the fridge.']

ingredients: ['1 medium onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 celery stalks, finely chopped', '1 cup mushrooms, chopped', '1 tablespoon pasture butter or ghee', '2 pounds grass-fed beef, buffalo, or lamb', '1/2 pound pasture-raised or organic liver, finely chopped', '1 egg from a pastured hen', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/2 cup unsweetened ketchup']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Sauté onion, garlic, celery and mushrooms in butter or ghee until tender. In a large bowl, combine the ground meat, liver, egg, herbs, salt, pepper, and sautéed vegetables. Mix well. Place meat mixture in loaf pan and bake for 15 minutes. After baking for 15 minutes, gently spread the ketchup on top of the loaf. Continue to bake for another 40-45 minutes, or until fully cooked.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ghee or coconut oil', '3 sweet potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '3 jewel yams, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '2 pounds grass-fed ground meat of your choice', '1 large onion, diced', '8 shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '3 celery ribs, diced', '3 tablespoons ghee, coconut oil, or rendered animal fat', '1 tablespoon dried sage', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 cup white wine', '3 tart apples, cored and cut into 1/2-inch chunks', '1/2 cup chicken stock', '3/4 cup toasted hazelnuts or walnuts']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. In the oven, melt butter in roasting pan. Toss diced sweet potatoes and yams in roasting pan after butter has melted, stir to coat. Bake yams and sweet potatoes for 45 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside.\nIn a skillet, crumble meat and cook until lightly browned. Remove from heat. Set aside. Sauté onions, mushrooms, and celery in reserved fat in a saucepan until onions begin to caramelize. Add seasonings and cook over medium heat for 2 additional minutes. Add white wine and continue cooking over medium heat until liquid is reduced by half.\nIn a large bowl, combine sautéed vegetable mixture, browned meat, apple chunks, roasted sweet potato and yam cubes, chicken stock, and nuts. Transfer all ingredients to a baking dish and bake at 350°F for 20 minutes. Bake until all ingredients are tender. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['3 large portobello mushrooms', '1/2-1 cup pizza sauce', '1 small onion, cut into rings', '1 tablespoon ghee or coconut oil', '4-5 kale leaves, chopped']
directions: ['Pre-heat oven to 375°F. Rinse and de-stem mushrooms and place on baking tray or in heat-proof glass dish. Bake for 10 minutes, pour off any accumulated liquid. Flip mushrooms and bake another 10 minutes or until mushrooms are tender. While the mushrooms are baking, get pizza sauce ready and cook onions in ghee or coconut oil. Top baked mushrooms with sauce, onions, and kale. Bake for another 7-10 minutes.']

ingredients: ['1 pint blueberries', '2 bunches flat leaf parsley', '1/3 cup mint leaves', '1 each small cucumber', '1/4 each white onion', '1 cup hemp hearts', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon New Seasons Market Moroccan Seasoning']
directions: ['Rinse blueberries in cold water and set half of them aside. With the other half, use a food processor to pulse into a coarse puree.', 'Rinse parsley and mint in cool water, pat dry, and chop.', 'Peel and dice cucumber.', 'Mince white onion.', 'Combine vegetables, blueberries, and herbs in a large bowl with hemp seeds.', 'Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and Moroccan Seasoning to make a dressing.', 'Pour dressing over salad and mix to coat all ingredients.', 'Let rest at least one hour and up to 24 hours before serving.\nServes 4 as a side dish.']

recipe_name: Creamy Zucchini Soup with Hemp Seeds
ingredients: ['4 medium zucchini, sliced lengthwise', '1 large onion, peeled and quartered', '2 large cloves garlic, peeled', '1 cup water', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '2 teaspoon Ume plum vinegar', '1 tablespoon hemp seeds', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '1/4 cup nutritional yeast', '', '2 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon hemp seeds', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper']
directions: ['Fill a large stock pot with about an inch of water. Place metal steamer in pot and add zucchini, onions, and garlic. Steam with lid on for about 5 minutes, until the zucchini is tender and the onions are just slightly translucent. Remove from heat, and transfer vegetables to a blender. Add about ½-¾ cup of the steam water (you can add more later if need be, depending how thick you like it). Then add in salt, Ume plum vinegar, coconut oil, and nutritional yeast, and blend on high till everything is fully incorporated and creamy smooth. Divide the soup among bowls and garnish with the olive oil, hemp seeds, and cayenne pepper.']

ingredients: ['2 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, scrubbed and cut into 1 inch dice', '1/3 cup chopped Piquillo peppers', '1/3 cup mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 lime, juiced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 scallions, thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons finely chopped Marcona almonds']
directions: ['Place the diced potatoes into a large pot of cold water, cover, and bring to a boil. Once boiling, uncover and simmer for 8 - 10 minutes, or until tender. Drain potatoes and allow to cool for 30 minutes. In a large bowl, combine peppers, mayonnaise, paprika, and lime, and whisk to combine. Add the cooled potatoes and toss to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer potato salad to a clean bowl and garnish with scallions and Marcona almonds.']

recipe_name: Farro Salad with Hemp Seed Pesto
ingredients: ['2 cups farro, cooked until tender', '1/4 cup roasted garlic cloves', '1 (14 ounce) jar artichoke hearts, drained and diced', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '1/2 cup hemp seed pesto (recipe follows)', '2 ounces fresh basil, leaves only', '1 packed cup Italian parsley, leaves only', '1/3 cup hemp seeds', '2 cloves garlic', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/3 cup olive oil', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['To make the pesto, combine the basil, parsley, hemp seeds, garlic, and lemon in a food processor and pulse to chop, scraping down the sides as necessary. Once the mixture is finely chopped, add the olive oil in a steady stream through the feed tube with the machine running until you have a thick sauce, again scraping down the sides as needed. Season the pesto to taste with salt and pepper and set aside until ready to use.', 'To make the salad, combine the farro, garlic, artichoke hearts, and tomatoes in a large bowl and toss with the pesto sauce. Season with additional salt and pepper if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups coconut milk', '1/2 cup unsweetened shredded coconut', '4 tablespoons chia seeds', '2 tablespoons coconut nectar', '2 teaspoons vanilla bean paste', '1/2 medium banana, diced']
directions: ['In a Mason jar or medium bowl, combine the coconut milk, shredded coconut, chia seeds, coconut nectar, and vanilla paste. Shake jar or mix well to combine. Gently stir in diced banana. Cover and refrigerate overnight to soften chia seeds.']

ingredients: ['1 large bunch red beets, trimmed', '3 sweet - tart apples, such as Jonagold or Pink Lady', '6 ounces aged white cheddar cheese, crumbled', '1/3 cup roasted pumpkin seeds', '2 tablespoons sherry vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons honey', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons pumpkin seed oil']
directions: ['Place the beets in a large pot of salted water. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer and cook for 45 - 65 minutes or until tender. Once tender, immediately run the beets under cold water and slip off the skins. Cut the warm beets into a medium dice and place in a bowl in the refrigerator to cool. For the dressing, combine the vinegar, mustard, honey, and salt in a jar and shake vigorously. Add the oil and shake again vigorously. Cut the apples into a medium dice and place in a medium bowl. Add all of the dressing to the apples and toss to combine. To serve the salad, layer the beets on the bottom of a glass bowl. Layer the dressed apples on top. Top with crumbled cheddar cheese and pumpkin seeds.']

ingredients: ['1 cup soaked nuts or seeds of your choosing*', '2-4 cups purified water (for blending)', 'optional sweeteners (maple syrup, coconut nectar, raw honey, dates, stevia)', 'optional flavors (cocoa powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, cardamom, turmeric, pumpkin spice, sea salt)']
directions: ['Choose a mixture of nuts and seeds and soak (see below). Rinse the soaked nuts/seeds and place in blender along with 2 cups purified water and blend well, adding more water if needed to reach desired consistency. Pour the mixture through a nut milk bag or fine sieve. Add optional sweetener or flavors and re-blend. Enjoy. Store in the refrigerator for 4-5 days.', 'How to Soak Nuts and Seeds\nChoose raw, unsalted varieties. Place nuts and seeds* in a bowl and cover them completely with water. Nuts and seeds should be soaked for a minimum of 4 hours but overnight is best (the longer they soak the silkier the milk). After soaking, rinse and drain.', '*Hemp seeds do not need to be soaked.']

ingredients: ['1 pound bones from poultry, fish, beef or lamb (from leftover cooked meat or raw*)', '4 cups water', '1 tablespoon unfiltered apple cider vinegar', 'optional: vegetables and spices such as celery, carrots (tops too), zucchini, spinach, garlic, onions, ginger root, turmeric root, rosemary and parsley']
directions: ['Place bones in a large pot and cover bones with cold water. Add apple cider vinegar and let pot stand for at least 30 minutes. Place pot on stove and bring water to a boil. Reduce heat to a slow simmer and skim off any froth that rises to the top. Allow broth to simmer for a minimum of 4 hours and up to 2 days. Mineral content increases with longer cooking time. If using vegetables and spices add them halfway through cooking time. Remove pot from heat and take out bones and vegetables. Strain remaining broth. Store broth in the refrigerator for up to five days. It will also last in the freezer for several months.', 'Chilled broth will gel if enough gelatin from bones is present.']

ingredients: ['1 cup coconut milk', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2-1 teaspoon raw honey', 'pinch black pepper', 'optional additions (pinch of ground ginger, drop of vanilla extract)']
directions: ['In a saucepan, warm coconut milk over medium heat. Stir in all other ingredients and enjoy.']

ingredients: ['2 cups carrot tops', '1 clove garlic', '1/4 cup toasted walnuts', 'juice of 1/2 small lemon', '1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil', 'sea salt, to taste']
directions: ['In food processor, place carrot tops, garlic, toasted walnuts, lemon juice, and blend. Add the olive oil and process until smooth. Salt to taste.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup (half a stick) butter', '1 small yellow onion, medium dice', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '3/4 pound mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 cup hazelnuts, roasted and skinned', '3 tablespoons hazelnut oil']
directions: ['Melt butter in a wide sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the onion, garlic, mushrooms, thyme, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until the onion is soft and most of the liquid from the mushrooms has evaporated. Set aside to cool slightly. Purée the hazelnuts in a food processor. With the motor running, add the hazelnut oil and mix until creamy. Add the mushroom mixture and blend until smooth, scraping down the sides as necessary. Season to taste with more salt and pepper if necessary. Pour pâté into a medium ramekin, smooth the top, and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate until cold.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound chicken breast, cut into chunks', '1 medium yellow onion, small dice', '2 large cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons sweet smoked paprika', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 1/2 cups short grain rice', '1 (14.5 oz.) can diced tomatoes', '8 ounces dry chorizo, small dice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 cups frozen peas', '1/4 cup chopped fresh Italian parsley']
directions: ['Heat the olive oil in a wide saute pan over medium heat. Add the chicken breast and cook, stirring often, until no longer pink. Add the onion and garlic and saute a few minutes more, until the onions begin to soften. Add the paprika and stir to coat. Lastly, add the broth to the pan and bring to a simmer. In the meantime, place the rice, tomatoes, chorizo, and salt in the crock pot. Once the broth mixture simmers, carefully pour it into the crock pot. Turn the crock pot to high heat and stir the contents well. Cover and cook for approximately 90 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed. Lastly, stir in the peas, cover and cook 10 minutes more. Serve the paella immediately, garnished with the fresh parsley.']

recipe_name: Spicy Italian Pork White Bean & Kale Soup
ingredients: ['2 (14oz) cans white beans, drained and rinsed', '1c white onions thinly sliced', '1lb spicy Italian pork sausage', '1 qt chicken broth', '1 bunch kale thinly sliced']
directions: ['In a medium stockpot over medium high heat, cook the sausage until brown, about 10 minutes (or until fully cooked).', 'Add onions, cook until translucent then add broth and beans, bring up to to a boil, then reduce to a simmer.', 'Add kale and simmer for 10 minutes and serve.']

ingredients: ['6 ripe peaches, halved, pits removed', 'Extra virgin olive oil', 'Coarse salt', '1 cup crème fraiche (or sour cream)', '3 tablespoons maple syrup']
directions: ['Preheat oven to low broil. Lay peach halves skin side down on a rimmed baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle salt across the pieces. Broil in oven on the top rack, 3-5 minutes or until fruit begins to brown.', 'Meanwhile, in a small mixing bowl, combine crème fraîche (or sour cream) and maple syrup together. Drizzle maple mixture over warm peaches and serve.']

ingredients: ['4 cups cherries, stemmed and pitted', 'Zest of 1/2 orange', 'Zest of ½ lemon', '5 garlic cloves, peeled and crushed', '2 rosemary sprigs', '5 thyme sprigs', '2 bay leaves', '¾ cup extra virgin olive oil', '¼ cup sherry vinegar', '½ tsp sea salt']
directions: ['In a large mixing bowl, combine cherries, zest of both citrus, garlic, rosemary thyme and bay leaves.', 'In a small mixing bowl, combine olive oil, vinegar and salt. Pour oil mixture over the cherries. Stir well.', 'Let sit at room temperature for about 4 hours, stirring occasionally. Cover and refrigerate overnight.', 'Allow to come to room temperature before serving (worth it, we promise!)']

ingredients: ['4 cups your favorite veggies, cut into evenly sized pieces', '4 tbsp olive oil', 'Salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400° F.', 'In a large bowl, combine veggies and olive oil. Stir well to coat. Season with salt and pepper.', "Arrange veggies on baking sheet in a single layer. Be sure to leave enough space between veggies—it's the key to achieving that nice golden crisp on the outside.", 'Roast in the preheated oven until tender on the inside and golden on the outside, about 30 minutes. Give them a little stir about halfway through.']

recipe_name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Squash with Dried Cranberries
ingredients: ['1 lb butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1” chunks', '1 lb Brussels sprouts, trimmed and sliced lengthwise in half', '½ cup dried cranberries (sweetened or unsweetened is fine)', '2 tsp Dijon mustard', '1 tbsp rice wine vinegar', '4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tsp salt', 'Freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 degrees.', 'In a large bowl, toss together Brussels sprouts, butternut squash chunks, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp salt, and pepper. Mix until vegetables are coated evenly.', 'Arrange veggies on a large baking sheet with Brussels sprouts facing cut side-down. Be sure to leave some space between everything so they can get nice and caramelized.', 'Roast for 20-30 minutes, tossing gently about halfway through, or until veggies are tender and caramelized/golden brown. During the last five minutes of roasting, scatter dried cranberries on baking sheet.', 'Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly.', 'In a small bowl, whisk together rice wine vinegar and Dijon. While whisking continuously, slowly pour in olive oil until emulsified. Season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Gently toss roasted veggies with vinaigrette in a serving bowl until lightly dressed. Serve warm, room temperature, or chilled.']

ingredients: ['1 Tablespoon chicken bouillon paste (or 1 cube)', '1 teaspoon each dried oregano or parsley', '¾ cup cooked diced chicken meat', '3/4 cup cooked white rice', '½ cup baby spinach leaves, chopped', '1 Tablespoon red curry paste', '½ cup coconut milk', '1 Tablespooon vegetable bouillon paste (or 1 cube)', '1 tsp fresh grated ginger', '1 ½ cup cubed and peeled butternut squash (fresh or frozen)', '1 Tablespoon vegetable or chicken bouillon paste (or 1 cube)', '1 cup frozen peas and carrots', '1 cup frozen green beans', '½ cup frozen corn kernels', '3/4 cup cooked quinoa']
directions: ['For chicken and rice soup: Layer in a jar- starting at the bottom and working your way down the list. To serve, pour hot water over contents, screw on jar lid and shake lightly. Let sit 8-10 minutes and serve.', 'For curried butternut squash soup: Layer in a jar- starting at the bottom and working your way down the list. To serve, pour hot water over contents, screw on jar lid and shake lightly. Let sit 8-10 minutes and serve.', 'For all the veggies soup: Layer in a jar- starting at the bottom and working your way down the list. To serve, pour hot water over contents, screw on jar lid and shake lightly. Let sit 8-10 minutes and serve. Simple, would be great with hot sauce.']

ingredients: ["4 cups chicken bone broth, we like Bare Bones, Bonafide Provisions, Butcher's Bone Broth, or homemade", '2-4 large eggs, whisked', '2 bunches baby bok choy, thinly sliced', 'coconut aminos, optional', 'fish sauce, optional']
directions: ['Bring broth to a simmer over medium-low heat, add greens, season with a few shakes of coconut aminos or fish sauce, if desired. While broth simmers, whisk eggs together in a separate bowl. Reduce heat so that broth is steaming but not bubbling. Slowly pour whisked eggs into broth, whisking broth with a fork while pouring egg in a thin stream. Let soup stand for a minute or two, allowing egg to finish cooking. Turn off heat, serve, and top with desired garnishes such as hot sauce, smoked salt, cilantro, or thinly sliced jalapeno.']

ingredients: ['1/2 lb stinging nettles', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 T extra virgin olive oil', '1 T red wine vinegar', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, optional', '']
directions: ['Bring 2 quarts of water to a rolling boil. Using tongs or wearing thick gloves, add the nettles and blanch for 60 seconds. Drain and allow to cool slightly, then squeeze out as much moisture as possible. Remove any tough stems, then chop coarsely and set aside. Heat a pan over medium heat, once warm, add the olive oil and chopped garlic with a generous pinch of salt. Saute garlic for about one minute, not allowing it to brown. Add the chopped nettles and cook, uncovered and stirring occasionally, for another 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add the vinegar and red pepper flakes, if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 3/4 pounds asparagus spears, tough ends snapped, cut into 2-inch lengths', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'Sea salt, to taste', 'Freshly ground pepper, to taste', '6 cups chicken broth', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 1/2 cups finely chopped onion', '1 1/2 cups Arborio rice', '1/2 cup dry vermouth', '1/2 cup finely grated “E Tartufo” sheep’s milk cheese', '1/4 cup finely grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 ½ teaspoon finely grated lemon zest']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°. Toss the asparagus with 1 tablespoon of the oil, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and roast until just tender. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.', 'Bring the broth to a simmer in a medium saucepan. Reduce heat to low. In a large saucepan, heat the remaining oil and the butter over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until translucent, 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Add the vermouth and stir until liquid is absorbed, 1 minute.', 'Add 1 ladle of hot broth to the rice and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, until the broth is absorbed. Continue adding stock one ladleful at a time until almost all of the stock is used, about 15 minutes. (Keep a ladleful of broth in reserve.)', 'Add the roasted asparagus (reserving 8 asparagus tips for garnish), cheeses, lemon juice, lemon zest, and parsley and stir to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (If you prefer it saucier, add the remaining broth now.)', 'Divide the risotto among 4 bowls and top each bowl with 2 of the asparagus spears and serve.']

ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic, finely grated', '1/4 cup New Seasons Market olive oil', '1/4 cup pure maple syrup', '1 tablespoon harissa paste', '2 teaspoons cumin seeds', 'kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 1/2 pounds small rainbow carrots, scrubbed, tops trimmed, halved', '1 lemon, thinly sliced, seeds removed']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450°F.', 'Whisk garlic, oil, maple syrup, harissa, and cumin seeds in a small bowl.', 'Toss carrots and lemon with garlic mixture in a large roasting pan to coat; season with salt and pepper.', 'Roast, tossing occasionally, until carrots are tender and lemons are caramelized, 35–40 minutes.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup toasted almonds', '1 lb asparagus', '1/2 cup packed fresh basil leaves', '2 cloves garlic', '2/3 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '3/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Remove woody portion of stem from asparagus and cut into 2-inch sections.', 'Combine the asparagus, basil, garlic, almonds and cheese in a food processor and pulse a few times to coarsely chop. Careful not to over process!', 'With the motor running, slowly pour in the oil and process until emulsified. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', 'Try on crostini, crackers, sandwiches, pasta, pizza, eggs and anything else your heart desires!']

ingredients: ['1 cup water', '1 tablespoon dried nettle leaves OR 1/2 cup fresh nettle leaves', '1 teaspoon honey or maple syrup (optional)', '1 slice lemon (optional)', 'Fresh mint (optional)']
directions: ['Bring one cup of water to a boil, and pour over nettles and steep. Nettles can steep anywhere from 15 minutes to several hours, depending on strength of tea desired. Strain tea and add your favorite accent such as honey, maple syrup, a slice of lemon, or fresh mint.']

ingredients: ['1 lb asparagus, trimmed', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', 'kosher salt to taste', '3 tablespoons shredded Parmesan Reggiano cheese']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high. In a bowl, drizzle oil over asparagus coating evenly. Grill for 2 to 3 minutes on each side. Plate asparagus and drizzle with lemon juice. Lightly salt and top with Parmesan Reggiano.']

ingredients: ['1 1/4 lbs rhubarb, trimmed and cut into ½-inch lengths on the diagonal', '1 1/3 cups granulated sugar, divided', '1/2 teaspoon finely grated lemon zest', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened', '2 large eggs', '1 1/3 cups all purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/3 cup sour cream']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350º. Coat the bottom and sides of a 9x13 baking pan with butter or cooking spray. Then line the bottom with parchment paper extending the ends up the sides. Stir together rhubarb, lemon juice and 2/3 cup sugar and set aside. Beat butter, remaining sugar and lemon zest with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, scraping down the bowl. Whisk flour, baking powder, salt and ground ginger together in a small bowl. Add one third of this flour mixture to the batter, mixing until just combined. Continue, adding half the sour cream, the second third of the flour mixture, the remaining sour cream and the final flour mixture, mixing between each addition until just combined. Pour batter into prepared pan and smooth the top evenly. Pour the rhubarb mixture over the cake and spread evenly in a layer. Bake in preheated oven 50-60 minutes. The cake is done when a toothpick comes out dry. Cool in pan and serve with whip or ice cream.']

ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups rhubarb sliced into chunks', '2/3 cup sugar', '2 tablespoons tapioca', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 1/2 cups stawberries, halved', '2 tablespoons Kirsch (optional)', 'whipped cream for garnish']
directions: ['Combine rhubarb, sugar, tapioca, and lemon juice in a pan, and heat to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 minutes. Remove from heat add the strawberries and Kirsch. Spoon over shortcake or pound cake and top with whipped cream.']

ingredients: ['2 cups carrot tops', '1 clove garlic', '1/4 cup toasted walnuts', 'juice of 1/2 small lemon', '1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil', 'sea salt, to taste']
directions: ['In food processor, place carrot tops, garlic, toasted walnuts, lemon juice, and blend. Add the olive oil and process until smooth. Salt to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons finely minced shallots', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 + 1/4 cups chopped Swiss chard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '½ cup of diced ham or lamb, depending on preference', '4 eggs', '1 + 1/4 cups whipping cream', '1 generous pinch nutmeg', 'one 9” pie shell', '1 cup grated swiss cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F and bake pie shell on a baking sheet for 9-10 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Reduce oven temperature to 375°.', 'In a medium skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add shallots and sauté 3-5 minutes . Add chard and stir for several minutes, until most of its water has cooked out.', 'In a medium mixing bowl, beat eggs, cream, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Place sautéed chard, meat, and about 2/3 of the cheese into the bottom of the pie shell. Pour in egg mixture. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese.', 'Bake in preheated oven for 25 - 30 minutes. The quiche is done when a knife plunged into the center comes out clean.']

ingredients: ['2 lbs fresh strawberries, washed and quartered', '1 orange', '1 poundcake, cubed', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla extract', '10 cups (lowball style clear drinking glasses work well)', 'Mint leaves for garnish']
directions: ['Zest and juice orange. Reserve 2 tsp. of zest and gently toss strawberries in orange juice. Set aside.', 'In a mixing bowl, whip the heavy cream, sugar and vanilla until peaks form. Fold zest into whipped cream.', 'Layer each serving glass with pound cake, strawberries, and whipped cream. Repeat until cups are filled to top. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and refrigerate until ready to serve.']

ingredients: ['3/4 cup diced red onion', '1 Tablespoon butter', '1 bunch asparagus, tough ends removed', '1/2 teaspoon lemon zest', '9 inch pie crust', '1 cup half and half', '4 eggs', '1/4 teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch salt', 'to taste freshly ground pepper', '1 cup shredded jack cheese']
directions: ['Sauté the red onion in butter until soft and slightly caramelized.', 'Combine eggs, basil, salt, pepper and lemon zest, whisk well in a medium-sized bowl and set aside.', 'Steam asparagus until crisp-tender, cut into bite size pieces and set aside 8 tips approximately 2” long to garnish the top of the quiche.', 'Spread half of the cheese on the bottom of the pie shell.', 'Layer in asparagus pieces and top with remaining cheese.', 'Pour in the egg mixture and arrange reserved asparagus tips on top in a sunburst pattern.', 'Place in pre-heated 450°F oven and after 15 minutes, turn the oven down to 350°F and continue to bake until firm about ½ hour.', 'Let rest for 15 minutes before serving.']

ingredients: ['1 head of garlic, cloves peeled', '1/4 cup rosemary leaves', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 racks of lamb, frenched (2 pounds each)', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper']
directions: ['In a mini food processor, combine the garlic, rosemary and olive oil and process until the garlic is finely chopped. Season the lamb racks with salt and pepper and rub the garlic-rosemary oil all over them. Set the racks fat side up on a large rimmed baking sheet and let stand for 1 hour.\nPreheat the oven to 450°. Roast the lamb in the upper third of the oven for 15 minutes. Turn the racks and roast until 145 degress, or to your desired doneness. Transfer the racks to a carving board, stand them upright and let rest for 10 minutes.\nCarve the racks in between the rib bones and transfer to plates. Serve right away.']

ingredients: ['Average 5 pound leg of lamb bone in or boneless', '4 cloves garlic, sliced', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary', 'Salt and black pepper to taste']
directions:
['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Cut slits in the top of the leg of lamb every 3 to 4 inches, deep enough to push slices of garlic down into the meat. Salt and pepper generously all over the top of lamb, place several sprigs of fresh rosemary under and on top of the lamb. Place lamb on roasting pan.
Roast in preheated oven until the lamb is cooked to your desired doneness, about 1 3/4 to 2 hours. Do not overcook the lamb, the flavor is best if meat is still slightly pink. Let rest at least 10 minutes before carving.
 ']

ingredients: ['1 stick (1/2 cup) butter, room temperature', 'Plastic wrap', '+ Choose from following mix-in combinations:', '', '2 tsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp dried tarragon', '1 shallot', 'Black pepper, to taste', '100 ml red wine', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1/2 bunch parsley', 'Black pepper, to taste', '100 g chèvre/soft goat cheese', '1 tbsp finely chopped chives', '2 tsp smoked paprika', '1 tsp dried chilli flakes', 'Pinch dried oregano', '3 strips cooked bacon', '2 tsp maple syrup']
directions: ['For Tarragon & Lemon and Red Wine & Shallot recipes prepare mix-ins as follows. For all other flavors, skip to step 2.', 'Tarragon & Lemon:\nFirst, soak dried tarragon in lemon juice. Then pulse shallot in food processor.', 'Red Wine & Shallot:\nBring shallot and wine to a simmer in a pan and reduce until wine is almost totally absorbed, about 5-10 minute. Set aside to cool. Place butter, parsley and black pepper in food processor and pulse until combined.', 'Place all the ingredients into food processor and pulse until combined.', 'Use a spatula to scrape down sides of food processor, and pulse again until everything is well combined.', 'Lay down a large section of plastic wrap on your workspace. Spoon the butter out into a rough log shape. Carefully begin rolling the plastic wrap around the butter mixture, then pinch the ends together and continue rolling to form a nice tight log.', 'Tie off both ends of the plastic wrap into knots, and store in the fridge.', 'To serve, unwrap chilled butter log and slice into medallions.']

ingredients: ["2 3/4 Cups Bob's Red Mill Gluten Free 1-to-1 Baking Flour", '1/2 cup + 1 tbs almond flour', '3 1/2 tsp psyllium husk powder', '2 tsp baking powder', '2 tsp sea salt', '1 tsp quick rise or rapid rise yeast', '2 1/2 cups water, 100F', '1/4 cup olive oil + more for brushing the parchment paper', '1/3 cup olive oil', 'Juice + zest of 2 lemons', '1/4 cup fresh basil', '1/4 cup pine nuts', '1 tsp each, salt and pepper', '1/2 cup spring Black Sheep Creamery fresh sheep cheese (if unavailable, substitute with chèvre)', '1 small bunch asparagus', '8 ounces creme fraiche', '1 egg', 'Sliced red onions', '6 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto', '1 handful of arugula', '1 tbsp chopped fresh chives', 'Sugar snap peas', 'Crushed red pepper']
directions: ['Mix the Dough: In a medium mixing bowl add the gluten free flour, almond flour, psyllium husk powder, baking powder, salt and yeast. Pour in the warmed water and olive oil. Mix with a fork until the ingredients come together. Knead by hand, in the bowl, for one minute making sure the dough is hydrated. It will be thick and sticky, almost like mashed potatoes. Scrape the excess dough off your fingers using a fork. Cover the bowl with a damp tea towel and leave on kitchen counter or warm area to rise for about 90 minutes. The dough should rise to about 1 1/2 times its size and be fluffy.', 'Divide and Shape the Dough: Dive the dough into two balls. On the oiled parchment paper, set a pizza dough ball in the center. Wet your hands. Working with both finger tips and palms, start pressing in the center of the dough, working your way towards the edges in a circular pattern leaving an edge all around. Continue, wetting your hands and smoothing over the dough with light pressure as needed so the dough does not stick to your hands. Shape it by smoothing the dough in circular motions and/or pinching to create the edges, then smoothing with moist fingers again. Wet a fork and dock the pizza (create small holes to prevent air bubbles) with the tines of the fork 5-6 times.', 'Par-Bake the Dough: Par-bake for 13-15 minutes, or until the dough is golden at 550F. Remove from oven.', 'Prepare the Lemon Pesto Sauce. Blend olive oil, lemon juice + zest, basil, pine nuts, and salt and pepper in blender until creamy.', 'Spread pesto on crust.', 'Top with clumps of Black Sheep Creamery cheese, creme fraiche, asparagus, sliced red onions, and 1 egg.', 'Bake 7-8 minutes at 550F.', 'Garnish with prosciutto, arugula, fresh chives, sugar snap peas, and crushed red pepper.']

ingredients: ['4 slices vanilla poundcake, about 1/2" thick', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted', '4 peaches, cut in half, pit removed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '1/2 cup honey']
directions: ['Preheat grill (or grill pan) to medium high. Lightly brush both sides of poundcake with melted butter. Brush peach fruit with olive oil and put fruit-side down on preheated grill. Allow to grill, turning once about 5 minutes per side. Add poundcake slices to grill, 4-5 minutes a side, until light brown grill lines form. Place poundcake on serving plate and spread ¼ cup ricotta cheese on each slice. Chop grilled peaches and add to each slice. Drizzle with honey and serve warm.']

ingredients: ['2 pints ripe blackberries', '1 bunch basil', '4 cups sparkling water', '1/4 cup local honey']
directions: ['Gently rinse blackberries. Spread one pint loosely on sheet tray and place in freezer until frozen. Take other pint and pour in sauce pan with honey. Chiffonade 20 leaves of basil and add to the berry mixture. Add 1 cup of sparkling water to berry mixture. Cook on low heat, until berries soften and honey is incorporated, stirring frequently. Let cool then strain through a fine mesh sieve. Add cooled berry mixture to remaining 3 cups of sparkling water. Place individually frozen berries in popsicle molds. Place one whole basil leaf on top and fill with berry mixture. Place in freezer until set.']

ingredients: ['1 lb apricots, peaches, plums or nectarines', '2-4 tablespoons honey', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom, cinnamon or ginger']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°. Place fruit in 9 x 13 ovenproof dish. Drizzle with honey and sprinkle with spice of choice. Place in oven for 10 minutes, remove and stir. The fruit should be soft and breaking down. Cool and serve on yogurt, panna cotta, cake or ice cream. It is also delicious with toasted nuts.']

ingredients: ['1 lb cherries, de-stemmed and pitted', '1 orange', '1 lemon', '5 garlic cloves, peeled and crushed', '2 fresh rosemary sprigs', '5 fresh thyme sprigs', '2 bay leaves', '3/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 c cup Spanish aged sherry vinegar', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt']
directions: ['Place de-stemmed and pitted cherries in medium bowl. Using a vegetable peeler, remove half the zest of the lemon and orange. Add to the bowl along with the garlic, rosemary, thyme and bay. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar and salt. Pour over cherry mix. Stir thoroughly. Let sit at room temperature for four hours, stirring a few times. Cover and refrigerate to marinate overnight. Allow to reach room temperature before serving.']

ingredients: ['1 sweet onion, diced', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '2 limes, juiced', '6 apricots, cubed', '1 large jalapeno, chopped fine', '1 cup cherries, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, taste and adjust for seasoning. Fruit salsas are a great accompaniment to grilled meat or fish. You can mix and match the fruit and herbs to create a multitude of combinations.']

recipe_name: Grilled Skirt Steak and Arugula Salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons grainy mustard', '1/4 teaspoon sugar', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1/3 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon pepper', '1 lb skirt steak, trimmed of excess fat and halved crosswise', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '2 bunches arugula, tough stems discarded', '1/2 cup crumbled Roquefort']
directions: ['For dressing:', 'Whisk together mustard, sugar, lemon juice, vinegar, oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper.', 'Steak preparation:', 'Season steak with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Grill steak, turning halfway through, to your desired doneness. Transfer steak to a cutting board and let rest 3 minutes.', 'Salad assembly:', 'Toss arugula with enough dressing to coat. Thinly slice steak diagonally across the grain. Serve steak over salad sprinkled with Roquefort.']

recipe_name: Teriyaki Beef Stir Fry on the Grill
ingredients: ['coconut oil, melted to brush grill', '4 New Seasons Market Teriyaki Beef Skewers', '1 bunch of scallions', '3 red bell peppers, deseeded and stemmed, quartered', '2 yellow onions, peeled and cut into quarters', '2 bags New Seasons Market Coleslaw Mix from Produce', '1 (12 oz) jar Thai and True Peanut Sauce', 'Salt and black pepper']
directions: ['In a separate bowl toss together New Seasons Market coleslaw mix and add the amount of Thai and True Peanut Sauce you like to taste and consistency. Cover and refrigerate while grilling the meat and vegetables.', 'Prepare your grill to medium heat. Brush surface of the grill with coconut oil. Arrange skewers, whole scallions, bell peppers and onions on the grill surface. Cover and cook, 4-5 minutes. Turn skewers and all vegetables. Continue to cover and cook until meat reaches preferred temperature and vegetables have desired char about 4-5 minutes more.', 'Serve grilled skewers and vegetables on a bed of prepared coleslaw. Salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['2 head of romaine lettuce, split lengthwise and dried well', 'Olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'Grated Parmesan Reggiano cheese']
directions: ['Preheat your grill to medium high. Using a large bowl toss the halved romaine heads with a generous amount of olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt and black pepper. Place heads directly on the grill, 3 minutes per side. Transfer back to original bowl and garnish with parmesan cheese. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['1 stick stick unsalted butter, melted', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 ripe pineapple, skin removed and cut into rounds, use knife to remove core']
directions: ['Prepare grill for medium-high, direct heat. Combine butter, cinnamon, sugar and cloves in a small bowl. Dip pineapple rounds in butter mixture, shake off excess and place directly on the grill, 4-6 minutes per side or until sizzling and brown.']

ingredients: ['1 package New Seasons Market pizza dough', 'olive oil', 'The following ingredients are divided between the pizzas-', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 fresh basil leaves, torn in half, more if desired', '8 oz fresh mozzarella, sliced into ¼” rounds', '2 large ripe tomatoes, cored and diced', '3 oz grated Parmesan Reggiano', 'salt and black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat grill for medium heat and oil the grill grate well.', 'Using a generous amount of olive oil, grease a baking sheet. Lay out pizza dough and use your hands to pull it out, making a larger, flatter shape. Allow to rest 30 minutes. Break shape into 2 equal pieces and stretch each into a 10” x 7” rectangle. You may need additional olive oil for your hands as you want to keep the dough well oiled.', 'Carefully place 1 dough at a time on the grill. After about 1-2 minutes, the bottom should get crisp and dark. Turn over and as quickly as possible, brush with olive oil, sprinkle with garlic and lay out mozzarella, basil leaves and diced tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and continue to cook 2-4 additional minutes. Cheese will start to melt. Remove pizza to a plate and sprinkle with Parmesan, salt and pepper to taste.', 'Repeat with second dough. Serve warm.']

ingredients: ['1 lb asparagus, trimmed', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', 'kosher salt to taste', '3 tablespoons shredded Parmesan Reggiano cheese']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high. In a bowl, drizzle oil over asparagus coating evenly. Grill for 2 to 3 minutes on each side. Plate asparagus and drizzle with lemon juice. Lightly salt and top with Parmesan Reggiano.']

recipe_name: Grilled Halibut, Romaine and Tapenade Bundles
ingredients: ['12 very large romaine lettuce', '1/2 cup green olive tapenade', '1 lb cod or halibut fillets (1 in. thick)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh lemon juice or lemon wedges']
directions: ['Heat grill to medium (about 375°).', 'Cook lettuce leaves 2 or 3 at a time in a pot of boiling water until ribs are flexible, 2-3 minutes; as done, transfer to a bowl of ice water. Lay leaves flat with smooth sides up on kitchen towels and pat dry. Spread the 8 largest leaves with tapenade. Cut fish into 8 pieces; set 1 at base of each leaf. If leaf isn’t big enough to enclose fish, overlap leaf with another. Roll up each bundle from base, folding in sides. Brush bundles with oil.', 'Grill, turning once until fish is just opaque and up to temperature, about 8 minutes. Serve with lemon.']

ingredients: ['1 package New Seasons Partner Brand Pizza Dough', '1/2 - 1 cup New Seasons Partner Brand Marinara (or sauce of choice)', 'Mozzarella, grated Asiago and Parmesan or even sneak in a little Gouda for extra flavor', 'Large handful fresh herbs', 'Half a red onion', '5 slices salami or prosciutto', '1 cup of chopped greens or sliced tomatoes']
directions: ['Prep your dough – Let the dough sit at room temperature for at least one hour (more if you can). You will find it’s easier to stretch and roll into a thin circle. Hint: prep your dough on parchment paper and have a little extra olive oil and cornmeal on hand to keep the crust from sticking to the paper.', 'Heat the grill – I’m a fan of low and slow direct heat. Getting the temperature around 350° will avoid possibly burning the crust and allow the heat to slowly melt the cheese.', 'Have ingredients ready – Once you start heating the crust you will want to have ingredients close so you can dress the pizza with all the goodies.', 'Grill one side of the pizza – Brush one side of the dough with oil; this side will lay on the grill. Lay the dough round on the grill with oil side down. Brush the top of the dough with a thin layer of olive oil also. Let the dough cook for about 3-5 minutes with the lid off or until you notice the bottom of the crust getting a light golden brown color. Grills marks on the dough are fine but be careful not to overcook. Hint: Using a pizza stone is a great method and eliminates the need to precook one side of the dough. With a stone you can add toppings directly to the fresh dough and bake just like you would in a normal oven.', 'Top the Pizza – Flip the dough over with tongs or spatula. The dough should come off the grill easily without tearing. Now the fun begins. Add your toppings while the pizza is still on the grill. Try to avoid piling on ingredients or the crust may be ready before all the ingredients are hot and the cheese is melted.', 'Time to cook – Put the lid on and cook for 10-12 minutes, checking every 5 minutes. Don’t rush it, this is chill time where you can become one with your BBQ! Using your sense of smell can avoid burning the crust. If you notice the crust burning simply adjust your heat. Melted cheese and golden brown edges on the crust are a great sign your pizza is ready!', 'Ring the Bell – When the pizza is done simply use a pair of tongs or a spatula to slide onto a pizza pan or cutting board. Let sit for 3 minutes then cut into slices']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds wild salmon', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper', '2 tablespoons ghee', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F. Grease the bottom of a 9x13 baking dish. Sprinkle salmon with salt and pepper and place in the prepared dish. Mix together ghee (room temperature), lemon zest and dill. Place half of the mixture on top of the seasoned salmon, and spread across the surface of the fish. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until fully cooked, checking for doneness after 10 minutes. Add the remaining ghee/dill/lemon zest mixture on top, add a squeeze of lemon juice and serve with lemon slices and dill for garnish.']

ingredients: ['2 peaches, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 mango, pitted, peeled and chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '½ red onion, finely chopped', '3 jalapenos, seeded and chopped', '1 cup cilantro, finely chopped', 'Juice of 1 lime and 1 lemon', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Toss all but the lemon and lime juice in a mixing bowl and stir together. Add the juice of the lemon and lime second, along with salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['6 slices bacon', '4 ears of corn, shucked', '1 cup shredded extra-sharp white cheddar cheese', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 teaspoon chile powder (optional)']
directions: ['Stack the bacon slices and cut in half lengthwise, then cut crosswise into ½-inch pieces. In a large sauté pan set over medium-high heat, sauté bacon until crisp. Use a slotted spoon to transfer to paper towels. Blot off the excess grease and finely chop. Combine with shredded cheese on a dinner plate.', 'Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the corn and boil until kernels are tender, about 3 minutes. Drain and allow to cool for a few minutes until easy to handle. Alternatively, grill the corn over a medium-hot grill, turning occasionally, until kernels are tender, about 8 minutes.', 'Coat each corn with a heaping teaspoon of mayonnaise, sprinkle lightly with garlic salt, then roll in the bacon-cheddar cheese mixture, pressing lightly to help it adhere. Sprinkle with chile powder if you like, and serve.']

ingredients: ['Zest of one orange, left in wide ribbons', '1/2 cup orange juice', '1 lemon, sliced in cartwheels', '1/2 cup lemon juice', '1 bottle dry, hearty red wine', '3/4 cup sugar', '2 fresh peaches', '1 cup sliced strawberries', '1 cup club soda']
directions: ['Put orange zest, lemon slices, juices and wine in pitcher. Refrigerate at least 4 hours.', '1 hour before serving, stir in sugar and fruit and continue chilling.', 'Add soda when ready to serve.']

ingredients: ['2 ripe avocados', '2 tbsp. fresh lime juice', '1 1/2 tbsp olive oil', 'Salt, to taste']
directions: ['Cut avocado in half and remove seed. Drizzle with fresh lime juice and brush lightly with olive oil. Gently place cut side down on grill over hot coals for 2-3 minutes. Season with salt to taste. Optional: fill with fresh salsa or your favorite fresh ingredients.']

ingredients: ['8 strawberries, diced', '2 nectarines, peeled and diced', '1/2 red onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tomato, diced', '1/2 jalapeno pepper, diced', '3 green onions, finely sliced', '1/2 cup chopped cilantro', '1/2 tsp sugar', '1/2 tsp salt', '1 lime, juiced']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a bowl and serve immediately with your favorite tortilla chips!']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup Annie’s Artichoke Parmesan Dressing', '1 pound Yukon gold potatoes, scrubbed, unpeeled', '1/2 cup fresh Italian parsley, chopped', '1/2 cup Kalamata olive, pitted and halved', '3/4 cup canned artichoke, chopped', '1/4 cup green onion, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon capers, drained', '2 cloves fresh garlic, minced', 'Salt, to taste', 'Black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['In a large pot of boiling water, cook the diced potatoes until fork tender. Drain and set aside to cool. Once cooled, add the potatoes to a large mixing bowl.', 'Add the fresh parsley, Kalamata olives, artichokes, green onion, capers, garlic and Annie’s Artichoke and Parmesan Dressing. Toss well to blend and season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and keep in refrigerator an hour or until thoroughly chilled.', 'Just before serving, adjust seasonings if necessary.']

ingredients: ['1 Bottle of Moscato', '⅓ c Amaretto Liqueur', '¾ lb Cherries', 'Club Soda']
directions: ['Mix together Moscato wine, Amaretto, and cherries and refrigerate for 24-48 hours. After cherries have properly soaked, fill up ⅓ of each glass with mixture and top with club soda. Kick back and enjoy!']

recipe_name: BABY BACK RIBS WITH BOURBON BBQ SAUCE
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 racks (about 5 pounds) baby back or country-style pork ribs', '½ cup Podnah’s Barbecue Sauce', '¼ cup bourbon (preferably Woodford Reserve Double Oaked)', '2 to 3 tablespoons packed dark brown sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine smoked paprika, garlic powder, cumin, cayenne, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Place each rack of ribs on a sheet of foil large enough to wrap around it. Sprinkle both sides of each rack generously with the spice mixture and rub it in (you may not use it all). Wrap racks in the foil and place each on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake ribs until fully cooked and tender, roughly 2 hours for baby backs and 3 hours for spareribs.', 'Unwrap the ribs and pour the meat juices into a measuring cup (reserve for making the sauce). When ribs have cooled, rewrap in the foil and refrigerate (ribs can be cooked several days ahead).', 'In a small saucepan, combine the barbecue sauce, bourbon, brown sugar, and ½ cup of the meat juices. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat and cook until reduced by one-third, about 5 minutes. (Sauce can be made several days ahead and refrigerated.)', 'Preheat a charcoal or gas grill to medium-hot (you should be able to hold your hand 5 inches above the grate for 5 to 7 seconds before it gets too hot). Lightly oil the cooking grate, set the ribs on it and brush with barbecue sauce. Grill, brushing with the sauce and turning every few minutes, until ribs are hot and coated with a few layers of sauce, about 10 minutes.', 'To serve, cut between each rib and divide among plates. Serve the leftover sauce at the table.']

ingredients: ['3 peaches, halved and pitted', '6 ounces fresh goat cheese', '6-8 fresh basil leaves, sliced', '1/4 cup honey', 'Non-GMO canola oil', 'Kosher salt to taste', 'Cracked black pepper to taste', 'Pinch of cayenne (optional)']
directions: ['Brush cut halves with canola oil and season with salt & pepper.', 'Grill each peach on the cut side, just long enough to mark them.', 'Warm honey in a small pot or in microwave, then brush onto grilled surface of each peach half. Reserve a portion of honey for drizzling.', 'Cool completely.', 'Fill each peach cavity with 1 ounce goat cheese.', 'Garnish with sliced basil and drizzle with remaining warm honey. Optional: add a pinch of cayenne to honey before drizzling.']

recipe_name: Grilled Peach and Mozzarella Summer Salad
ingredients: ['3/4 cup balsamic vinegar', '2 ripe peaches, halved and pitted', '4 tsp. extra-virgin olive oil', '4 cups lightly packed baby spring mix', '1 cup Ciliegine (cherry-sized fresh mozzarella balls)', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat a gas or charcoal grill to medium heat.', 'Bring vinegar to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat.', 'Reduce heat and simmer until the mixture is thick and syrupy\xad—reduced to about ¼ cup. (Reduction will thicken a bit as it cools, do not overcook.) Remove from heat.', 'Coat peaches with half the olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill flesh side down until lightly charred, about 3-4 minutes. Allow to cool and slice each half into thirds.', 'In a medium bowl, toss the greens with the remaining 2 teaspoons of olive oil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Plate greens and top with mozzarella and peaches. Drizzle with balsamic reduction and season with salt and pepper to taste.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds cantaloupe (weight without seeds and rind), cut into small cubes and frozen', '1/4 cup freshly squeezed lime juice', '1/4 cup honey', '1/4 cup fresh mint, roughly chopped', 'Pinch of sea salt']
directions: ['Place all ingredients in food processor and process until smooth. Serve immediately or add it to the freezer to set up further, if necessary.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup olive oil', '1 tsp sea salt', '1/2 tsp ground black pepper', '1/2 tsp paprika', '1/2 tsp cumin', '1/4 tsp cayenne pepper', '2 cloves garlic chopped', '3 tbsp chopped shallots', '1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 1/2 cups your fave local lager', '¾ cup orange juice', '½ cup reduced-sodium tamari sauce', '¼ cup honey', '¼ cup chopped fresh garlic', '2 tbsp grated peeled ginger root', '¾ tsp crushed red pepper flake (optional)', '.5 cup olive oil', '2/3 cup vegetable broth', '.5 cup fresh lemon juice', '2 tbsp maple syrup', '4 tsp minced garlic', '2 tsp Italian seasoning', 'Salt and fresh ground black pepper to taste', '2 cup finely chopped shallots', '2 cup ketchup', '2/3 cup packed brown sugar', '2/3 cup red wine vinegar', '2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce', '1/4 tsp crushed red pepper', '2 cup soy sauce', '1 cup sugar', '1 cup sesame oil', '2 1/2 tbsp sesame seeds', '2 1/2 tbsp ginger', '2 1/2 tbsp garlic powder']
directions:
['FOR HERB MARINADE: Pour olive oil into mixing bowl.
In another small bowl, combine salt, pepper, paprika, cumin, and cayenne pepper. Whisk into olive oil.
Add garlic, onions, and parsley. Whisk together until combined. Slowly add beer (so as not to add bubbles/foam).
Pour marinade over the chicken in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator 1 hour or overnight for best results.', 'FOR TERIYAKI: Whisk together orange juice, tamari, maple, garlic, ginger and red pepper in mixing bowl.
Pour marinade over the meat in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator: chicken or meat 4 to 12 hours, fish or seafood 30 to 45 minutes.', 'FOR PALEO LEMON GARLIC MARINADE: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, chicken broth, lemon juice, honey, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper.
Pour marinade over the meat in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator 1 hour or overnight for best results.', 'FOR BBQ MARINADE: Combine all ingredients in small saucepan, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Remove 2 cup to use as marinade. Bring remaining suace to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer about 10 to 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until desired sauce consistency is reached. Set aside for use as sauce on cooked beef.
Marinade beef in 2 cups of sauce for 15 minutes to 2 hours for tender steaks; 6 hours or as long as overnight for less tender steaks, turning occasionally.
Discard marinade and grill steaks until desired doneness, then serve with previously set aside sauce.', 'FOR THAI MARINADE: In a small bowl, whisk together all ingredients.
Pour marinade over the meat in a plastic zipper bag. Remove as much air as and seal to close.
Marinate in refrigerator for 15 minutes to 2 hours for tender steaks; 6 hours or as long as overnight for less tender steaks, turning occasionally.']

recipe_name: Kathy Unger’s Spinach and Strawberry Salad—Unger Farms
ingredients: ['1/2 cup walnut oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced shallots', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', 'Kosher salt', 'black pepper', '2 ounces Parmesan–shaved on top', '2 bunches of spinach (about 8 cups, loosely packed)', '1 pint strawberries, hulled (stems/leaves removed) and thinly sliced, divided', '1/2 cup coarsely chopped toasted walnuts', '2 ounces Parmesan–shaved on top']
directions: ['In a small saucepan over medium heat, warm the oil with the shallots.', 'Reduce heat to low and cook until the shallots are softened, but not browned.', 'Add the vinegar and mustard, whisking to emulsify.', 'Season to taste with salt/pepper.', 'In a large serving blow, place the spinach and season with salt/pepper then add strawberries and walnuts.', 'Add half of the vinaigrette, toss well to coat and then add more, one tablespoon at a time.', 'Shave Parmesan on top and garnish.']

recipe_name: Kathy Unger’s No Cooking Freezer Jam—Unger Farms
ingredients: ['2 cups crushed strawberries', '4 cups sugar', '3/4 cup water', '1 box of pectin']
directions: ['Remove strawberry caps. Crush berries one layer at a time.', 'Combine strawberries and sugar. Mix thoroughly and let stand 10 minutes.', 'Combine 1 box of pectin and water in a small sauce pan. Boil hard 1 minute, stirring constantly', 'Add pectin mixture to fruit mixture. Stir 3 minutes.', 'Ladle into 8 oz. jelly jam or freezer jam jars, leaving 1/2" headspace.', 'Store in freezer. (May be stored in refrigerator up to 3 weeks.)']

recipe_name: Kiss of Ginger Melon—Savor Fresh Farms
ingredients: ['1 cup water', '2-3 inches peeled, minced ginger', '2 tbsp. sugar', '2 Kiss Melons (try one Honey and one Golden or Sugar) cut into bite-sized chunks', '3 tbsp. chopped basil, mint, or tarragon']
directions: ['Place water, ginger and sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. (For a less intense ginger flavor, keep the ginger whole while boiling and remove from the syrup after cooking.)', 'Boil for 10-15 minutes, uncovered, until the liquid has reduced by about half and turns syrupy. Let the syrup cool before use.', 'Drizzle the ginger syrup over the melon chunks and top with fresh herbs.']

ingredients: ['2 cups flour', '1 cup butter or margarine', '4 tablespoons powdered sugar', '6 ounces (2 packages) cream cheese', '8 ounces (1 container) whipped topping', '1 cup powdered sugar', '1 pint strawberries, 1/2 pint blueberries, 1/2 pint blackberries, washed']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray round pizza pan and set aside.', 'Crust: In a medium bowl, cut flour, butter and powdered sugar into coarse crumbs. Press evenly into prepared pan. Bake 8-10 minutes or until lightly brown. Let cool.', 'Filling: Mix cream cheese, whipped topping and powdered sugar. Spread over crust and refrigerate until ready to use.', 'Arrange fresh sliced berries on top.']

ingredients: ['1.5 oz aquavit', '.25 oz RAFT Ginger Syrup', '.25 oz lemon juice', '4-6 dashes The Bitter Housewife Cardamom Bitters', '3 oz soda water']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.', 'Stir to mix.', 'Garnish with an orange twist.']

ingredients: ['1 cup pomegranate juice', '1 cup blueberries', '1 cup coconut water', 'Sparkling water', 'Small splash of vodka']
directions: ['Pour pomegranate juice into ice cube tray. Freeze.', 'Place blueberries in another ice cube tray and pour coconut water over berries. Freeze.', 'When frozen, place pomegranate and coconut blueberry cubes in glasses. Pour sparkling water over the cubes, plus vodka.']

recipe_name: Summer Salmon with Grapes and Olives
ingredients: ['4 each 6 ounce Coho salmon', '2 tablespoons butter', '1/2 cup minced sweet onion', '1 cup red seedless grapes cut in half', '12 each pitted Castelvetrano olives sliced thin', '1 tablespoon each chopped parsley and green onion', '4 teaspoons sherry vinegar', 'Zest of 1 small lemon and juice from half of the lemon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°. Salt and pepper salmon fillets and place on a parchment covered sheet pan. Bake 15-20 minutes, or until fully cooked (depending on thickness of fillets and desired doneness).', 'While salmon bakes, melt butter in a sauté pan on medium high heat and cook onions until they begin to soften. Add a pinch of salt. Add half of the grapes, olives, and cook until grapes start to release their juice. Remove from the heat and add parsley and green onion. Add remaining grapes, vinegar and zest. Add lemon juice to taste.', 'Top salmon with grapes and enjoy!']

ingredients: ['1 whole fryer chicken, around 4-5 lbs, cleaned and rinsed', '1 tbsp garlic powder', '1 tbsp ground cumin', '1/2 tbsp ground coriander', '1/2 tbsp smoked paprika', '1/2 tbsp sea salt', '1/4 tbsp ground black pepper', '2 tbsp olive oil', '½ can your favorite lager-style beer']
directions:
['Heat grill to medium heat (325-350 degrees).
Rub whole chicken liberally with olive oil.
In a small bowl mix together garlic powder, ground cumin, ground coriander, smoked paprika, sea salt and ground pepper.
Rub seasoning into chicken until well coated.
Place body cavity of chicken over beer can, and transfer to grill.
Grill chicken until it reaches an internal temperature of 160 (thigh) and 180 (breast). This is a low and slow process—approximately 1 ½ hours.
Let chicken rest before carving and serving.']

ingredients: ['1 bottle of New Seasons Partners in Crime Rosé', '½ sweet summer melon, peeled and seeded-cut into chunks', '¼ cup lime juice', 'Garnish of basil leaf and slice of cucumber']
directions: ['Pour rosé into a 13 x 9" pan and freeze until almost solid (at least 6 hours)', 'Scrape rosé into a blender. Add melon and lime juice, Transfer blender jar to freezer and freeze until frozé is thickened 25–35 minutes', 'Serve in party glasses with a garnish of basil leaf and a slice of cucumber']

ingredients: ['1 1/4 cup sugar', '1 cup self-rising flour', '1 cup milk', '1/2 cup melted butter', '1 tsp vanilla', '2 cups diced strawberries']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350. Spray an 11" x 8" baking dish with non-stick cooking spray.', 'Whisk together 1 cup sugar and flour.', 'Add milk. Whisk until almost smooth.', 'Add melted butter and vanilla. Pour into your baking dish.', 'Top with strawberries and remaining sugar.', 'Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, until golden.', 'Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.']

recipe_name: Roasted Red Pepper and Spinach Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ['15 medium-size cremini mushrooms, stems removed (save stems for filling)', '1/2 tablespoon ½ Tbsp olive oil', '1/4 cup ¼ cup sweet onion, finely chopped', '1/2 cup ½ cup mushroom stems, finely chopped', '1/3 cup 1/3 cup roasted red peppers, finely chopped', '5 ounces 5 ounces frozen spinach, thawed and excess liquid squeezed out', '1-1 1/2 tablespoon 1-1½ Tbsp nutritional yeast', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 drizzle Balsamic reduction']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.', 'In a skillet, over medium heat, sauté onions and mushrooms stems with olive oil for 8-10 minutes or until onions are translucent.', 'Add roasted red peppers and spinach and heat another 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Add sea salt and pepper to taste.', 'Dividing evenly, fill mushroom caps with filling. Bake for 25-30 minutes.', 'Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups quinoa, rinsed and drained', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 cup beets, peeled and grated', '1/2 cup finely chopped parsley', '1/2 cup chopped scallions', '2 1/2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '3 cups baby salad greens', '1 medium carrot, julienned']
directions: ['Place quinoa and 2 1/4 cups water and salt in a sauce pan, bring to boil. Turn down to low heat, cover. Simmer until done, about 15 minutes. Remove, fluff up quinoa.', 'Stir in beets, until all the grains turn scarlet. Stir in parsley, scallions, olive oil and lemon juice. Serve on a bed of salad greens, surrounded with carrot sticks. This may be served warm, room temperature or chilled. Additional lemon juice and sea salt may be added if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 sweet onion, diced', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '2 limes, juiced', '6 apricots, cubed', '1 large jalapeno, chopped fine', '1 cup cherries, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, taste and adjust for seasoning. Fruit salsas are a great accompaniment to grilled meat or fish. You can mix and match the fruit and herbs to create a multitude of combinations.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup sesame oil', '1/4 cup toasted sesame oil', '1/2 cup rice wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon peeled & minced ginger', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon tahini', 'Hot chili paste or sriracha (optional) to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.', 'Finely slice a head of cabbage, add a cup of shredded carrots, and toss with the dressing for a crunchy salad that will last a few days in the fridge even after it’s been tossed.']

ingredients: ['2 avocados', '1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons raw cacao powder', '3/4 cup maple syrup', '1/2 cup coconut cream (solids from the top of the canned coconut milk)', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon maca powder (optional)', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne (optional, omit to make anti-inflammatory)']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a high speed blender or food processor. Blend until it is silky smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning. Refrigerate and serve with cashew cream or whipped coconut cream.']

ingredients: ['6 ears corn, sliced off cob', '1 medium red onion, diced', '1 pint blueberries', '1/4 cup fresh lime juice', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 cup thinly sliced & packed basil leaves', 'salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Steam the corn with water in a large saucepan over medium heat, covered, until bright yellow, about 4 minutes. Remove the lid and continue to cook the corn, stirring frequently, until the water evaporates, about 3 minutes longer. Transfer the corn to a large bowl and let cool slightly. Mix in red onion, blueberries, lime juice and olive oil. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover bowl and refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours. Remove the salad from the refrigerator and fold in basil. Serve immediately.']

ingredients: ['1 medium yellow onion, chopped', '1 bunch collard, thinly sliced', '2-3 tablespoons avocado oil', '1/4 cup water', '1/2 cup full fat coconut milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat oil in a 9 inch skillet over medium heat, add onions and saute until they just begin to turn translucent, about five minutes.', 'Trim the bottom inch from the collards, then cut into thin strips by rolling 4-5 leaves into a tight bundle and cut crosswise into 1/4-1/2 inch strips (it’s not necessary to remove the stalk). Add greens to the onions, add the water and cover, reduce heat to low, and cook for 30-40 minutes. Add the coconut milk and turmeric, stir to combine, increase heat to medium, and cook for about 10 minutes or until the mixture has thickened.']

recipe_name: Burrito Bowl with Kale and Black Beans
ingredients: ['1 cup brown rice, rinsed & cooked', '1 bunch curly kale, destemmed and chopped', '1/4 cup lime juice', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 jalapeno, deseeded & minced', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1 avocado pitted', '1/2 cup mild salsa verde', '1/2 cup coarsely chopped cilanto', '1 lime juiced', '2 cans black beans, rinsed & drained', '1 shallot, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced or pressed', '1/4 teaspoon chili powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne (optional)', 'sliced cherry tomatoes', 'avocado slices', 'hot sauce', 'vegan sour cream or plain yogurt', 'sliced almonds', 'hulled hemp seeds']
directions: ['Prepare and cook rice as directed.', 'Prepare kale: whisk lime juice, olive oil, jalapeno, cumin, and sea salt. Toss the sauce with the chopped kale in a medium-mixing bowl. Set aside.', 'Prepare the avocado Sauce: blend avocado, green salsa, cilantro, and lime juice in a food processor or blender until creamy.', 'Prepare beans: Warm a little olive oil or avocado oil in a sauce pan over medium-low heat. Sauté shallot and garlic until fragrant. Add beans, chili powder, and cayenne pepper and cook until beans are warmed/softened (about 5 minutes).', 'To serve, scoop a little rice, beans, and kale mixture into a bowl. Dollop or drizzle the avocado sauce and garnish with desired veggies/toppings.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups butternut squash, cooked', '1/4 teaspoon Italian herbs', '1/4 cup water or broth, or more as needed', 'sea salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat squash, water and seasonings in a sauce pan over medium-low heat. Stir frequently and mash squash with spoon. For a smooth sauce, blend mixture in a food processor.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup coconut oil, melted', '1/2 cup raw cacao powder', '1/2 cup almond butter', '1/4 cup raw honey', '1/4 cup unsweetened shredded coconut', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Line a muffin tin with paper muffin cups. Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor and blend/process until smooth. Divide the liquid between muffin cups, filling 1/4-1/2 inch full. Place in refrigerator for 30 minutes and enjoy once solidified. For quicker results, place in freezer. Store in an airtight container in the fridge or freezer.']

ingredients: ['15 medium-size cremini mushrooms, stems removed (save stems)', '1/2 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 cup finely chopped sweet onion', '1/4 cup finely chopped mushroom stems', '1/3 cup roasted red peppers', '5 oz frozen spinach, thawed and excess fluid squeezed out', '1-1 1/2 tablespoon nutritional yeast', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', 'Balsamic reduction for drizzling (optional)']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. In a skillet, over medium heat, sauté onions and mushrooms stems with olive oil for 8-10 minutes or until onions are translucent. Add roasted red peppers and spinach and heat another 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Add sea salt and pepper to taste. Dividing evenly, fill mushroom caps with veggie mix. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving if desired.']

ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups unsweetened shredded coconut', '4 oz semisweet chocolate']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Toast coconut until fragrant and lightly browned. Melt chocolate using a double boiler. When melted, remove from heat and stir in cooled toasted coconut. Place parchment or wax paper on a cookie sheet. Drop coconut chocolate mixture by spoonfuls onto cookie sheet and refrigerate until firm.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon gluten-free mustard', '1 tablespoon raw honey or maple syrup', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons celery seed', 'Sea salt and pepper to taste', '1 small head green cabbage, finely shredded', '1 large carrot, grated', '1 cup shredded vegetables of choice (such as snap peas, radishes, broccoli, etc.)']
directions: ['Whisk together dressing ingredients (vinegar, mustard, honey or maple syrup, olive oil, celery seed, and salt and pepper) in a bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste. Toss with cabbage and other veggies.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons gluten-free mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon celery seed', 'Sea salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Whisk together ingredients in a small bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste.']

ingredients: ['3 cups cooked garbanzo beans', '2-3 cloves fresh garlic, crushed', '1/2 cup freshly-squeezed lemon juice', '1/4-1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1-2 teaspoons sea salt', '1/2 cup sesame tahini', '2 cups fresh baby spinach, washed and dried']
directions: ['Drain beans and set aside. Place garlic, lemon juice, olive oil and sea salt in a food processor and blend until creamy.', 'Add sesame tahini and blend.', 'Add ½ the beans and ½ the spinach and blend.', 'Add the other ½ of the beans and spinach and blend until desired consistency is achieved. If you like a very creamy hummus, you may need to add a little water or a bit more lemon juice or olive oil.']

ingredients: ['4 large garnet or jewel yams, scrubbed and cut in half lengthwise', '2 tablespoons raw coconut butter*', 'Sea salt and black pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Place split yams face-down in glass baking dish containing one inch of water. Cover dish and bake yams at 350° F for 75 minutes. When cool enough to handle, remove skins from yams. Mash or whip yams with coconut butter. Add sea salt and pepper to taste. For variety, try baking a combination of sweet potatoes or Japanese yams (purple skin, white flesh) instead of garnet or jewel yams.']

ingredients: ['1 green plantain peeled and sliced', '3/4 to 1 cup coconut oil, plus more if needed for frying', 'salt, to taste']
directions: ['Heat the coconut oil in a sauté pan until hot. Carefully place plantain slices in pan, cook on each side until crispy and golden brown. Remove with slotted spoon and place on paper towels to drain. Sprinkle with salt and serve hot.']

ingredients: ['1 15 oz can chickpeas/garbanzo beans, rinsed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning -or-', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika, ½ teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon sea salt, ¼ teaspoon pepper -or-', '1 1/2 teaspoon smoked sea salt']
directions: ['Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and preheat oven to 350° F. Drain and rinse beans, then pat dry. In a bowl or bag, toss with oil and seasoning.']

ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ground turmeric', '2 tablespoons ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground cardamom', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['2 cups pinto beans (rinsed 3 times and sorted)', '8 cups water', '1-2 tablespoons sea salt']
directions: ['In a large pot, bring beans and water to a boil. Cover and reduce to simmer for 4 hours. Add 1 tablespoon sea salt, mash with potato masher (3-4 mashes to thicken liquid but keep most beans whole) and simmer another 30 minutes uncovered. Add more salt to taste if needed.']

ingredients: ['1 cup green lentils, uncooked', '1 cup toasted walnuts, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon avocado oil or coconut oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 1/2 cups sweet onion, diced', '1 cup celery, diced', '1 cup carrot, grated', '1/3 cup apple, peeled/grated', '1/3 cup raisins', '3 tablespoon ground flax AND 1/2 cup water (thoroughly mixed in a bowl)', '1/2 cup oat flour', '3/4 cup breadcrumbs', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme (or 3/4 teaspoon dried thyme)', 'Salt and pepper to taste', 'Red pepper flakes, to taste', '1/4 cup ketchup or tomato paste', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '2 tablespoon apple butter (or unsweetened applesauce)', '2 tablespoon balsamic vinegar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Rinse lentils and place into a pot with 3 cups of water. Bring to a boil and sprinkle in a little salt. Reduce heat to medium/low and simmer uncovered for 40-45 minutes. Stir frequently and add water as needed. Cook lentils until slightly overcooked. Once done, mash with the back of a big spoon.', 'Heat avocado or coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and sauté for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with salt and add celery, carrot, apple, and raisins. Sauté for 5 minutes more and remove from heat. In a large mixing bowl, mix all remaining loaf ingredients together with lentils and veggies and season to taste. Grease a loaf pan with a little oil and line with parchment paper. Press mixture firmly into the pan.', 'Combine all glaze ingredients and mix until creamy. Spread ½ of this mixture onto prepared loaf. Reserve the remainder for dipping sauce. Bake loaf at 350°F for 40-45 minutes uncovered. Edges should be lightly brown. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.']
