ingredients: ['1/2 cup quinoa, rinsed and drained', '1 pinch sea salt', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup lime juice', '3 cloves garlic, pressed', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper', '1 1/2 cup cooked black beans, rinsed', '1 cup corn, steamed and cooled', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '1/2 cup chopped cilantro']
directions: ['Boil water in small sauce pan, slowly add quinoa, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until all water is absorbed. Remove quinoa from heat and set aside to cool. Meanwhile, whisk dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Combine all black beans, cooled steamed corn, diced pepper, and chopped cilantro. When quinoa is cool, fold it in with the rest of salad and dressing.']

ingredients: ['7-10 large dates, pitted', '3/4 cup walnuts, soaked in water for 2-8 hours and rinsed', '3/4 cup almond meal', '1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon maple syrup', '1 tablespoon water', 'Raw or toasted coconut', 'Fresh berries']
directions: ['Toss dates, walnuts, and almond meal in a food processor, blend, and add in cocoa powder and maple syrup. Continue to process and add water. More water may be added to reach desired consistency. Press mixture into a glass baking dish and refrigerate or freeze. Keeps in the freezer for up to a month.']

ingredients: ['3 tablespoons garlic powder', '3 tablespoons dried lemon peel', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together and store in an airtight container.']

ingredients: ['1/4 cup coconut milk whipped cream*', '1 tablespoon frozen cherries', '1 banana, sliced', '1 teaspoon dark chocolate hemp seeds**']
directions: ['In a bowl: combine So Delicious coco whip, frozen cherries, sliced banana and Himalania dark chocolate hemp seeds… the perfect nut pick parfait!']

ingredients: ['1 cup brown basmati rice', '4 cups nut milk of your choice', '1/3 vanilla bean', '1 cinnamon stick', 'Fingertip size of peeled ginger', 'Pinch of sea salt', 'Coconut nectar to taste', '2 tablespoons coconut cream']
directions:
['Add the first 6 ingredients to the pot and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to a simmer and cook for approximately 45 minutes or until the rice is cooked. When rice is cooked through remove cinnamon stick and ginger and scrape vanilla bean into cooked rice. Add sweetener and coconut cream and enjoy!', 'At this point you can add whatever flavors you would like:
Fresh mixed berries
Lime zest and toasted coconut
Toasted almonds and raisins
Caramelized banana
Stewed rhubarb and strawberries
Different spices to travel around the world!']

ingredients: ['1 cup roasted and salted cashews', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus extra', '3 lbs ripe heirloom tomatoes, seeded', '1 lb strawberries, hulled', '1/2 cucumber, peeled and seeded', '1 red bell pepper, cored and seeded', '1/2 medium sweet onion, peeled', '1/2 cup mild olive oil, such as Arbequina', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar, plus extra', 'Finely diced cucumber, strawberry, and mint for garnish']
directions: ['Working in two batches in a blender, combine half the cashews, garlic, vegetables and strawberries. Puree until very smooth.', 'Add half the olive oil to the blender and puree until fully incorporated. Transfer the soup to a large bowl.', 'Repeat the blending process with the remaining ingredients and transfer to the same bowl.', 'Stir the vinegar and salt into the soup. Taste and adjust seasoning to your liking.', 'Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours before serving. Serve topped with cucumber, strawberry and mint.']

ingredients: ['1 pint blueberries', '2 bunches flat leaf parsley', '1/3 cup mint leaves', '1 each small cucumber', '1/4 each white onion', '1 cup hemp hearts', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon New Seasons Market Moroccan Seasoning']
directions: ['Rinse blueberries in cold water and set half of them aside. With the other half, use a food processor to pulse into a coarse puree.', 'Rinse parsley and mint in cool water, pat dry, and chop.', 'Peel and dice cucumber.', 'Mince white onion.', 'Combine vegetables, blueberries, and herbs in a large bowl with hemp seeds.', 'Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and Moroccan Seasoning to make a dressing.', 'Pour dressing over salad and mix to coat all ingredients.', 'Let rest at least one hour and up to 24 hours before serving.\nServes 4 as a side dish.']

recipe_name: Creamy Zucchini Soup with Hemp Seeds
ingredients: ['4 medium zucchini, sliced lengthwise', '1 large onion, peeled and quartered', '2 large cloves garlic, peeled', '1 cup water', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '2 teaspoon Ume plum vinegar', '1 tablespoon hemp seeds', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '1/4 cup nutritional yeast', '', '2 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon hemp seeds', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper']
directions: ['Fill a large stock pot with about an inch of water. Place metal steamer in pot and add zucchini, onions, and garlic. Steam with lid on for about 5 minutes, until the zucchini is tender and the onions are just slightly translucent. Remove from heat, and transfer vegetables to a blender. Add about ½-¾ cup of the steam water (you can add more later if need be, depending how thick you like it). Then add in salt, Ume plum vinegar, coconut oil, and nutritional yeast, and blend on high till everything is fully incorporated and creamy smooth. Divide the soup among bowls and garnish with the olive oil, hemp seeds, and cayenne pepper.']

recipe_name: Farro Salad with Hemp Seed Pesto
ingredients: ['2 cups farro, cooked until tender', '1/4 cup roasted garlic cloves', '1 (14 ounce) jar artichoke hearts, drained and diced', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '1/2 cup hemp seed pesto (recipe follows)', '2 ounces fresh basil, leaves only', '1 packed cup Italian parsley, leaves only', '1/3 cup hemp seeds', '2 cloves garlic', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/3 cup olive oil', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['To make the pesto, combine the basil, parsley, hemp seeds, garlic, and lemon in a food processor and pulse to chop, scraping down the sides as necessary. Once the mixture is finely chopped, add the olive oil in a steady stream through the feed tube with the machine running until you have a thick sauce, again scraping down the sides as needed. Season the pesto to taste with salt and pepper and set aside until ready to use.', 'To make the salad, combine the farro, garlic, artichoke hearts, and tomatoes in a large bowl and toss with the pesto sauce. Season with additional salt and pepper if desired.']

ingredients: ['1/2 cup rice*', '1 1/2 cups water', '1/2 cup red lentils', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon dijon mustard', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/4 cup olive oil', '1 cup scallions, chopped']
directions: ['Gently wash and drain the rice. In a pot, bring 1 1/2 cups water and 1/2 cup rice to boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 45 minutes. Remove from heat. In a separate pot, bring 1 cup water and 1/2 cup lentils to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer and leave covered for 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Once fully cooked, combine lentils and rice and rinse in a strainer under cold water. In separate dish combine mustard, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt. Whisk until smooth and toss into rice and lentil combination. Add chopped scallions and mix again to combine all ingredients. Refrigerate and served chilled.']

ingredients: ['1 cup steel-cut oats', '1 13.5oz can full-fat coconut milk (save can for measuring water)', '1 13.5oz can filled to brim with water', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/8 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons coconut oil', '2 medium carrots, grated', '1 large apple, chopped', '6 medjool dates, chopped', '2 tablespoons maple syrup (optional to add sweetness)']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker. Stir to combine, cook on low for 8 hours. If you prefer a chewier texture to your oats try cooking this during the day for 6 hours, then reheat the following day for breakfast.']

ingredients: ['4 cups cherries, stemmed and pitted', 'Zest of 1/2 orange', 'Zest of ½ lemon', '5 garlic cloves, peeled and crushed', '2 rosemary sprigs', '5 thyme sprigs', '2 bay leaves', '¾ cup extra virgin olive oil', '¼ cup sherry vinegar', '½ tsp sea salt']
directions: ['In a large mixing bowl, combine cherries, zest of both citrus, garlic, rosemary thyme and bay leaves.', 'In a small mixing bowl, combine olive oil, vinegar and salt. Pour oil mixture over the cherries. Stir well.', 'Let sit at room temperature for about 4 hours, stirring occasionally. Cover and refrigerate overnight.', 'Allow to come to room temperature before serving (worth it, we promise!)']

ingredients: ['2 ripe avocados', '2 tbsp. fresh lime juice', '1 1/2 tbsp olive oil', 'Salt, to taste']
directions: ['Cut avocado in half and remove seed. Drizzle with fresh lime juice and brush lightly with olive oil. Gently place cut side down on grill over hot coals for 2-3 minutes. Season with salt to taste. Optional: fill with fresh salsa or your favorite fresh ingredients.']

ingredients: ['2 ripe bananas, sliced and frozen']
directions: ['Add frozen banana slices to food processor and begin pureeing them. Use a spatula to scrape down the sides and encourage uniform blending. The process may take a few minutes. Enjoy immediately in soft serve consistency or freeze for an hour for a firmer texture. Top with cacao nibs or a drizzle of almond butter.']

ingredients: ['8 tablespoons New Seasons Partner Brand Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided', '5 lbs butternut squash, peeled and cubed (6-8 cups)', '2 medium leeks, light green and white portion, sliced and soaked in cold water', '2 cups diced celery (about 4 large stalks)', '1 cup New Seasons Partners in Crime Pinot Gris wine', '1 16 oz bag New Seasons Partner Brand Artisan Bread Stuffing (broken into small pieces) or 16oz Gluten Free Bread Stuffing', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme or sage, or combination', '1 quart vegetable stock or mushroom stock', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°. Toss squash in 3 tablespoons of olive oil and place in one layer on a rimmed baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and roast approximately 25 minutes or until tender. Stir halfway through.', 'On medium heat, heat 3 tablespoons of olive oil in a sauté pan and add drained leeks, celery and 1 teaspoon salt. Stir and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes, and add wine. Increase heat to medium high and let wine reduce by half. Remove from heat.', 'Place bread stuffing in a large bowl and add roasted squash, celery-leek mixture, herbs, 2 teaspoons salt and ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. With a large spoon, mix to combine and add stock and stir until all bread is softened.', 'Place in an oiled 9” x 13” baking dish and drizzle the top with 2 tablespoons of olive oil.', 'At this point, you can cover and refrigerate stuffing for 3 days.', 'When ready to serve, remove from refrigerator, uncover and place in a preheated 350° oven, for approximately 30 minutes or until the top is golden brown and it is heated through.']
